title: Good, not great

review: this app essentially took a well run system and turned it upside down. i wont be scammed into paying to get a ride sooner. i can understand if folks want to pay a membership fee for discounts, but to make what is already a difficult task of getting a ride in a decent amount of time and making it worse is sad. we don't all live huge cities with an abundance of drivers on the road and when you choose to make a priority membership that essentially cancels rides left and ride, scheduled rides included, it's seems a whole lot like a scam. i don't use the service anymore, went exclusively to your competitor. you all really have to do better.
title: Good customer service optional

review: had two appalling experiences with lyft drivers within three days. one of them tried to get me to walk half a block down to a cross street instead of picking me up at the set pickup location, and angrily hung up on me when i tried to call him to see where he was. he aggressively peeled over to the curb to pick me up - it was clear he was furious. the second pulled up to pick up the second rider on a shared ride, but didn't realize that he had a second rider, so proceeded to cancel her as a rider and drove off, leaving her alone on a dark street at night. they also give no refunds or credits to attempt a second chance. lyft is a vile company. avoid at all costs, go with uber.
title: Disgusting driver behavior

review: new user of lyft. arrived and scheduled car. car arrived and as i approached the car she asked where are you going. i told her and she said i won't take you there.  it is not a bad area or anything it was just in the opposite direction of where she lives. when i asked why she accepted the ride she said the system does not tell her the location of the drop off. this was a terrible user experience as there were limited other cars and the taxi driver standing there said it would be $65 more than the lyft cost.
title: Driver showed up and then said No, I won't take you

review: missed my flight after my lyft driver decided to cancel my scheduled ride after being already 20 min late on my scheduled pick up time. when will lyft stop allowing their drivers to cancel at the last minute? users should be able to rely on the car showing up and on time. there is no good reason for the driver to be able to cancel when the time and itinerary is known to them and they accept the ride. it is an awful customer experience and you cannot even report the driver for their bad behavior as 1) they disappear from your ride history, and 2) there is no lyft email or number to reach. great way to reward bad behavior, lyft.
title: Lyft does not care about its users

review: it used to be easy to get a lyft in my area but now the waits are 2+ hours and the prices are way over what they should be. there are a lot of people who use lyft and uber where i live so it's ridiculous that they cut down on the drivers in my area. not to mention drivers will frequently cancel the ride after already waiting 20+ min for them to get to me, making me late to work on multiple occasions. the transit system is also very limited where i live and a lot of people in my area rely on lyft or uber and complain about there being no drivers even though it's a very populated area. it's an extremely unreliable source of transportation.
title: Cutting drivers out of my area

review: this was my first lyft ride so i didn't know what to expect. 1) driver was nice and friendly, 2) his car windows were dirty on the inside from long neglect, 3) the trunk where i stowed my luggage looked like the bottom of a dumpster, literally, covered in trash, 4) and more importantly he was a poor driver. once he turned onto an undivided 4 lane highway (lebanon road) and drove against oncoming traffic until i yelled and leaned over the seat and pointed to the correct lanes; i don't think he sees well and doesn't know his left from right. i hate to criticize him but i feel obligated to be frank. i tipped him $5 cash as he used gps to get me home.
title: Great guy; poor driver

review:
i rarely use lyft anymore, but since my car was totaled, i was forced into using the app i never had problems with. the first ride i take in a long time, i end up leaving my house keys, i do understand that's due to my negligence, but it was very urgent for me to get these back. i took the appropriate steps to get them back. long story short, driver did not give them back, fee was charged and when trying to dispute charges via email or in the support chat, it was very difficult and nearly impossible to get this situation handled efficiently. 
i just want the money for the fee back for the item i never received, i'll be spending more than that changing my locks anyways.
title: POOR/SKETCHY CUSTOMER SERVICE

review: i appreciate the thorough investigation and quick response to complaints that i've had about drivers that have either given me an excuse of why they can't pick up my dog or they just don't want to pick up my dog. even after explaining that it's a federal law and telling them it's not a pet it's a working animal they don't seem to care. but the quick response from your hotline reassures me that someone does care. thank you!
title: Service animals

review:
hit with a prime time fee that doubled the quoted amount of the ride. no warning. customer service playing dumb as bricks. blaming me.  

this terrible company spent hundreds of billions in advertising in california to prevent their drivers from becoming full time employees through a proposition. 

doing a chargeback and crossing my fingers. i've screenshotted what i need but this app is long deleted. support your local taxi business if you can.
title: So expensive you might as well call a cab.

review: in chicago we had a wonderful public service called divvy. for a reasonable yearly fee you could access an extensive network of decent bikes anywhere in the city. after lyft acquired divvy they have allowed the classic bikes to deteriorate and replaced them with e-bikes that cost an absolutely absurd amount of money. all while receiving significant amounts of public funding from the city. what lyft has done to our public biking service is very sad.
title: Lyft can be great, but they have absolutely gutted divvy

review:
my driver justin was absolutely fabulous!
his car was very nice & clean, he was a great safe & fast driver! 5 starts don't do the justice! he was 10!  my problem was,for some kind of a flow in your system,he was sent to a different location 10 minutes away from my home. i texted justin the correct address & he came over. we lost time some precious time,in the process. but,thank goodness,he was such a superb driver,we managed to go on time to the airport!
title: Airport

review: i made a mistake and had us go to the wrong terminal. our driver was already booking his next ride when we realized our mistake. he just quietly took us to the right terminal so that we didn't miss our flight. i always thought that you should judge people not when things go right but when they go wrong is when you can see true character. gels is an asset to your organization. thank you
title: First Lyft experience Great service

review: i was so frustrated because lyft did not even help me to review my problem. last april 17 i requested a ride to pick me up at 119 st pauls ave jersey city going to 730 newark ave jersey city but to my dismay the driver did not show up and i got a note thanking me for riding jeison. the history ride shown was he picked up at 38 skillman and drop to john f kennedy . this is not my address . i was trying to dispute about it but lyft has not action about it. it was really annoying and i was so frustrated
title: Driver did not pick me up

review: i understand that when i scheduled a ride, i was warned that it would be subject to be canceled at any point in time. however the last 3 times i tried to use this service, i have been canceled on 10 minutes before i'm supposed to be picked up. i'm getting reminded an hour early that i have a ride, and expected to be ready asap but then i get to scramble for a new ride 10 minutes before i'm suppose to leave? driver should be required to warn you at least 15 minutes. most things are time sensitive. this is crazy inconsiderate.
title: Cancel rides

review: i have used uber in the past and now that i have signed up with lyft i can definitely see the difference your company is way better in every single way the timing that you guys get to your destinations to pick me up the friendly customer service and all the people seem to have really nice cars as well i thought i'd let you know every single driver i've had is so very personable you guys should give them all a raise
title: All my Lyft drivers

review:
if you have any issues you have literally no means of holding them accountable. 

my experience:
i had a driver pick me up from my work, drive a couple miles, say his app isn't working and i'm driving him for free, and asked me to cancel and re order. the next driver i cancelled as he was trying to pick me up again. he drove me to a random corner and said it's a good spot and kicked me out.

good luck calling corporate (if there even really is one). i spoke to some nice young man from india who told me there's nothing he can do, because he was in the accident reporting department (only one i could get a call back from).

ultimately, i was charged a $5 cancellation fee and am still trying to get a human on the line. albeit only 5 dollars, i am considering legal action for the total and complete lack of accountability this worthless service has. one bad apple happens - but when the company supports the bad it's a problem. don't use lyft. i was even considering using them for my business, glad i know they're completely unreliable.
title: Do NOT USE LYFT

review: okay so for my every day routine, i like to order my lyft while i'm still getting ready so the driver gets to me by the time i'm done. i don't want to finish getting ready & then order a lyft & wait for the app to find a driver and then the time it takes to get to me & risk being late. it's really annoying when i choose the 15 minute wait & save feature thinking i can still have 10 minutes to get ready but the driver gets to me in 3 minutes. if i wanted the driver to get to me that quickly, i would use the instant feature. please fix that.
title: Time

review: i am a member and though they say you save 15%, they show rates more in the times you travel and to the destinations you travel regularly and show they discounted. if you choose, wait and save, just before your wait time over they cancel and allocate another driver and put you on further waiting list. if you think, driver is not making any move and it's getting delayed and cancel the driver who is dropping some other near by, they charge you 50% of original charge. when you ask why, they won't even respond in twitter. uber shows prices less than this app during peak hours or regular hours. so, check and take wise decision
title: Misleading and waste!

review: ok so this whole lyft dash uber thing is completely new to me and i'm a little bit older in my 50s. but as i continue to use the service i find one amazing idea somebody had and how well it's worked out for me. i have a friend that lives in los angeles and we talk a lot on the phone and he talks about his experience with lyft and has been nothing but good reviews and i second that there's only one problem but i don't wanna get into that now maybe in the future. overall my experience has been good
title: New to Lyft

review: terrible app the drivers are literally so lazy and would cancel 5 or less minutes before pickup, and this has happened multiple times in a row. i cannot stress enough how many times this awful service has made me late for work, honestly pt is preferable to this crap. my worst experience has to be a time when this new driver cancelled me mid ride and dropped me off in the middle of nowhere, the bimbo had accidentally accepted a different ride and was afraid her score would go down, worst part is customer service was no help and i never received a refund, just the worst of the worst drivers, customer service and really crappy ui on the app as well. take uber
title: Rider

review: our auto repair shop arranged my first lyft ride (on the auto shop's account). i learned a lot about lyft from my first driver and from subsequent exploration of the app. this evening, we needed to order a lyft on our own in kind of a hurry, and thanks to having set up our account with payment option, all went very smoothly. we were even able to add a tip on our credit card payment. we are now believers!
title: Easier than I imagined

review: i was charged a $150 damage fee as the driver had claimed i damaged the car and provided evidence' to lyft. the images he provided were of vomit on the passenger seat which i was not mine as i would remember if i had done such a thing. the ride was an airport trip from newark to manhattan. when i spoke to lyft customer service they simply stated that the driver told them it was me so they charged me the fee. i tried to contact customer service several times explaining that it could not have possibly been me but they simply would not reply to my messages. there should be a clearer system on how these fees are charged. never using this app again.
title: Charged me $150 damage fee' for damage I did not create

review: lemme just say that, i am very disappointed to ever had to depend on this app to get me through my living circumstances. first off, i wanna say that i would highly not recommend this app to anyone. i use to like the app, until there were three charges for rides i didn't authorized charged to me. i didn't even give me account nor card number to anyone except lyft. i don't even know how long this predicament has been going on for. i am happy i checked my account because i would've kept getting scammed by lyft. so for this and the hardships this company has put me through you deserve a one star. i am very disappointed  in lyft. for whomever reads this review enjoy and have a good life.
title: SMH

review: than uber!!  will never use them again. i'm very impressed with lyft. so glad my son loaded your app for me!!  both drivers were great today. love how easy your app is to use. so much more reasonable than the other company!  both cars were immaculate. on uber (first time) on sunday, the driver's car was filthy!  you'd think he'd be too embarrassed to drive it!!  plus, his charge was more than double?!?  why did i even tip him!?!  we'll, live and learn
title: So much better!!

review: yesterday i booked a lyft and it showed that the driver was 2 mins away. i gathered my things and then looked at my phone again, and apparently the driver started the ride without even picking me up and then ended it before i could do anything. i ended having to call an uber! i've been going back and forth with lyft customer service to refund me because i was not picked up and they refuse to do anything about it. all they keep telling me is that the ride info is correct and i was charged correctly. but how is that possible when your driver started and ended the ride without even picking me up !! safe to say i will not be using lyft again!
title: Poor Customer Service

review: i booked a ride a day in advance but could not find confirmation in the app or in my email. there was no number to call and there were no replies to my email. i searched in google and tried the suggestions but nothing popped up. eventually i stumbled on a revelation there is a calendar sign. clicking on it revealed i had a ride booked for next day. lyft should be more efficient than this. give or show a document a ride was booked in advance. not hide it the way it is now.
title: App confusing

review: i booked a ride and it said 12 minutes from me . i was ok with it then 10 minutes later it change to another driver and then that driver was like 15 minutes (probably they just gave up on me or something) . then when i text the lyft to hurry up and he said yes then another 10 minutes later i got transferred to another ride . i was so frustrated from this when i have school in the morning at 8:20 . now i had to write a letter to the principal about why did i late for school . i just hate this app so much . i need an apology or some kind of form because this is ridiculous.
title: Disappointed

review:
there is no consequences to accepting a ride and then letting you wait over 10 mins only to ditch you a 1-2 minutes before they are to pick you upor just making you wait then cancelling right after they see where you are going or how long your ride is. uber drivers have yet to do this to me. lyft doesn't care about passengers. 
i'm writing here as i tried to complain after being stranded yet another time and there is no place to report horrible drivers who do this. is there a bonus for accepting rides even if you take them no where? you guys need to address this or you'll lose even more customers.
title: Drivers Leave you stranded

review: i like how you can see the price quoted ahead of time. the app shows little cars moving on the map so you can see where they are on the map. you can also see the driver's profile photo, their car make, model, and license plate. the app also lets you know when they're close. it's a really cool app and a great concept that makes your taxi experiences from the 70's, 80's, & 90's completely obsolete.
title: Interactive with Live driver updates

review: it is a good thing that i was watching the arriving car in the map while waiting near the curb waiting for the car. it was coming down my street but took a sudden turn to and went to and stopped at a wrongly marked location a few blocks away from my correctly input home address.  i received a notification that the car had arrived and would leave in 5 minutes if i didn't come.  fortunately, i noticed and was able to call the driver and manually direct him before he took off. but his tesla was a nice ride.
title: Bad mapping

review: we began using lyft exclusively when uber behaved so badly in the past. now, they followed the trend of many apps of making it difficult to manage my profile, especially my payment when a credit card was hacked and had to be changed. there's no settings or account button and the lift site seems only to pertain to drivers. i do not understand the thinking. i believe web designers no longer care to understand users designing for their own ideas. very disappointing.
title: Deleted-too hard to manage profile

review: i used to use lyft all the time for work travel but the app keeps saying poor network connection when i get a ride or try to get a ride. this happened in more than one city. my other apps work but not lyft for some reason, and i don't know if i'm being throttled but i can't pay my driver or tip from today and the last time this happened i had to email the website.
title: App keeps crashing after I get a ride

review:
i've had drivers leave if i'm not immediately outside as opposed to waiting the five minutes that they're supposed to. the ride history never shows up so i have to contact lyft via twitter to report the drivers. i had a driver refuse my destination. i was going 20 minutes to the very next town over but he made me get out and cancel the ride. why are you driving if you refuse to leave a certain area? so i had to stand there at night, in the cold for fifteen minutes for my next ride.

i will constantly have cancellations for rides when one is supposedly coming.
title: Multiple driver issues

review: i wanted to add my daughter. she lives in florida. i just did not like the fact she could independently use my app without my knowledge. the should add a one time option where i have control. i should control adding and when i use lyft. the rider should also see when vehicle arrives. if the app can be tweaked for additional riders that would be great. then the log can be kept so i can choose them for a ride down the road.
title: Regarding Lyft family add-ons

review: lyft why suddenly i cant book rides now?!?! first i noticed i couldn't book no rides; the app gave me blank options. i asked other lyft rides if they had the same issue; all of them could select and purchase rides. i refreshed the app numerous times, and that failed. i deleted the app to see if that worked, and no changes. i gave up, so i deleted my account to make a new one. now i can select rides, but my new account can't approve my credit cards. this is aggravating on all levels and overall ridiculous. i have been a 5.0 rated customer to have my account bug out like this; now, my second account is also bugging. please fix this as soon as possible!!!!
title: LYFT IS THE WORST APP EVER!!!!!!

review: i appreciate the lyft drivers. when i do get in conversation with them, it's fascinating hearing about the places they're from: africa, middle east, south america, and europe.  knowing spanish and portuguese helps me a lot with this but i'm sure there are ways to use the phone as an interpreter. i have appreciated 99% of the drivers i've had. the only one or two i didn't were people looking at their phone while they're driving
title: Interesting conversation

review: they don't respond to the question, they beat around the bush, they just tell you to delete the app, sometimes even just not respond so when you ask if they have an answer you get sent to another person. i've been asking the same question for 3 hours and was left on read by the first and the next two just told me to log out and then delete the app. i've been passed to another rep so let's see if i get an answer. it literally can't be that hard to get a standard lyft for 3 people without having to use rideshare or economy lyft  waste of time
title: Customer service is a sham

review: i usually do the wait and save option. for obvious reasons. when i need a ride quicker, the price is higher. every single time i opt for the quicker ride, the wait times are the same if not more than the wait and save option so i still end up paying more and waiting longer. their wait times are extremely inaccurate. if they can't have a driver accept the ride within that time frame quoted, the price should be lowered if your wait time exceeds the wait and save. i find myself using ride share less and less. the drivers all tend to complain about the lack of money and benefits they receive.
title: Trick you into over paying

review: lyft is horrible i've been using it these past few days to compare to uber and i have to say by far uber is superior i've requested a ride twice and had multiple drivers cancel on me that's something that rarely happens on uber and today i was waiting 45 minutes for a driver to accept my ride making me late for work don't waste your time just cause uber instead
title: Lyft is the worst go to Uber !!!

review:
i see now that the pick up says hempstead but i was actually picked up in hewlett.
i sent a note of my exact whereabouts and yet went to pick me up elsewhere.
when he finally got the pick up correct he saw me struggling with grocery bags that were heavy and full and all he did was open the trunk and had the nerve to blow the horn at me i guess because i was taking too long to load the bags into the trunk.
the whole ride he said nothing but kept giving me this cold stare through the mirror 
then he dropped me off in the middle of the street after i took out all my grocery bags from his trunk.
he sent me 7 messages to my iphone telling me he was outside even though he was no where to be found.
an $11 ride turned into a $15? he put in the wrong town
title: Rude / Impatient / Driver

review:
so now, if you want to get picked up anywhere close to the time posted when booking the ride you have to pay extra. 
this new option to get a faster ride has really mess up the whole customer experience. i was rerouted with 4 different drivers only to be given one about to get on the highway going through opposite direction because they had a different ride it was sending them towards. lyft has become so greedy. i'm sure the drivers do not get the extra money for an on time pickup. 
these ride share companies have destroyed affordable transportation in san francisco
title: This service gets worse with every new feature

review: i downloaded the app and set up my account because i knew later i would need a ride out to the suburbs. i had to take a bus to the end of the line, and when i requested a ride, there was an additional verification step that i had to submit a photo of my drivers license, and i could not complete it because apparently it's too dark and my hands were probably shaking because it's cold. i was stranded and had to call a regular taxi. horrible experience that put me in potential danger. there's absolutely no reason that this step couldn't be a part of the initial setup.
title: Horrible setup process left me stranded

review: this was my first experience with a ride share company. i was running late to pick up my truck at a shop and take my kids to a bday party. i had a lyft lined up 2 hours in advance just to have my reservation canceled 15 mins before it was due to arrive. thankfully i was able to reserve another driver who picked us up fairly quickly. the driver was a really nice guy and we talked the entire trip. saved my opinion towards the company after feeling like i was flaked on.
title: Started bad but ended great

review:
i have been a lyft user through and through for several years and i have to say that the recent changes with the app are horrible. it's completely deceiving - if i pay more money to be picked up in 2 - 3 minutes as it suggests, i expect to be picked up within that time frame vs an additional 5 - 10 like the cheaper option that i am not paying for. it makes no sense to me. i've had to cancel rides and order through uber multiple times because i can pay less and be to work on time. enough times that i will just be using uber first from now on.

fix your timing estimations!!! give people what they are paying for!!!
title: Bad App Experience

review: i'm so over lyft. they do their best to try and steal your money. they'll have you pay $20 extra for a ride but if you click the wait and save it sends you the same driver it would have if you paid more. their operators and customer service reps are useless. they don't ever know anything and 9 times out of 10 you're talking to a machine. i take lyft anywhere from 2-4 times a day 7 days a week! you'd think they'd offer me at  a discount on at least one ride. you people know no loyalty and won't be surprised if your company doesn't last another 5 years.
title: Great drivers. Terrible service!

review: my sister forgot her phone in a lyft the other day, she realized she didn't have it after coming out of the car and she called it. another passenger answer and said to her he will give it to the driver and he will return it. that never happened and now the phone appears to be off. lyft doesn't have a costumer service # and the only way to contact support team is by the app which my sister does not have access to. we have send emails to their help staff but its been three days and we have not received any response. i also contacted them through tw and all they told me was to submit a claim and that they cant do anything else
title: Lost and found failure

review:
i tried ordering a lyft from the oak airport home at night.  it gave me a time and price and i accepted- it said ride booked.  10 minutes later it still hadn't found me a driver and it was searching for a driver.

the algorithm failed its most basic test, as did the product and ux team- don't tell a rider that the ride is booked when you don't actually have drivers near the airport.

you wasted my time and lost my trust.  i took uber and bart on this trip - both worked flawlessly.  major fail by lyft (who i want to succeed, but failed majorly here relatively to other options).
title: Need to improve ride availability algorithm

review: there should be a time limit in which a driver can cancel a trip. an example of an experience i had with a lyft driver. i have waited 10-15 minutes for a driver and because i refused to cross the street with packages and endanger myself my driver cancelled. or i will be assigned a driver and for reasons i'm not aware they have cancelled after i have waited several minutes for them. as paying customers the window for us to cancel without being penalized is almost seconds but the drivers can cancel at anytime with no regard to our schedules.
title: Cancellation

review: this review is not about the drivers. every driver i have had is excellent and i have rated them all at 5 stars. this review is about the app. the app is not user friendly. it also has no way to send info when your request for a lift doesn't get picked up. i scheduled a lift and no driver was assigned and there was no way to resend the request without canceling the one and creating a new one. there should be a feature that allows you to resubmit your active request so it pings to active drivers in the area.
title: App has issues drivers are good

review: the customer service and resolution on this app are horrible. there is no one to speak to and isn't even an option to put specific problems. i was charged double for my ride to have two stops. when we got in the car, the driver refused to go to the stop and went straight to the second stop, even though i paid double the original price for it. when i tried to dispute it in the app or report my problem at least for a partial refund, there wasn't even an option from the automated selections. never had anything resolved and it went from a temporary charge to a permanent one.
title: Worst ride user app I've ever used

review: very unhappy with lyft and how easy it is for drivers to pretend to pick you up and charge you for the ride. i now have to deal with and go out of my way to dispute this charge because lyft won't provide a refund nor at the time let me cancel the ride. i follow the gps of where the driver was going and even when calling him he was playing dumb with me. the sad part is that i only need transportation that was 15 minutes away from the destination i needed to get to. i guess this guy can keep playing lyft and customers and continue scamming more people. this left a bad taste in my mouthin the end i had to use uber.
title: Driver's scamming and claiming they pick you up

review:
i used lyft today for the last time ever. i was waiting 25 min. and i was already late to the spot because of that. finally, the driver came.i came out from my apartment and he was leaving in 2 min after he was at the stop to pick me up.  i was running after the car to catch him, he wasn't polite, he didn't care. 
last month, when i was using lyft i had always a problem. first, they change drivers like crazy all the time, and i have to wait first 13 min and then another 15 min because they change the driver all time. or the car is different. 
not gonna waste my time anymore on this. 
the worst experience ever.
title: Awful experience

review: i'll start by stating how ashamed i am of this app's algorithms. god forbid they realize you work at a certain location or search one up often, then you're most likely to see that same ride raise greatly in price because of how important that destination is for you. best case, you'll have a wait and save ride where you can wait longer than what's stated and only save a couple dollars. i used to love lyft because of their affordability and reliability over uber but they seemed to have fell off. i hope they could get back to at least being competitive because at this point i'm cool not having the app at all.
title: Over Priced and Under-reliable

review: i cancelled a ride literally 30 seconds after ordering because the driver was too far away. i ended up being charged $29 and was forced to wait over an hour for them to tell me to look out for an email to help me. they refused to offer any kind of real help and just wasted my time. the service agent who helped me was extremely rude. i work in customer service and was absolutely appalled by this behaviour and would never treat even the worst customer like i was treated. i will never use lyft again nor will i recommend it to anyone to use. they just care about getting as much money from everyone as possible.
title: horrible customer service

review:
it is very annoying and inconvenient when there's a bike station entirely full and none of the bikes unlock on top of which it charges our card multiple times and doesn't get returned for days on end. this is a very messed up operation way. 
then you have multiple driver cancellations after ordering a car ride, each waited 3-5 min before canceling and thus causing lateness to the extreme on top of traffic. this is terrible service yesterday and multiple times super terrible. waste of money & waste of time .
title: Bike and Driver service Cancellations

review: why is it always limited availability for standard fare in los angeles, a city that is mostly cars? this is every time of the day. i know there is a pandemic but nobody here thinks there is so that can't be the only reason. what happened to this service? at this point i wish i could still call a cab, but rideshare ruined that. it's like i came into your house and said throw out all your pots and pans, i have a better way to make dinner. and then you do and i say thanks but just so you know i can't cook. this app ruins my day when i use it and unfortunately i routinely have to.
title: Where did you people go wrong

review: my driver tonight was supposed to show up at 7 pm on a schedule pick up. lyft ended up scheduling him to arrive seven minutes early. then when he arrived i asked him a question about the pick up and how they're trained and the guy just looked at me, didn't answer the question, got in the car, and drove away! i was totally stunned. the part that's really frustrating is i don't have the ability to rate the driver. i tip very well for the good drivers and i appreciate the work they do. it's totally unacceptable to just drive away from a fare. and it's really frustrating that lyft can just schedule it 7 o'clock and then show up seven minutes early on their whim.
title: Hit & Miss

review: took a $14 ride to the wrong location. arrived at wrong location. realized i was not at the right place and changed my destination to the correct one. lyft asked if i wanted to confirm that the new price (including the new destination) was $48. i confirmed. driver canceled the ride 10 seconds later (not sure why), and i was left with the $48 charge. we had to get a new ride to our correct destination. i had several conversations with lyft support, and they refused to refund the extra $34 they charged me, citing company policy. really not the kind of service you'd expect from a big, publicly traded company. a real eye-opener. will not be using this app in the future. legitimate fraud.
title: Stole my money

review:
the car was comfy and driver very pleasant. 
the gps of the start location failed again for lyft. both my location and my home address both gave the driver a location two blocks away. so be sure to enter the correct address again as a note to the driver. we had this problem with lyft both at airport, cruise terminal and home multiple times but not for uber.
title: The ride and gps of Lyft

review: i usually never write a feedback but lyft upset me. i use the wait and save to save some money and it says that it'll take no longer than 25 minutes to get a ride.. and then they go over an hour and still don't book me a ride even though i can see lyft drivers right next to me. and so i'm forced to cancel that and get an ordinary lyft ride.. it costs me double!! and says that i still need to wait over 10 minutes for that one and i still haven't gotten one booked and i'm still waiting! i'm outside in the middle of miami which this is my first time in this state and i've been outside past midnight for almost 2 hours!! terrible service lyft!
title: Bad service

review: i really liked lyft, but it doesn't work well for adding family members. i already arranged a ride for a specific time and day for a family member to pick up my child while i was away. while out of town i had to order a lyft for myself and it canceled out my trip for the family order. if i didn't cancel it myself then it shouldn't have been canceled. luckily i was somewhere where i could just order her another one. i rely on the plan a heads when i go out of town, so unless i cancel a ride it should never be canceled.
title: Lyft is great

review: used lyft for the first time in months after requesting a ride the app crashed then held onto my money i contacted lyft support they said that there was nothing they can do from 3 to 5 days but also the customer support representative was contradicting things and previous statements that they were saying which confused me also would it take 5 to 6 hours to even get a reply from said representative and when i told them all my issues and problems they said that it was my fault for having a connectivity issue but i showed them that i had full service and every time i ask them a question they danced around it
title: App crashed

review: i ordered the pickup in 1 min option which is an extra $15 because i had an appointment to do get to and waiting would have made me late. the lyft drove around for 40 minutes while i was stuck in an area i have no idea how to get around before cancelling the lyft and getting a taxi and being an hour late to my appointment. it was embarrassing showing up the that appointment and having to say my lyft driver decided to take a 30 min drive in the wrong direction. i have screenshots of my driver sitting somewhere for 15 minutes and the driving the wrong way as well because of how ridiculous this was.
title: Stranded for 40 min past pickup time

review: i arrived at newark airport this afternoon. i waited until i had my luggage in hand before requesting a ride. at the time i booked the ride the cost was $27. i was told my ride was 9 minutes away. the map showed that he was not near the airport and it said he was finishing another ride. we waited 15 minutes and it still said the same thing. the icon for the car had not moved. i continued to sit and finally gave up. i cancelled the ride and ordered another. by then the price had gone to $47. i think that lyft should honor the original price. this seems like a bait and switch routine to me. i left uber to start using lyft. looks like i may need to switch back.
title: Frustrated

review: i have raised a dispute on a charge and submitted my request thrice since march 25th. every time i got the message that my request was valid and will be processed within 7 days. nothing happened the first two times and today i looked all over the app and website but there is no way to call these guys. how can you run such a major service without any call center support? reflects poorly on the state of affairs within the organization. next time i'll think twice before i book on lyft. i have submitted my request third time and fingers crossed for a resolution.
title: Poor customer support

review:
i input the address pick up for a ride at 801 shell dr and the drivers navigation took them somewhere where nowhere near me, then the app still processed the ride as if it'd been completed and charged me $8. 
on a separate occasion it seemed as if the driver was being lead in a circle before the ride was canceled and the app tried to find the next available driver.
as this is one of the apps i and maybe others like me use to get to work or home, maybe look into updating your map/navigation system.
other than that this app- or at least the drivers- are okay
title: GPS Navigation/Msps

review: i use lyft solely because i don't agree with ubers politics. but lyft prices are horrible and they aren't being passed on to the driversif that were the case, i wouldn't mind it as much. $20 to go less than 1.2 miles is laughable. if it wasn't dark when i needed the ride, i would have walked it. but hey, they had me by the balls due to it getting dark so early, but i'll definitely be looking for new ride options because this isn't it. great drivers though. every driver i've had has been friendly, super clean cars and so for that, they earned two stars.
title: Costly ride that isn't passed on to the driver

review: the driver was not the issue. i selected a car that was supposedly 3 minutes away. as soon as i selected it, lyft pulled a fast one on me and i got a notification that the driver was 11 minutes away! after about seven minutes i got another notification that i had a new driver that was also 11 minutes away!! that car never came and all of a sudden i had a third one so all in all lyft made me waste 30 minutes or so!! most irritating of all is the fact that i can't call customer service! change your policy, offer an explanation or contact me and i will revised the review.
title: Lyft pulled a fast one on me/cannot contact customer service

review: he was by far one of the most best driver's i've ever had during a lyft ride. more people need to act and represent there selfs like this driver did. i know we're all facing hard times , but it's on how we treat each other . he is a excellent example of someone who treats others how he would like to be treated!!!!! thanks jason again , you are very appreciated by me . hope to run across you in the future one day on a future ride!!!!
title: The Diver Jason

review: to find out the poor rate they pay their drivers. every time i get a cancellation, i understand lyft is pushing my ride to a driver that knows how poorly lyft will pay them and refuse my ride request. it's easy to blame the drivers in these instances, but i would like to ask lyft a simple question here, if you want my business, why aren't you paying drivers their share in order for them to provide the quality of service you market and charge me for? these lyft rides aren't cheap and it infuriates me to know i paid $40 and my drivers is getting $6.  what kind of service can i possibly expect for $6?!
title: EVERY time I ride with lyft I'm disappointed

review: we arrived at the las vegas airport.  i hadn't used lyft in a few years so i had to update information.  as soon as i opened the app, it was very smooth and easy transaction.  immee we fiately i was instructed where in the airport to go to catch lyft.  there were lyft signs everywhere in and out of the airport m  asking it very easy to get to the garage to wait to be picked up.  i was constantly made aware of how soon the driver would arrive.
title: Quick and easy

review: being that i'm pregnant and i have to see my doctor weekly i get frustrated when the gps is always having my driver take the wrong route or a dead end route and half of the drivers don't speak english so it's really hard trying to communicate with them and to give them my exact location. and when that happens my ride gets canceled. lyft just needs to work on giving accurate routes and not routes that no longer exists or end up being dead end routes.
title: Issues with the gps

review:
first, the website is glitchy. i fill out a help form, submit it, and then am led to the same page first step as if it never went through. also, the website says select an option for whether i strongly agree, agree, disagree, etc for how well the help was, and when i select one and hit submit, it says that i must select an option. buggy.

next, i started a chat session and didn't respond for a while, and the chat said that if i respond within 24 hours, it'll reopen the chat, yet just after a few hours it was completely inaccessible.

then, i have clear issues with rides (like driver skipping a stop) yet the app says we found no issue with you ride and i'm forced to navigate through other options like safety issues just to reach someone.

finally, i was promised a refund for a wrongful fee and it never was sent. when i re-inquired about it, i was told a supervisor would reach out to me-they never did.
title: Customer service has gone down

review: this app is by far one of the worst ride share apps i've ever used. the privacy and safety is nonexistent. there is a driver who goes by the name eli on lyft, who drives a silver toyota sienna. he goes by jesus on uber, and i'm sure he has other names on different apps. he wasted 30 minutes of my time driving in circles. when i asked why he was going the wrong way, he cancelled my ride. i requested a ride through uber and jesus refused to come and get me (it was the same person, with the same picture, vehicle, and license plate number). isn't there some way lyft or uber can verify someone's identity? what is he doing that he needs two different names? awful experience
title: Worst Rideshare App

review:
i once used uber. lying in pain outside the e r, uber was showing me all places in and outside of new england. luckily i had my iphone and my credit card. on the spot i contacted lyft and all said and done a driver came to get me at the er and bring me home. and he kindly offered to help me to the door. i declined with graciousness as there were many posts that i could cling to with my good right arm.  lyft saved my day/night!!!
thank you all n god bless all!!!
title: Grateful for simplicity of use.

review: i'm between jobs and am having a very rough year but i could always rely on lyft to get me to and from home until i was blocked for two days because a driver reported i wasn't wearing my mask correctly but never brought it to my attention. if it were a legit claim why was it never brought to my attention why do i still have a 5.0 rating? u people make me sick thanks to u i lost the last piece of job i had
title: Screw Lyft

review: i'm not sure how many times this has happened with lyft, but definitely approaching ten. i'm about to go to work, request my ride with plenty of time, but still get there late because lyft prioritizes financial gain over customer satisfaction. multiple times now, the driver was within 1 minute of picking me up but is suddenly reassigned to another passenger willing to pay more, while i wait another 16 minutes for the next driver to get there. i'm not exactly sure what lyft has going on but i know for sure i'm not having this issue with uber. i do not trust lyft to simply to what they advertise.
title: Do not use if you need to be somewhere by a certain time.

review: i use to drive for lyft and uber and know the value of a great ride with excellent customer care. we came into town for the juan luis guerra concert today and while staying at the sheraton opted to take a lyft instead of driving to the allstate arena and boy did we make the right choice. we got a gem of a driver in ivonne! she was amazing! friendly, relationally intelligent and knowledgeable of the area. it made our night out spectacular!!!
title: Now that's what I'm talking about!

review: lyft service ordering has been good. some lyft drivers are a little on the weird/make you feel uncomfortable side. drives asking way too many person questions. makes me feel like they will some back to harm me because they have my address. driving telling war stories; what they had to do/ would do to an individual (harmful). a little weird at times. once a drivers driver seat was pushed back to the back left passenger seat. made it hard for me and my daughter to sit in the back sit. overall okay.
title: It's okay.

review:
this app fr used to be my favorite riding app i loved it more than uber cause it was so convenient and was a joy to use. but now it is nothing more than a way over priced money stealing app. how is it a 10 minute drive use to cost me like 8$ and now it costs me almost 40 dollars like make that make sense. i'm uninstalling this crap go take an uber
didn't let me rate it 1 star and wouldn't let me post this till i rated it 5
title: Failure

review: i used it for the first time today. after my ride ended, it prompted me again to add a tip of the same amount. i changed the option to no tip because if i didn't, it seemed like i would be double-tipping. i hope that didn't revoke my original tip. lyft needs to change the wording of this to something like, you added a tip of [amount]. would you like to tip more? from now on, i will wait until after the ride has ended to tip until i am sure this has been fixed.
title: Tip while riding function confusing

review: i always use this app and in the past few weeks to months using the app hasn't been pleasant. idk yestrday me and a friend ordered a lyft and after putting correct address in it still didn't show up on the drivers end and was driven somewhere else. also i just ordered a lyft and it kept saying it was waiting for a driver and in 2 seconds i got a txt saying the driver was outside. i just updated the app a day or two ago what's going on? these are the most recent issues but i've had plenty
title: Service lag

review:
i have always been pleased with lyft until today. we told driver #1 that we were at 3
c-9 at the oakland airport. after 16 minutes he texted that he was in front of southwest terminal . i have a husband in wheelchair and two suitcases. there was no way i could go looking for james so he drove away and i was charged $5 for something not my fault. the second driver sayed told us our two suitcases would not fit in the trunk of his car and he drove off! finally, stanley picked us up and we finally arrived home. i am asking you to credit our charge with the $5 we were charged for not showing up. we were in the right place but jamese was not!
title: Doreen Covell

review: i always ask the drivers the name of the person they are picking up out of safety but for some reason he started arguing with me. i've heard horror stories from women who told drivers their name instead of asking who they were picking up. i'm trying to protect myself and their goofy driver starting arguing then lied when he reported me about me not wearing a mask because he knew he didn't have a valid reason to report me. he was just upset i wasn't taking his nonsense. i wear masks in friends houses. why wouldn't i wear a mask in a strangers car?? he didn't have a mask and he didn't look like his picture. y'all will never get money from me again.
title: Trash company

review: on december 28 we booked a ride with karen to pick us up when we arrive at phoenix on our trip from san francisco. in san francisco the trip was delayed a small amount. we could not find any place to revise the pick up time or add the flight information on the lyft website. we then had to cancel the reservation and hope that there was someone available to pick us up when we arrived. the website needs to add the function to either revise the pick up time or better yet include the flight number and details when the reservation is made.
title: Poor website
userName: j uh Ted d DDS hi jb

review: today is my first day using this company i ordered and left this morning it's stated that the life would be there by 650 and 707 the driver got there at like 638 i told her that it said she would be there between 650 and 707 she was there for approximately two minutes and then she left and i was charge $7.30 which i'm not ok with that i did however get another driver and she was great i had no issues with her
title: Lift left

review:
we got into sdo at midnight. went on lyft to get a ride home, first driver who accepted us didn't show up and didn't answer my text or phone call. after waiting quite a while we cancelled the ride since the driver was clearly not moving from where he was parked. we went back on the app, booked a new ride and again, the driver didn't show up, didn't answer calls or texts. but this time he marked that he had arrived and was waiting. he was not. lyft charged me for canceling. 
the third time i tried a nice lyft driver did pick us up. we were grateful, but today i'm deleting the lyft app and using uber from here on out.
title: Drivers didn't show up

review: i requested a ride from my room in my hotel and when i got to the lobby door there was no driver. they said he was there and i had to take the ride or i would be charged. the map showed he was on the other side of the hotel. lyft also sent me an alert that he was deaf. no issue for me but what was i to do? i tried to reschedule but the new ride would take for 5 minutes. very frustrating. then i get a message from lyft that i was being charged $70 for 2 canceled rides! seriously?! now i need to go through the hassle to correct this. maybe i should have called uber!
title: Ride Mix Up

review:
the app never gives accurate estimates of time in any way. said 8 minutes until pickup. once you click book the ride, it never finds a ride within what is advertised. so far, i have waited 30 minutes. the app errored out and said it couldnt find drivers. i am once again waiting for the app to find a ride. it says that it is fast during the wait. but it never finds rides and will leave you stranded like me. time to start walking. uber found me a ride quick and only $1 more.

update. left stranded many times.
title: Poor service. Worse app.

review: me and my family got up early to get to a bus station that's about 30 minutes away. the first driver was just in time and about 3 minutes away from us but then he passed us on to another driver that is 8 minutes away. then we got passed on 2 more times before we decided to rebook our bus trip, costing us 34 dollars because we were gonna miss our initial bus schedule. i don't seem to find where i can dispute such situation on your website. this is very inconvenient for anyone. i need someone from lyft's customer service to speak to.
title: Got passed on to different riders

review:
i am extremely disappointed with lyft app and the way no one responded to text and pick up my call yesterday. 
i request a ride from marikami museum. the driver came on time but app would let us proceed for a while. then there were two road closers and app was confused. there were no one to ask the direction and i am new in this area. 20 minute ride became an hour long and i missed important appointment.
on top of that i am being charged extra 11$. i would not take lyft against n if you don't resolve this. you should also check with james the driver about how confusing and frustrating the ride was.
title: Frustrating last ride

review: i had the most terrible experience with lyft. on thanksgiving night me and my friends took a lyft to our friends house and after arriving i was charged with a damage fee for spilled liquid in the car. i received an email stating that i am charged 80 dollars for this and their proof was a picture and a story provided by the driver. the most interesting part is that we didn't have any liquid with us and it was definitely from a previous person in the car. so i contacted them both with email and from the app and i have not received an answer yet.
title: Incorrectly charged damaged fee

review: lyft has been an amazing service to me from the get go! the drivers i've gotten so far have been great, the wait time has been short, and it's been smooth payment + easy to understand controls and whatnot. i was having issues with uber in setting my card up and they left me on read, and it wouldn't register my tips :/ i love lfyt tho!! no issues at all, awesome service. :)
title: I Love Lyft!

review: my last three trips on lyft were prompt, warm, safe, economical and engaging.    a bit of safe small talk helped me learn about local culture and distant ones too. i took lyft on christmas eve and told my driver to drive past an inspiring location before his next pick up.  he was happy to view the late night mass and the glowing open doors to the basilica.  that's value added!  that's lyft!
title: Great drivers, good conversation and a comfortable ride

review:
it took 2 1/2 hrs to take a 20 minute drive. twice, the app strung me along saying it was getting a driver, then kicked me off saying try again. 
after the 2nd time it offered a lightning fast ride if i was willing to pay twice as much. said they'd be there in 6 minutes30 minutes later we got in the car. 
we agreed to double the price for lightning fastwe were charged double even though lyft didn't come thru with the promised timein fact it was 5x the time. that's extortion & charging for an upgrade you failed to provide. had we not agreed to pay double i believe we'd still be standing there waiting.
title: EXTORTION NOT APPRECIATED

review:
horrible! constantly double charged & with all the unexpected charges i get from lyft, it's hard to keep track. i'm sure i've been charged more than i've actually ridden, but their habit of charging your account immediately, but it's still a pending charge will mess you up.
 for instance, today i was double-charged for my ride to work & back, but i can't even dispute it because it's still pending although i was charged instantly.
very easy to forget to check your account days later, to make sure they put it back. 
may be switching back to my other apps .
the small amount of money saved is not worth the unreliability & accidental charges.
complained about my last 2 rides because the car literally was filthy and smelled so bad, i had to request that the driver opened a window, although it's freezing out . 
no compensation for that either, or even a response . 
just bad service overall. save your money & use other apps.
title: Lyft is a scam

review: lyft has some of the worse customer service i've ever had to deal with. they're rude! you have to talk to several rude representatives to finally receive one who actually wants to know what's going on and try to help find a solution.  and i also feel like if a passenger has to pay to cancel a ride that's is less than 5minutes away, a driver needs to either have a fee they have to pay when they cancel or dont receive the option to cancel on a passenger when they're 5 minutes away or less. it's happened so many times it's ridiculous, especially when i'm trying to go to work.
title: Horrible

review: very good for those who love to schedule rides ahead of time; very affordable with great drivers. haven't had any issues with any lyft driver, though the app can be hard to connect to after a major concert and such. schedule the pickup at a certain time and at a different location as the event like a nearby starbucks or mcdonald's where you can get free wifi or better data signal.
title: Good pricing for planners.

review:
i took a lyft to the airport and had the coolest driver. we had a great conversation about music and he happened to listen to a lot of music listened to growing up. overall it was a great experience, car was clean, dwight was friendly and talkative, and my car ride went by super fast because i had a great driver and host. hit up dwight for rides in.  san diego. 

ps: aye, yo, lyft can you relay the message to dwight's reviews??? the dude has nothing but good vibes! ct916
title: Cool as can be driver

review: i moved from ny to co last year, so maybe thats the issue, but even in the last few months, my experience with lyft has gotten much worse. from being forced to pay $200 to take a 20 minute ride from the airport to my house, which is not entirely lyfts fault but partially, to lyft allowing drivers to force you to cancel rides by just not coming to pick you up and wasting your time, to lyft setting the wrong pickup address and not allowing me to change it. they also don't have any customer service. this app is garbage.
title: My experience has been bad lately

review: i had my family from houston visiting me in my home for these past 10 days. they needed a ride to the airport today, so i wrote in the notes 4 people with lots of luggage! need all the space in your trunk! thx! as a note for someone to read before they accepted the ride. ossee with the bmw accepted the ride, but when he pulled up he just yelled out the window too much luggage! you need a bigger car! before rolling his window up and driving away. now they might be late for their flight due to ossee's inability to read the notes. if there were negative stars, i would have rated a minus number!
title: Ossee with the BMW - read your notes!

review: there have been a number of times i have had lyft drivers cancel on me. i've been told by numerous friends who drive for lyft it is because they either see where you are going  or the fare. this happens all the time with me with scheduled rides. the driver starts the ride befor i'm in the car, then they know it is scheduled, then they decide not to take me because they know they are getting way less money. i've been late to numerous things and screwed over too many times. what is the point of using this service if i can't trust it is actually going to come through in the end.
title: Untrustworthy - they always cancel

review:
your customer support needs serious work. i'm fairness, most corporations suffer from the same thing because of the size of the business, there's a lot lost between the different departments communicating information.

i just want a simple way to go back and tip a driver i never got a notification to tip. i forgot to check within 72 hours and the directions from searching online are inaccurate. 

it's furthermore frustrating because i go to submit for help on the website and on the app, but all you give are irrelevant options without any other' with a fill in spot.

it's quite frustrating. it's the exact issue i have with every corporation - lack of any form of feedback and actually getting help. i have to resort to reviewing the app before i have a chance of submitting feedback. rediculous.
title: Customer support needs work

review: they will take your money for the ride and the driver get to your desk nation and act like they are there but won't really be in front of your house they do not communicate back to your call or text. the worse i was stuck in the rain for a hour or two and never got a ride here you ladies with everything going on, get your own vehicle or something and never use lyft again. then when you try to call customer service never actually help you. then will you call the driver as well they're not even able to be connected to you because then i didn't service
title: The worst and I mean the worst

review: i love using lyft. i've never had an issue. the only reason i don't have five stars is because of the limited drivers that come to my area. sometimes i have to request a ride three times or more if it's the weekend in order for someone to pick me up just to take me 20 minutes away. sometimes there are no cars available and other times the only cars available are the more expensive lux vehicles
title: Just one issue

review: i understand this practice, but when you use apple cash to keep track of business expense. but you basically get charged for 2x rides in one day, so i'm constantly having to keep extra cash loaded until 5 to 7 business days later, when lyft releases it. a better method would be to instantly charge the card for the rate calculated, then request an additional charge later to collect any overages on miles or tips. because this is an absolute mess and it's unnecessary and avoidable.
title: Bad Authorization Holds

review: i can't wait till there's another service that respects its customers and doesn't put us in danger with their drivers and treat us like crap and doesn't extend any customer service or honor system for frequent riders. when we've had problems with drivers that have been less than professional with us or even aggressive or downright dangerous lyft has done nothing about it and i resent giving lyft any money my taxi ride home i rode with uber i only choose lyft now out of sheer necessity i choose other optionsbefore i try lyft these days.
title: I only take lyft when I have no choice.

review: i never had an issue with none of my drivers but this one i told the lady maria where i was at she text back and said okay, but mind you my picture is on my app so you took a whole person that didn't look like me and took that person to a whole different location and i text maria back and said where are you and she decided not to respond back because she knew she messed up. now my whole problem is how lyft not try to credit your money back or do a refund if the driver didn't pick you up and i had to get a whole new driver like make it make sense please never again.
title: My driver never picked me up

review: lyft is great. i haven't used it in a while but recently used it for my weekend get away. prices are decent, however, the company needs to do a better job with updates (i.e. via sms). i reserved a ride and received 3/4 initial updates, however the driver changed and there was no text update as i requested. the update was only within the app and i still never received a text update which i opted for. otherwise, good job.
title: Some improvements to make

review: i've only had a couple of rides with you guys i guess maybe four, and all of your drivers have been great. i really like the way you have the ride tracking i can seeyour driver and that way i'm not on the other side of the building right when you're coming here on this side of the building. your drivers are all courteous and attentive to detail and i don't have any white knuckles sitting in the backseat so thank you for your great service!
title: Great service..

review: chenghui was wonderful! he drove me to the hardware store then showed me how to set a new trip so he could take me home. the he kindly waited for me to pick up my order and come back out to his car. it was a cumbersome bunch of things and he even helped the hardware employee to load my items into the car. when he returned me home, he also helped me all unload my things  at my home. thank you chenghui!
title: Chenghui driver

review: i spend money on these rides a lot of money and people get to make me late to work by stopping at gas stations to put gas in their car and i can't even get a partial refund their are drivers falling asleep while driving and all types of crazy stuff a passaged is forced to deal with and can't even get our money back smfh i'm not using this app no more
title: Starting to hate this app

review: for whatever reason whenever my ride is on their way and are like 2-5 minutes away they cancel and i end up having to get a driver that's about 20 minutes away. that doesn't make any sense. i wait all this time for my ride and once it comes near my location it cancels. this is the third time this has happened. officially deleting lyft because this is ridiculous and no one gets penalized for it. why are people accepting rides just to cancel it.
title: Nearby Ride Cancellations

review: i am not a democrat, republican or trump supporter. depending upon who you are the politics you play on your radio could make a customer feel uncomfortable or insulted. i think my driver was either insensitive or actually wanted to insult me.  i didn't say anything to him,  but don't want to ride with patrick again. with a mask on people may not know i am a man of african heritage, so i am uncertain what the message was.
title: Political content on the radio

review: i am a lyft rider for medical transportation. the driver have mix protocols, some wait there usual five minutes, some just leave if they don't see you. one had the wrong location.  then again the wrong location. i reported these things and now day one, no hiccups. they asked for this review. hope it gets better. if lyft ever want to know who's who, i write names , descriptions, dates and time. just let me know if you want this info.
title: Lyft rider for three weeks

review: i have an issue with the car seat policy. you tell your drivers that car seats are required and leave the choice to them on whether or not they complete the ride. why not make that apparent to the riders? just like we have to confirm having a mask there should be a pop up about child riders and car seats. it would save a lot of time for all parties involved. i understand the safety measures and appreciate them however carrying a car seat around everywhere is not practical. there has to be some kind of middle ground about this.
title: Car Seats

review: everytime i get a ride the time gets pushed back further and further cancels at least 5 times! i'm currently waiting on a ride for over 20 minutes yet i'm paying $10 more than usual and consistently making me late for work! not to mention, no way to contact customer service! then i finally got a ride and the driver says we'll your area is rough so people don't want to drive there! are you kidding me?! i am a paying customer! why are accepting rides if you don't want to drive the area?! so it's fine to inconvenience the customers and there is no way to report them!
title: Getting worse and worse

review: usually i have no issues with lyft, but lately my experience has changed drastically. just recently, i have requested a ride which was then confirmed. after 15 mins, they driver canceled on me. not a big deal as another driver confirmed. inconvenient but not the end of the world. the tipper is, the following driver, after waiting 25 mins also canceled on me and the app paired me with another driver 15 mins away. almost an hour total wait time, when the app clearly shows an abundant amount of drivers nearby. keep in mind, i am not located in a rural area. disappointed.
title: Disappointed

review: we waited about 25 minutes for our lyft driver only for him to pick us up and tell us he couldn't make the hour drive we had paid for. he cancelled the ride and the app had a other driver coming to pick us up, took another 25 minutes for the new driver to pick us up. got in the car, driver looks at the map and asks if we have cash to pay him another $100. he wasn't willing to drive us 1 hour to our destination. so frustrating. we tried the competitor that starts with a u and they showed up and drove us to our destination with no issues.
title: Skip Lyft and use the competition

review: i use public transportation everyday and it has really changed since i first started using it. the customer service sucksthe prices are always jacked up and you never even know why they are jacked up.the drivers always have attitudes or they cancel not caring if you're trying to get to work or not.lyft even double charges.they make you pay money from weeks ago and they say oh our system was down so we need to charge you an unexpected fee. i hate how even if you're going to the exact same destination everyday, you still have to pay a different price everyday
title: The day I get a car..

review: honesty the driver are prejudiced. i feel like when you need them you can get them, i work in the hospital after a 16 hour shift i thought hey maybe a lyft can help, i got canceled 3 times all because they didn't want to go to the bronx seriously? it's not i didn't have the money for it. i called them twice and told the drivers where i am, it's not hard to keep track of them on the app. i see them near the area and don't move for minutes, and when playing the waiting game and see you don't give up, they cancel it on purpose. they are worthless and discriminative, uber is better in my opinion.
title: Discriminating

review: i can't thank you enough whoever put this program together. whoever was first doesn't matter lyft rules. i'm in florida now and a year ago i moved to gainesville texas i had no idea that you couldn't get a lyft there. big problem i had to buy a car to get to my home in moss lake that's maybe 13 miles from town. i really hope you guys can set up lyft in gainesville texas so that i could get around
title: Loving the lift

review: in the last 4 months in new york city, with an abundance of drivers, all lyft does is charge you one price to wait for a car to come in 6 minutes (which is really 8 minutes) but when the car is 1 block from picking you up, the app will reroute the driver and reassign you a driver another 6 minutes away until ~they~ get one block from your apartment to start the process all over again until you are now running so late that you cancel all together and its now $100 to get a car in 3 minutes to go 3 miles. thanks big tech!
title: Rerouted and rerouted until they can charge you more

review: a driver spoke rudely and behaved badly toward my wife and son. so we got out of the car right away. the driver cancelled the ride and we decided to just forget about it and did not report. that was a mistake. soon after, i found the driver had made a false report to lyft and my account was deactivated! i tried to contact lyft and explain what happened. i was literally asked to sit tight and wait for an email. very unfair and frustrating. on seeing similar reviews online, it looks like they tend to favor the drivers because they obviously don't want to decrease the number of drivers, even the rude, lying and vengeful ones.
title: Unfair deactivation

review:
just so you all know, they will bill you for service even though the driver never picks you up.  i watched in disbelief as the driver, who couldn't find us, told his app that he picked us up and then proceeded to our destination without us, and then reported that he dropped us off.

the worst part?  the customer service is completely automated and they would not refund our money.  they automatically believed the driver over us even though we never got picked up and had to find another way home.

this service failed us and then stole our money.  lesson learned.  use at your own risk.
title: Use at your own risk

review: not a reliable app to get rides don't believe when it says 10 mins away or driver finish trip nearby. it will somehow assign you a new driver and make you wait even longer. but anyways i needed a ride to work. i scheduled it so i wouldn't be late. when my lyft got here i forgot a mask (i live in nj) and i went back in to grace one. told her i would be quick, i came back out and she's gone. didn't even tell me she was leaving how unprofessional. so i tried to get another ride and was assigned multiple drivers but all of them never picked me up and made me 40 minutes late to work. use uber!!! uber has never disappointed me.
title: Worst app

review: i wish y'all would stop putting holds on the rides, just take the money like y'all use to. stop waiting till the end of the day for the total transactions. that is an inconvenience to some of your customers and it's confusing. idk if i really owe y'all money or if you just holding it. also stop holding my money when i cancel a ride. i could be getting ride from a family member or a friend, so i cancel the right and then i gotta wait for y'all to release my money. go back to how y'all use to be because the new lyft is weird and confusing and it's making me wanna spend my money elsewhere
title: Stop holding the money

review: the driver did not want my bags in the car so he opted for them to be put in the trunk. when i reached my destination he took them out and handed them to me. when i returned home my house keys where missing from the side pocket of my bags. i reached out to lyft they did not do anything to help neither has the driver got back to me regardless of how much i expressed i was stranded out side. it was my first time sitting without my bags and now my keys are missing. it seems intentional to me since no one is getting back to me. it's not a lost item that i left in the car, it was misplaced by their driver and cannot help me. i am so devastated .
title: Worst experience ever

review: used it for poker night, cuz i was gonna plan on drinking. everything went smoothly. only thing was the rides tended to arrive for pickup early so you have to plan accordingly. so if your night was supposed to end at 9pm, you should prolly schedule pickup for 920 minimum cuz they maybe arrive 10 minutes early. for same trip uber rate was 55ish vs 18ish on lyft. suggest have multiple ride share apps to comp rates.
title: 1st timer here

review: good service and drivers. the bad thing is it tells you an expected pick up wait time and after you select a ride most times tells you the actual wait is at least double. i hope they are not just lying to make me choose certain ride type or their service altogether. may seem not a big deal but it makes me feel lied to and leaves me with a bad feeling.
title: Good service, just slightly Misleading

review: i had to cancel two drivers because their eta to get me with groceries kept changing to longer and longer. took me an hour to go five miles home, including waiting with groceries for half an hour for a driver to know where they were going. one driver drove past me and another stopped to fuel up when it said three minutes to pick me up (ended up being over ten). what a disaster. i live in a tourist city! why is it so hard to get a lyft within half an hour? ugh.
title: Took Too Long To Get PickedUp

review: i highly recommend lyft platform for customers as they will feel safety and comfort level while riding with the chauffeurs especially on the left black premium services. i also encourage partners to associate themselves with lyft platform as this platform provides good customer support and driver support and feedback and treat their drivers fairly.
title: Lyft is a friendly platform for both customers and partners

review: i requested a ride share and after being notified that my driver was on the way to pick me up after picking up the first person, i watched as my driver drove past the road they needed to turn on in order to come pick me up. i was supposed to be picked up at 7:08 pm but didn't get picked up for nearly an hour after i had contacted by the lyft app. so that mixed with no actual phone number to actually reach a flesh and blood lyft employee will ensure that i never request a ride from lyft again, and if you are thinking about requesting a ride from them don't it's not worth the headache.
title: Lyfts poor customer service

review: extremely unsafe that you can schedule a ride and then have lyft seen to confirm/commit this to you only to find out after the expected pickup that you are out of luck. luckily we had service to book a regular taxi service, but we would have been stranded after trusting lyft. reached out to their safety line who said this was not their problem and i needed to contact customer support, but they don't have a phone number, so still awaiting a response to my email i assume i will never get. horrible experience - don't allow prebooking rides if it's a scam.
title: Left Stranded when Scheduled rides did not show up

review: requested lyft pickup via app. app then displayed a street address which doesn't exist. lyft cancelled that driver and sent another one. the lyft app showed his vehicle at some distance from mine. used app to text driver the name of my locationa hospital emergency room entrance. the driver then knew where to go. very helpful - but ended up waiting over 40 minutes for pick up. thank heavens it's summer in minnesotawaiting that long in zero degree weather could be life threatening.
title: Out of town folks rely on your App for address  location. Big Mistake!
