review: whoever says that lyft is the best app is lying because when i go to work i normally take uber my friends and coworkers told me that lyft is cheaper. i downloaded the app 6 days ago used it for the first time and i noticed i had discounted rides. i had to go to work at 11:45 and it was 11 am i decided it's too early so when i got the 15 min ride that was supposed to drop me off by 11:30 lyft kept on changing my rider and it was annoying me because i was counting on lyft to take me to work. they almost made me late to work to the point where i didn't want to wait anymore or else i'll be late and went back to uber.
title: Worst app ever

review:
first annoying bug, google map integration doesn't work properly and neither put in my starting or ending address when lyft app launched, this used to work. 

second issue is really just bad design, why have a half native app experience and an incredibly sub-par web app to fill in the missing pieces? it doesn't create a unified app experience! your web app couldn't even recognize i was in the ios app and kept showing me some open lyft option when i'm already in the appwas just trying to tip driver..why make it such a gross experience?
title: lots of little bugs cause a crappy user experience

review: my 3rd driver was great, but the app fails to show the driver my correct location. twice. and if you try to call the driver(s) as i did, they don't understand english. i waited over 30 minutes just to finally get the 3rd driver, maria who was great. and she complains that the lyft app is not reliable and causes tension between the drivers and the passengers. and she also said that since gas prices are double, lyft doesn't increase the payment to the drivers for the cost per mile. she will be forced to stop driving after many years. what a shame. i guess we go backwards and hail taxis again.
title: My 3rd driver was great, but the app

review:
i was at las terminal 3 and my expected driver went to the regular passenger pick up instead of the rideshare area. then he stopped responding to my texts and calls. he basically ghosted me. it took another 18 minutes to get a ride when lift posted it as 3 minutes away.      ridiculous
last month i waited at the reno airport in the rain and snow while watching drivers pick up others and come back. finally one of the drivers said to cancel my ride and put it in again so he could take me after watching me sit there while he picked up 3 other rides. lyft dispatch is doing something wrong .
title: No show drivers

review: i was taking my sister to the hospital in the morning and i saw that the charge was $10. but when i received the message of the ride it showed that the map was wrong, we never went to a hotel all the way to the hospital. and they also charged us for damages we never done. when they showed me the pictures, it was something my sister and i didn't do, we never caused any damage and the driver accused us for the damage. and charged us $180 for something we didn't do and for not ending the ride. don't use lyft anymore if those drivers are going to rip you off.
title: False damage and wrong destination map

review:
i don't really like lyft because the prices are always higher then uber. also i was over charged for a few of my rides and i tried to report that to lyft and they don't make it easy to communicate with someone . or even have a way to return the money that was taken from you .. if i book a ride for 10$ i want to pay 10$ not 16 or 17$ because my
driver says he's at my location meanwhile he's driving in circles around my block because  his gps is messed up. it's wrong ! so i just deleted the app.
title: Why are Lyft prices always higher then Uber

review:
a driver made a false claim that i threw up in his car and used fake photos probably that he found online. i came from the beach and he probably made the claim because i got some sand in his car. regardless, i reached out to customer support to look into this claim and refund $80 damage fee. he did not have leather seats and the photo did. they did absolutely nothing and took his word for it. and i quote,

we re-opened your case and after extensive review of the information provided by both you and the driver, no adjustments will be made to this claim.

i'm deleting this app and using uber from now on.
title: Worst customer support

review: the app is easy to use and will vibrate when the driver will arrive in 7 minutes, so i could rest for sure. other details like book in advance and location, makes it a good tool for me who needs a ride from time to time. the cost is less as i compare with the other ride app, same destination. truelybrecomended.
title: Easy to use, cost less

review: i recently had a lyft driver pick me up from work the other day and not even 10 minutes into the ride he told me he needed me to call another lyft driver because he had a flat tire. are you kidding me!? if you have a flat tire you shouldn't even be driving! why not cancel the ride before you pick someone up!? another experience i had was with this guy who kept asking me for my number and locked the doors and wouldn't let me out till i gave it to him. absolutely unacceptable! will not use lyft anymore. these are only a few experiences of the many that i've had.
title: Everything That Can Go Wrong, WILL Go Wrong

review: i'm always late for work because of the sharing rides if i get picked first i should the one who get drop off first but they picked the second person that is sharing the ride with and they drop him first and it's not fair for me the ride takes up to 38 min ,also another thing if the drives cancel the ride when he's 2 min away i should get a discount or something because when i cancel the ride 3 min away because the driver is taking too long i get charge 5$ ? why it should be both sides driver and customer both get charge this app is definitely the worse and not fair at all
title: Lyft is not fair

review: i don't like the fact that there is no way to contact customer service. the company is to large not to have anyway to reach anyone. i am handicapped. i've talked to drivers and was told add to notes for drivers to pull in the drive when picking up. which i did but they still stop in the street. there's a large tree in my front yard they can't see me nor i them and that's where they stop. lyft needs a customer support!
title: Lyft

review:
i was overcharged multiple times in january of 2022. didn't get a refund until june of 2022. wasn't a full refund but got some back. 
it double charged my cash app card 3-4 times. took roughly over 100$ in total. not counting the rides i did spend money on. do not use debit card. use cash app. lock card after usage. 
app would also give total cost of all rides for the day/24 hour period and also took that cost out of account. also charged for rides when one was never order. cant say it enough watch your transactions
title: Overcharges (watch your transactions)

review: i've been driving for lyft for 4 weeks. during the 4 weeks i've encountered 4 customer cancellations as i'm getting to pickup location.   lyft doesn't honor their policy and pay the cancellation fee to the driver.  they are lying, no support giving, and for a lack of better words(bi+ches)!!!!   their app glitches, they hold you in queue multiple times as first to be called then you watch 30 lyfts get a passenger before you.   this is the worst experience with support i've ever had.  i honestly wish bad upon all lyft support and upper management because i know you steal from thousands of us everyday.
title: Pays less than Uber & they steal

review: i've recently been experiencing some issues with how the app generally works, mainly how it will de-prioritize me unless i submit requests for lyfts at the premium rates. wait times basically extending until the app informs me to retry later due to no drivers being available. i waited at an airport for over an hour because i chose the basic' tier for drivers and watched as new folks called in rides almost and got drivers almost instantly. message received, lyftyou gotta pay or else. i would not feel the need to leave this review here publicly, but there's no way to connect with support.
title: No way to contact support

review:
i had a ride where my driver drove recklessly, running red lights, stop signs, cutting through gas stations and cutting in front of other cars. 

i later got a message from lyft saying i owe $80 for damage with fake photos of vomit on the car and that if i don't pay the amount my account will be suspended. i told them the driver made this up and asked for further evidence and for them to look into the past ratings for the driver and me respectively. 

after going back and forth for almost a day, i got the same responses over and over again from support saying they'd escalate to a specialized team. they never showed any proof that they had put any effort to investigating further.

this was the worst customer experience i had and i will never be using the app again rather than paying $80 for an unjust charge. steer clear of this app and watch out for vomit fraud. google it, there are multiple articles about it.
title: Frauded for fake vomit

review: i don't know how the gps in the app works but it always has the driver taking the longest backwards route every time. sometimes i'll lyft to work which it 10 minutes away. and it always takes the drivers on this out of the way route that's backtracking and has a ten minute ride turn into a 15 to 20 minute ride. very frustrating.
title: Longest route

review: i scheduled my ride at 3am for a ride at 1235p! first drive came, canceled 3min out and charge a cancellation fee! second driver was 1min out and canceled! third driver 9min out! by this time i'm going to be late for work! got switched to a fourth driver who got me here a few minutes early! i've had this issue before with all of these cancellations! i'm standing outside or on my way down! i don't like to make people wait and i don't have extra anything to spare! lyft to me is safer than uber by far but more inconvenient it seems
title: Canceled on

review: i ordered a lyft with the wait and save option, at first it said that i'd have to wait 15 minutes to get a ride then 15 minutes passed and i did t get nothing not even a notification from the app to say it might take longer, after 18 mins they sent another notification to say that i was gonna get a ride in another 13 minutes and my driver was on the way, when my driver was about 5 mins away they canceled the ride and they said i had to wait another 15 minutes for them to book a ride for me. i opened up my uber account and got a ride in 5 mins.
title: Pickup wait was sooooo long

review:
sometimes app will say x minutes until driver arrives for pick up, but often is two to three times longer. 

i often know the neighborhoods the driver is coming from, and often second-guess the initial time stated, because i know how long it ordinarily takes for me to drive from those neighborhoods to wherever i'm at. 

it makes for a frustrating experience, because the app is often wrongand it's no the driver's fault.
title: Driver arrival time is often inaccurate

review: i scheduled a ride for my husband to go to work, because our car broke down. everything went through okay, and it said the ride was scheduled. a little before the driver was supposed to get here, the ride was up and canceled with no explanation. we don't have food in our house, i am handicapped, and so is my mother that lives with me. we were dependent on lyft to get my husband to work, so we would have money for food. this company is horrible, they are not reliable, they are callous, and they don't care that we have nothing. do not use this company, they are unethical!
title: One star is too much for this company

review: the app charged me $5 because it couldn't figure out where i was. my gps was on, i had the signal and i pressed the command to locate myself. still, the app wasn't able to figure out my location, wasted the driver's time, and charged me $5 for that. the driver canceled on my trip and the next trip was charged $7 higher than originally advertised. i've never experienced that with uber. i was using lyft because sioux falls, where i spent the weekend, has limited number of uber drivers. however, after this bad experience, i will try my chances with uber
title: I was mugged $5 by the app, never experienced that with Uber

review: so i use this app a lot it's how i get to and from work. it was my understanding that not only am i paying for someone to come pick me up but in that i'm paying for the gas. but now i have to literally pay for the the gas as well as the ride. i understand that gas is high but that is no reason to pass that on to the customer that's the whole point of me ordering a lyft in the first place. maybe if lyft paid their drivers better we wouldn't have to also pay for their gas.
title: Fuel surcharge

review: this ride-share app is pretty decent. similar to uber but a little cheaper. i don't like that rider can't manipulate the tip tool and has to pay a dollar amount. i also don't like that a ride can be taken from a driver.  plus, there is no feature on either app that lets a driver know you are either on a military base or need to enter a military base before he or she takes a ride. but, overall, the app is convenient and i would recommend.
title: KP

review:
i don't understand how lyft can be both worse than uber and more expensive. 

i can't could the times that my driver has been lost or i've put in the wrong location of a chain because of their horrendous mapping. how is it i put in mariano's grocery and i get a list of the same name 10 times with no address or any way to tell which location i'm choosing? should i just go down the list until i find the correct one? how is it i can put in the name of a bar and be taken to an empty lot on the opposite side of the city? i never use lyft but now it's time to just delete it
title: Map is always incorrect

review: this isn't my first time riding in a lyft but the people are rude i got in the car with my family and this dude didn't let us get seated right we asked if someone could have seated in the front and this guy said no. then was like you know what now you can sit in the front right when we all got in the back uber has better service than this and they are more polite if your not gonna have the right attitude while working on what you do right now then don't do it and find another job where you can have the attitude you have right now . and not just that but the dude was racist.
title: Rude drivers

review: i am losing my eyesight, so i have lost my independence. taking the bus is uncomfortable but i thought it was my only option. someone told me about lyft, and i wasn't sure about it, but am beyond thrilled! a shout out to all of your drivers! every one of them have been kind and cordial. even going steps beyond by assisting me in and out of the vehicle or with small packages. excellent, truly excellent!!!
title: Thank You!

review: so i've literally put 65 lyftcash on my app and it has been two weeks i've been in contact with them and they have not fixed it they keep telling me to verify my bank cards when i verified over four of my bank cards and they still are telling me i cannot use this account and they have over $65 worth of loose cash on my account they're basically just doing everyone's money and overcharging us and i hope they see this i would love to post a screenshot of the lyft cash i have they stole 65$ from me n won't let me use it even when i changed my bank cards 4 times
title: The steal your money

review: i like that feature that lets my family members see what's happening with the ride on their phones. the wait and save option is nice since i am not usually in a hurry, as well as the add a stop feature that let's me turn quick errands into a round trip with the same driver. my drivers have always been polite and helpful.
title: Good features, great staff

review:
this company works like that. they have reasonable pricing, many pick up type options to choose from to save the most on a budget without sacrificing the quality of a business professional ryde.
need i say more? nope! totally recommend this ryder dream in real time to all my friends and real life family
title: Great overall win/win company for all even non playing entities

review: i had such a bad experience with lyft at nyc. one of their drives were filming us after i canceled the ride because he was being really rude. another driver made my friend and i get off the vehicle just because i asked for a paper towel, and left us in the middle of the city. i called several times and the customer service were as rude as you can imagine, they didn't help me, when finally got an email asking for my refund they told me they're gonna make the refund but never did, i'm still waiting sending emails and nobody answering. do not use lyft. uber is way better, specially their drivers.
title: Bad service

review: this is about the fourth time in a row now where i've had to wait more than 30 minutes for someone to come get me. just now, i only had to go a couple of miles down the street and someone couldn't pick me up for 30 minutes. i'm literally walking back. last week, i had to rent a car from the detroit airport because there were no lyft drivers to be found. this type of company is wonderful until drivers become scarce. starting to change my mentality of this form of transportation.
title: Becoming very unreliable

review: uber user exclusively for years until one morning i check the price of my ride and it was $18. i then showered, got ready and 15 mins later went to place the order for a ride and it was jacked up to $37. i downloaded lyft and it was $14. if you like wasting money then by all means use uber, but if you work hard for your money, lyft is the way to go
title: So much cheaper than Uber

review: i understand there arnt a lot of drivers in my area but you shouldn't let ppl accept trips then never show up i waited 45 minutes because the time just kept updating but the driver wouldn't answer my messages or move at all i order this lyft an hour ahead of when i was leaving if ur drivers are not going to follow through on the fairs they accept they should be fired or at least give me the option to leave him a bad review i just had to cancel my ride and wait for the money to go back in my account after waiting an hour thank god a friend was nice enough to give me a ride for free
title: Such a scam

review:
when open app the app place my current position correctly on map. after ride requested it made pickup at another location of honolulu airport on the map. 
had to message driver to tell where the correct place of pickup was. driver was appreciative so that he didn't need to backtrack from where he was coming to correct pickup location. 
other than that the driver was friendly and ride was great!
title: Ride was great. App not so great.

review: there should be a penalty for drivers who pretend they're gonna do the ride and make you wait until they complete their previous ride, only to cancel two minutes before arriving. the amount of times i've been late to work because a driver decided to make me wait 10+ minutes only to cancel is ridiculous and shouldn't be allowed. at least let us review the flaking driver because some of these people need to get 0 stars or something that matters so they can stop doing this
title: Drivers shouldn't be allowed to accept rides and cancel them after making you wait

review: i'm tired of booking rides with long wait times only to have the driver cancel a minute before pick up. it has happened several times with no way to report them. i waited 1 hour today after two cancellations and a third ride still 20 minutes away. i can't afford to lose my time on these rides anymore. i ended up ordering an uber instead. lyft has better prices but longer wait times. i won't use lyft as my first choice unless these drivers are held accountable. force drivers to confirm or deny rides immediately. give passengers ride credits if their time is wasted. drivers get paid for their time. compensate us passengers for our time!
title: HOLD YOUR DRIVERS ACCOUNTABLE!!

review: always a great experience taking lyft ! you guys have bailed me out countless times from risking everything i've worked for the last 20 years , i wish more people would realize it's not worth it to drink and drive when we have the option to pay a small price to arrive anywhere you want safely.  anyone who doesn't have lyft should get it !
title: Rich

review: after reading billings cab reviews, we needed another option. took a leap of faith, downloaded lyft app and booked a ride for next day. lori, our driver, arrived early, masked, pristine car, allowed us to b chatty with her and offered to help. we've never been to the airport this early because husband driving us is always a johnny come lately. 100 percent recommend.
title: First time experience

review: jesus was extremely professional and caring. i contacted lyft to pick me up from the grand ole opry christmas show half time because i was not feeling well enough to remain for the second show. jesus was nice enough to get out of the car and help me in out of the wheel chair the company provided me with. he also asked if i needed water or something in making sure i was ok. just a nice caring personality.
title: Exceptional Driver

review: lyft almost made my late for my flight i didn't want to take my car so i wouldn't have to pay parking for a long vacation and that's what i ended up having to do. i scheduled my time days in advance and they said they would arrive 4-4:15 and they didn't then they said they were sending closest uber which was 30 mins away and i had decided to wait even though it would cut it close then when he was 10 mins away it said finding me new driver! like what!? i almost missed my flight and now have to pay an arm and leg for parking! this is why i scheduled days in advance!
title: Uber never showed!

review: i have a very steep driveway and even before that i have a steep road to get to my driveway and it's all dirt road i did have my groceries in the back owen was kind of skeptical to go up the hill but i asked nicely many times and he ended up taking me all the way to my front door i don't think many other drivers would do so he's a great guy
title: Above and beyond the call of duty Owen goes

review: we absolutely loved our driver.  not being from rockford i didn't realize there were 2 hospitals and throughout our conversation she quickly realized i'd input the wrong destination and helped us get to the correct hospital.  told us about great food placed and the beautiful park with food trucks.  would request her next time for sure!!!
title: Fantastic Service & Friendly driver!!!

review: bad server because driver can cancel right before hand. had to use my debit card twice and qued for another 20 minutes. and it quit looking for drivers. thats why i had to use my card twice and not to mention making people wait at night like that. and then have to wait for funds to return. i don't mean to sound petty but 30 bucks is a good chunk to wait to be returned in 5 to 7 days because you your screw ups. and your representative cancel the conversation after i try to explain. i will be using uber for life. you are done with me because of principle.
title: Bad service no accountability

review: they don't care for their riders, and when you report a problem with their navigation system and do nothing about it, leaving g you somewhere you do not use formula, especially when your business account is door to door .and there are times they don't pick you up where they are supposed to. still, oh, they use that complaint against you and then deactivate your business account and screw you even on your birthday, right before your birthday at that. lyft operates to care not anymore. they changed within the last year.
title: Not happy at all with these people

review: i've been using lyft for years. now i'm being told to verify my payment. the same card they been charging for years. i tried to send someone a gift card and now they can't verify my payment? i took 2 rides that same day. my card was charged $60. still i'm being told to verify my payment that they have never had a issues getting. they say add a card with the same address. that's the card they been charging for years and been picking and dropping me off at. there's no way to fix this issue or speak to someone. lyft should get it together
title: I wish I could give a 0

review: i used to prefer lyft over uber, but recently, the prices have gotten much higher. and they really need to fix the gps system. 3/5 times it puts the driver blocks away. i one time had to run 2 blocks in the snow to catch a driver. and most times, these drivers don't want to come to you. it's crazy. not to mention taking the long way around to your destination. you'd think it was to avoid traffic or something, however, that's not the case. fix it lyft!
title: Fix Mapping/GPS System

review: not only was i refused a ride even when i asked the driver to give me one (he clearly didn't care if you were wearing a mask or not. just wanted to enforce masks and report people afterwards) locking you out of a ride until treated like a child you have to upload a picture of you with your mask on.
title: Locking you out of a ride when a driver reports you for not having mask

review: it's ridiculous when the predicted time of pickup is 10 minutes but i end up waiting a whole half an hour because drivers cancel at the last second. i've had drivers less than 2 minutes away cancel on me, i feel like they shouldn't have that option once they're so close. i only use this app because of the starbucks partner program but even then this app makes me late to work. it use to work fine but lately it's been incredibly unreliable.
title: Unreliable drivers, unreliable times.

review: they need to realize in the app wether the driver has military base access because i tried getting a lyft while on base and have cycled through 4 drivers after a total of an hour and 20 minutes. i won't be using it again because i was trying to get to a computer repair shop (it was 12:40 when i started) and then didn't get a driver that actually picked me up until 2 which is when they closed. my friend and i just chose to take the ride and go to the mall because it was either that or lose the money since someone was committed to the ride.
title: Military bases access

review: i originally booked a taxi to lax the day before. after 10 minutes with no contact from the provider i called and they told me the taxi would be there in 5-7 minutes. this went on for 35 minutes calling back to the taxi service.  i called lyft and freddy was at the house in 3 minutes. he saved me from missing my flight.  excellent service!
title: No more Bell cabs

review: it is infuriating to order a ride service and then be forced to wait while a driver slowly finishes up a ride and then comes to get me 5-10 min later, when another vehicle could have been sent directly to me with a faster pick up. please allow riders a preference to pre-select no wait pickups to avoid the greedy drivers who selfishly pick up their next ride when they are more than a couple minutes away. i need a ride, not a place in line.
title: I wish we could reject finishing up a ride

review:
if you schedule a ride for a week out but they don't find a driver, you're just out of luck. they won't even cancel you, just let you stand there with no ride.
but, if 27 minutes before the scheduled ride you want to cancel and a driver has accepted then they will steal $10 from you. doesn't matter if the driver hasn't even started toward you. doesn't matter that you're not guaranteed that ride, so the driver can still cancel on you. 
i will occasionally use them, because sometimes it's okay. but this company is unethical. 
customers are garbage to lyft.
title: Don't use their Pre-Schedule function

review: better off using uber. route is different between the driver and passenger. i constantly have to correct the route because 99% of the time lyft is making them take a longer route, which i have to pay more. drivers also cancels on me. i get penalized if i cancel on the after they drive like 5 minutes in but lyft drivers cancels on me once they're like 10 minutes in route. it's extremely frustrating. i could have waited for another driver that could be closer to me. i've been using lyft for more than 4 years and it gets worse each day.
title: Unreliable drivers

review: i use it sometimes to go to school (i'm a senior in high school) and i would get one early so i won't be late to school but then it says no one picked it up and try again. once i try ask it gets me to my school 30 mins later than what i wanted and i'm late. there were drivers close to me and it had someone 20 minds away from instead of the person who was 5 mins away i use to like lyft but lately i've been very unsatisfied with it
title: Takes very long and selfish

review:
it seems like ride share apps in general are really moving in the wrong direction after the last year. this used to be a great alternative to uber, but it too has become awful. extremely long wait times, drivers cancel on you constantly, fares are insanely overpriced. it's cheaper for me to pay full price to park at the airport for 3 days than to use lyft. 

on a recent trip, there were so few drivers out that it took me a solid 45 minutes to even get picked up. don't waste your time with these apps anymore, their time to shine has come and gone.
title: Has Gone Downhill

review: 100% of all issues i have ever had with lyft is a driver will accept the ride then after 5-15 minutes inexplicably cancel!!! today i had to take my son to piano lessons and after 10 minutes the driver canceled. this caused me to have rebook and be 15 minutes late. the lesson is $30 nonrefundable so lost half the lesson that cost me $15!!! time is money!! it's ok that drivers cancel. what is not ok is the app does not allow you to rate a driver who cancels on you. fix the software to allow rating drivers who cancel!!! drivers should also be allowed to rate customers who cancel.
title: No way to rate a driver that cancels on you

review: i like the app just a few suggestions i feel we should have. 1. customer service needs to be mobile just not text through the app. 2. there should be an iptio. where we can use more than one feature at a time. for example if we are using the citibikes and someone i know needs a lyft pickup i should be able to do so
title: Review

review: this company is a scam and is not to be trusted they lie to their drivers. and chat reps are very rude and give you a hard time and there is no number to talk to a live person. long story short i was promised $3000 to finish a certain amount of rides within my first 30 days and i never received my reward scam don't trust the promo rewards you will not get them and they don't care.
title: Scam

review: if i could give this no stars i would. lyft stole $118 from me and when i texted them they said they would have someone contact me and when they did email me they said they couldn't do anything about it. also when i texted them again they said they would have someone higher up email me and it would be put under urgent but nobody ever did. a little bit later i texted them again and they said they were going to have someone contact me and once again nobody ever did. do not get this app!!! all they will do is steal your money and not do anything to get it back to you.
title: Stole my money

review: first time using this app. i requested a lyft, the driver never showed up but started the ride, never responded to messages or answer calls, and even appeared to complete the ride. i had no option to cancel the ride and there was no customer service to reach out to, i couldn't even report it until it was completed. the algorithm proceeded to deny my claim and only refunded me for 10% because the ride was inefficient. i'm deleting this app once i challenge the charge with my credit card company. i'm sticking to uber, i've had no issues and the app is far more user friendly.
title: Got scammed

review: caught my driver before he made the turn to deliver me to the valet parking entrance which has no pedestrian access. pickup said driver was here when he was a block away at the corner that many try to leave me at because app says we've arrived. anxiety making for this elderly, lame passenger. the drivers are quite good though & the fact of this service really nice for those of us who chose to drive very little.
title: Drivers great, GPS not so much

review: we were charged for damages and no one moved, ate, touched or even talked during our trip from the airport! everyone was exhausted and there was no damage at all. we were charged $80 laterthe driver never said anything to us, we assumed it was a language difference. i tried to get into contact with support and only got a recording that says to look it up on the app, that is worthless. i tried contacting the driver and got nowhere, this was a horribly way to start our family vacation! i am so disappointed with this app!
title: Charged for damages never happened and no customer service!

review: i used to use lyft constantly but lately i can't get a ride without going through two to three 5.0 star drivers picking up my ride, then promptly turning around and driving away. they refuse to respond to txts or calls. keep your app on hold as they drive 15 min in the other direction while your waiting on a sidewalk late at night. it's disrespectful and no other business gets away with allowing/encouraging their employees to treat customers like this. also, its very suspicious that lyfts app rating is 4.9 when you see 5 star ratings with 0 star review comments
title: Worse service than 4am at a Diner

review: unbelievable. the condescending attitude from email bots where you're in violation for community guideline, but you're not told what you did? be kind it says and wear my mask? i do. i have a 4.75 rating and 92 5 stars out of 100. but they suspended me for 2 days for who knows why? all to limit the privilege to pay them hundreds of dollars a month for rides. the drivers follow the app and have no directional sense. lyft is expensive as cab and uber. don't worry, lyft. you're time is coming, people are wearing thin from all the tech company nannying.
title: So many issues

review: a lot of their drivers use two apps or more and if they decide they don't wanna come pick me up they don't cancel the ride but just pick up another contract on another app and hurts me as a customer. so i get charged for a ride i did not get it because i had to cancel it because they refused to i would have been late for work. drivers that don't care about the customers should not be drivers. they only care about there ratings so if you cancel it they don't get a bad review but if they cancel it it looks bad on them
title: Drivers

review:
i set up a ride to the airport 2 days in advance.  the morning of my flight, i get a message the driver will be there within 25 minutes which was already 15 minutes later than they were supposed to show up.  he never showed and the suggested driver that was pushed to me, after calling him he said he never received a request.  either way i missed my flight and the next flight.  terrible.!!!!!

after the 4th attempt to get a driver, one finally showed up.  (he was great by the way) but now stuck at the airport waiting.trying to get on a flight!!!!!
title: Terrible

review:
excellent driver  careful; but lift said to meet at arc californiawithout giving an address. i was 1/2 block away from where i first ordered the ride, with no way to spot the location. so i was  confused and i had to contact the driver. it worked out. 

   i don't mind walking, but if possible please always provide an address as well as the name of the business if i am walking somewhere to meet the driver. thank you.
title: Downtown Sacramento to West Sacramento

review:
chiko was incredibly friendly, caring and helpful. he's is a charismatic and authentic person, and a great conversationalist. he shared some excellent stories and sound advice, while making sure we reached our destination on time.

we hope chiko continues to touch other's lives as he did ours. meeting him was an absolute pleasure! we wish him the best. god bless!
title: Incredibly Friendly, Caring, and Helpful

review:
prices are great, so are the drivers.

the app could use one small change though. when a ride is active, it would be helpful to close the details tab and just have the map on screen. 
as it is, only about 20% of the screen is viewable map, the rest is taken by an options/details tab
title: Almost excellent

review: i am sometimes left waiting to match with a driver for 10 minutes or more. when i match the drivers are often finishing up another ride, which means they'll take longer to arrive than otherwise, which i can deal with but the driver may then cancel after completing their first trip. so i have to wait all that time just to get kicked back into the queue and start over. it's gotten terrible over the last year. other apps don't have these problems or not as frequently.
title: Unreliable

review:
i have been very happy with lyft when i use it & have used it in the us: florida, seattle, san francisco, & tucson, az. the app is very user friendly & you get very timely messages about the driver/car progress. 
also, every time i have scheduled a ride ahead of time to go to the airport, the driver is always there on time. 
90% of the drivers are very good, friendly & helpful.
title: Save yourself a drive!

review:
i downloaded this app just so i can leave a review, but i will never use this service, and will delete the app without ever having opened it.

lyft drivers are, by far, the most dangerous drivers on the road. they speed, tailgate, run red lights and stop signs, and their job basically requires them to be distracted drivers. the worst ones are the ones that only drive for lyft and not uber. i guess uber is more strict about their drivers. people worry about self driving cars, but the real danger on the road, and number one cause of accidents, is distracted driving, and every single lyft driver is a distracted driver.
title: Dangerous drivers!

review: because this is an important feature to me, i dinged it for 2 stars.  i will be confirming a car, it even gets confirmed and the ma that allows me to follow the car as it is en route to my pickup doesn't always work.  it is hidden and inaccessible due to lyft messages.  drivers cancel when enroute to the pickup.  this feature does a better job of tracking and is better than the notification feature for driver cancellation.
title: Map and car route issues

review: i paid a premium for a ride. lyft charged me, took a while to find a driver then i waited about ten minutes for the driver. after i got in the car and bucked up, the driver said i have been given another fare. i had just been sitting on a broken train on the way to the airport.  i didn't have time. i was back on the street waiting for the next guy. there was no way for the driver or me to indicate i was in the car. lyft took cash for an immediate pickup and didn't adjust when they didn't meet their part of the agreement.
title: Bounced for another Rider

review: a driver i had went up to 100mph on the highway, weaving in and out of traffic like a crazy person. in response, lyft gave me a $5 credit, but then hung up on me when i asked what would have happened if she crashed. just curious if that would qualify for a refund, or if they'd just give my widow a credit for their next ride (within 30 days). lyft isn't safe, they have no oversight, and you're trusting your life with someone who may not care about their own, let alone yours, and a company who doesn't care if you die, so long as they make a buck.
title: Driver nearly crashed. I got a $5 credit

review: lyft has made me late for appointments and work even when i schedule ahead of time. if it is raining and i need a ride there isn't one available. today the app quit connecting to the internet even though everything else on my phone is working fine and a ride showed up twenty minutes after scheduling after i'd already rescheduled my medical appointments. i couldn't even load the app to cancel and i shouldn't be charged for the ride when the app stopped working but considering my experiences it wouldn't surprise me if i got billed for their app being crap.
title: Disappointed Again

review: i just used lyft for the first time and had an issue with the location services.  the driver called and told me to cancel the ride.  i was notified by my credit card that i was charged $5 for a cancellation fee.  i know it's not a lot and i want the driver to be compensated for his 5 minutes of time.  i decided to contact lyft to ask them to apply the unused coupons i had received as a new user to offset the $5 cancellation fee.  that, or provide a current promotion as a first time user.  they refused these requests. it's unfortunate that my business isn't worth a $5 credit. sayonara lyft
title: Horrible Customer Service

review: today i had the experience where i was supposed to be picked up at a certain location. instead the driver was given an old add on file for a pick up location. then after seeing this i went to cancel the lyft and they had the nerve to charge me $5 even though it was their error!
title: GPS Not always correct

review: i ordered a ride at huge surge prices for $80 to go 8 miles. after waiting over an hour and having 2 drivers cancel on me the third said the ride was completed and they charged me for the ride. the driver never came within 10 miles of me. when i contacted customer service they  said 10 times wait while we look in to this and never actually responded. this is the worst customer service i have ever experienced in my life. this company doesn't deserve to stay in business. they are liars and scammers. don't waste your time or money. use uber instead.
title: They scammed me out of $80

review: both lyft and uber desperately need to consider putting a time limit on when drivers can cancel. it's ridiculous  i use lyft to get to work in the mornings and will have drivers who are 15 min away, wait until they're like 5 min away to cancel. then all i'm able to do is hope i'm not late by the time the next driver gets to me, letalone hope they don't cancel on me too. meanwhile i can get charged if i cancel. fix your priorities.
title: Need better policy for drivers who cancel.

review: lyft is usually pretty convenient, but beware. i was recently charged a $150 damage fee after a driver accused us damaging his seatbelt, which we disputed to no avail. note that lyft support is only available via chat in the app, and a lot of their messages seem canned and robotic. they forwarded us photos of the damage we were accused of without time stamps or pictures from before the damage. it seems like lyft will side with the driver over very little evidence. i've decided to file a dispute through my bank instead.
title: Problems with damage dispute

review: i don't know what happened to lyft. i constantly get dropped rides after waiting a long time. and sometimes the app says i've been picked up when i haven't been and it charges me for a ride i never took. then, i have to go through a difficult process of getting a refund that takes quite a while and they try to trick you by just offering a small credit that's less than the cost of the rides that never happened. any error i've run into on uber is just able to be handled in app without a protracted conversation with someone. lyft is falling apart.
title: Consistently bad

review: one of the nicest and smoothest rides that i've ever experienced since i have ever been riding with list i would like to say this driver is courteous and respectful and he made my drive comfortable even when i made a mistake on the exact location for the drop off he took his time to make sure i was safely delivered i really appreciate list having this driver on their roster
title: Great driver

review: this app has been a good concept and has helped me in very tight positions, but as of late has been one of the most unreliable apps i've ever had. i can expect to be waiting for a ride for at least 45 minutes, have absolutely insane drivers, and don't try to cancel a ride that takes the driver 20 minutes to get to you even after a minute for your request because you'll be charged for their time. absolutely insane.. covid has gutted their customer service and i don't see any effort in making it better. so beware, because you never know what you're gonna get.
title: BEWARE

review: i ordered a ride and when the driver got there i called him to find out where he was. he was parked in front of a building a little further down so i asked him to just drive up to us and he hung up the phone and canceled the ride. i tried to dispute the charges on the app but received no help from customer service. i paid $12 for the ride and only got $3.30 in credit. when i expressed my dissatisfaction, the app said that it would use my dissatisfaction as feedback for their other driver and my problem was never resolved. if i could give a 0 star i would.
title: HORRIBLE!!!! DO NOT USE THIS APP

review: this is such a horrible app. has nobody tested the usability before pushing out updates ? it is so hard to navigate - for example if i have to cancel the ride or zoom into the map. if i finish a ride, this darn app doesn't let me order another ride till i enter a feedback for the previous driver. i mean if i am in a hurry can you let me order a ride and not force me to write a review first ?? similarly, if a driver is not coming and is delaying the pickup there is nothing i can do on the app - no help option. if i select a priority pickup and pay more and yet the pickup is later i don't get refunded.
title: Terrible UI

review:
the lyft app sends drivers to the wrong terminal.  this causes customer late fee and missed rides. i tried calling driver who did not speak english and was unhelpful.  customer than has the hassle of requesting another driver and going thru the whole process again.   
solution is for app to: 
track customer to correct terminal and send driver to correct terminal
try to employ drivers who can text or speak english so can locate each other
do not charge a customer when customer was waiting for ride
title: App sends drivers to wrong terminal

review:
i had a flight and relied on my driver dropping me, he showed up and was like sorry i am not taking you to the airport after i waited for him for like 15mins, and this was a busy day at this town and finding a new ride quickly was impossible!! 

also tried getting help with lyft and what happens is they only allow you to request help with rides you ride through, this one i had to cancel and therefore the app wouldn't even me say how much inconvenience and possibly a missed flight it has caused!!! 

not reliable!!
title: I would give less than 1 star! Horrible experience with Lyft

review: said it would pick me up in 9 mins, 8 mins later they got a different driver now coming in 10 mins, another 8 mins later they got another driver now coming in 12 mins?!? seriously wouldn't have taken a ride if i thought they didn't mean it. of course there's no way for you tell em what they're doing wrong cause they too big to care. i didn't choose the 9-30 min option i chose the 9 min option but the fact that there's no way to turn in a complaint is crazy stupid. always go uber first. plus they price gouge 3x what uber does when it's busy.
title: Too cool to care

review: this app is gettin worse by the day. the wait time options are bogus wait 20 mins to save $1. then get and driver immediately. pick regular pick up and end up waiting over 20 mins because drivers will drive slow to your pick up to cancel or your driver switches 4 times before your eyes. there needs to be a way to report these drivers who do this. the times that it happens. i've had to reschedule appointment and pay late fees due to the actions of the drivers and this app something needs to change and soon
title: Drivers, wait times and app are getting worse

review:
it can get a driver to me who will safely get me where i need to go at a reasonable cost. 
however. 
it also will send you phantom notifications when you are not using the app. then, when you click in, there is no actual information. it's like the app got bored and just wanted to say hi. 
i deleted apple maps from my device for this exact reason. i would do this with lyft, but i still use it from time to time.
title: Does the job but is also annoying

review: i had a fabulous experience with both drivers arriving and departing ny airport. both drivers were knowledgeable about the areas and both were attentive to conversation. alvin on my departure was very humorous and quick the app said i had 10 minutes but he arrived in 2 minutes. he gave me the extra time i needed to get downstairs from my hotel i loved my trip!
title: JFK NY

review: i didn't rate our driver fast enough and would like to do that, but i don't see a way to do so. his name was marc. he drove us from tracy ca to the sacramento airport on 5/7 at 12:00 noon. he deserves five stars. he was polite and efficient. twice during our trip, other drivers cut him off and he handled it safely without getting upset. i would definitely recommend him.
title: Our driver, Marc.

review: i like this app i really do but i can't give it 5 stars the only major thing i do not like is the price changes that your ride can go through on your way to your destination i got a ride for $11 but when i got to my destination they app proceeded to charge for $26 because the ride price has gone up since getting in the car and frankly i find that very unacceptable i was not expecting that and could no longer afford to even tip my driver after a ride pls have set prices after you confirm your ride so i am able to actually afford to tip the driver!!!
title: App is okay but

review:
i pre scheduled a ride from the airport two days prior, to give them plenty of time to find someone.   i needed to go an hour and half away but on the day and a hour and a half after the time of pick up my appointment was canceled.
had to check for a bus which only leaves early morning not the evening or the train which got me a half hour away only ran at 2 am.  ended up paying twice the price with a cab company to get home.
i can not and will not recommend lfty to any guest at the hotel i work at, they can not be trusted to be therec
title: Left a 65 year old stuck at the airport

review: i've had this app for a while and before it was fine but recently the more i use it i'm seeing that it charges me twice for the same ride. i tried to get help on the app and it won't connect me with any person and only says it if i'm charged twice it'll come back in my bank account in 5-7 days. this is the 2nd time it's happened and it won't give me my money back for the extra charge it makes. i truly used to really like lyft because of the prices but i will definitely never use it again. big thumbs down.
title: Barged twice one one then more occasion

review: the drivers tend to be mostly friendly and have clean cars, plus if you ever decide to go somewhere along the way just remember to offer them something as well like today i wanted starbucks before work so i asked my driver if he wouldn't mind going and i would also get him a drink as well if he wanted one.
title: Lyft is pretty okay

review: the app continually misidentifies my current location as a house number 100 yards away and on the other side of the street.  it always defaults to the current location rather than to my home address.  could not exercise a worse default.  the app only offers a limited list of available problems and does not offer a direct contact option to explain an unlisted issue.  this may make their job easier since it will show fewer problems but is asinine if customer service is of any interest.
title: Terrible choice current location

review: process for booking a dog friendly ride is not user friendly. i put a note in my ride that i would be bringing my small dog in the car and received 7 cancellations. on the 6th cancellation, lyft said that the next driver would be unable to cancel. the last driver called me directly and said he was in some traffic. despite the estimated 3 minute wait, he arrived 15 minutes later and ultimately explained that he was uncomfortable with dogs. lyft needs to add dog friendly rides not only to be respectful of driver preferences and religion but also not to waste rider time and $ with cancellations.
title: Needs dog friendly rides

review: we had an event to go to when we ordered a ride to the event, we were picked up super quick and the driver was awesome however when we ordered one to get a ride back.. well let's say i was traumatized it was below freezing and we couldn't stay in the building and the wait for a driver was 30min we ended up having to walk with our 12 year old son with us. we stumbled into a bar a the owner was nice enough to let us stay right in the front. the event was over at 11:30pm we never got a lyft driver and ended up using uber. did not get a ride until 1:30am
title: Pick up experience

review: i'm very satisfied with lyft and their drivers and vehicles however the app lacks a lot and has made improvements however has a long way to go!!!!  for instance, i had a lyft and was headed over 30+ minutes to my destination, my girlfriend who i have to request a lyft for to go to the same location in another lyft vehicle well the app would not allow me to go ahead and request another lfyt to pick her up until i finished my lyft!  now that put her an whole friggin hour behind me!!!!  there should be a way to do both at the same time!!!!!
title: Robert Brown

review: had to put my car in the shop and no way to get home. lyft app made it so much easier to get back home and go pick up my car when it was ready.  first time to try the lyft  app and it worked out perfectly. the app let me see where the driver was and when i would get to my destination.
title: What a convenience!

review: we scheduled an airport ride last night, received confirmation, were waiting in front at 0700 appointed time, and ride disappeared without notification to us. fortunately we were able to find another driver after waiting 25 minutes with no word from original driver. the new driver was excellent and got us to bna in shortest possible time. very happy with driver and lyft for getting us a new driver - but concerned with the lyft app for not notifying us of the no-show driver!
title: Scheduled ride

review: this is the third time i have been assigned a driver who did not come pick me up.  the app assigns the driver who is already finishing a drop off.  you wait for them to complete the ride before coming to get you.  except the driver cancels my pick up after the complete their drop off.  i have been late several times to appointment or left standing outside for 30 mins waiting for a ride to show.. no way to leave feedback for the drivers or to contact support about these issues.  i'm about ready to delete this app and just use uber.
title: Driver never showed

review:
antonio's first lyft ride. he is brazilian. his english is pretty good but i speak a little portuguese 
, spanish, and italian so we managed to have a good conversation. he is thrilled to be living in the us and grateful for all the opportunity we offer. great to appreciate what we have through the eyes of someone from another country. may be my best rideshare experience ever. wishing antonio much success!
title: Super friendly.

review: love the app! there is one thing i just discovered though, you can't see your reviews for past rides. i'm nice to everyone and tip well, somehow my number came down and i can't see the past rides to see why or what happened?  it's unfortunate because i'm always friendly and generous!
title: Like it more than the Uber app! One thing though!

review: i attempted to send feedback thru app but cannot find a link that isn't associated with a completed ride. on sunday morning of may 22nd i attempted to request a ride for my sister from an address used frequently in the past coming to my house, a destination used frequently. i had multiple different drivers accept the request only to cancel it without explanation moments later. i have a 5.0 rating. i would like to speak to someone about the reason these trips were canceled so i can understand how better to use this app.
title: Drivers Repeatedly Cancel Rides for me

review: it charged my boyfriend for a damage repair fee but we never threw up in the car. it charged 150 and i discovered that this has been going on for a while with other people. alinatoart, a person on tiktok, has also talked about the fact that she and other people are being scammed because of greedy lyft drivers. this is so sad and ridiculous because the reason we use lyft is because we can't afford a car, only to be charged 150 for an 8 minute ride in a scam. we have been using lyft for three years and this is the first time it's ever happened to us.
title: Scammed

review:
i've not used lyft before. it was a much more pleasant and positive experience than i imagined. richard, my driver, was courteous and professional. he drove with quiet confidence and convinced me that this will be my new mode of accessing the airport. i travel a great deal and so do my colleagues. i will highly recommend lyft to them following this excellent experience. five stars! 

lee cantelon 
microboard
connecticut, usa
title: First Experience Was A Lift of Expectations

review:
the first time i rode in a lyft was because l had called a taxi before l called lyft and all the windows were busted out and covered with trash bags needless to say l didn't get in but instead called my daughter and told me l was about to ride in luxury and comfort and the drivers are very friendly. 
i had never rode in a lyft until that day and l loved it!!
title: I have never met so many wonderful  pleasant people !!

review: this's is the top one to take an affordable ride to work, travel safe and convenient, especially with the economic activity of our business. also, compare to others app, this one send you cars in (great) conditions and amazing atmosphere while you on your way to your destination. i highly recommend this app.
title: Daily ride

review: i depend on this app to go to work and yet even with priorities or the promised time of pick up, i would have multiple drivers cancelled on me and caused me to be late for work. plus their price is way overpriced and i will be switching to uber from now on since their price is more reasonable. seriously they need to make it a consequence for driver to cancel because it's it is absolutely ridiculous. i would like to be 10 mins early for work not late for work! never using lyft again until at least their price is lowered for this possible inconveniences.
title: Cancellation from drivers

review: it was my first time using lyft. i needed a ride to the airport in florida at 3:00 am. i scheduled it on the app. the only worry was the confirmation. i only saw that it was scheduled. i would have liked more notifications.  once it was close to pick up time, i could follow the driver's location on the map.  that was a great relief. it was a comfortable escalade upgrade at no charge. driver was responsive to my needs, but quiet, which was fine.
title: New to Lyft

review:
about a year ago my friends and i requested our driver richard to return a phone that had accidentally been left in his car. he demanded to be paid in cash on top of what he would get through the app for returning the phone. also he asked to be given water which seemed very weird to us.

long story short when my friend went to get her phone back she did not give richard any cash and that's when he started to get aggressive and did a few threatening things.

i reached out to lyft support about this and all i was told was that a specialist was handling it. i was called to get the full story and then about a week or so later was called just to be told it had been handled.

i wasn't told how it had been handled and i never received a refund.

if this is lyfts way of making sure their riders ride safe, then i want nothing to do with it and will taking my business elsewhere.
title: Threatened by driver

review:
if you are anywhere traveling don't rent a car, grab a lyft! we were in las vegas and took lyft all the time, they were exceptional. we mistakenly took a cab one time and he was so rude. told me i didn't know what i was talking about cause i was a woman!
all of the lyft drivers were very accommodating as i was in a wheelchair. i can't say enough great things about all of the lyft drivers!!
title: Las Vegas Great Lyft Drivers

review: the ride is great the people are nice but i always get charged twice,  it glitches and charges two rides. no call support or way to contact them about my situation not helpful when trying to contact them and when i do the help support they don't give much information or even the help for the situation just says (what you looked up was it helpful) if the topic was helpful not, not great at contacting people ,terrible company
title: Great but charges twice

review: the mechanics of the app are trash. the overlay is not ideal for riders or people waiting. the constant zooming out of the map makes it hard to notice where a driver is or where they are driving to. before the zooming out was only during the wait but now it's even when i'm riding. only a sliver of the map and the waypoint are shown. that is not safe. hopefully there will be a fix, as i'm sure thousands of people would like to the the waypoint and direction their driver is going when they get picked up.
title: The app itself

review: we have had a recent string of canceled lift rides where we were waiting for the driver and they cancel after we have waited for about 15 minutes. just this evening the driver went right past us and canceled with out stopping. it is becoming a little frustrating when you are outside in phoenix at the airport and the driver just leaves. thankfully the second driver showed up within 10 minutes.
title: Driver canceling on us multiple times

review: first, how do you have so many low reviews and still have a 4.9  nothing is right or accurate. estimated times are terrible. drivers constantly sitting and not moving while you wait. pay for 4 minute pick up get picked up in 10. and if you have any issues; forget about getting any kind of decent or accurate help. perfect description of business practice in 2022. greedily grab as much cash as you can and provide minimal service for it. these drivers should make an driver community app and cut out the greedy fat cat jerks. it would be perfect.
title: Nothing is right

review:
last night was my first ride with lyft. 
i was a little concerned as i didn't know what to expect and it was late at night. but my experience couldn't of been better. my driver was very helpful, kind, & nice. enjoyed our conversation until getting to my residence. hopefully, all drivers are like him. thank you for making for first ride so relaxing & comfortable.
title: LYFT

review: i never take the time out of my day to write reviews but this issue has gotten me so irritated and it keeps happening over and over- 1. my driver keeps changing by itself and this causes the wait arrival to change as well so something that was 5 minutes is now 15 which causes me to be late all the time! 2. i can't leave the app at all now because it will either stop finding the driver or will end the ride and i have to restart all over again. i am now using uber because this app is very annoying.
title: App is getting worse and worse

review: on wednesday i requested a ride to the boise airport for thursday morning for a 4:55 am pickup time.  i received a confirmation text on wednesday.  on thursday morning i received a text saying the driver was 26 minutes out. then i received another text saying a different driver was 11 minutes away. neither driver showed up to pick us up.  the app said it was looking for the nearest driver.   at 5:30am i called an uber and it took 10 minutes for the driver to show up. we were late getting to the airport and almost missed our flight.   looks like i will be using uber from now on.
title: No driver

review: thank you for your wonderful service and quick response. i never have to wait long and my needs are met every time. if i do have a problem once notified lyft handles it in a professional manner. thank you very much and i look forward to using your service in the future.  mikki williams
title: wonderful service

review: they constantly cancel last min making you late. they will have you wait 10 mins for their ride to complete and say they're on their way and when they're suppose to be there they cancel. happened multiple times and sometimes your late to something important other times your stranded in a dangerous situation. only use if your not in a rush and don't mind waiting 30 mins for the possibility of a ride.
title: They cancel last min, with no consequence but charge you if you do

review: i have put lyft credit on my phone for me to use but the app won't apply it to the rides instead it asks for my cards i constantly am giving them vaild working cards i was stranded all night with my toddler due to this they keep blaming it on my bank cards and my bank it tell me there's nothing blocking lyft for my cards so i tried just restarting my app lyft took my credits  booooooooooooo lyft boooooooooooo terrible treatment to one of your 4.9 rating rider
title: LYFT STEALS PEOPLES MONEY

review: for the most part lyft is good.  but twice now the lyft driver has been more than 45 minutes late.  the first time the lyft driver called to say she was going to be 20 minutes late and actually asked me if i still needed a ride to the airport.  today the lyft driver was 20 minutes away and then lift informed me that he wasn't coming so they booked a new lyft driver who took another 40 minutes and also charged almost $10 more.  again i was going to the airport so i obviously couldn't change my plans.
title: Not 100% reliable pickups

review: there is no customer service number you can contact. how convenient. they don't care about any issues you may be having and give you canned responses. they're quick to take your money though! watch out for vomit fraud! a driver can splash some liquid in their car and take pictures and blame you for a nice bill you have to pay for. don't worry though!! lyft won't believe the rider even if you explain everything to them. they rather delete you comments on social media as well. avoid them completely.
title: Poor service, horrible treatment

review: this is now my 10th time in a month where i order a ride and then my driver changes 4 times. first it's 10 minutes, then switches to 26 minutes. that's unacceptable. it's clear they fool you with the wait times so you don't use other apps. it's the same with all of these ride-sharing apps, they're only about profit for the company and that's it. and it's why it's nearly impossible to contact customer without actually speaking to a human being.
title: Don't use this app at night if you want a ride

review:
have been good customer for about 2 years
love 99.9% of drivers and not having to handle payment with drivers 
i do not like app i found it a little difficult to become proficient on it. almost impossible to reach anyone with comment or questions unless a credit/debit card is denied then an email is sent right away 
also i really hate the fluctuation in price. i need to know cost so i can budget. please slow down!!!
title: My Issues with Lyft

review: thank you!  my mom needed transportation for a doctor's appointment and has issues with memory so i love being able to schedule for her while living in a different area.  i love being able to see on a map where they were and all the details provided before the driver arrives so i could help mom know the driver's name and the license plate.
title: Peace of mind

review: the other day i took multiple rides, and as i confirmed each ride, my bank account reflected the balance. but at the end of the day when i took my last ride which was $8.99, i got charged $32. i was charged twice for all the rides i took that day which put my account at negative. tried disputing but it keeps saying it's a 7 day hold to verify funds are available  which is unacceptable because a ride wouldn't be accepted if the funds aren't available. i would a refund and credits or i'm going to uber for good
title: Keeps charging me for ride, then again at end of day

review: hey was a awesome person he drove pretty well nice attitude very friendly kind just a all around good person if all drivers was like him i'd love it being that the drivers in the past were rude drove crazy in wasn't as nice but he was great awesome perfect i wanna thank him once again for getting me in my son there in back safely thank you lyft
title: Awesome driver need more like him

review: cheaper rides than uber but they never have any cars available. not in the morning, not in the evening, not at 9pm. not in a remote location. not in the downtown of a city! their app repeatedly says we will find you a driver in the next x mins. today, my own personal record was broken - i have been waiting for the app to find me a ride for the past 43 mins. i literally could have walked home in this much time. also, they have nowhere on the app to drop a complaint. not surprising at all. terrible service, i absolutely would not recommend this app.
title: Terrible!

review: i use lyft for san francisco transport since i am without a car. i'm able to get a driver at a specified time for a good price and the drivers are always kind. i had a driver today who brought me to a vaccine appointment and made sure i was at the correct location by driving around the block with me before letting me out of the car. thanks, d.
title: Lyft Delivers

review: lyft deactivated my account for no reason! i was late to work trying to order a lyft , and as soon as i tried to pay for the lyft it deactivated my account.. then i tried it again on my moms phone it did it again! i don't understand this uber would never - this is really annoying for me to hear nothing but good things about you guys and i join the app to have this happen to me i've emailed lyft support team and i have yet to receive a email back it's been two whole week! i've miss work several days in a row because of this.
title: deactivated my account !

review:
so friendly and helpful.  didn't mind having to turn around a few times when we weren't sure where we were supposed to go.  he genuinely wanted to make sure we made it to the correct place.  (seems like this is a skill that all drivers should possess)
i never leave reviews but this driver really
title: Best driver!

review: my driver hemn was very nice and talkative. which is good because it always make me feel weird sitting next to a stranger that does not talkmakes it even stranger. he got there right when when it was said he would be there. the cold was ridiculous and it was great to get into a warm very nice car. your the bomb dude and will look for you in the future
title: Excellent

review: drivers love to cancel. i made a new account a year or two ago to see if maybe there was something about me they didn't like despite having good reviews. last year our ride to an airport was cancelled and we almost missed our flight. just now, after i had scheduled the ride a day in advance, my driver cancelled last minute when i needed to be at work. busses here don't run at 4-5am. our car needs a new engine so i can't exactly drive myself. i already missed 2 other days due to no car. now i'm at risk for losing my job because of lyft.
title: Don't trust them

review:
employs and outrageous intrusion into your personal data read the "privacy agreement" that the chinese government must envy. 

the drivers are generally excellent despite the fact the app gps itself is often way off and seems to have a fetish towards most inefficient path between too points. drivers are dropped and replaced and the eta is a roller coaster.  

if the drivers were not professional the app on a scale of 1 for awful  to 10 for awesome the lyft app deserves a resounding score of 4.5 'meh'.
title: Meh

review:
lyft has horrible policies for riders. these policies just favor drivers too much over riders. lyft drivers just aren't there, even when they show up on the map and say they arrived. sometimes drivers dont even pick up the phone or text back, so youre just stuck waiting for nothing, unable to call another ride. even despite this, riders still get charged fees for the nonexistent ride. when i was talking to service agents to get this resolved, they just accuse me of lying and brush you aside.

i have never run into this issue with uber.
title: Just use Uber to ride, using Lyft is a pain

review: thank you lyft for recruiting helpful people who in turn help people to reach their destinations. my latest trip with lyft was more than what i could have asked for. reliable driver who repeatedly assured me that nothing to worry and he will make sure i reach my destination on time. the conversation was warm and friendly. it will be one of my memorable rides with lyft.
title: Thanks

review: i get my cars serviced regularly in san carlos by a shop that i have patronized for over 20 years. they routinely use lyft to ferry their customers from the shop to their work or home locations. i am always impressed and thankful for the lyft drivers that take me to my destination in a safe and professional manner. hurrah for them!
title: Consistently Quality Drivers

review: extremely courteous, getting bags unloaded, prompt, safe driver, solved a problem for me.  i live away from the city into rural county, no issue to driver.  locked out of car. i felt safe with all the procedures you have in place.  i am 73.  couldnt ask for better response , very quick.  i was unable to connect with you without adding app, puzzled by that.
title: 73 yr old

review: lyft used to be the better option between the two big ones, but anytime i've tried to use it in the last couple years, it's been a waste of time and money and a huge hassle. like right now i'm waiting for a ride that's around a mile and a half: it's around $18 and i'm waiting up to 15 minutes. so you pay more for worse service. it's a scam. and this says nothing about driving for them, which is a different scam all together. uber is probably still worse but lyft is so terrible now that i'm only using it because i have to
title: scam

review: i would give this ten stars if i could. if uber was a plane, this man is first class. his car has every amenity possible, from television to massage chairs. his driving and service are top-notch, and you can really tell he cares about his job. i would pay double for ken to drive me without a second thought. i regret ever leaving his car.
title: Best Uber and Uber driver

review: i have used lyft now about 4 times now.  once with about no cell phone battery left and stranded in a bad area in a not so nice city at night.  all of your drivers are kind polite and extremely helpful.  at least the ones that i experienced.  bravo to a job well done.  safe driving and clean vehicles.  thank you very much.
title: Best of the Best

review: i love this app, it is affordable and they give important information you need; like the driver's name, the car they drive, the tag number, and also how long it takes them to get to you, they also notify you when the driver is 3 minutes away. you pay on the app so there is no confusion.
title: Amazing

review:
like lyft the service is pretty much quick and pleasant. don't understand the constant change of drivers . yesterday i was assigned a driver, he arrived i was walking toward him and he took off  and i was assigned someone else.
don't think that should be allowed especially for someone handicapped like myself. service should always about the customers convenience not about the driver's.
title: The flip flops

review: it is way too frequent that i get a driver 20 minutes away and after 15 minutes of waiting i get a notice that they canceled!  i order rides at least an hour early but these canceled rides have made me late  on multiple occasions. i was also told that lyft will cancel your ride so the driver can pick up the priority riders
title: This app will get me fired

review: so my driver to me to get gas on my ride and when i said no i need to get to work on time he said too bad if you want to cancel you can . all i got was an email from lyft stating thank you for your feedback nothing like i am sorry for you experience or anything like we will give you a refund or half refund. i spent $40 only to get to work 20 mins late because my driver had to get gas during my ride. i can't believe this. this is horrible service on lyfts end!
title: Why can't I talk to a human on Customer Service

review: 100+ rides and 5 stars later i would call a lyft with friends to prove their rate would be lower than mines. recently my price was 74 and his price $30+ cheaper. i deleted my account today. i ran this test with users based on: 1 what credit, debit, or even paypal account they used 2 how many rides they took 3 how often they tipped what areas they travel too (distance) 4 how many stars they had 5 complaints/refunds 6what data they shared with lyft lost one user and many others will follow until there is a buy out and rebrand but i digress i'm done!
title: Scammed: Compared Prices With Friends

review: i have found it to be user unfriendly.  i am pretty smart and computer competent, but scheduling rides has been difficult with many program glitches.  for my ride today, i had scheduled the car on friday.  this morning, (monday), i noticed that no ride had been scheduled.  so i sent a second request at 9am.  i needed the ride at 2pm.  by 1:30, i had received no message, so i made a third request, which, thankfully went through, and a car did arrive, finally, albeit ten minutes late.
title: Lyft app is hard to use.

review: there's an issue when it comes to the payment options. my card was declined once and now every time i try to choose the standard lyft option, my card keeps getting decline, but when i choose to wait and save option it goes through. mind you, i have enough money for both options so i do not know why it keeps saying decline even after editing the payment options.
title: Bug with payment

review: i have been using lyft for 2+ yrs. every morning at 6:40-7:00 i have a hard time finding a rider. and when i have a rider it said 16 min. then they will cancel and i have to wait for another rider. then they cancel. a chain reaction! it's getting extremely annoying. me waking up super early for this?! as well, when i requesting a certain ride, it said i'll get there by a certain time. not for the rider to be here at the time of my destination area.
title: High unacceptable
