review: using the lyft app is always extremely frustrating. upon opening the app to book a ride you're bombarded with dialogs and prompts, too many configuration options, and unnecessary complexity. i only open the app for one reason, and anything that hinders the ability to get a ride is a distraction. also, it is always difficult to set a precise location, inevitably causing the user to walk across some street or locate the driver. the drivers rarely ever come to you. when possible i just walk because it avoids frustration.
title: Confusing user experience

review: there are no drivers in north augusta & augusta the waiting time is unbearable need 2 improve on your drivers availability also i'm still got 4 pending charges from saturday july 9 that i'm waiting 2 fall off my bank tells me it's a lyft issue i sent u 2 different copies of the charges please let me know so i can balance in checking account
title: Cars

review: this app is absolutely ridiculous, i tried to order a ride today to only have my driver cancel on me and my money still be taken out of my account. not only that but i recently took a ride yesterday and just noticed i was charged twice for the same transaction. safe to say this app not only has unreliable drivers but also a crappy management team and system. i don't understand how i could be overcharged more then $40 in the matter of just 2 trips. never using this app again. would not recommend.
title: Worst ride sharing app

review: i have a disability that affects my memory and ability to discern some written information when long lists are involved and i accident tipped twice because the email receipt that was provided had a leave a tip option at the very top and i had forgotten that i had left a tip and couldn't find the tip i had left in the receipt since there are many charges listed. i left a tip for the second time then realized immediately the mistake i had made and immediately contacted support. i explained the issue and my disability however they refused to refund me.
title: Ableist

review: lyft has been first class with me so nice using them. uber has service that is just always seems to be rude. where lyft has it all together all the time with the booking and the drivers. sometimes cheaper then uber some times more expensive.  it always better in its service to the people.
title: Give me Lyft over Uber any day.

review: tried to use lyft for the first time. i've had the account for about two years. i updated my credit card information before my trip so there wouldn't be any problems. tried to get a ride today and the app wanted to verify my credentials. it wouldn't let me put my credit card expiration date. they wanted mm/yy. my phone wouldn't give me the option for the / so i couldn't use the app. had no problem with uber. what good is the app if i can't use it. tried to add a picture showing the options i had, but can't do it here. i'll do that on yelp.
title: Useless

review: yeah it was early, like 5 a.m., but it's as if lyft knew there was no chance of the already long waits, but showed an estimated 30 minutes out, at least. just before 10 minutes left, the booking vanished and reset. had to wait another 30 or more. it was cold out. my first thought besides the cold and longer wait was whether i'd booked two drivers or was being charged twice. this experience made me download the uber app while i waited for the 2nd booking with lyft.
title: Vanishing driver and entire booking

review: you book a ride and wait for a 15 minutes for the driver to arrive. then when the drivers get close about a couple of blocks away or 2-3 minutes away, they cancel the ride. now you have to wait for another driver. this keeps happening all the time and this makes lyft inferior compared to uber. lyft drivers are abusing the covid mechanics implemented in their app, thereby allowing the drivers to cancel with impunity if they see upon reaching close to the passenger that their trip is not that profitable.
title: Drivers keep canceling rides when 2-3 minutes away.

review: he took me to a place where i was meeting friends and i have to say it looked a little sketchy but it was totally not at all. my driver waited for me to go inside to make sure i was safe. i very much appreciated that. usually they want you to get out fast so they can carry on with their night, but not him. i am thankful for this experience.
title: Great ride

review: a few days in a row now, the driver will be on their way and cancel at the last second. i tried to let lyft know this but there is literally no way to leave feedback on the app or website unless you select a recent ride (a successful ride where the driver showed up). also, stop making me take a selfie wearing a mask! i'm usually ordering from my bedroom/somewhere where the mask isn't right next to me. so then i have to close out and get a health violation. just take a cab.
title: Drivers keep canceling

review: i have had mostly positive experiences with lyft especially with kind accommodating drivers!! but tonight i was scheduled and promised a ride in a 30 minute window that i arranged 1 hour beforehand and was let down. i was left with no ride at 2 am in a closed bar on the street in the cold despite seeing many cars around me but no one accepting my ride because it was arranged in advance for a lesser fare. super ridiculous and a waste of my time, energy, and money
title: Unreliable

review: my driver got me to destination and back. his car was clean and he was very professional and kind. i waited half the day to get to the job site and the driver fir the cab company never came. then light bulb flash. lyft! i hopped on the app and my ride was here in no time. i just wished they had business points or credits for business accounts.
title: In and out Yessssss

review:
my lyft driver slid off the road due to some snow. i asked him to go towards a main road but he ignored and went the way the gpa asked, which i completely understand.
we slid off the road and into a ditch about 2 minutes later. he contacted lyft and informed them what happened and said we would cancel the ride.
the ride was not canceled until an hour and 58 minutes of us being stranded for nearly 3 hours.
we were not in a location where i could get out and walk and he was kind enough to drive me home after because i helped be a translator for him with tows. 
the driver was very kind and i offered to pay him out of pocket but he refused.
a ride that would have only costed me about $10, cost me $30, and lyft will not allow me to dispute.
title: Lyft Driver Slid off Road

review: waited two freaking hours just to have a ride finally come and then cancel when they were only 6 minutes away. cars on the map kept popping up and disappearing. i had no way home from work. i finally had waited long enough for a friend of mine to get off work themselves and come pick me up. i've never been so frustrated with this app. it's been a terrible experience. this is how i get to and from work. i rely on this as my main source of transportation. this has really be upsetting. 10/10 would not recommend
title: NOPE

review: lyft drivers keep canceling on you. almost every time i book a ride through lyft, my rides get canceled at least two times if not more causing me to be late in reaching work or important destinations and mind you i book my rides at least 15 minutes in advance. pathetic. don't recommend this app at all. use uber
title: Pathetic service

review: some days as it gets clean drivers car smells really good and they drive right by the law and some days i get drivers that forget to take a bath or clean out they car and then again i just let my ocd kick in and i don't think men driving should be picking up women before 8 and after 10 but that's just me
title: Some dayz

review: this was my first time using lyft. i needed a ride to the airport from mohegan sun resort. it was a good experience. i never use these type of transportation services but i will in the future. my driver was very nice and he made the ride to the airport pleasant. he loaded our bags into the car at the hotel and unloaded them for us at the airport which was so helpful. thanks david.
title: 1st time using Lyft

review: our family waited for 3 cars and no one explained why even though the app said the car could take 4 the drivers would only take 3 people.  one driver never even spoke to us just kept driving.  we were tired from a long day of travel, eager to get home and felt abandoned.  this is the second time driver cancellations have impacted our schedule and our trip experience.  we will discontinue using this app since there does not appear to be a way to tell who really is coming to get you in the estimated time.
title: App does not reflect Lyft Standards

review: the service itself is fine, but it's almost impossible to view the map of your route and your position on the route because other information about the ride fills most of the screen. it's not possible to collapse the ride details and view the map. this wasn't always the case. the app is less useful when the map can't be viewed.
title: Frustrating interface; can't view map

review:
after a cancelled flight i was without a rental car in memphis. i tried to use the other share ride company and after a pickup confirmation the driver called to cancel the pickup. then, i tried lift. the experience was amazing. very friendly drivers!!! 
thanks to them, i was able to make to my hotel and jobs safely.
title: Rides at Memphis

review: i usually walk to work since it's up the street but today it was too hot to walk and i realized when i was halfway there to work. i ordered a ride and my options were:  3-5 minute wait for 8 dollars, 8-10 minute wait for 7 dollars, and 11-14 minute wait for 6 dollars. i chose the 3-5 minute wait and waited three minutes for a ride to pop up. after that lyft gave me a driver that was 18 minutes away. this frustrated me because i stood in the heat for 20 minutes and this pushed back my arrival for work and made me late for work.
title: Horrible waiting times
userName: jamir who is fed up with lyft

review: the drivers have been great, but sometimes the app drops me and i am stuck without a driver, sometimes in the middle of the night and having trouble finding another driver while the price is going up.   fortunately my original driver reconnected with me and showed up after all, it's scary enough riding in the middle of the night with a stranger, but he was a really good safe person.
title: Lyft review

review: they have no way to get in touch with anyone especially if the issue isn't one of the listed issues that they give a canned response se to and no one ever follows up when you submit feedback - i had issue with being charged twice for tip and that isn't listed so guess what you don't get help!?! they make it so you can not contact anyone and get resolution if it's not one of the listed complaints you can't even submit feedback! ridiculous don't bother with their service uber is cheaper and better
title: No support ever when you need it

review: my driver was very professional and his car very clean. he was friendly and talkative. the problem i have is the amount. i paid $60 for a 10 minute ride. knowing that my driver receives only a very small portion of that, i will not be using lyft again. i will not use lyft until your driver are paid a livable wage. $60 for a 13 minute ride is more expensive than a rental car. i will simply rent a car or use a yellow taxi
title: My last ride experience

review: it's amazing to think that i can type a few words into my phone and have a driver waiting for me in minutes. i've never had a driver that i didn't give five stars. everybody is professional and knowledgeable. i just hope that drivers get a fair share of the cost of my ride. they deserve it.
title: Revolution in transportation

review: every lyft driver and ride have been great!  all very thoughtful and helpful drivers. if i had one thing to complain about it would be your app. i do not find it user friendly. i feel i am often left out in the cold with how it works and what's supposed to happen and even if there's someone coming for me!
title: Helped me in a pinch!

review:
be careful. lyft system did not allow me to enter a full address and only took a partial address without the street number. i think it had to do with the internet at the airport. 
i did confirm with the driver my destination with the driver he acknowledged the full address. however he missed my stop and i asked him to turn back around. 
he wasn't paying attention and he then realized he did not have a full street address. he made me re enter the address- triggering more charges. 

when i contacted customer service through the app, they insisted that charges were due to their policy. they didn't address the issue of why the system only allowing me to enter a partial address or why the driver would even take a ride without an actual street address.

they never actually let you speak to a human being. 
i will never ride with lyft again.
title: Extra fees

review: one minute a fare is normal the next it's 3xs the amount then drivers won't accept a normal lyft only lyftxl and aren't afraid to tell the rider that's what they are doin i don't mind tipping extra for good service but the service as of the last 6 months has really took a dive down the tube and no one seems to care about the customers anymore
title: PRICES ARE OUT OF ORDER

review:
as much as i use this app to get to & from where i need to go i honestly wish i had anything good to say. after being an active rider for years there have been a few instances where i have reached out to customer service to resolve certain issues. majority of the time the end result is biased & more then often i get a simple thank you letting us know yet do nothing to make sure the paying customer is satisfied based on your policies. 

u guys have taken my $$$ & quoted me 30 mins & i have waited over 2 hours for a ride. 
where & in what world is that ever ok? 
especially after taking my $$$ 
why would i ever have to wait 2 hours for a ride?????????
anyways today was an emergency & i had to use my lyft app but honestly i wish to not ever use it or give this company another dime since the thousands i have spent mean nothing!!!!!
title: Do Better for ur riders who spend thousands pls + thanks!

review: you guys charge the ride right away. i had to cancel one ride because the app didn't take the correct address when i entered it. i wasn't home but it automatically inputs the address even though i wrote in what my current location was. now i'm stuck with two bills for one ride one for $25 the other for $20. now i have to go through the trouble of making this review and contacting your refund team because your app malfunctions. fix the bugs, please.
title: Wait to charge

review:
tbh i'm getting really frustrated paying full price for a ride that takes twice as long for me to get where i need to go. i've been late to work multiple times because of app failures and rides not working out. 

if you can't get someone where they need to go in the time you first estimated, you should at least give them a discount. i'm switching to uber after this ride, i think that the drivers should switch over too.
title: Rides take twice as long for the full price.

review: found myself with no way to get to the airport after scheduling in advance. the app kept saying driver was on their way and finally after 35 minutes canceled. uber was busy, and i had no other options. i missed my flight.
title: Also find myself being left stranded after scheduling in advance

review:
i had a horrible experience with a driver in which i politely asked if he would mind turning down the radio as it was early in the morning.  he said no, it's fine as.'  i didn't say anything in response.  

then he said you no what, just get out.'  i was running late to work and said no it's okay, it's not a big deal.  he said no and canceled the ride.  i got out and disputed the charge but it is still charging me.  

lyft did not respond and has no way of contacting even though i have disputed the charge many times via the app.
title: Horrible customer service

review: long time loyal lyft guy but just left my id in a car and there is an automatic 15 dollar charge to have lost property returned. seems incredibly stupid since there are so many other solutions  obviously happy to pay my driver for their time and effort if they can get it back to me but it makes lyft look like they're trying to profit off of it and feels disrespectful to the customer. just leaving the one star because even good companies can have bad policies and i'm sure it's helpful to surface them up so lyft can get back to being the best in the future.
title: Bad policy, easy fix

review: so apparently drivers are scamming people by charging for damages like vomiting in the car and then lyft refuses to take any steps to rectify the charges. i did not vomit in a car, if i had, i'd be mortified and pay a damage fee. after some research there is apparently a trend of this. i can't believe two photos without time stamps are evidence that i did something. i was in the car for 17 minutes exactly and texting two people the entire way home. there's no phone number to contact people. the chat customer service is rude and unhelpful. emails go unanswered. it's a huge scam.
title: Lyft scam

review: overcharged me. wrong address. did not arrive on time due to changing of lyft driver's delayed pickup and of course delayed arrival time. i am requesting a partial refund. these errors are not the fault of the driver but the company. you caused me to be late for my doctors appointment. a refund is fair. in my estimation lyft has overcharge me $8.00. thank you for your consideration. me. rodney marcella burton.
title: Overcharged Delayed Pick up & Arrival

review: for the most part, lyft is great but i think one thing you need to work on is drivers canceling last minute. if riders cancel we have a fee that is non-refundable but drivers sometimes cancel when they are 2 minutes out and that is very disruptive. they should also have a time limit to cancel so it's not last minute, and sometimes it takes over 15 minutes for the next ride.
title: Driver cancellations

review:
iately lyft became greedy will charge you extra fees. drivers will leave you stranded, you request the 1 min and still takes 8min. and worse is their customer help section don't even bother if you ran into a problem or forgot something the car. their drivers are not paid a fair cut from what i heard from them compared to other platforms, and i after my case with help section of the app  
not being resolved.
i can't compromise my convenience but to delete the app all together
title: Lately the service and quality went really bad

review: i drove for lyft for a while and like the app and lyft's support for drivers. i also drove an ev under the green mode campaign. as a customer i would like to see a green option choice for fuel efficient or ev cars. for drivers, it sounds like there is an option to rent teslas now. great cars and lower lifecycle cost to operate.
title: Great App, usually good for drivers, needs a green option

review: the cancellation is getting really annoying i had a driver who canceled on me and he was only 4 minutes away made me wait 20 minutes cause he was giving a ride to someone else and then i got a new driver who was gonna arrive in 10 minutes and it was like 4:30am and its a 15 min drive to my house to work and my shift starts at 5am so i had to cancel you know how annoying that is so anyways i better get my money back and honestly i'm not supposed to be getting charge $20 for a 15 min ride

i enjoy using public transit whenever it works with my schedule, but i am soooo grateful for all the friendly and safe lyft drivers who've helped me get where i need to go. after experiencing such good services, i used it many times for my very anxious and somewhat forgetful 82 yo mother in los angeles.  every experience was excellent. thank you!
title: Grateful for drivers

review: can't say enough great things about the drivers we had this past week in chicago. every one was right there on time with masks, seat belts, great information about the city, clean, safe and comfy transportation. i would highly recommend each of the 5 drivers we had this week-mustaf, richard,emmanuel, lawrence and jonathan.
title: Great Lyft Drivers in Chicago

review:
haven't been using rideshare as often since we had a baby, but i'm glad to see that it's still thriving. 

our driver was courteous, polite and went above and beyond to give us a fantastic ride. 

i'm looking forward to taking advantage of these rideshare services in the future, when we do get out. :-)
title: Excellent service

review: this app use to be great but now they just keep adding fee on top of fee to push you to buy their subscription. to only get a 15% off an already outrageously priced ride what a joke i feel bad for the drivers too because they don't ever see the outrageous prices or get paid out any where near what the customer is charged making them hungry for tips what a joke of a company. yet again another proof to show that one company's get big they don't care about customers or their happiness just money and how much they can profit what a joke.
title: Money robbers

review: i requested a ride for a 5 seat vehicle but the vehicle that came to pick us up didn't have enough room and instead of him sending another driver, he reported my account a health risk so now my account is suspended; they don't even call you to check on the circumstances or anything they just do everything based off a computer. i have been a loyal customer to lyft but now i'm really just about to start dealing with some else cause i'm not going keep putting the ignorance and lack of respect for their customers.
title: No customer service and bad drivers

review: the driver was very nice however i told him we were going the wrong way very early in the ride and then it might be the wrong address, and i told him where we were staying and he said he knew where it was, but he still continued to go the wrong way. i feel like if he would have listened i would not have been charged $30 instead of the 13 i was expecting. the names of the hotel and the street that we ended up on or the same name. i respectfully request a refund.
title: Wrong Way

review:
the control and oversight of the driver's is excellent keeping a high level of positive customer experience. the real benefit is safety which enhances everyone's life. thank you for insuring my safety at all times.  

wonderful experiences with this company and it's representatives.  all issues, questions or concerns handled quickly and promptly by the company safety is job one and lyft proves it
title: Lyft experience

review: the driver was great !!! but the price was nottttt $65 for ten miles is pathetic preying on the american people like this is unacceptable!!! please fix your rates before y'all lose your riders too i'd rather take a scooter or hitch hike and take a chance on netting a serial killer than be raped by the government and lyft charging over double triple quadruple amounts it's not right and i will be telling my friends and family about this one !!!! y'all used to be my go to but now ur just like uber evil and cruel and greedy and ungrateful. we're all suffering and the lyft name is tarnished just the same !!!!
title: Review

review: it would be nice to be able to select a driver that i liked and provided me great service and had a vehicle that was not smelly. i understand your wanting to give all drivers equal opportunity to provide rides; however, as a customer i like using a repeat driver that i feel comfortable with.
title: Would like to choose drive.

review: had to wait to long for a ride and changed drivers and never gave me contact information on second driver! talked to first driver and he said he was two minutes away and never showed! i'm disabled and had to stand in the middle of the parking lot in the heat watching for a car that never showed !  lyft has a very poor system and wish you would improve it!
title: Lyft needs to improve their system

review: it's great you have drivers at odd hours which are so helpful to the needy customers or for some sort of an emergency , at a reasonable price . thanks to all the drivers too, who choose to work after midnight hours sacrificing their sleep and rest for the service of others .
title: Very helpful and thoughtful service

review: i missed giving her a star rating but it definitely would have been 5 stars rating. she greeted us on pickup in a clean car, good safe driver and was friendly.  she deserves a 5 + star and am sorry i hit the wrong key and was not able to go back to finish.  sorry deedee and thank you for making our ride a pleasant one
title: Dee Dee in Ft Lauderdale

review: i couldn't find any information on how to actually use the family feature also my pin location comes up as another address and it can be real confusing for some drivers. there seems to be no way to correct one without the other being wrong.
title: Family feature

review: one second it was charging me $22 and literally 10 seconds later when i refreshed the page, it went to $63??? and then like a minute later it went down to $43, then a few mins later it was $28, then back to $66, then went to $23??? so weird. but cheaper than uber!(at the $23 rate i finally grabbed quick before it went up $40 to $66 again!)
title: Weird rates?

review: after a long period of not traveling, i am finding that, in contrast to my past experience, the lyft app seriously underperforms uber's. i often get poor connection messages from lyft at times and locations where the uber app functions perfectly.  i also have had to reinstall the lyft app 4 times in 2 weeks because it completely freezes. i prefer lyft over uber, but not if i can't use it.
title: Good Service, Poor App Performance

review: i had scheduled a ride the night before but couldn't find the indication that this had gone through anywhere on the app. it wasn't until i started to order the ride again just because i was concerned, that it said you already have a ride scheduled  fix that and i'll give 5 stars!
title: Good but needs to be more clear for scheduling rides ahead

review: lyft needs to do a better job. drivers need more accountability and shouldn't be able to play stupid. you have the same gps we do so we can see when you are just dickin around. used to be great. i'm fact o haven't used uber in two years- now i'd almost rather pay a cab driver.
title: Out of town drivers

review: i own several cars, but i purchased another vehicle this one miles and miles away from home, so i needed someone who can pick me up at home and drop me off at the dealership so i tried for first time lyft and i love it ! the entire program is desirable and well programmed! i'm seriously thinking on joining the program and become a lyft driver!
title: First Time Rider

review:
i booked my ride like 1 he ago. instead of telling you no driver available. i was lied that it will arrive in 5 min. and no matter when you check, it always say that it will arrive in 5 min. in the end, i have to wait for more than 1 hour, which i should have got home already by taken subway. 
so regret to use and trust this app.
title: Waiting for 1 hr. Never show up.

review: this company should be embarrassed. they are garbage, my husband waited over 15 min this morning for the driver to be allowed to cancel 3 min away???? then for him to get another driver just for them to cancel also??? garbage, this company should be embarrassed extremely horrible customer service seems like they just pick up anyone off the street and let them drive. will never use this again. still haven't even issued a refund for the ride either. absolutely ridiculous. wouldn't suggest this to anybody, made him late to work trash company.
title: SHOULD BE EMBARRASSED

review:
my driver didn't load a bag and when i got to my destination, he got huffy when i said a bag was missing, telling me to check the back seat, and look in the trunk. it's not there! see?!

i want to report to lyft what happened, but there's no way!  when i touch help, i get an invalid message.

i lost about $600 worth of items.  i had to manage six bags to carry to his car. he told me to get in the opposite side wher this bag was, so i didn't notice it didn't get in the car,or trunk.   i assumed it did.  he was next to no help, and i am a senior and was alone.
title: Can't talk to anyone

review: the ride was for my granddaughter she said that the gentleman was very kind. that he put her bags in his trunk for her then when she arrived to her destination he got the bag out for her and then he waited in the car until he seen that she made it safely into her home as the ride was at 10 pm at night. please keep drivers like this in  your company.
title: Debra Canty

review: i won't go into detail because this has already been explained by many other reviewers, but basically drivers will make you wait 20 minutes just to cancel on you, sometimes multiple drivers in a row. the most infuriating part of it is that you can only give a bad rating to drivers you cancel on, not drivers who cancel on you, so there's no penalty for them doing this. additionally, lyft has completely automated their support center so that it's impossible to actually contact them.
title: the bad reviews are true

review: last time i wrote a review for lyft was to mention that my location was off but since then they have fixed it- i'm not having that same issue with uber. honestly i really enjoy using lyft so much that it's my preferred choice because the app is just so easy to use and occasional discounts don't hurt neither!
title: Lyft is the best!

review: really terrible that you do not have an option for people to report technical glitches in your system. i can't call or email customer support and the choices offered never lists lyft having technical problems as a reason for their customer to be reimbursed. your system crashed midway so i was double charged and the poor driver was helpless and i can see he felt guilty about rebooking me when i have already paid once. awfully disappointed. still haven't found a way to lodge my dissatisfaction
title: Technical issues

review: first driver will be 13 minutes away, cancel when he's scheduled to arrive in 2 minutes, with zero notification from lyft. just a text message saying joe schmo will arrive in 16 minutes. have been left waiting over half an hr for a ride too many times. i don't use ride services for recreation, i use them when i have important places to be , so having to always schedule rides an hr before i have somewhere to be is getting old. the only thing going fast around here is my patience.
title: Drivers cancel w/ zero notification from Lyft

review: i really appreciated our ride, but about 30 minutes before, i got this disturbing text message about a pickup on hurlbut street, which is not my address. my driver came okay and on time, but i worry about the person on hurlbut. and when i tried to reply to the text, it said no reply.
title: Strange text message

review: i have had great drivers and very good response with ride requests. the only issue i have is that there is no option to request non-smoking drivers. i had a wonderful driver today, but the smoke residue gave me a headache before arriving at my destination. otherwise, the app itself does what it is supposed to - arrange a ride for you to get where your going.
title: No non-smoking option

review:
this is probably the best driver i've had.
not only was the vehicle clean and music was on a pleasant level, it was also very soothing.
after dropping us off, she came back with my phone and found me in the lobby of our hotel.
i didn't even realize i had lost it. wow! great experience all the way around! mh
title: Skyreal's driving

review: the app was working fine until recently. after booking a ride, the window confirming your ride' would pop up for a few seconds before i got taken back to the screen where you pick your location and destination
title: Couldn't book rides

review: i hate that once i make a mistake on the location to get picked up at you can't change the location that you're in only the destination which is crazy because i had put in the wrong address to get picked up and i could not change the stop only the destination which is upsetting to me and that i could not even cancel the ride lyft y'all need to fix that situation because people do not really have enough change to order another lyft can y'all please add changing the location please and thank you!!!
title: Poor App

review: so recently i've been having multiple drivers cancel on me & would have to wait another 10-15 minutes to get another driver. on top of me having to already wait 10-20 minutes for the original driver to come. it's starting to make me late to work.
title: Can I get an answer??

review: lately it's been crashing a lot, they don't notify when they arrive car color is wrong they don't give you a call ,app get stuck and can't call them to find out if it's your is here since it's the wrong color that i sow on the app before it gets stuck then without calling the driver leave and i got charged for it was so much hassle to try to dispute the charge since the app does not work they had the wrong driver and wrong dateon the history around it's just been so horrible don't waste time
title: App no longer work

review: lyft used to be good, but now they must think they are too big to fail. most of my rides arrive later than estimated, and then the ride takes longer than estimated, no matter how fast the driver is going. costs almost always go up after you book, and the drivers i've talked to are getting paid less than 30% of the total price. new fees every couple of months. now there is a gas surcharge? just pay your drivers and concentrate on your core business before people catch on.
title: Out of control

review: i travel from east coast to the west coast and i must say that after numerous complaints my current drivers have had amazingly clean cars. i currently have not had to complain in a while. i hope it stays this way. i chose lyft over uber for a reason. the drivers are much more professional and a lot nicer! keep up the good work.
title: East/West Coast

review: i have only taken lyft three times now. two of the three rides were great. the lax setup is an unsolvable riddle if you haven't done it before - just go ahead and ask someone. don't wait for the bus if you come into terminal 7, it will always be full and won't stop; just walk over to the pickup. it's next to uber so there should be a crowd to follow.
title: Good service but LAX airport setup is confusing

review: john was 1 minute from our hotel when i requested a ride , he shows up and sits in the middle of the road , we get in and he asks us if we have masks , we do not john is that going to be a problem , he just sits there in silence, ok john no problem buddy we will just catch another ride , that's his choice, his car i'm fine with all that , but what i'm not fine with is lyft charging me $5 for a no show , forgive me if i hope lyft goes out of business, our uber driver didn't require us to wear one so i will be using them from now on
title: Will never use Lyft again !!

review: anytime i'm in downtown atl i will use lyft for sure. i can input the address where i want to be picked up and the driver will arrive. another ride service can never find the downtown address and directs the app to have me go to some meetup spot. i never know where the spot is and do not want to go there. thanks lyft for providing excellent service!!
title: Good maps

review: i has the worst experience ever this week with lyft. i was left in the streets at 5 am in the dark and the driver refused to get me to the right place. he costed me a lot of money for missing my bus and also feeling unsafe as a woman in the darkness in the nowhere. let me just put it out there that they don't ever care about their customers. no way to reach out for them or to seek help or send feedback!!! i filed two complaints that were never followed up or looked at. inhumane experience by all means !!!
title: WORST SERVICE!!! Unsafe & unresponsive. Better save your life and don't ride with LYFT

review: sherif is a treasure! i was concerned when his time eta kept stalling to get to me at the airport. he replied in a timely, kind and professional manner. he is a terrific and safe and enjoyable driver and went above & beyond to get me to the right destination - and even helped me with the front door lock! i feel so fortunate to have had him as my driver tonight. thank you, sharif & lyft!
title: Sherif PiE to Treasure Island

review:
arrived long beach airport. 1st driver 19 min away. waited til he was 8 min away. then he dumped my ride. waited for another16 minutes away. waited for that one. dumped. waited again for another 11 minutes away. finally showed. why are drivers allowed to accept the ride, make you wait, then dump you. it's asinine and frustrating and this is not the first time it's happened to me. 
the airport was virtually cleared out before a car actually came.
title: 3rd Driver finally picked me up

review:
i was trying to get on time to my destination.
i saw a 6 minutes wait but because i didn't paid extra,  i had to wait 10 minutes for pick up. but the 1st driver cancelled because his map took it wrongly far away. adding extra minutes for my pick up- another driver. hence, i was late to my destination. i tried to cancel it initially but the cancel button is not clear. i have first to click edit trip to cancel. nevertheless the last driver was nice but off course he wouldn't recover the time lost.
title: Needs better maps

review: lyft won my allegiance as soon as i used their platform. the design is intuitive. i felt at home right away ~ not at all like uber's maze of dead ends and wrong turns. plus lyft's drivers excel in courtesy and safe driving. i've had a few bad apples but if notified lyft makes sure i never see them again. bravo lyft!
title: Fabulous service!

review: i really like using lyft since their prices are usually a little lower than the competitors and they use friendly and professional drivers! like everything else these days their fares have risen too but overall they're still more reasonable! i also think that the lyft app is easier to navigate and more user friendly!
title: Very good service

review:
for whatever reason, your app has difficulty finding where one is for pickup - it never finds my location by gps and i end having to literally run to where i think your app has sent the driver.  go example, this trip i was at 116 huntington ave on way to logan but the takes me back to belvedere which is almost a quarter of a mile back and so the driver was facing the wrong direction and added 10 min to the ride time because if i had been picked up where i requested the ride 116 huntington it was on a direct route to logan.

this happens again and again in other directions. it is really frustrating when you are tight on time

not driver's problem but a problem with the app.  i had a much easier time getting a taxi and it was much less expensive!  

app needs a major revision before i will use it again
title: Terrible pickup logistics

review:
my app experience has sucked like an industrial vacuum. it keeps forgetting what i was doing or which settings i have set. i seriously made almost a dozen attempts to get a ride, because (if i even looked away from the app) i had to re-enter my details, destination, and turn on precise location (which i never turned off). the app just started over every bleeding time. additionally, i requested any driver show up in 20 minutes, so i would have time to get ready and not have to wait. he showed up in 5 and left.
you know what that means?
i had to go through the whole experience again with an app that has the memory span of a goldfish.

2 stars because i did eventually get it to work.
second time writing this review, because of course it forgot before i could finish.
title: App Amnesia

review:
how do i leave a comment for a driver who accepted the fare, drive 90% of the way to the destination without me and then cancelled? i've been sitting here for 20 minutes watching the driver go the wrong way. unknown if i can cancel the ride and not get a cancellation fee. how do i report a driver as a no show? they can do that to me. had one driver go to the wrong pickup location and then threaten to report me as a no show.

that's the second driver now that accepted a fare, left me sitting around, this time only for 10 minutes, and then cancelled.
title: Poor support options

review: i've used lyft for a year or two by now usually going no more then 10 miles i've always had the decent pricing of 12$ for those rides till one day i click on a ride of the usual price and it turns into 30$+ never had this happen to me before, i tried contacting the support to get to get to the bottom of what happened and got told that was the correct pricing for the ride the same ride i take all the time i feel robbed. might have better luck with other ride services
title: Never had a problem, Then

review: literally the worst app i have ever used! very confusing to use and seems to always malfunction when i'm trying to use it. i had a very important event that i scheduled a lyft to travel to, and right when the car was about to come and i was waiting outside, the drive was cancelled and the car that i was about to get into drove away. i was left stranded with no way to get there, and they didn't even notify me that it was cancelled. lyft, do better!!!! i would absolutely not recommend this app to anyone, you're much better off using uber!
title: DO NOT USE!!!!!!!!

review: my wife was at the emergency room and ready to be picked up but i accidentally locked my keys in the bedroom. i immediately booked a ride on lyft with a new driver named jerry. he was prompt, courteous, and very helpful in booking a return trip from the emergency room to our home. his vehicle was spotless and his driving was excellent, abiding by all driving regulations. i rate jerry 5 stars!
title: Great New Driver

review: i been a customer of lift for a few years now. i appreciate the great effort their drivers put in every ride they carry out. thank you for the relieble and cost effective service and promotions. look forward to the next opportunity to make used of your kind and friendly experience.
title: Great Promotions

review: my driver was at the airport to pick me up within 15 minutes of the call. she was friendly, appropriately dressed and had a clean car inside and out. it was easy to converse with her unlike the driver who took me to the to the airport on the 6th. i wish i could use her all the time. i felt safe and comfortable with her as my driver.
title: Diana

review: i used to ride lyft both ways to work and i understand that covid slowed things down but i'm an essential worker with no way to and from work besides walking! i do have to get groceries and lugging that from work is a pain. i've recently gone down to one star because i just got charge a temp hold that doesn't come off for 24 hours as well as a charge for the ride. the ride was already four times more than i'm used to. i'm going somewhere else because lyft has gone down since i first started using it five years ago
title: Terrible

review: this is the first time i used lift and was amazed with the rates and the many options lift offers ! you can selected the time to requested your pick up and the rate you want to pay ! i like the fact that it gives you options of times to choose from and vehicles sizes too !
title: Awesome Ride

review: i thought uber prices were outrageous, i was over charged to get driven five minutes away. i tried speaking to a lyft rep and was told there's nothing they can do and i have no choice but to pay that price. will never use again. my ride was taken several times and i was still charged a fee. i reached out and the communication was terrible and i didn't receive my money back on several occasions, definitely won't use again nor recommend
title: Not worth it

review: i used to love this, but as of recently every time i order a lyft the driver changes 3-4 times and due to that i've been late to work all weak. i understand things happen but it's becoming very frustrating. i've ordered them an hour in advance but once a driver is chosen and is almost here, it changes saying a new driver is 15+ minutes away. hate having to start my morning out like this.
title: Ride changes

review: they retain your credit card number so you can call in any condition and they will come get you for a 4th of what a cab costs.  if you have had more than two drinks it's better to pay like 12 dollars than more than 5000 for a dui.  you crazy folks out there listen to me! ok thank you'
title: Lyft is great!

review: i've been using lyft for about two years now and with my recent experiences i'd call this the worst. a 15-minute ride to the train station ended up being a 1-hour nightmare. the driver not only kept going in circles, he kept refusing to go in the right direction i told him to. i ended up missing my train because of this and when i contacted lyft for help, all i got was a half hearted apology. even though it was completely the driver's fault i was still charged for the ride. totally unsafe and unreliable for a woman passenger!
title: Absolutely the worst experience ever!

review: there is no point for wait & save or plan ahead rides as you'll more than likely always be cancelled on missed work due to my rides constantly being called. even when i lived in a more popular city was the same issue before the pandemic it's ridiculous.
title: Constant Cancel

review: i switched to uber after having drivers cancel on 80% of the time. i'm a very busy full time working mom who needs to rush home after work. i only take a cab when it's too cold to walk or wait for public transit. uber has been so much better and the drivers are friendlier. i would highly recommend using uber before using lyft. you might pay a little bit more but it's worth it if you need a service that is accountable.
title: Drivers canceling all the time!!!!

review:
so location settings on ios is usually several blocks off. add in the fact it doesn't allow you to paste an address you copied from google maps. it's convenience is questionable the more i use it. often it's quicker and more efficient to get a taxi in certain cities.

coming from a person who travels a lot. 

i used to love lyft, pandemics through now it's gone to the toilet
title: IOS on iPhone 13 issues

review: yesterday i took a ride to starbucks got there with no problem from my home in cape coral but when i set up a ride to be taking home the driver went to the wrong starbucks and i got charged a five dollar fee because they said i miss the ride but how can you how can i miss a ride when
title: Ride to Starbucks

review: drivers constantly cancel after you've been waiting and then have to wait on a new driver, much more than with uber. they also intentionally underestimate the time it will take for a ride to arrive, so that you don't cancel. estimated time 10 minutes? expect 20 minutes even with no traffic. it makes arriving to with reliably on time almost impossible. lyft used to a much better quality service. after my annual plan runs out, i will be switching ride service plans.
title: Worse and worse service

review:
the driver found it and bought it back at great cost to him!

i was up a creek without a paddle. 
no phone! i went to neighbor and we could find no way to report it. no phone number to report it. 

terence came back at great expense in time and money and spent another 10 minutes knocking on the door (remember i was at the neighbor's)
but i caught him just as he was going back to his car. 

i wanted to give him a big tip but the custom tip only let me give a $30 tip. so if the driver gets this get in touch so i can finish the tip. thankfully it was on thanksgiving another reason to thank jesus! driver-5. lyft-0.
title: I left my cell phone in the car.

review: i almost didn't get a ride to the airport on time for a ride that i scheduled 24 hrs prior.  that's more than enough time for a driver to see it and plan on picking me up as scheduled.  lyft even sends a confirmation!  my driver came from 30 minutes away and i was picked up 15-20 min after the time range.  he said that no one had confirmed that i was getting picked up when he looked at the schedule.  so if you schedule a ride and lyft sends you a message confirming that you're scheduled pick up is confirmed, don't count on it.
title: Early a.m. scheduled ride issue - STRESSFUL

review: was always using uber and i was stranded one day looking for a cheaper ride. google for other rides and saw lyft was impressed with the price also with the clean car and polite and friendly driver. ever since then, i have been using lyft even introduce to my daughter and she has also been a regular.
title: Impressed

review:
she was the best driver i ever had. i would hope all rides were just like it. she went over and beyond being kind and helpful. she made our ride feel like we were we riding with a friend rather then a stranger.  
thank u vanessa for making me and my son feel so comfortable, we truly appreciated it!!!!!!
title: Lyft Thank u for Vanessa!!!!

review:
in the past i have used another company and i called them for this trip.  their price was  literally exactly 4 times higher than what  lyft charged. 
was so  easy.  juan was so nice and personable. plane was delayed and canceled four times and was such a frustrating   night was so nice to get the ride home easily. thanks lyft!
title: Easy!

review: he was amazing. his car was very clean and he went above and beyond for me.. at my drop off he made sure i got in safe... he definatly should get a raise or an extra whatever. i also gave him a 10 dollar cash tip just because he went the exyra mile for me and i know gas is at its all time high..
title: about my driver

review: i used to think lyft was superior to uber in all ways, especially customer service. unfortunately, a driver can randomly accuse any passenger of damage and lyft will accept the driver's account without any appeals process for the customer. i am warning you that this happens to honest, good passengers, not just drunk vomiting passengers now. google it. it has become a way for drivers to make extra income. if you are unable to avoid taking rideshares, i would suggest you record your entire ride for every ride from here on out.
title: Beware cigarette burn scam and vomit scam

review: i first was introduced to lyft out in denver in about 2015. back then rides were scarce but i've always had someone available within 15-20 minutes, many times 5, and all of my experiences have been very pleasant. i have taken other services before but i always prefer to use lyft.
title: Lyft is where it's at.

review: lyft will glitch & cancel the ride on you when it knows you are getting a ride for cheaper than the going rates in your area, it will also glitch & cancel when it knows you have checked uber to compare price. it also allows the driver to look at how much money they will make off your ride & if it is lower than what the driver had been making they can cancel it for a false reason & without repercussion & you will wait twice as long & sometimes never get matched with a driver.
title: Lyft glitches & cancels

review: lyft should make it a little more clear when scheduling rides at certain times that a ride may not be available.  i scheduled a ride with a pickup window of 4:05am - 4:15am on a sunday morning.  there was no mention of the fact that they do not guarantee a lyft will be available during that time.  4:15 came and went with no notice of driver on the way.  had to scramble to get to my airport shuttle on time!
title: Be careful when scheduling rides

review: i got picked up from tulsa airport last night by a piece of golden junk. door dinted in with the impound numbers still visible on the front. the guys sensor kept going if. so he was pulled over under the hood flooding something with a gallon of water half the time. we finally got moving on our 45 min destination , only to get a flat 20 min from the hotel cause his tires was bald. we were stranded on the side of the road for two hours before a uber driver came and rescued me. worse ride of my life!! being stuck with a stranger in the turnpike at 2 in the morning. horrible experience
title: Stranded

review:
i waited about 1.5 minutes for my lyft driver and i was greeted by a very friendly, outgoing driver! i reached my destination, which was a pretty long drive, in plenty of time to get to a family function, even after a slightly delayed flight. 

my driver leigh made the trip fun and she was very professional! i love lyft!
title: Excellent Customer Care

review: i have had 130$ in gift cards to use for this dumb car lyft app and i'm still not able to use it v and i've beengoing back-and-forth an email with these people that work for lyft and i am still not able to get an answer or able to use the money on the gift card !!!! i'm still spending my own money out of my own pocket (when i have credit towards this app)once i figure out how i can use the $130 or if i can get my money back either one of the two i'm gladly going back to uber to get me rides
title: Worst customer service ever

review: lyft has been great came down to san diego for our anniversary. we wanted to be able to freely drink. so we decided to just do lyft for the weekend. it has worked out well for us. most of the drivers have been friendly & gave us great suggestions of place to eat & things to check out.
title: Care free weekend

review: we ordered a lyft and waited ten minutes (it said we would only wait three). it then told us that it had to find another driver and that it would be another three. after another ten, it said it was finding yet another driver. after five minutes of it loading, it systematically cancelled the ride and made us order an entirely new ride for twice the original rate. the new ride was an additional ten away. at this point, we would have been home already had our drivers not bailed on the fares.
title: Terrible

review: i called three taxis and a friend for a ride, and none has called back it's 24 hours later. used lift for the first time and the process went effortlessly. glad to have lift in my area for a quick ride to and from. the price was reasonable and scheduling my next pick from my home. way to go lift.
title: Excellent Service

review: please update ya'll gps system.  ya'll have the worst gps system ever for your drivers. literally have you go in circles and take unnecessary turns. the rides be longer than it have to. makes a 15 min ride into a half  hour. i have to constantly direct the person where to go. it's even more horrible if your driver doesn't know english so you will be pretty screwed in telling them where to go. ya'll gps system needs to function like google maps.
title: Please Fix Your GPS System

review: deleting this app now, only will use uber from now on, they have better prices but more importantly, they actually have customer service. lyft used to be good but drivers keep scamming by not moving or driving away and waiting for you to cancel so they can get paid. disgusting.
title: Drivers Scam You, NO CUSTOMER SUPPORT

review: i think there may be a glitch. when i try to share my ride with my family, the app immediately pops away. i thought something was wrong with my phone, but i realized the lyft app is the only one doing this; not my uber app or any other. can this be fixed? thanks!
title: App Not Working Correctly

review: if i could give it 0 stars i would got harassed by a driver and she started behaving as though she's involved with sex trafficking asking me where do i live do i live alone does anyone know where i'm at . made disgusting comments and never drove me home . told me when we were a minute away from my house i don't feel like bringing you home made an illegal u turn and brought me elsewhere and left me stranded in the cold . lyft then charged me $30 for the ride they gave me a refund after i had to constantly call them for help but let the driver go freely
title: SEX TRAFFICKING

review: as i finish my ride with my driver i learned that i left my keys in the car and was told he would bring them to me later that day. time passes and he says i have family plan all of a sudden and did not bring my keys back i even got in contact with lyft support and it's been at least 3 weeks and i have heard nothing about my keys being shipped or returned by the driver! i believe my driver threw it in trash!!! where i have other membership cards that costed money to have smh
title: I'm done with Lyft

review: lyft allowed me to schedule a pick up in advance but didn't check my payment method at the time. apparently my car was old but they didn't alert me to this until i was 10 mins before my pick up time. so they canceled my pick up, almost causing me to miss my flight and then charged me twice the amount for a 20 minute drive. they charged me 97 dollars for a 20 minute drive which i could have avoided if they had let me know ahead of time. i will never use lyft again.
title: Lyft cancelled my pick up then charged me double to rebook

review: i just had one of the best rides ever with a very nice and friendly gentleman in an extremely clean car . thank you lyft for hiring such nice professional people to represent your company. my only complaint is that your wonderful drivers should receive a bigger portion of the earnings since they do 90% of the work.
title: Best driver ever

review:
narrow list of feedback responses aren't conducive for constructive criticism, please bring back written fields. 

e.g. a driver sprayed their car with so much air freshener it gave me a headache. feedback question was what was wrong with your ride? and only possible response was smell. but if i have the feedback that the car smells, then the driver is likely going to spray even more air freshener.
title: Bring back written feedback

review: gps system is constantly messing up the drivers i had a wonderful driver named mark but he was at risk of being suspended because of the gps system not tracking that he was right in front of my apartment and threatened to suspend him from driving for this company please fix your gps system i don't know if it's a coding issue or something along that line but drivers should not be being punished if the gps system is not fully operational to track where they are
title: Great app love my driver but I worry that he might be suspended due to GPS

review: i love lyft and the app usually works great for me.  the two star rating is because there is no way to directly get in touch with customer service to give them this feedback.  i just accidentally canceled a ride with my palm while walking out the door to catch my just-arrived lyft, just from holding my phone!  they should really make the edit ride and following cancel ride buttons in different places so you can't do that!
title: Make it harder to accidentally cancel rides!

review: driver great! organization needs to reevaluate their stance politically. and stay out of politics. at least you're less supportive than uber is. do not support blm or any antifa or any marist organizations. i might as well spend a little bit more and use a taxi or call a neighbor to get a ride to and from the airport
title: Lyft needs to get away from Marcists

review:
i booked my reservation day before. went to app to check. no visible confirmation of my ride until a text an hour before. that's disturbing. i was not confident i had a ride until one hour before pick up. 
please work on that. thank you.
title: Need app confirmation of upcoming rides.

review: i must say that i have never used a lyft service before, but the ride with david was great! he made us feel very comfortable and made sure we were comfortable during the ride. we had to go out to port canaveral and he gave us some interesting facts about some of the things we saw along the way. aaa+ ride!!!
title: Lyft from Orlando airport!
userName: the sleepy girl and her mom

review: lyft is way better than uber which i didn't see that coming but yeah lyft over uber, simply because lyft seems to get more business, and/or (since i couldn't even get a uber in my town) a greater quantity of workers, and/or covers a larger area for pick ups and drop offs.
title: My personal opinion on the service.

review: we had requested a return ride, and no riders were available. so we walked a mile to another location along a busy road and tried to call another ride, but the app froze and would not work. this app freezing happened more than once on this trip, so i needed to use a different ride app to get to our location.
title: App froze

review: so far my experiences have been great. i've heard a lot of bad stories and then once lyfts bail out on customers they call us. but with everything i've experienced myself it's been great. except my lyft to the metallica concert was dirty inside, not wiped and the guy could've dropped me off a lot closer then he did.
title: Owner of a transportation company in Utah

review:
several times i booked a lyft car an hour in advance, only to find that after the waiting time had passed, lyft went straight because there was no car answering
shut down my system and put me back on hold, asking me to hail a cab at a grossly unreasonable price. this behavior is a waste of customers' time and energy. please do not open this function if you cannot guarantee the success of the taxi. i will only use uber to call a car in the future. even though it is expensive, it won't waste my time
title: beguiler

review:
i've been a lyft pink membership for over two years and it is nothing short of a disaster. the account randomly deactivates, requiring me to cancel and re-enroll. the grubhub plus partnership is also broken, despite contacting support many times for assistance.

i understand bugs in the platform from time to time, but in this case the premium offering from lyft is essentially broken and charging subscribers over $200 annually. lyft is a scam and the platform is not stable enough to support a subscription model.
title: Lyft Pink membership is a mess and doesn't work

review: i really appreciate timely service. the world is lacking good workers overall and it's so nice to have a business with workers that show up on time and are all about their business and providing the service that they are there to do. thank you i really appreciate the service provided.
title: On Time

review: you guys deserted us when we needed you the most. coming home on a late flight, several passengers called lyft. only two cars showed up and they immediately jack up the price to double! this is gouging!! we took a taxi cab instead and it was at regular competitive price.  and without waiting.
title: Gouged

review: they literally left me stranded in a completely different state i didn't know how to get home i didn't know how to get to where i was going when i complain to customer service through twitter because they do not have a professional phone number like a regular professional company they said sorry but good luck next time. uber helped me get all the home if it wasn't for uber i will still be stranded for 5 to 7 days waiting for my money to try to get out of florida
title: Left stranded and holding my money for 5-7 days

review: i scheduled a lyft 2 days before with a confirmed time window of 10 min. only after payment was deducted from my credit card did i get a subsequent notice that the drivers arrival time would be at least 22min after the agreed upon time. my lyft driver in total arrived 35min late from what i scheduled with lyft. subsequently missed my appointment. thought i would give lyft a try after using uber for the last 3 years (bad move on my part).
title: Do not use their schedule option

review:
i recently got contacted by lyft for assaulting a driver. i never did that, let alone argue with one. i was extremely offended and upset since i don't drive and use this service a lot. i don't even know which one of my recent rides reported me because i had no problems with anyone. 

to make things worse, i have a bad shoulder, spine injury so i wouldn't even be able to attack anyone. my sister has been having issues with drivers giving her low star ratings for no reason. i will be deleting this app and sticking to just uber.
title: Liars

review: i usually ride as one person but i inadvertently hit the wrong thing but i enjoyed my ride with the other two gentleman. the driver accommodated me off n the front seat and carried my luggage. during the daylight hours i feel comfortable doing this so the driver can transport a full car load $$$
title: Ride share

review: so the ride was good pretty convenient but the app kind of is difficult to interface with regarding changing scheduled start times or destinations,but the really challenging thing is the amount of alerts that are nonsense and don't give me a link to something more meaningful  they even asked me if i needed help like three times for some reason who knows why. what that out internally, could you.
title: So many alerts

review: i've been a customer with lyft since 2018. every time i take a lyft, the drivers are always so nice and chill. they make the ride very enjoyable and i feel very comfortable with them. honestly, my life became so much better with lyft in my life. i'm glad i chose them and this app. i can't stop raving about how much i love them.
title: My Fave Transportation

review: i've had better results with lyft than uber, but i still feel some anxiety as reliability as not been 100%. the last time i needed a ride to the airport no one showed and i was left scrambling. i wish the schedule function assigned a driver right then instead of putting you in the que of current drivers out there.
title: Good experiences overall

review: we used our lyft app for the first time this week. we used 4 different driverseach one was professional, friendly, and helpful. each car was very clean. all were safe driverssometimes in challenging traffic. very grateful and will recommend highly! thanks lyft!
title: Lift rides

review: lyft y'all need to take share rides away i like it better when in was the only person in the car. since the share rides came back i been waiting 30 minutes for a ride and take forever for me to get to where i was going. please bring back the one rider only.
title: NO MORE SHARE RIDES

review: multiple times using this app waiting for pickups have left me frustrated. real time estimates for pickups are very misleading. drivers often arrive very different times from what the app says. i understand the estimates aren't perfect but the time left til pickup never change even if waiting longer than time estimate. waited longer than 15 mins for driver that app said was 3 mins away.
title: Pick up time is misleading

review: and i get charged the horrible price when i get off at 3am . i think it's not fair i am not going to dance and drink i go to work. i've gives 2 add a month to good customers that never get affected by demand. thank you for letting me voice my concerns .
title: I take Lyft from my job for the last year., there and  back 2335'n Miami ave.

review: after two rides and one abort i can say drivers were great, friendly, helpful, decent drivers.  the lyft application is horrid to use.   if you are doing simple address to address it's probably great.   but i accidently canceled two rides because i got trapped on a page that the only exit cancelled the ride.  no explanation, no fail safe are you sure pause.   and that is the least of problems i experienced with it.
title: Lyft eval

review: my very first experience today using lyft went very well on both rides, to and from of my destination. i did not have to wait very long at all. first ride with patty  , she arrived in 8 minutes, made my appointment easily. i look forward to using lyft  a lot more in the future.
title: First experience

review: i counted on this ride home. as the days get longer there is fair daylight until relatively late but i need a lot of daylight in order to cross the street safely. as a result of the driver not showing up i had to walk home which is at the tour but crossing the last street to my house is very dangerous. it would've been appropriate for the driver to indicate that he was driving for another company at the same time and was not going to show up as pretty as promised. the end
title: Driver never appeared

review: they'll charge you a cancellation fee even when a driver doesn't show up. update: this keeps happening to me regularly. i'll get a driver confirmed, i'll wait for them only to see them on the map not moving. i wait, wait and wait. eventually i have to cancel to get another car and they charge me a cancellation fee. their support barely speak english and don't even try to understand the problem. i've paid over 16k for lyft last year but switching to uber now due to lyft being so unreliable
title: Unauthorized charges

review: i ordered an uber and they canceled me after they went to the wrong inappropriate pickup area at sfb and blamed leaving on me not being there and not having a mask on. i didn't even see the guy until he was leaving behind me. harold came to the rescue. he was very helpful and got us there safely.
title: Uber disappointed me and Harold did great

review: lyft, you have to consider the strain the changing price of gas is causing on drivers. i am hearing from passengers of a driver shortage yet instead of better incentives my bonuses are lessening and getting harder to achieve. do you not want to keep drivers on the road? i will change my rating back to 5 stars when i think this is being addressed fairly. fairs should start to be reflective of the gas prices in their respective zones
title: New rating due to lower bonuses higher gas prices

review: 1. you speak with a human. the help button on the app is never available andchatting with   these people in messenger or twitter where they ghost you. i hope uber hostility takes over lyft at least i dont get dripped off at wrong locations and i can get a human on the phone.
title: Customer service is the worst

review: i live in a relatively rule area so it makes finding rides near impossible. i've been known to wait upwards of an hour for uber but i don't have that problem with lyft maybe the first 2-4 cancel but usually i can find somebody within 20-30 minutes.
title: Better but more expensive

review:
marilyn was generous with her time tonight waiting in the storm, when it quickly overwhelmed my boyfriend while riding his bike to the north liberty pick up spot. she waited longer than the standard 3-5mins. until he could get to her, i'm greatful she didn't leave and got larry safely to me in cedar rapids! 
thank you marilyn!!!
title: A ride despite the rain

review: i love how lyft better suits different financial budgets, with wonderful new options to wait and save a few bucks! those few bucks go a long way and definitely end up promoting multiple rides in a day, since one trip isn't overpriced like most of these apps!
title: Different price ranges!

review: i've needed to use lyft a lot for personal reasons, however sometimes i have drivers who will just cancel on me within minutes of arriving, or i'll be searching for a car for 30 minutes, although this app is usually super useful and helpful it can get frustrating.
title: Helpful but frustrating

review: there's a problem with the maps so when you ask for a lyft ride and put it in the name of the establishment it shows a route to streets behind the establishment. uber app does not do the same thing. it takes you right to establishment. lyft needs to fix this. it's best just to put the address itself and not the name of the establishment. but you have to catch it before you request the lyft.
title: Circuitous route

review:
the passed 2 nights we have had such a great time driving around meeting woman who work for lyft. on both nights misty ( who picked us up at walgreens & today a great woman that i would consider family. i
love meeting wonderful people especially in this day & age. thx ladies u made our surgeries just a little more bearable.
title: Lyft

review: i took 5 rides during my trip to baltimore. all drivers were nearby with all wait times were less than 5 minutes. all vehicles were clean, smelled great with very friendly and accommodating drivers. my safety and comfort were their primary concern. thanks baltimore lyft personnel for sending me your best.
title: Baltimore's Best

review:
every time i use them they are there within a few mins so don't click unless your ready to walk out the door.  
i'll use it every time i need a lift (lyft)!
99% of the drivers have always been super nice too!
everyone please remember to tip the driver wellthey depend on it!!!!!!
title: I think the prices are a little high but I can understand with gas prices & stuff.

review: i always used the app when necessary. i've always had a great experience. the drivers are nice, courteous, compassionate and helpful. they go above and beyond to make my trip experience satisfying and enjoyable. the car too is always clean, in great condition, both inside and outside.
title: My experience

review: on wednesday 4/20, i ordered a ride to logan airport with a new driver.  he took a wrong turn and we ended up in s.boston near haul road, where he missed the turn to logan and we had to drive all the way back to the allston/brighton tolls and i was charged for the mileage.  i tipped him not knowing that i would be charged for the extra mileage.
title: Lost driver

review: im a heavy frequent user of lyft but as of recent lyft has been giving me such a hard time to plan my rides ahead of time and i don't know if it's due to these new updates they are consistently doing but it's not working. i can't schedule my rides ahead of time anymore and when i do the app does not inform me of what color car the driver is in. at one point in time i had a driver come pick me up but never showed up to location pick up but the app was showing he was there but really wasnt. so disappointing.
title: Zero stars

review:
i called myself going to uber. uber prices are very very high. as far as i'm concerned, the prices are just right, and the people are friendly and the cars are clean, also the driver are safe drivers. keep up the good work.
i'll recommend lyft to my friends and family other than uber, sorry uber!!
title: Miss You guys

review: maybe it's my device specifically, but when i try to request a ride, the prices does not show up. i'm not sure if it's a developer's issue but that has to be dealt with if you plan to have consumers to deal with you. other than that, it is very exceptional!
title: Application

review:
i only had to wait one minute for siaband, lyft driver, to pick me up. 
siaband has not resided in the usa long enough to be fluent in english, but he knows how to read a map and got me to my destination promptly and directly. his car is immaculate, and he is an excellent driver. he is courteous and sought to be helpful beyond our expectations.
title: Lyft Came Through

review:
i pre-scheduled a ride to the airport and was quoted $31. the next morning the driver was 20 min early and also the price had been raised to $45. this doesn't seem right. by the time you know about the increased price, it is too late to find alternative transportation. lyft needs to stick by it's quoted price.
the driver was friendly and polite and i have no complaints about the ride itself.
title: Price changes at last minute

review: this app is not user-friendly for the visually impaired. voice readers often cannot describe basic items on screen such as price for a ride, arrival time, etc. also, hard to navigate to screens to send a text message or call driver to alert them that you are visually impaired. texts sent or received are tiny and illegible to anyone without 2020 vision. please update the app so that magnification filters work with the tax displayed on the screen.
title: Not user-friendly

review: i typically don't leave reviews, however this is an exception! the best experience i've ever had with a lyft driver. friendly driver, great driving skills making my entire family feel safe. the added entertainment was a surprising touch that went above and beyond! i highly recommend this driver!!!
title: The best Lyft driver period!!!

review: drives aren't reliable. never exactly on time. the drivers would take the request just to cancel the ride. this has happened to me multiple times and even back to back after the 1st cancellation. 3 cars has currently switched out on me. another issue is routing. lyft gps would have the driver go in a complete circle just to get on the block/ street i'm on. i would literally see the car pass my location go around other blocks then make it to my location.  get ittogether  lyft!!!
title: Unreliable source of transportation (NO STARS)

review:
my driver was so pleasant and helpful. locked my keys in my car at the store. i asked for a round trip(store-home-store) and he did as i requested. helped me with the lyft app- was having trouble because it posted the wrong address.
was pleasant and kind, and customer service oriented ( i'm a former taxi driver) which is important!
title: Mohammad

review: they charged me a $10 cancel fee after it said they charge if you cancel with in 30 seconds the driver excepts the ride and i canceled as soon as it came in. they also make it very hard to contact and type of customer service person so i can talk about how i was wrongly charged. now i will have to go through my bank and dispute the charge because the offer no help on app fir riders what so ever. i would highly recommend uber it's cheaper and way easier to contact someone if you have an issue.
title: Do NOT use

review: after probably several thousand dollars in rides i am uninstalling lyft. why? because it sent me a notification in order to offer me a promotion poorly-disguised as a free gift (you get a free ebike usage!), despite specifically noting in privacy that i didn't want to be spammed with promotions, presumably because there had been a brief lull in my own use of their app. if lyft chooses not to respect their customers requests not to be bombarded with spam then i choose not to do business with them.
title: Lyft does not honor its I don't want to be spammed with Promotions settings.

review: this was my first time using lyft for a ride the gentleman that pick me up was very friendly and pleasant to talk to him his car was very clean and he was a very nice ride fromfairfield to vacaville i will definitely refer lift service to a friend or whoever needs it and i will definitely will use lift again if i need to again.. thank you
title: Nice

review:
when i booked my lift today the charge was for $26.i see i have been charged $81!! 
they told me a price and charged me like triple the amount! 

there is absolutely no way to reach anyone for help! theres a customer service number i found and it just hangs up on you! theres an email i found that just sends you an automated email letting  you know that the email isn't monitored! they can do anything and get away with it! never using them again
