title: They rob you and there is no way to get a hold of anyone

review: the driver was amazing he went above and beyond he went even back to my house when i forgot something it wasn't that long like he didn't leave the block but i truly appreciate him he was nice cause i left my keys at home so great recommendation i definitely recommend him he is the best
title: Driver

review: works all the time. never had a glitch in the 3+ yrs ive been using them. the drivers are always friendly. i like the tip feature and being able to get a little bit of background on who i'm riding with.  it's an easy rating system. 5 stars!
title: Reliable app!

review: i normally don't ever have a problem with lyft however, now it has been changing my pick up location when someone picks up my ride. i hope it's not effecting the rate i pay! just hope the problem gets resolved soon!
title: Wrong Pick Up Locations

review: i've been using lyft for a while but now it's saying my card is expired but my card is working fine. i've reached out to the customer service but they're not helping and multiple people said their having the same issue with lyft saying they're payment method is expired. you guys need to check the app and see if it's any bugs or issues and update it please. and charging for rides i did not take. a driver literally went out glen burnie and did not picked me up and they charged me for it
title: Always a problem

review: lyft gives the drivers horrible directions the longer route  always making me late  and it's kind of annoying. drivers have a hard time listening to our directions to make the ride quicker and safe at the same time .  i really can't wait to get my car so i can stop riding. (it's really annoying being a pregnant mom with nausea always feeling like i have to hold my vomite and having to ride a longer distance  than intended due to the apps poor set of directions. ) do better lyft!
title: Directions

review:
i ordered a lyft to be picked up 29 minutes later and was promptly & automatically switched to driver just 10 minutes away, before i was ready.

it was extremely uncomfortable, explaining myself & asking the driver to wait.

please provide the option to accept that change, rather than forcing it on someone whom is unprepared.
title: Changing drivers when not ready

review: jassia was an awesome driver.  we had a hard time finding a ride to the airport for our trip back but once i was able to schedule our ride through lyft we could not have asked for a better driver. i will definitely remember lyft service the next time we visit this area.
title: Trish

review: in my pending charges it has charged me twice and took double the money still in pending charges, don't know if i'll get my $ back but the 35$ ride became 70 out of my account never done this before never had problems with my ride always finds a driver fast and drivers are professional
title: Charged twice

review: i selected the 2-3 pickup option for more only for the the closest driver to arrive 7-8 minutes per the algorithm pick up time. in which case, i could have just selected the standard pickup option that was about 9 minutes and save several dollars. i don't think we should be charged express rates  if the drivers aren't available to actually arrive on express times. that's misleading on the algorithm's part.
title: Misleading express option

review: my driver was jamall and he was driving a late model malibu hybrid vehicle in very good shape. the first driver that ever talk to me about anything serious and things that are just happening in today's world. he is a very good listener and a gentleman, scholar and overall good people. please make sure that he gets this information from me.
title: My trip July 3

review: the estimated pick up times tend to be a little off which is confusing and a bit inconvenient when trying to get to places on time without planning on getting there too early. i usually have to wait 10 minutes more than when the app says the driver will arrive.
title: Good but

review: i never really used lyft before. i usually use uber but people always say lyft is better so i tried it. scheduled a ride to the afternoon airport a week in advance. when the day came it gave me my 1 hour reminder about my ride and about forty minutes later it sent me a notification about an error and i'll be refunded for my ride. i was thinking like what the heck are you serious so i had to get an uber ride to get me and my parents to the airport in time. i'll just stay with uber i don't care if lyft is cheaper or better.
title: Sad

review: today was my first time experiencing lyft and it was pleasant coming and going ... much quicker and safer then dart and my drivers were excellent john picked me up early this morning unfortunately i didn't have the time to review him but he was awesome ! thanks lyft !!! jonathan was so awesome and the conversation and music was excellent  yay !!! thank you !!!
title: First time Lyft user

review: i've had multiple problems getting this app to load anything off of wifi, which is obviously problematic for a ride sharing app. every screen either freezes or just never loads any car near me, etc. getting support is nearly impossible which makes matters even more frustrating. i want to love this app, but i'm ready to give all my business to uber if this isn't resolved.
title: App doesn't work off WiFi

review: this is only the third time i have used lyft always to/from airport. drivers are consistently prompt, friendly, and helpful. the app is very convenient to use. i appreciate the opportunity to be able to schedule my ride ahead a time. gratitude for your services. thank you.
title: Gratitude for Lyft

review: anybody that don't have time to waste do not use lyft. lyft charges you for canceled rides even if the driver is not in route to you. the drivers cancel on you when they want with no reason and no fault. i am otw to work late as i type this because a driver was 3 minutes away from me and decide to cancel and i had to wait 10 more minutes for the next driver and the time it took to get there but i don't get no money back or promotion or anything. lyft is just like public transportation unreliable
title: Awful policies

review:
i haven't used lyft much since i usually use my own car. the lyft service was convenient & predictable. i'll use lyft more. quick response to request. great driving. easy to use lyft.

a driver always seems to be available quickly when i need one.
title: Pickup was on time. Friendly Driver

review: and just like that you are about to lose a loyal costumer. i use lyft all the time. i used it multiple times yesterday with no issues. i used it this morning to get to work. i go to use it tonight and am told i have a big balance on my account that i have to pay before i can get another ride. there was no reason for a balance since all my payments are right there on my bank statement. so why i am being forced to pay the same payments again. lyft pink passcanceled!
title: Fix your card problems

review: yesterday 4/13 my lyft ride was cancelled 3 times. i set up an hour before i was supposed to be at my doctors that is only 4 miles from my home for a surgery procedure and i was an hour late due to the crappy service of your drivers canceling. i don't take lyft much but after yesterday i don't plan on using your company. totally unreliable. i felt lyft should have paid for my ride. i even tried contacting customer service and of course they were busy and the one of numbers wasn't working. i'm hugely disappointed with lyft!!!!
title: Drivers canceling was late to my surgery

review:
i was pleased to see the driver arriving on time.  he was very pleasant and professional. i will be more than happy to make recommendations to my friends to contact lyft for services.

thank you for your excellent customer service and following the cdc guidelines to keep everyone safe.
title: Professional Customer Service

review: i preordered a car 5 days in advance and it never showed. fortunately we were able to secure a ride quickly. the app doesn't show the ride ordered and i wish it was easier to find the ordered ride, or receive an email that it is scheduled otherwise i would have given a five star as we always use lyft.
title: Pre ordered

review:
unreliable drivers, constant canceling of rides when there are multiple of them in the area.  the apps gps mapping pins your location sometimes farther than where you actually are.
wouldn't recommend if you are in a hurry to get somewhere. uber is more expensive but i will pay more for the reliability rather than hoping the driver on lyft doesn't cancel my ride or i get pinned farther on a map than the location.
title: Unreliable drivers

review: i have been using lyft for a few weeks due to a car issue and i scheduled my ride got two stops my driver left me after my first stop and it has been hard and very complicated to get in touch and dispute the charge this was very inconvenient i had to download uber and pay for a another ride again i still have not received my refund for the time being i will be using uber until lyft refunds money. not only that the driver continues the full ride without me smh
title: Left stranded and hard to get refund

review: when i confirmed the ride that arrive in 6 min, the app kept telling me looking for nearby drivers forever .  without other update like a car is coming , got a message saying car arrived . it might be about 6 min , to 10, it is just confusing if there is a car identified and coming and eta, and showed up with the message at the same time
title: Confusing message

review: i really wouldn't recommend lyft at all, today after i was getting off work the driver arrived and then his phone stopped working and refused to take me to my location, and then on top of that lyft still charged me for the ride, the driver refused me any services he didn't even provide me the costumer service number, then we his phone started to work my ride was gone so i had to catch a different lyft. i was charged for two rides and one was for one i didn't even use. i am definitely not using lyft anymore!
title: Lyft

review: the drivers are always extremely kind. there vehicle's smell fresh as well as clean at least 99.9% of the time.  the lyft drivers always try there best to make you feel comfortable and make sure you make it to your set destination safe
title: I recommend this app to everyone!

review: i added a large tip  for my driver in the app kept asking me for hours after i was dropped off if i wanted to add a tip,,  this is very annoying because i wanted to get out of the app. it took a long time for me to verify what my actual billing was and if the actual chip was applied.
title: App Keeps asking me to add a tip

review: not sure what's up today, but lyft has reassigned our driver four times in two minutes. was a 2 min eta. now 10. standing here with two older folks who are confused as all get out. also, there is no support of any kind offered by the company. if you go to the help page, it is all faqs. nowhere to actually get help unless you want to report a driver. the issue is not the driver. the issue is a corrupt greedy company that does not provide support, abuses its drivers, and mislead customers. what happened to lyft?!
title: What happened?!

review: with lyft the price you are quoted when you request your ride is the price you pay. no surprises. lyft's major competitor will quote you a competitive price, but then add a large surcharge at the end of your ride that can double the cost. not cool! with lyft's app you know you'll get to your destination with no ugly surprises.
title: Honest Pricing

review:
i had never ridden with lyft before. my car is in the shop and  i have to get to work! 
so far  my experience has been great and i will certainly recommend to everyone i know in need of a dependable safe way of transportation. thank you lyft for being there for all of us in need.
title: My Rides

review: the way they charge your card after a ride drives me crazy. they charge you for your ride once, then again for the same ride later on to make sure your payment method still works i guess, but i can never tell if my money is refunded back. it doesn't matter how much you have in your account, they'll overdraw it just to do this which is ridiculous to me  just keeps reminding me why i try my best to refrain from using lyft and why i need to hurry and get my own car
title: Payment Frequency

review: a lot of things wrong with this app. 1. you get different pricing based on pick-up times. for example you can be picked up in ten minutes for $8 or five minutes for $10. but if you choose the $10 option and the driver ends up taking longer, you still pay the $10. 2. you should be able to rate a driver that makes you wait and then aborts the pick up. 3.  when scheduling a driver, they shouldn't be allowed to show up ahead 10 minutes early.
title: App blows

review: our home has two entrances, one is facing the street which is the official address, but difficult to stop, and another one is at back where is safe to pick up and drop off. now i enter my home address, it is guided the driver to our back entrance. very good!
title: The map is good

review: don't use it. their drivers are rude, and they can't think use google maps so they won't find your address. you will be late wherever you need to go.  don't use this application.    don't use this application.  don't use this application.  don't use this application.  don't use this application.  don't use this application.
title: Worst application ever

review:
for as big as lyft is, they need some redesigning of the app-  especially for example if you have more people, or need room for extra luggage. you can click lyft xl, which specifies #of people, but you can't request lots of luggage room. 

i found it difficult to just get an estimate from the app. and found the user interface just generally frustrating from the booking end.
title: Clunky app

review: lyft has been a very dependable service. i prefer using it to driving myself. i would encourage the company to consider providing drivers with an additional benefit: a gas/car maintenance allowance to compensate somewhat for the high gas cost and for routine car care.
title: These difficult times

review: a five star rating is high as you go, but my driver deserves a six star. she was quickly there to pick me up, she opened the door for me getting in and out of the car. asked me about the music and temperature of the car. she offered me water and all that wearing her mask! she is awesome! thank you!
title: A 6 Star  ride!

review: started using the family function. it's a great idea but i'm supposed to get notifications when members of my lyft family request and use my account for their lyft rides and that doesn't happen. nor do the rides taken by my lyft family members show up in my ride history. not to mention the long history of crappy customer service by lyft. this topic of lyft  family isn't in the abysmal lyft help q&a either.
title: Family Function not working correctly

review: lyfts algorithm does a great job of dropping my ride requests and shifting drivers just as they approach. too many stories to tell, but tonight specifically they switched my driver on me as i was walking up to their car, causing me to lose my table i was waiting at and leading me to my 6th driver switch. will never use this service again after this, their customer service specifically restricts your ability to complain about these issues within the app to seek assistance.
title: Never get picked up, 5 star rating

review:
uber has been trying so hard to please everyone that they have the worst drivers and they don't get penalized for their actions.

lyft is cheaper, more options, more drivers.

the only con: they don't have my address registered so i need to walk a bit so people can see me.
title: Lyft All The Way NO UBER

review:
i enjoy lyft, almost always great cars, people, and don't have many complaints about it. it's been invaluable on nights i have had too much to drink, and even just some days when i am too stressed out to be driving, or too tired. grateful for the service. 

-travis
title: I appreciate Lyft

review:
my granddaughter and i flew from orange county to oakland on thanksgiving morning. i had not arranged a ride but took my chance on getting a lyft.  it worked!  i uploaded lyft and the driver picked us up in three minutes. he was polite, helpful and appropriately social.  he shared that he loves driving for lyft. 
the entire experience was effortless for us.
title: Comfort and Convenience

review:
recently i could not be more disappointed in this service! i'm not really sure why but they are horrible the times go up they charge you for no service and there's absolutely no way to reach people here's some more information

so here is the deal  lyft use to be reliable and a good price. recently the time they say does not corallate with the price the quote. there is no customer service option. no one to fix the issue or discount the ride because of wait times huge fail!
title: They use to be good

review:
not only being courteus and friendly, when he found out that this is our first time at providence he gave us many recomendations about where to go and specially what to eat (we are still salivating) after his suggestions.
way to go, michael
you are the best providence ambassador.
thanks
title: The best Providence ambassador

review: lyft has a terrible customer support i got charged on a ride that was cancelled and have not received my money back from the cancellation that was all the money i had for a way home now i'm stuck having to wait on a bus for an hour drivers should get charged for accepting a ride and then when they arrive they're not willing to take you to your destination because it is too far waited like 30 minutes for a ride and when he drives to my pick up spot he cancels .
title: Lyft is Awful

review: problem with the interface. can't move the drivers info down to see the map when i booked a ride ahead of time . it's very inconvenient because i can't see where the driver is before they arrive nor can i easily keep tab on where we are going. this is not on the driver but lyft interface problem.
title: I can't move the drivers info to see the map

review:
we booked a lyft on an out of town trip. not knowing the town or surrounding areas we felt this would be a good way to get aroundbad idea!!! we were told three different pickup times covering more than an hour. no one ever showed up, no updates were sent and no communication given as to our status. we missed a scheduled appointment and subsequently were canceled from our appointment which we still had to pay for. do not use lyft..its not worth the headaches!!!!

as an aside..uber showed up with 15 minutes notice!! wake up lyft.
title: Don't use!!!!

review: they keep booking me a driver and then cancel that driver say there is another driver in the area but it will be more $ and then give me a new wait time! i just want a ride i don't want to play games  it hasn't been a every now and then problem. they do it every time.
title: I quit using Uber

review: sometimes three drivers will cancel in a row. sometimes the wait will say 4-25 mins wait. that's hard to plan to squeeze in anything. but it's super helpful and some of the drivers are very kind and friendly. every ride is different.
title: Great when the drivers don't drop you cause you're too far from stuff.

review: my friend and i booked a ride and the app made us wait 20 minutes just to get a nearby driver. then when we finally get a driver, it took a while and then the driver cancelled. then we waited more than 20 minutes for the app to find another driver.. in total we waited over an hour just to get a ride. and price isn't cheap either and no refund or compensation at all. uber is better and should've just used that instead for a few dollars more.
title: Waited for a MORE than an hour just to get a ride

review:
their time estimations are not realistic, you wait 20 mins more than they quote. 

drivers also keep cancel once they're meant to arrive. i waited an additional 30 minutes while i was given three different drivers for one ride until i just gave up. this happened just about every time i use lyft in san francisco. 

completely unreliable. lyft, i want you to beat uber but i just can't anymore. this is such a bad experience over and over again.
title: Cancels on you over and over

review: people should be ashamed of yourselves i can see why you're profitable because you keep wiping your customers with these ridiculous fees surcharges for fuel give me a break !! i talk to a lyftdriver and he told me he hasn't seen that one penny in fuel surcharge is it sounds like it's going into corporate pocket as usual you wanna charge me $14 to go 2 miles away and there's 15 cars in the area does that make any sense i in mind you it's only 2:42 pm keep raping your customers cause uber looks better and better every day !!!!
title: Corporate Greed

review: i tried to find the answer in the help section, but it was not one of the options and there was no way to submit my question. here it is: is there a way to force the app to use the pick-up location i enter and not make me walk? twice i used my actual location, which was listed when i requested the ride. the app made me walk two blocks to another pick-up location, but sent the driver to the pick-up location i entered when i requested the ride.
title: No help in help options

review: having a hard time right now. going through serious medical issue. don't have time for bothersome drivers. but, he was so pleasant & relaxing to ride with. he has a very peaceful spirit, & a joy to ride with. god bless & keep him covered as he is out proving service for so many people. thank's
title: Satisfied Patron

review: came to quiet community and screamed my name with open windows like a crazy. after annoyed my cat. i asked him to check my stops. this driver has a broken car. in the end he left me at the 1 stop. i need to call uber. i lost money and my mood because of stupid lyft driver.
title: Absolutely horrible driver!

review: lyft is great been using it for some years now , however i dont like the face people can constantly pick up and cancel the lyft not even 30 seconds from the location of picking up the rider, very last second warning/update . that shouldnt be allowed especially with things being on a timely manner . and already being paid for. or dont take the money til the rider is picked up! come on now. wasting time and money .
title: Whew

review: i usually prefer to use lyft. the other car service actually rates you as a customer and that's not fair. most drivers are good. usually no issues and they stay focused on the road, don't play music loud or talk to their friends. prefer to use them. prices are usually fair.
title: Majority of rides good with lyft

review: my dislike is when you quote a price and say pick up in 6 minutes. when you select it your actual pick up time is 16 minutes. i select lyft over uber because of the pick up time. that's false advertising. you should not state pick up within xx minutes if you can't guarantee it
title: Pick up time

review:
brian, the driver was a perfect gentleman. he was on time, even though the roads were a little icy. he took his time driving to the destination so that we would be safe. he wore his mask and made sure that i wore mine again so that both of us would be safe.
pleasant conversation
good job!
title: Safe and sound

review:
lyft was hacked last week, now i have charges on my lift account but not on my card.  they will not refunded it because the hack was made via on apple pay!!!!! i was asleep during this time and on flights!!!!!! they won't ask the drivers who was in the car.  do not trust them!!!! 

do not let them have your apple wallet!!!!!
title: LYFT WAS HACKED LAST WEEK

review: thank you! such a great ride! great conversation and he went the extra mile! i typed in the wrong address and went to the wrong address. then he went out of his way to make sure i got to the place i need, which was great since i am from out of town! he is very generous!
title: Thank you

review: happy with all except for the no-show rulethe no-show rule says that i have to find the driver within 5 minutes of him arriving! doesn't he have to find me? i go to the exact place that i'm instructed to go to and the driver is never there. so that no-show rule makes me very nervous as to whether or not i'm going to continue using lyft
title: 5 minute no show rule

review: my car was stolen and had no choice but to use ride services. uber was great and i even scheduled a designated pick up time. however there were no drivers available when needed but lyft was there with available drivers. and now i will be using lyft exclusively
title: Dependable

review: app tries to make drivers take the longest route possible it can make you late to things usually by 5 to 10 minutes even if you pay for things like priority pick up to save time. and   drivers should have the common sense to take quicker routes especially if the truly know the area they drive in. drivers would 100% receive better tips if the customer could not see the app making small changes to the route and the ride time increasing.
title: Bad routes

review: i had some not great experiences in the past. so had been using uber but purely for principle and how bad there app is and how high the prices are i decided to try lyft again and it was awesome and not stressful and my driver was wonderful!
title: From past customer who left and gave Lyft another try today

review: this was my very first time using a ride app, and it was a wonderful experience. my driver harry was extremely polite. he was on time. his car was clean and comfortable. lyft prices where very fair and affordable. i had great experience for it being my first trip using a ride share app. thank you
title: First Timer

review: i use lyft often and it would be my go to app but lately the prices have been absurd. a ride that is usually $15 is now $50 for a 10 minute car rideabsolutely ridiculous. even with the wait option it feels like no money is being saved and there is no reason as to why the price of a single ride should ever be that high especially with how short the car ride is.
title: Getting expensive

review:
i'm done with lyft. been using it for 5 years and since a month ago i have not been able to request any lyfts because of driver shortage ive spent at least 30 minutes each time i try to request to get the notification that theres no drivers.

how come uber has drivers and lyft doesn't? maybe it shows you how they're paying / treating their employees. 

will delete the app and not download it again.
title: For a full month have not been able to request a ride

review: do not use lyft even if it's cheaper than uber i was charged 80$ for damage i did not do and customer service is no help at all. there's absolutely no way the car was damaged during my ride but i'm still forced to pay it because they said so. pictures of the smudge aren't even possible to be done by a person unless someone kicked the car or rubber dirt with their hand in that area( we were no where near dirt in the city). drivers can just falsely accuse riders and nothing happens to them
title: Damage

review:
i have had 2 lyft drivers cancel my ride after i waited over 10 minutes. drivers  were in front of my business while i walked down and left/canceled. the fact that lyft has no response to their drivers lack of reliability is astonishing. lyft pays the drivers and can at least enforce no cancel policy for drivers once they've reached their destination. 
lyft has bo idea how long a person has waited to get picked up just to have a driver cancel once they've reached you. that's what bothers me the most.
title: Don't use LYFT

review: lyft i waste to much money to pay 28$ for a 5 min for two stops under 3 mins away from one another it's 44$ ? i waste to much and have been a lyft user for over a year and probably wasted half of what anyone spends you guys are over doing it with the tax now
title: It was good while it lasted

review:
great app, enjoyable service. life is expensive these days. many people are still trying to recover from the pandemic. i'm one of them. i lost my car during that horrific time in forida. so please be mindful of your prices. not everyone can afford them to & from work. thank you.

tracy sims-eley
title: Prices.

review: i have been a long time loyal customer and even a driver for a short time. last night i ordered a ride home from dinner. the quoted price was about $12 for the 2 mile ride. however when i got home the app told me the cost was $45. $45 for a two mile ride is ridiculous especially when the app quoted me $12. non existent customer support. finally someone responded to my emails and said too bad. other drivers said this happens so it's not just me. so i deleted the app and will never use lyft again.
title: Overcharged!

review: i arranged a ride at 4:30 to get to work by 5 the driver cancelled my ride less than 5 minutes away. i had to pay $21 to get an xl for myself just to make it to work on time. there's no option to complain on your app since i did not ride with them but this is ridiculous. your selfish driver probably cancelled my pre arranged ride to grab a further more expensive ride. and i can't do anything about it but pay more. now the new driver coming now will not get a tip. thank you.
title: Arranged ride cancelled

review: my driver was perfect and i would take her any day that i need a lift. unfortunately, the app did not work well for either of us. she picked me up when the app showed that she was actually a few miles away. this is ultimately a good thing because i was ready. however, we made a stop and it said that i had exceeded five minutes which is completely not true. i'm glad she didn't leave and brought me on the final stretch home.
title: Recent ride

review: left my phone in the car reached out to customer support lost and found and they were extremely quick with replying and getting my phone back to me at 3 am. even more thanks to my driver that dropped it off to me
title: Left phone

review: my app had the wrong address cents north instead of south and unfortunately the price did go up to $30 but he didn't trip he showed me how to do it and i appreciate that because i made it to my job interview and i got my job i made it early to my job too so thanks
title: Thanks Jimmie

review: i enjoyed the application it is convenient i just think there should be some type of reward program were frequent riders get two or three dollars off a ride or a certain percentage depending on usage of the service
title: Improvement

review:
i cannot verify my payment method.
i tried with my 3 master cards and i correctly typed the information, but it doesn't work at all. 
(i can use these cards well in other applications including uber, or at offline stores.)

i asked lyft about this issue, and lyft answered as follows.
"the app may reject your payment for one of the following reasons:
- the payment method details are entered incorrectly
- the payment method is declined by your bank
- the payment method is not supported by lyft"

however, i checked with the bank, but they said there is no problem with my card.
also, i entered every information correctly, and tried it more than 10 times.
not only one card, but every mastercard that i have, including paypal, are not verified with lyft app.
there is nothing i can do!!
title: payment verification issue!!!!!!!!

review: ashley was right on time and the ride went smoothly. i really like how lyft keeps good communication. i wish that there was some way to notify how much luggage we were taking since it would make a difference in what kind of car should be sent.
title: Our ride

review: dante was lovely, and a wealth of information. he picked us up within 2 minutes of my submitting a request, and we were on our way , luggage loaded, in moments. we enjoyed his pleasant conversation while benefiting from his conscientious driving skills, negotiating traffic hazards with ease.
title: Newark Airport

review: the price that i was quoted is not the price that i was charged. i was advised that the route that the driver was given by lyft, provided the scenic route and avoided the highway, which is the faster option. lyft and i left my home at 6:50am est and didn't arrive at the tampa airport until 9:15 am est! i have no idea if i'll make my flight due to the fact that it leaves in less than 45 minutes. i will absolutely be contacting your customer service department for a resolution as soon as i have the liberty.
title: Late + Overcharged = Lost Customer Forever

review: i chose the save and wait option for a ride that was about 15 minutes. i'm over an hour they never connected me with a driver so i cancelled and chose the more expensive option. i still didn't get a driver for another 30 minutes. at that point i checked uber and it was cheaper than the save and wait option and connected me with a driver that was 3 minutes away.  it was only 6pm. i was two hours late to my mothers wake. would not recommend.
title: Just download uber

review: living in a busy city with minimum parking in certain areas lyft gets you there and back with no issues or worries. definitely been my go to app for all the times i needed to travel and move around even on date nights as well.
title: Chauffeur me please

review: i always used the other ride-share app. but to pre-schedule a ride they charge about $23 extra, whereas lyft had no charge to pre-schedule. the notifications from lyft that the driver is on his way and the 3 minute warning before his arrival was very reassuring. from now on, it's lyft.
title: First time on Lyft

review: lyft is awesome and very confident they really work with you and they do strive for good service and the drivers are all sooo friendly and nice i really enjoy using this company for rides i truest do trust and believe this company does care about its clients and drives for the he best with going above and beyond with screening their drivers!!!
title: Great service!!!

review: got a message that my driver was at the designated location to pick me up. i spot him and i notice he's picking up other people. i asked the man who he was there to pick up and quickly responds with these people. he drives off and i wait thinking i'm just waiting my turn? but he never comes back in my direction. i waited a good 30 mins. so i had to cancel the driver. on top of that.. i was charged. will be placing a call first thing in the morning for a refund on someone never coming to get me.
title: First time user

review: lyft glitches a lot and when it come to the. drivers being responsible for mistakes or really getting over because they kno they can better on this app like not coming at all they take forever for refund plus they are not reliable with returning items you may have left it's just all over the place and not reliable i'd prefer uber uber is more stern and reliable i've have one too many bad experiences wit lyft may not be your situation but use it at your own risk !!!
title: Lyft cool if your Uber not working

review: while i'm in a ride i want to see where the driver is on the route but all i can see is the driver info. i can't lower it and there is only 1/8 to try to see either how far the driver is or where we are on the map. super annoying & it seems like it would be easy to fix. i wish there was somewhere other than here to give feedback.
title: I wish I could see the route, but the app isn't designed for that

review: i feel that all riders should be able to choose between male or female drivers along with age group a lot of my recent drivers have been older cranky males or rude females and i believe there should definitely be an option even if the option can't always be met there should be the option just in case to keep riders comfortable.
title: More options for riders

review: switching drivers from my app was very confusing and could disappoint by customer who was going to be up . but i was very satisfied by our 3rd try in driver
title: Switching drivers on app it was a little confusing but I really like our driver by the 3rd try

review: it is always convenient to have a ride at your fingertips when your car is in the shop! i always have a ride fairly quickly and the drivers are reliable and safe. did i mention convenience?! love it! thanks lyft!
title: Convenient!!!

review:
i like this service better for sure
pre scheduling a ride the day before is tricky. you have to get deep into the reservoir before the pre schedule option comes up

also at the airport they won't let you pick your pickup point.  you have to wait till the plane is closer to the terminal or they book you at the remote freight location or something.  would be nice if i could pick the pickup point
title: Prefer to Uber but pre-scheduling is tricky

review:
wow for a first time non-tech guy this experience went so smoothly and worked out so well i am totally impressed. i am no longer worried about stopping driving next year because i know i can call these people and still get out and live a life.
thanks
title: First time

review: advising a driver will be arriving at my location. in 16 minutes. followed by we found new a new driver when they are 2 minutes away from arriving. adding an additional 8 minute wait on. not good enough.  have some respect for your customers.
title: Lyft needs to do better

review: john went above and beyond to pick me and my fianc up after a long drive from miami. he was patient and he got me to my kids safe and sound. he was attentive and very welcoming i love him. he played the best music in his car and if i wasn't tired i would have loved to stay and enjoy another ride with him!
title: JOHN WAS AWESOME

review: lyft changed me 80 dollers for a spilt drink that was not me it looked to be water and couldn't cost anything more the 20 dollers maybe they refused to give me the money back and i will never use lyft ever again and i hope you guys dont too because they didnt even contacted me about it i found out after my accident says that it was negative 108 dollers the car ride cost 25 dollers plus the 80 doller damage fee i want my money back and i cant even get it back
title: I got charged 80 dollers for a spilt drink that was not even me

review: i canceled a ride so my lyft driver wouldn't get caught in an altercation i was in. i was charged $15 even though my lyft driver was only 2 minutes away, my account was flagged so i couldn't use the $28 lyft card i bought prior to even buying a lyft. don't use this app, just get a car.
title: This app steals from you.

review: driver started ride 10 minutes before picking me up. i asked the driver why it said he was at my location when he wasn't. he told me the app was having a problem. then, after he did finally pick me up and drop me off, i was grossly overcharged (i'm assuming because the ride was much longer then it was really was). there was no way to dispute the charge because it didn't fit into one of lyft's basic dispute options. would give 0 stars if i could.
title: No way to dispute ride fare

review:
my wife and i were stranded after returning our rental car at sea-tac because the lyft drivers wouldn't leave the airport cue for a shorter trip. we were stuck outside for 40min in january. we called the drivers and they would just hang up on us until we cancelled. 
the hotel shuttle said they would make an exception and we were saved.
we both were using the lyft app trying to get the first to actually move only blocks from where the airport que is.
lyft is trash
title: Drivers refuse to move out of airport que

review: lyft owns and distributed divy bikes all over my city of chicago and people have been leaving them in front of my house for the last 3 days. i called today to see if someone could help take care of them and put them back where they charge. nothing has changed since i called a few hours ago and just recently a third bike has been dumped into the alley next to them. customer support hasn't helped and i don't want more piled up in front of or next to my house.
title: Bad Customer Service

review:
why do you offer while in mid ride to tip . if you're going to ask me again ? 

also , this whole time i thought i was tipping riders because you guys ask mid ride  tip while you ride  yet that tip doesn't go thru , not even after the ride is done . it'll ask again , if i want ti tip .  in my mind im thinking i already tipped so why would i tip again ?!?! please fix this because this is misleading. you fabsay i saved money by not actually giving those drivers tips but they are human beings like i am .
title: Why ?!

review: they have all of these wait tiers pickup within 5 minutes vs pickup within 15 minutes and make you pay different amounts for each. they're not even trustworthy. they'll have you choose the quickest one and still give you a life 15 minutes away. then for some reason they always switch the lyft while you're waiting so you get even more late. it's ridiculous and i won't be using this app anymore because of this.
title: Always inconsistent and lie to steal your money

review: what a nice young man this driver was. helped put my luggage in his car. a little conversational but not too chatty or inquisitive about my personal life. i appreciate this as i've had drivers ask very personal questions, such as do i live alive?, causing discomfort. he was pleasant and welcoming. would definitely ride with him again. and he arrived quickly!
title: Nice driver

review: the service has been getting worse and worse. crazy drivers - even worse than pre-pandemic. and now their matching algorithm has become just unworkable. i just cancelled a ride after waiting for 40 min, then selecting the option to pay $60 for a pickup in 3 min, then seeing it would take 15 more minutes, then my wife found a ride on uber with a 7 min wait. so after waiting 45 min, i had to pay money to still not get a ride from this fleet of weirdos.
title: Terrible

review: this is shere-ling. not sure why this happens but since it's super hot, so changing arrival time multiple times has been very bad to me as a customer. please make your system true to the fact is the best !!! thanks.
title: Changing the wait time many times for my last ride

review:
my husband and i flew into seatac airport at midnight. while on the plane still i booked a delayed pickup for ~20 mins later for $40 to take us home.
upon arriving to the pickup spot (which looked like a third world country, in other words; chaos) lyft would not assign us a driver for more than 15 minutes past the pickup time. i canceled that and requested a new ride/driver at which point prices soared to over $100.
deleted the app and took a taxi home for $60 with no wait.
lyft is horrendous
title: Lyft left us stranded, had to take a taxi

review:
my driver was great. before she arrived two cars canceled on me. in each case i was notified they were 5 minutes away but both of the first two canceled prior to arrival. had they let me know that they were only arriving if  they didn't get a better offer i would have made other arrangements. i will think twice before i try lyft again.
selecting an acceptable nick name is as another frustration with my experience!!!
title: Two cancellations

review:
this is the second time in 24hrs that i've had a driver with a third party in the car without my knowledge. agents have been unhelpful and didn't want to own up to hiring drivers who aren't transparent about the state of their vehicles or if they have personal guests in their car. the short history of calling out lyft in my city of overcharging riders is a new one,i had to go into the app and despite the charge and lo and behold,i was right. i was overcharged. and of course no follow up nor ownership.
unacceptable
title: Lack of integral follow up is a whole NO

review: i had 4 lyft drivers and u had a couple that drove fast! i had one that was switching lanes and looking at his phone while driving fast had me scared! i will never get that lyft driver again! i've given i think 3 of the drivers a tip except the one that drove me from the galleria mall in houston!
title: Hi

review: this was my first time using lyft and i'm absolutely never using uber again! lyft was cheaper and quicker! i was picked up within like 6 mins after scheduling my ride to go pick up my car from the dealership. my driver was kind and had good conversation. thank you again lyft
title: Lyft vs. Uber

review: i've been on lyft for a year now and thankfully no bad experiences by far although, now more than ever i see many unsafe reviews on drivers mainly men and as a female on this app i believe we need an option to chose our driver preference such as a female and male driver and add safer features on this app as well. please take it into consideration and i will continue to use lyft if so.
title: WHAT WE NEED ON LYFT

review: they let their drivers take twice the distance and time and charge you the cost. i won't use them anymore since they don't care about overcharging. also they have no customer support to speak to so you will just get to see an automated series of premade messages telling you to go away and it isn't their problem. also they let the drivers drive aggressive we almost got into three accidents on our last trip because of how he drove.
title: I switched to Uber

review: sent for lyft and asked for the one that is delayed. driver showed up early. i let him know the luggage was taking a few but waved at him. he called me and asked what was happening. i told him i needed a few more minutes for my luggage. he hung up on my and drove away. this was after midnight and there were no other drivers. finally got another one after sitting outside about to walk home. them got charged a $5 no show fee.
title: Left at the airport

review: both my drivers today were great. friendly and fun. i am lucky to have such wonderful strangers take such good care of me. my first driver went so far as to fix my phone for me. grate person and i hope i get her again. a big thanks to both.
title: Today's Drivers

review:
booked 7:45 -8:00 am ride to newark airport, $93. crazy departure, did not hear the text. 8:03 on street, car gone and i'm charged $5 for driver. ok so far. ask for car again now price is $153. i have to get to airport so i agree. not ok. 

interesting, 7 pm return from airport $67. i agree this is a different time pricing, but really feel ripped off by that $60. 

both drivers and cars excellent (and well tipped)
title: Good service, but ?? Pricing

review: each time i have road in a lyft each person know where they're going i like the conversation each time i'm in a lift well as each time all cars are clean smell good and the drivers are very friendly and professional thank you
title: My ride

review: you should upgrade your app because when the driver arrives the app has him located at the corner at another address i usually try to text but if the driver isn't understanding an english message then it's a bit troubling thank you and have a safe day
title: Your Location App

review: to date i had a doctor's appointment my drive concealed 4 times i kept getting tex messages rescheduling my ride finally somehow the destination address changed and i was dropped off 10 miles north of my destination i missed a very important doctor's visit  how do i get relief?
title: Concealed Ride

review: never trust the estimated times. the app intentionally lies. example: will say there are cars within 3 minutes but finds a car that is 12 minutes away then after 20 minutes the car is still 7 minutes away. no reduction in price when the car is absurdly late. this happens constantly. also overpriced. no way to request refunds when ride is absurdly late. i can't wait for there to be more competitors
title: Straight up lies about estimates times and overpriced

review: scheduled lyft pickup from surgery center at hospital.  sent text to driver multiple times to inform him exact location of surgery center pickup. same place as drop off. even called him on phone. i had surgical injection limited mobility. he refused to pick up from location on this side of lot. left and rejected me in app.  yelled at me. i have nursing staff witnesses.  then they had nerve to bill me $5 for not being there when he arrived. i was at pickup location before he was.
title: Lyft unprofessional left stranded then charged for missed ride

review: wow, i couldn't believe how easy app was to use and i could see exactly where the driver was.  i used the preferred rate which was a little bit more but well worth it as i was running behind for my doctor appointment. the driver was very polite and friendly. i recommend lift.
title: First Timer Lift

review: the driver i had was a good driver 3 of the 3 ppl i have road with an he was good. what the most i love about the driver he was a safe driver. he even made a stop because u had to go to rest room. so he's the 3thrd  of my best.  love you and think for get me home safely after a night of drinking with my wife. xxxxxx
title: The driver

review: it's freaking new years, the one night of the year when i need a ride, and no dice. no drivers available. i'd have paid extra to be driven home. i've been drinking and had to scramble for a ride home. some people might have decided to drink and drive because the responsible route was unavailable. i was lucky my friend was able to drive me home. this is the only ride share app available in my area. pay your drivers better. maybe then you won't get reviews like this.
title: New Years

review: only issues i have had was with early rides to the airport. sometimes you don't get rides in the early morning. also the app doesn't let you see your breakdown of your ride until after you get the receipt. can't see if your tip was applied if you tip during the ride.
title: Good ride app - drive service

review: jesus christ. i'll pick you up. just on the principal alone. i like lyft. people are cool. it's way better then uber. they don't care about you. that's kinda important when you partner with someone. it's your time might as well spend it with people who care about you
title: You read Lexus review?

review: i was harassed and physically intimidated by a lyft driver who, among other points, insisted that the uvlade shooting was perpetrated by the government and that covid was a hoax. he physically threatened me both before and after a subsequent homophobic tirade. i exchanged dozens of emails with lyft support who did nothing other than assure me that proper action had been taken though they made clear that the driver was still paid for the ride and is allowed to continue. uber isn't a lot better but they seem to at least feign caring.
title: Unsafe/threatening drivers

review:
don't know his last name but he is the most honest and best driver i have ever met. i meant to tip him bigger but i can't seem to find his contact info. lyft -keep him around . he is the best!!!

signed by a person who had a. when i had a bad day and he made it wonderful!

thanks for honesty and professionalism!
title: Stephan

review:
today i waited for 14 minutes for the driver to arrived at the airport. i entered the vehicle and he said the app have been acting weird today all day. he said he will not drive me to my destination and asked me to get off the vehicle. he told me that i won't be charged and another driver will pick me up. 
this never happened before. the reason i am using lyft is to give them business but in return the driver give lyft a bad rep. i had to wait for another 14 minutes. hope lyft figure this out
title: Values your customer

review: i had scheduled my ride the day before so i could make it to work on time ( car was being borrowed for a bit). i woke up, got myself ready and waited for my ride. i had 3 separate drivers cancel on me so i was forced to rely on someone who was half an hour away and was late to work because of it. when i asked for part of my money back (they already charged me 20$ for a 1.2 mile ride) i was ignored for hours and had no help with the issue
title: Worst service, go to Uber or anything else

review: i was charged a $5 cancellation fee because apparently the driver had been on their way for over 5 minutes. last i'd looked they were 9 minutes away and i'd cancelled at the 6 minute mark. 3 minutes not 5. make that make sense. as well the driver was on another ride!!! not even finished with their previous ride, yet i still get charged for inconveniencing the driver??? it makes zero sense. do better.
title: Lyft doesn't care about their passengers

review: they tell you it's going to 7 minutes, but it stays on 7 minutes for 5minutes! they have really gotten selfish lately. you cancel the driver that's taking too long, then book another ride and they try and send the same ride!
title: Semi satisfied

review:
our driver answered all our questions, was pleasant and knowledgeable and when we discovered the restaurant we thought we were going to wasn't open recommended and drove us to a similar restaurant. 
we highly recommend him!
title: Outstanding Driver!

review: this app is a joke this is no point hitting up costumer service they are a joke and won't help i recently used lyft for years and recently they keep letting me down as a joke of a company i recently got into a car, and the seat was wet and totally ruined my pants, i had to go to work with soaked pants all this did was give me a 5 dollar credit how come when we ruin something in the car we have to pay a huge fee but when you guys ruin something of ours you just blow me off
title: A joke

review:
i would like to know the car description and driver name 24 hours ahead, instead of just a few minutes before pickup. 
also, when i was reserving the ride, the app didn't ask me how many passengers there would be. luckily it was only me, since my drivers car was small.
title: ML Hurley

review: i've been using lyft for years. but instead of improving it's getting worse. it's increasing price everyday even though you're going to the same place, same distance, same time. worst, you can't even find a driver easily anymore. they are always far or finishing another ride. so so frustrating. tell your drivers not to book or cancel the ride if they can't make it on time.
title: Need improvement

review: it was bad enough that the prices had gone up dramatically, but now it is almost impossible to get a ride. i'll finally have one coming and i will watch them get further and further away, and my pick up time increase to a point that i've had to cancel and end up driving myself almost every time now. it's a shame it's no longer a reliable service.
title: Not a good service anymore.

review:
i was so happy. for one he spoke great english. 
2) when he picked me up he was so curtesy that he jumped out helped load all my groceries and drove smooth to my house. 
3). on the way he profusely apologized for being late. he was rerouted 2x because of 2 separate vehicle accidents and still showed up. ty
title: True American.

review: it literally said my ride would be here by a certain time frame. on the way 20 minutes out until the time frame they're still trying to find a driver and it's saying looking for a nearby drivers when there is at least seven drivers in my whole entire area but they are just obviously not trying to pick me up i'm late for work already this is not the first time it happens it always happens
title: I can never get to work on time

review: go back to the 1st come 1st serve model of business. sick of this save and wait ridiculousness. then when you pick a ride it changes drivers and times. lyft has become so unreliable !!!  pay your drivers more!  the price of gas and wear and tear on the car is a lot and they only get less than 50% of the ride cost. also, show them how much the rider pays. quit keeping secrets.
title: Ride juggling

review: the app is very good. it is easy to use and i appreciate the safety features it has. however, i would like to see an add a note to driver' section. i am visually impaired and have difficulty navigating drivers to my destination. a notes feature would be nice feature, so i can to let drivers know ahead of time.
title: Very Nice

review: over this week i booked lyft about 6 times. each driver was excellent and treated me with respect and care. i felt safe held good conversations and each one (all different drivers in 4 different cities) was extremely competent and professional. what joy. vine road
title: Can't Be More Pleased

review: brandy showed up as expected. even though it was after 1 am. brandy was courteous and professional and brought me straight to my destination. i was very impressed i was in strange town in the middle of the night. she made me feel safe. car  was very clean.
title: Excellent ride

review:
thank you to kentantia for taking me to the game and thank you to ga for taking me back from the stadium.  two exceptional people lyft is lucky to have you both!!  5 stars to both of you and thank you again and god bless you both and your families.

best regards,
frank brezina
title: Thank you Lyft drivers great job!!

review: had to wait an hour and a half for a ride yesterday.  lyft kept changing drivers and one of them even said it was too far to pick me up (5 miles) and i had to cancel and start over again.  not a good feeling when your phone is running down and it was late in evening and i was trying to get back to the hotel.
title: Lyft experience

review: i had been trying to find a ride to the methadone clinic  in bakersfield from shafter since saturday. i should have checked on lyft first because in just 15 minutes i found a ride with an excellent driver for 1/3 less then the other driving app.
title: Life Saving transportation App

review: i typically use uber and occasionally check lyft prices ... this time the price was 30% off ... great deal! i will check lyft more often and maybe switch ... clean car and excellent driver ... the app worked great also!
title: Uber user, but this time got a ride 30% cheaper in Lyft

review: lyft does not care about its riders the cars are nasty and stink the drivers are rude and don't care and 9 times out of 10 the trip your paying for is cheaper on uber please save yourself time and money and stay far away from lyft your better off getting a taxi at least you can get some nostalgia if your going to waste your money. lyft is the worsts plus there customer service help center is worse than the drivers i wish i could have gave no stars that's how bad lyft is.
title: Just use Uber

review: had a driver take a wrong turn and drove extra miles because he got lost and lyft changed me over twice the price of the ride and contacting customer service is almost impossible, they leave it up to this algorithm that says since your driver got you there the charges are justified so drivers run this scam all the time. lyft customer service doesn't do anything about this so the scam continues, i will be deleting this app once i get my refund.
title: Horrible customer service

review: my husband and i used lyft for first time during our vacation in las vegas.  we were thrilled to see where the driver was at any time after we submitted our ride request.  driver changed our destination to the best dim sum according to the locals, not according to online reviews.  how awesome is that?!?
title: Our very first Lyft

review: i was having a friend picked up and after i scheduled the ride i forgot to tell them where at the huge pick up location. i could not text them and i do t remember the number i had registered with. thought it was my cell phone but apparently not. that was the only thing i didnt like.
title: Contacting Driver

review: i was at ewr terminal b pickup 1 when i requested a ride. the software said to go to pickup 2-4. i did. when the driver arrived at pickup 1 the software said he had arrived & i had 5 minutes to find him. he was not visible so i had to frantically search for him, pulling all my luggage. i found him where i was originally when i requested the ride!?!! so why did it instruct me to go elsewhere??
title: Software needs improvement

review:
i am a pink member and i keep having issues with getting a confirmed driver, waiting 15 minutes or more, and then the driver cancels and i have to start the process all over again.
if i get charged for canceling after a set period of time, shouldn't there be some deterrent for drivers to cancel after a rider has waited for a ride?
really considering kicking lyft to the curb.
title: Confirmed drivers making me wait for 15 minutes and then canceling

review:
in the past week i've been stranded twice in new york because drivers are constantly canceling. today i was charged forty six dollars to take a 15 minute ride in allentown on a friday when there were several drivers available and no traffic. i contacted lyft customer support and was told this is completely normal. 

at this stage i've realized i can't depend on lyft to get me from a-b on time or within an affordable price. i'd recommend against downloading this app and using the service.
title: Either unreliable or unaffordable.

review: ive had two drivers for rides to and from the airport who had so much personal stuff in their trunks they could not accommodate my baggage.   one refused to take me and another worked for a good 20 minutes trying to arrange their personal stuff to make room for baggage
title: Trunks

review: my waiting time changed from 10 to 6 to 10 minutes. and each time they change the driver i have to wait for an amount of time. so for a drive which is estimated with 6 minutes waiting + 6 minutes driving = 12 minutes eventually took 30 minutes.
title: Change driver frequently

review:
i enter a destination and lyft puts in an old destination.  i delete old and lyft enters it as a stop on the way. i delete this entry and lyft puts it in as primary.  the car comes and i tell judith my frstration . she says i can delete it from here. 
she did. why  do you do this!
title: drive destinations

review:
this man and his woes with his wife are amazing that he could still keep up his spirits for me. he's definitely a keeper as a employee and his courtesy after picking me up at the hospital where his wife was at after a stroke. forgot uber already as they declined all my cards and were rude. i'm a lyft convert from now on. 
daniel c
title: Lyft Rocks!!!!

review: my street (whitney park lane) in greenacres florida, is nonexistent for some odd reason. probably because my neighborhood relatively new and is only a few years old. but it keeps confusing my lyft drivers making it seem as if i live on 2nd street, which is not the case. never had this issue with uber. other than that, it's a great app.
title: PLEASE UPDATE YOUR MAP

review: done with lyft. you guys cancel on me way too frequently after waiting and you guys are responsible for making me late every time i call. quit bumping riders that have already been waiting 10+ to make them wait an additional 20. what type of service is that? if i went to a restaurant, ordered my food, and was told i had to wait longer because someone had a bigger order even though i was already waiting ahead of them, i would never order there again.
title: get cancelled on after waiting

review: driver was extremely helpful the car was immaculate extremely clean very friendly kept the conversation engaging explain to us about places of attraction here in orlando specifically at disney springs i would recommend him definitely 10 out of 10
title: CEO of Caribe investments

review: taxis have their place, but timeshare is definitely formidable competition. after multiple attempts, i have yet to get uber app to work, even with support. within a few short minutes, lyft got me an urgent ride, clean car, nice driver, smooth ride!
title: Lyft from here on out!

review:
my husband and i have always called on lyft, and never been less than appreciative for the excellent driving, comfort and professionalism of our drivers.  when traveling alone, i never have a doubt about the caliber of driver and my sense of security.
bravo
title: Safe and Secure

review: overall satisfied it could use some minor tweaks. but 90% of the time it's fine. voiceover accessibility is pretty good. i think it's mainly the support pages and options that could use some work. like i said, just some minor things. overall pretty solid insertion point at end
title: Overall satisfactory

review: lyft tells you your ride will be there in 15 min before booking it, then you book it and they suddenly change the arrival time to 3 min; then you miss your ride by 2 min, and they charge you $5.5 in penalty fee. then you request a second ride which should come in 10 min, but they make you wait 20 min, cause you're already there and they can't scam you a ride-miss fee this time. good job lyft. that's how you are ending up losing to your competitor.
title: The ride-miss penalty is a scam

review: if the driver shows up lyft is fine. too often you wait the nearly the full time for the driver to arrive only to have the ride switch drivers at the last minute. waiting 15-20 minutes for a ride only to have the driver switched to another 20+ minutes away is unacceptable. 2 of 3 tries to use lyft this happens. uber doesn't do this would prefer lyft but if they can't actually deliver timely service what good are they?
title: Confirmed ride cancel way too often

review:
lyft is very important in our lives.  as seniors we rely on lyft for many things.  we truly appreciate this very reliable service that makes our lives so much easier. we have never been disappointed 

cardonaldgirl
title: Thank you

review: most drivers are not wearing mask as, i'm was protected by wearing a mask keeping my hands clean i took, a ride with my little boy both us, was wearing a mask the driver was not she insisted that my son doesn't has to wear a mask because he's a kid which is bogus i make sure i keep me and my family protected by masking up keeping our hands clean i notice she was coughing two days mommy son and myself became ill enough though we're wearing a mask we contracted covid the driver was also, rude to me that day .
title: Rides must be be protected also

review: me and my family needed a ride and steve showed up 15 minutes before the time he was supposed to arrive which was great! he was also very nice. the ride was smooth and the air conditioning was already on when we got in. thank you!
title: Great ride!

review: i used to use lyft religiously. chose it over uber nine times out of ten. always felt safe and like i wasn't being overcharged. so what happened? gas prices went up a little bit and it's now $107 dollars to go fifteen minutes away? that's absolutely ridiculous. how am i supposed to be saving money this way? lyft was how i got to and from work. i am so disappointed with this because, honestly, i don't like uber. i am now forced to use it because lyft decided it needed a lot more money. ridiculous.
title: Prices

review:
i wonder why my scheduled ride that i made before my flight hours earlier was passed to 3 different rides before i was picked up. as a result i was picked up 30 minutes later than my scheduled ride.   
is it be use of cost or price?   i noticed most of the people waiting outside were scheduling on demand lyft rides and were being picked up within 5 minutes.  not me; i was one of the last ones and probably won't schedule another ride.
title: Scheduled rides get pushed behind on demand rides

review: my driver was awesome i was lost and he guided me to were he was and was exceptionally patient and let me know about the traffic conditions and how long it would take to get to my destination. and we made fast friend i really enjoyed my driver and the trip
title: My first trip out or SF airport

review:
not sure what we are paying for when you take a ride from lyft. in the last 6 months i have taken uber literally everytime because lyft prices are at atleast 150% of what uber offers. i am writing this review sitting on an airport waiting for an uber.  
it is astonishing what the prices are shown on lyft app. i have taken at least 4 rides every month in the last six months and never thought of choosing lyft after seeing their prices.
title: Too costly ride when compared with Uber

review:
if i could give zero stars i would. 

need to be picked up right away? 

willing to pay $5.99 for the convenience? driver shows up 10 minutes late anyway? 

will lyft return the priority pickup fee when the driver arrives late? well at least they're willing to give back $5 of the $5.99 for the next inconvenience right? 

well that's what the first guy said. 

you mean after offering to charge you $0.99 for a service they did not provide they didn't give you a credit they promised? 

nope. 

is this the mafia? maybe. it's definitely a racket. maybe one day the feds will bust this criminal organization and bury them underneath guantanamo bay. 

isn't it hot there? yes but not even the feds can send these gangsters to the even hotter place which they surely belong
title: Den of thieves!!! Despicable app and company!

review: i'm new to using car services. i downloaded lyft & uber. tried uber 1st. got an email from uber saying my driver complained because i didn't wear a mask. i actually did get in the vehicle & told the driver oops i forgot to put on my mask & immediately put it on. that's ok because i will now be using lyft in the future.
title: LYFT ride

review: the apps been real buggy lately.  when my driver is on their way, it will show them driving towards me but have them stop randomly when actuality they have arrived and are looking for me.  also, the location bugs out a bit of where i am at.
title: Buggy Lately

review: what i like about lyft the most is that i can order a ride or my wife, friends or family when i'm hundred to miles away, even week's in advance and i do not have to worry cause i know lyft will be there for them and on time
title: Accommodating and easy to use

review: this app is really easy to use and cheaper than other apps. it has always dropped me to the places at right time n drivers are really friendly n good drivers. thank you for creating such a great app to help people like us travel easily.
title: Review on app

review:
i scheduled a lyft in advance of my flight and it never came.  i then called lyfts to pick me up and two drivers made me wait 15 minutes while they finished rides just to cancel as soon as they finished theirs rides.  i almost missed my flight and the only reason i made my flight was because of uber which came promptly.  

when i contacted lyft customer support they responded slowly and did nothing about it.  awful app switching to uber.
title: Awful Customer Service and Unreliable Drivers

review: since drivers aren't scheduled and can refuse to pick people up it is not a good business. most quit when covid started and claim they make very little driving. we need more real public transportation in america like they do in europe.
title: Nice drivers but rarely available

review: why in the every would i pay you $20-$35 to go 5 miles up the street. i can take the bus for $2, i'll still be waiting around for 15 minutes, and get there at the same time. will always manage to be most expensive when you need it most and then you have to add on the time it takes for your driver to find you which is another 5 minutes or so.
title: Not cost effective

review:
this is the way we should travel to all of our disney plans for the day if we could! amazing driver and friendly convo! my husband would've spent the entire day chatting with him!
five plus stars all around!
sara f and family
title: Smooth efficient and friendly driver!

review: please start monetarily punishing your drivers for canceling last minute.! i'm tired of waiting for a driver 3 times before someone decides to show up! i swear you do this on purpose so we will buy the more expensive rides. update- wait and save is a joke. you select this and wait forever for a driver that doesn't move. then you find the drivers are all magically more expensive than you originally saw. scam! you should be ashamed of yourselves.
title: Drivers keep canceling last minute

review:
7 minutes for a pick up at lax? are you kidding me? 60-70 (at least) other riders already there. after 30 minutes and still no driver, i took a taxi (already waiting) and got home an hour earlier, while others were still waiting who had been there from the time i first arrived. what a joke.
this is not amateur hour. get your waiting times right or at least a little more realistic. i will never use lyft from lax again
title: Totally unrealistic LAX pick up estimates

review: not worth the hassle - half the time the drivers cancel and the other half they take an authorized hold and charge you twice for the same ride saying the money will be back in a few days there is no need to put a temporary hold on the card if the amount was already paid in full. not only do they take the hold out once they do it several times - i had a 5 star rating and will never ever use this app again. just download uber.
title: USE UBER INSTEAD

review: excellent service.  new rider, downloaded app and requested a ride.  lyft confirmed requested service upon imputing needed info.  driver showed up within 3 minutes.  new car, superclean very helpful providing information  about the riders app.  this system really works.
title: My first ride with Lyft

review:
a few years ago, my experiences with lyft app was great!

however over past month, the app has not allowed me to see the full screen/map to better orient myself.  in unfamiliar areas, that is important.  

the screen about the driver, etc could not be scrolled out of the way.  i look forward to using lyft in the future once that has been addressed.  until then, will return to uber (recently used in area of the country where lyft was not available).
title: Great service.

review: i have no problem waiting for lyft to find a driver but when they find one and it says they'll be here in two minutes and im waiting 10 to see the driver just sitting in one spot then i get annoyed. that happened today and i canceled the ride and had to pay a $5 fee bc they were two minutes away and i thought that was dumb bc the driver wasn't moving and had been sitting at a gas station. i asked to dispute the $5 charge and they gave me $5 ride credit instead. and there was another time my driver got pulled over while driving me to work and they added more money to the ride fee??? i was late to work bc the driver got pulled over and i had to pay extra money
title: being charged wrongly

review: ran afoul of credit card fraud fraudster used lyft twice. i put lyft on notice. years later tried to use lyft but they without advising me disallowed any further transactions.  i tried and tried to put in my card for over an hour. all they had to do was advise me but they never did. now they corrected issue but no explanation why no one  contacted me that i had been removed. waste of so much time. nothing offered by them. no responsive email returned. awful.
title: Bad to non existent customer support

review: i have a complaint. i like this app because is cheaper than uber but i got recently have been charged for a lyft that the driver canceled himself not me. this is not good because i didn't cancel the lyft it was him and i didn't receive the refund for it. y'all need to change this because this put y'all in a bad position. definitely this app not worth it. i need my refund!!! this is unacceptable
title: No refund !!

review: my driver who picked me up at juniors and took me to macys was amazing. extremely personable and very accommodating. plus an excellent driver. this is my first time using lyft and apparently missed the window to leave a review. i hope this message makes it to his account   he gets 5 stars
title: Todays first driver

review:
thanks so much to raymond, my lyft driver extraordinaire. he patiently waited as i found my way to the pickup area at the fort lauderdale international airport; conversed with me about the area; and pointed out the broward convention center, when i asked it's location for the national senior games.

happy returns to raymond & lyft, for making my 1st day in a new place, welcoming!
title: Lyft'd Spirits

review:
your driver gave me brain damage by driving an unstable, wobbly, car at 70-80 mph on the highway. i told him about it and he started yelling at me. i am still feeling dizzy and disoriented the next day after the ride. contacted your customer service and they just keep saying they are looking into it and then don't respond again. 

dear lyft, your customer service team is charging you salary whilst not doing their jobs. am guessing you are outsourcing these job? no wonder.
title: Dangerous driver, no real customer service

review: i may end up deleting this app as it is the larger by far of any other app and it continues to increase in size. is the size really necessary or are they using poor coding practices?  to touch a bit on the cancellations i been hearing and reading about. that's why i now use lyft as a last resort. the cancellations and the much higher prices than other alternatives.
title: Ever growing app size

review:
after having a drunk driver go on a racist rant while swerving between lanes because he couldn't contain his anger you would think lyft might, at the very least, refund my ride. but instead all i received was an apologetic email. 
that combined with being charged $70 twice and the pending charges not being returned for an entire weekeven after contacting customer service who eventually just ignored mehas made me completely give up on using lyft altogether
title: Many issues

review: this app isn't that bad, but it's ridiculous that when i get non-english speaker it's hard tell them where to go when they don't even speak your language. there should be an option so you can pick either english or spanish. the man tried so hard to get what i was saying, but he was so lost and i felt bad. in the future y'all should consider doing something like that so it's easier for your rider and drivers.
title: Need option to pick same language speakers.

review: amazing app. helped me and my friends get home safely at 4 am when it was pouring. there's always a driver available (24/7 service) who will assist you and personally i can always rely on lyft over any other transportation  to bring me home safely at any time of the day
title: Best app to get

review: i've experienced this more than once. i had a driver assigned and it was getting close to the pickup time, and suddenly i get assigned a new driver without explanation. which adds to the wait time! really frustrating! and was not able to find a way to get in touch about this issue with customer support.
title: Sometimes assigned driver gets switched

review: we live in a very remote area, and my mother doesn't drive, let alone know how to use a smart phone, i love that i can rely on lyft to get her where she going safely and i can easily order them for her frequently, im so very grateful for this company and how easy it is to use
title: The best
