review: the algorithm is messed up. the gps tries to take you the longest route possible so they can charge you more. their customer service isn't that great, 1 person was very helpful but if you try to send help thru the app, they don't care to respond and resolve your issue, they will occasionally overcharge you and if you don't go and request a refund they'll just keep your money. overall not a great platform
title: Not that great

review:
my first lyft ride was to the san francisco airport on february 12, 2022.  gloria arrived ahead of my early bird 4:15 a.m. pick-up time and she is a warm, welcoming and very polite woman.  her vehicle was spotlessly clean and i really enjoyed our chat.
thank you, gloria!i hope that you usher me to and from the airport again.  take care, be safe.
title: Gloria be her name!

review: she helped a friend of mine that had an emergency get to the hospital in a timely manner, and was very friendly during the process. i would ride with her every time if it was possible. one of the best lyft drivers i've had so far in the city. thank you!
title: Excellent City Driver

review: met some people out one night and someone ordered me a car to be nice but i don't know who. left my wallet in the car by mistake and lyft refuses to help me find out if the driver found it because i don't know who ordered the car. i know the license plate of the driver from security cameras. i know the make and model. i know the starting and drop off addresses and what time this all happened. just don't know who called the ride so they refuse to help me retrieve my wallet. looney tunes.
title: Customer service is non existent

review: lyft offered outstanding service. the ride came in 3 minutes and the driver was great. he made sure we got onto our property safely. he watched as we unlocked the gate, got inside, and locked the gate again. as senior citizens, we appreciate he watched out for us.
title: great service

review: opened an account 3 days ago. today my bank/debit card was fraudulently charged and card info breached from the lyft app/account i set up. so they have a breach in their system. please be careful. my bank verified that my card info was breached from a merchant like uber or lyft. again it was lyft i made the new account. debit card number was hacked from them and then charged. now i have to get a new card and deal with this head ache. u would think they have a better security system with so many users and riders. beware. please
title: BEWARE STOLEN CARD INFO!!!!

review: the pricing and availability enforced with lyft make using lyft more of a deterrent than a preferred option.. pricing and availability that is consistent and reliable with safety being the top priority is doable  lyft just needs to make the adjustments necessary.. because if you take care of the people who work for you.. they are more inclined to go above and beyond to make a synergistic relationship possible
title: Improvement

review: i use lyft quite a bit but i get really mad because every time a ride is done it won't let me close the rating section unless i give 5 stars to the driver. this is just annoying when i have a very bad driver and can't give an honest review, or can't leave the review screen. i tried uninstall and reinstalling but it only worked for one ride, and then the bug came back. please fix this
title: Please fix bug

review: very good service. thank you for having a company like this one. because i don't have a car and at time it be too hot to catch public transportation.  now some driver be a little off at times, but everything not perfect.
title: No Complaints

review: eugena was so helpful and sweet. i was leaving the er and she helped me to her car and also into the house. also, the drive through pharmacy was not open so i had to go in, she found someone to help me, waited patiently for me. as there were 2 people ahead of me.
title: Excellent experience

review: works well for getting from place to place and entering preferences but i like to be able to see where i am and how soon i'll be at my destination and every time they update this app the portion of the screen devoted to the map is smaller. it is now like a tenth of the screen and you can't adjust it except to make it even smaller!  why. don't even get me started on how annoying this is when you try to use the app for bike share.
title: WHY is the map so small

review: i understand there's a limit on how many drivers there are out there but charging $150 for a 10 minute car ride is absurd and unreasonable. i also feel unsafe when i can no longer view the map and route within the app. why is this not accessible while i am in the lyft? you also took away the ability to schedule rides in my city. not happy.
title: Expensive and clunky.

review: good app user friendly but i think what would help is, in addition to canceling a ride, we should have the ability to change pick up driver when they are taking too long. that would make you guys service even better and top notch.
title: Suggestion

review: enjoyed my ride very much! felt safe first of all, i'm a pregnant mama whose car is broke down, and got a very interesting cool conversation out of a short ride. if was busy or feeling antisocial, i believe it would have been a peaceful ride also :)
title: Sensitive, friendly, interesting!

review: lyft has become functionally unusable. 10 min wait times manage to actually take 20 minutes, and then drivers cancel at the last minute resetting wait times to upwards of another 20 min. i'm currently waiting on a ride that i requested more than 30 minutes ago which initially promised a 10 min wait, and i'm now on the 5th driver lyft has assigned. let's hope this one comes. if the service weren't so unreliable it might be useful!
title: Unreliable wait times

review:
every ride i've had so far for lyft have been one of the most casual and protected rides i've been on, drivers are always understanding and very quick each time to pick me up and drop me off.
great work at picking the right employees lyft !
title: Savior of transportation

review: lyft always finds a way to keep me happy. i just type my location and where i'm going, and like magic, someone shows up. there are so many places to go either alone or with family, and lyft always takes me there.
title: Happy Client

review: i was waiting for my lyft and had the wrong location. my driver was lost and had to reroute to find me. i don't normally write reviews but my ride was delayed. i must admit my driver was awesome and was pretty chill about the situation. i'm thankful that a driver was available but the inconvenience my me give this a two star rating. i may also add that my driver did accommodate my by doing the speed limit for me to reach my destination in a timely manner.
title: Driver was awesome

review:
i like riding lyft because cars are clean & drivers are friendly. but you are getting expensive now. i left uber because they became expensive  in their rates. i hope you will lower a little bit.
thank you.
title: Becoming expensive

review: i love lyft but right now im having problems that they take my money twice from the bank and i go to costumer support and they try to say something us but when i call my bank or i check my bank account they charge twice
title: Hello

review: scheduled a ride ahead of time and the location picked up the address of a business down the street.   the driver, sim, was early and called me and told me and somehow i got my ride.  but i couldn't figure out how to fix the pick up location.   grateful for sim's patience!
title: Scheduled ride picked up the wrong location

review: so my ride was suddenly canceled oh ok cools no problem but the suddenly the next day lyft hits me a safety warning i'm guessing not wearing a mask but how is that possible if i never went in lyft ride is there someone i can contact about this incident  i checked the website and the app and there no way to prove i had this incident there's no information about false accusation and health not even giving a choice to pick other if you problems isn't listed either please help very upset
title: So upset

review: he was very polite and kind and waited on my 98-year-old friend so he cannot be able to go shopping at walmart he he had an accident and he still waited and i just want to tell everyone this driver was very polite professional thank you romona hobbs
title: Spanish Drivers

review: having the app and the ability to both prepay and track my ride so i know when it arrives is really great but without the ability to send a text message or email makes taking care of minor technical problems difficult.
title: App is helpful but...

review: took my money and the ride never showed up. i booked the ride for 9:00 am and the transaction was approved. i watched the app so that i am aware of the drivers location. it said the driver arrived and there was an 11 minute departure. i went outside there was no one out there. i texted the driver's phone she left me on read. not to mention i was charged an extra 10 dollars for no reason . now i'm stuck without a ride to work. i literally have a baby coming in 3 weeks.
title: Nine months pregnant

review: stay away from this company. worst customer service ever, or should i say no customer service at all! as paying passengers, we are given no protection or customer care whatsoever. i got scammed by a lyft driver and got charged a damage fee for something that's clearly a set-up by the driver. i sent lyft customer service at least four different emails but never got a response. they also have no phone number or live chat available. stick with uber everyone!
title: Lyft Completely Ignoring Customers

review: i was very grateful to get a ride quickly this morning with ricardo. my surgery was very early and i was quite concerned about getting a ride so early in the morning. but everything worked out great and i was very pleased!!  kudos for a great experience!!
title: Early morning ride to the hospital

review:
i don't know what's going on but i just received a low rating from an unknown driver & i don't know why i always tell my driver to be safe & have a great day if this continues i will use another source of transportation. 

                       signed a respectable customer
title: Confused

review: inaccurate times - don't bother paying for a faster pickup because you wait just as long and don't get compensated for the delay. it's not the driver's fault - i see their screen and the app tells them to take really inefficient routes, doesn't let them know which side of a busy street to be on etc. it finds you the nearest driver even if they already have a ride that's going across town. add a padded wad of time onto any estimate or you will be late. horrible app.
title: Horrible

review: i been trying to change my payment frequency but it hasn't let me do that at all. i wanted to change it because every time i take two rides a day it charges my card three times for 2 rides. i talked to customer service about this issue but they still haven't done anything about it
title: Payment Frequency

review: so i have to start by saying that i usually use uber because i pay for the pass with them but their rate here were  so much higher! i tried to book with  uber and the fare for an 11 minute ride was $89!!!i i booked with lyft, also met an awesome driver for only $15! redqueenbee
title: Rates so good!

review: this is the third time i have booked ahead of time for my ride. i booked it last night around 10 pm for pick up at 7:20 am this morning. they sent me three different rides and all of the rides canceled. the last one never was canceled it just did not come. there was no way for me to contact the driver and lyft has no way for me to speak to a customer service representative. i do not recommend the service to anyone else. >>>caution<<<
title: They hold your money but don't pick you up

review:
i drove for lyft for about 8 months. until today. if that course of time i've first hand watch their platform steadily go downhill. 
they are ripping off both drivers and riders alike. i've had numerous issues with the driver side of the app. costing me money gas and my time. every time their app malfunctions they blame my brand new iphone 13 pro that works flawlessly. i've had ride streaks broken by being kicked off line. 
i've had double rides booked and have had rides canceled after driving a considerable distance to pick them up. never once received a cancellation fee. 
they are disreputable and dishonest to the core. 
all the customer service for lack of a better word is farmed out to people who have no grasp of english or even how the app works. 
i could write a novel about all the problems i've had. one star is one star too many. 
user beware. 
ps i had over a thousand rides and not even one negative feedback from any of them. 

i won't even get into how their tier rewards are t what they say they are. 

***k you lyft. i can't wait until the class action lawsuit gets filed. i'll be first on that list.
title: awful company

review:
i just can't understand why lyft would charge differently to every single person even if it's the same time at the same location. plus raising the price because it rains or because it's snowing or holiday. but the worst is that they are extremely over charging to go to places like jfk or newark. more then $120! just to go to newark from chealse or jfk from brooklyn or even worst a 15 mile drive $240!!!!!
 i have no idea why are you guys are charging so much money.
title: Lyft and Uber are all the same.

review:
was too busy while on trip to tip or write a review . got home and wanted to do so and all i could was file a complaint - or give negative feedbacks 
no way to contact lyft. 
this impacts not only driver but my rating 
also hate hate hate the scoter and bike situations- never ever again- overcharged - no help/ no parking and even after submitting complaint no follow up from lyft. 
also had major issues with rides not showing up on vacation earlier this year
title: Can't add a tip, review or get help for compliment

review: when i'm returning home from a plane trip, i can count on prompt courteous lyft drivers for pick up. using lyft for business trips allows me to get a receipt for the ride to be reimbursed by my employer separate from the tip receipt.
title: Jorge of Lyft - clean car, fast pickup, friendly driver

review:
appreciate this young man. he went above and beyond to return my phone that i left in the back seat after returning from the emergency room with my mom. it was my moms first ride share experience and she loved wendell being her first driver and ride-share experience. 

thanks wendell
title: Super Good Guy

review: today was my first experience with the service and i had two great drivers.  i love that the app displays a driver photo, tag number, and info regarding the rating/time driving.  i felt safe and comfortable with both trips.  very happy!
title: First time user

review: i hate the fact that they have change their policies just because and without warning: the shared rides are back and now you don't have the option of you want to share it automatically does it for you. and if you decide to wait 20 mins for ride instead of paying for the premium price they will take longer then stated on app or won't even pick you up even if they are car available
title: Awful

review:
don't rely on lyft or uber if you need to be somewhere by a specific time. i've been bitten a few times when going to the airport or a dr's office.

you wait a good 15m and once the driver gets close they simply cancel it and you need to wait another 15m. funny enough lyft charges you if you cancel late but doesn't pay a cent if they or the driver cancels your ride the last second and ruins your plans.
title: Not always reliable

review: our plane got in late this evening and the rental car company was closed so we weren't able to get our rental car gloria was so nice to come and get us she even stopped so we could get something to eat great driver great service greatly appreciated.
title: Montgomery

review: lyft drivers are professional and courteous all the time, the cars are clean and the drivers go out of their way to be friendly. and it's always cheaper than uber-who ups their prices depending how busy they are! lyft is a much better value!
title: Awesome Job

review: after having a major issue with a ride. i contacted lyft with concerns about my ride. they not only didn't read my initial email and address my concerns. they also sent a second email antagonizing me for not being able to help me. i have never written a review for an application before but i have also never been treated so horribly and disrespectfully by customer service in my life. terrible company would not use again.
title: Horrible customer service

review: i had used uber to book a very early flight and two drivers did not show. i quickly tried lyft, and my driver was there in minutes . he saved the day! i will be using lyft as my first choice in the future.
title: Lyft came through !

review:
mostly ok. i've had some trouble with the re driver not coming to the right address.  not the drivers' fault but faulty info sent from lyft. also hard to reach lyft to rectify the problem.  
for the most part, i am satisfied with lyft.  the drivers r helpful and interesting.
title: Review

review: i've been trying to schedule a future lyft for my daughter for the last half hour and your app is making it absolutely impossible. and, i see no way of asking for help. thanks, lyft.
title: Extremely difficult

review: i ordered a lyft to pick up my mentally disabled son at a newport beach hotel and take him to a hotel. he got confused and couldn't find the car. the driver made an extra effort to contact the the front desk and locate him. excellent, rapid service.
title: Made extra effort to accommodate my disabled son

review: i had lyft pink which was cancelled with the explanation that i had removed my credit card. i never removed it with all my rides showing clearly on my statements. reached out to support, which said they'd look into it, cycled through 5 support members over 5+ hours, and then one finally asked for details. sent them screenshots and they said not to reply as they'll get back to me. conveniently the chat closes in 24 hours and there has been no response.
title: There's no support

review: i request a lyft today and the app said 15 minutes away and it sat right in the same spot for at least 5 minutes and didn't move so i cancel it and they still charge me, then one i request a lyft to go to work the driver text me talking about he's not picking me up from my house i had to walk down the street to get a ride they charge me for a ride i didn't even get yes i'm going back to uber i no it's a little expensive but hey they are better then lyft
title: It's getting worst

review: i was fine with my ride but i have to tell you i hate the app so much i don't know if i will use lyft again.  i scheduled a ride and couldn't find anything about it on the app.  i was coming in on the train and was worried about the train being late so i tried to adjust the schedule.  impossible.  nothing about the app was easy or helpful.
title: Train station to Germantown

review: i am ready to stop using lyft. i had to go through three drivers today because you sent the drivers to a different place than you told me to wait at fort myers airport. you need to fix this problem or i will never use your system again. the only reason i got this one was because i was able to text driver and tell her where i was because you sent her to where i was not and i went to where you told me to go. fix it!!!
title: Terrible preparation

review: often request a ride and the app will cancel it and then the ride will be way more expensive. i'll be waiting 30 minutes for a ride. this might have something to do with driver reviews but that's what happens when they can see your review before they write there's. y'all don't tell anyone that little fact. or it could have too do with what you pay. pay more then uber and we wouldn't be stranded and hoping for rides.
title: Just use Uber

review: the app is constantly switching drivers causing my pickup to be longer and longer making me late to certain places and things that. i need to be on time for. this app needs a way to get more drivers in certain locations also some drivers need to reported i was walking up on my lyft literally can see my reflection in his rear view mirror and he cancels on me and speeds off
title: Constantly waiting for extended period

review: lyft is never responsive or supportive on customer service issues.  i've ridden in some of the worst cars and paid too dollar to do so complained and nothing happens.  at times they can be more affordable than other ride-share apps so i guess you get what you pay for.  they aren't responsive, i left my keys in a car and they didn't support at all in helping me to get them back i paid hundreds to get all my keys replaced.  horrible.
title: Poor customer service

review: i love the convenience of taking a lyft to my destinations. however, i will get lots of riders that constantly try to converse with me and i'm not a socializing person. please make a rider option for introverted people like me. we will greatly appreciate it.
title: An option for introverted people

review: i waited more than 10 of 15 total mins and lyft cancelled my ride and within about 5 mins of my driver getting, without warning.  i had to wait about 10 mins to get another driverthat one cancelled toofound another lyft with about 5 more mins but even they were going to be another 16 mins! uber would never do this kind of irresponsible stuff. now i see why they are the cheaper option. smh.
title: Lyft is a liar.

review: i'm removing this app from my phone because it's broken no matter how many times i tried to set a location it keeps rerouting me to my present location. lyft doesn't give you any means to address problems with its app, drivers, file complaints or anything of that nature. many problems have been created and aggravated because of this broken app. lyft, either get yourselves together or you will continue to lose business
title: Removal of broken app

review: i love, love the convenience of getting, and paying for a ride on lyft.  one of the first cab rides of my life in nyc back in the 1950's was traumatic.  the driver ran the meter up by taking the long way there, and then there was a confrontation about the tip.  thank you, lyft for inventing this new technology!!
title: What's not to love?

review: i keep getting charged twice as a temporary charge to see if my card works and i've yet to receive 2 of my temporary charges back a long with how i can't change the way i want to get rides set up. it shows how i have temporary charges and how i should be receiving the money back but as of recently i haven't gotten it back
title: charges

review: there is no way to contact lyft if there is an issue that isn't listed in there very limited selection. ordered an xl for the airport and a toyota highlander arrived, it was supposed to be able to fit 6 people and our bags. also, they were sitting far in the back of the lot and never responded to any texts and so the time was running out. wouldn't let me cancel without being charged.
title: Hard to contact for help, limited options in help to choose from

review: we have used the lyft three times today from downtown salt lake city back-and-forth to our hotel and they have been prompt, courteous, and efficient. i feel lucky to have such an economical way to get around the city as we are tourist.
title: Good Experience

review: sometimes it just takes a friendly smile and i love your conversation to make a bad person feel good your driver encouraged me to smile on my way to the doctor and it helps a lot thank you for having her as a driver
title: Patient at senior Dedicated Medical Center

review: the lyft app changed the driver 6 times and put changed the address back to start point and we were drove in wrong direction for a few blocks until i realized and changed the address to correct one and now the rate doubled! we finally got to the destination but later and paid twice the original quoted rate. i have always used lyft for the past but will use uber from now on to find the difference.
title: Horrible experience but good driver

review:
joseph took on my request when someone else dropped my earlier booking.

he is professional, friendly and helpful with my request for a short ride.

excellent service.
title: Friendly and accommodating

review: lift needs to pay the driver about 60% to be fairthey're only paying 30% of the fair to the driver and that's definitely not fair. then the company expects you to make up the difference with a tip. i'm happy to give a tip but the company is taking advantage of the situation.
title: Great service

review: unless i choose the most expensive ride, my rides keep dropping extending my wait time to double or triple the original projected amount. what a way to hike up prices for lyft.  this has happened more than 3 times, causing notable delays.
title: Lyft hiking up prices

review: well, i find the lyft app can be very easy to use until.... that's right until you have a simple or serious issue to solve. it's such a pain to go through all the step to find someone just to text....and then you have to sit and wait on the emails/text to return with an answer... that could be an automated person! lol
title: Lyft App %10 or %100

review: lyft has turned into a whole scam. they processed their pending charge and then after it went through a couple of days later they turned around and charged me again and out my account in the negative and told me all i have is screenshots for proof and their system isn't showing that so reach back out in a few days. i will never use lyft again and i will make sure to tell anyone who listens about the fraud and scamming lyft has going on.
title: Fraud and Theives

review: i just want to thank all of you for what you do, being a truck driver it's hard to get around when your truck is in the shop and you all are who we depend on to get around and you don't disappoint, thank you
title: Grateful

review: i solely rely on lyft to get to work and the last two months have been horrible the cancellations are one thing but it's happening when drivers are less than 10 min away and becomes more frequent everyday i've been late to work and missed appointments because of this no matter how far in advance i scheduled the ride time is something you can't get back and penalty or low ratings toward the driver does not help rider
title: Unreliable frequently cancels

review: ain't no way y'all trying to charge me $100 for a 7 mile trip. y'all must base price off individual income from some unknown finacial information yous receive via a business agreement, bc uber doing the same trip for $20? doesn't even make sense. it wouldn't cost me $100 to drive my own car 7 miles which is what i'm currently doing, so why t-h would i pay you $100 to do it? come on don't make your desperate scamming attempts so obvious.
title: $87 for a 7 mile trip?! Uber is doing it for $20

review: if a line in the store is long how is that my fault? i pay too much to only have a 5 min grace period and im disabled also but even when i wasn't  that's the biggest finesse. this is why im faithful to uber.
title: Constantly getting left after 5 mins

review:
this time i changed from uber which i have been using for two years (over 50 times.)
 i rode with lyft this time because of a 50% discount they offered me for my first 10 rides i will wait and see the results and  if they're for  real

gp
title: First time LYFT

review: lyft is 95% of the time useful until i had left my phone in a lyft which i understand was my fault but when i had contacted to driver to coordinate a plan he was just being rude saying it wasnt his problem when he literally had my phone then told me  he threw my phone out the window, kept it overnight  so i tracked it down to his house the next morning. this honestly could have been super dangerous and lyft did nothing but send me a lousy email a whole week later.

dinh, my driver went above and beyond! it was in the 40's, he took care of my bags, got them for me, and ensured i made it into my home safely before he drove off into the night! couldn't ask for more! 
  his car was meticulously clean, glad for the ride!!!!
title: Dinh, great driver, so thoughtful!!!!

review: two thumbs up! best drivers ever! very friendly!  felt safe! safe drivers. very accurate. always feel safe. always arrives on time. i've never had a bad experience with any lyft drivers. i'll definitely recommend lyft to others.
title: Lyft is the way to go!

review: i tip my drivers cash i'm a bartender i've had arguments with drivers through text sometimes about my pick up, if they don't want to pick me up why should i cancel i use your app 5 times a day at a point because i bartend. and my costumer service is based on a point where i could lose my job. so if i don't want to work why should i be there? can't cancel a drink order or i waste product.
title: Happy mad guy here

review: added lyft pink to my account since it came free from my credit card and prices immediately went up by 30%+ for a ride to the airport so after a 15% pink discount the price was still significantly higher. triple checked it by creating a new account and ordered the same ride at the same time a few more times and the one without pink was always less. this should be illegal and for sure is a super shady business practice.
title: Delete Lyft pink for lower prices

review: i ordered a ride and the driver missed the turn into the parking lot of the hotel i was going to, so then he drives in circles irritably, and doesn't know any english so i couldn't help him figure it out. then he drives past a do not enter sign, drives around the incoming traffic, then finally drops me off at my destination. i tried to talk to customer service and report the driver, but all they did was say "yeah, that sounds really scary." no offer of a refund, or at least discount. nothing. it was infuriating.
title: dangerous drivers.

review: ride times are completely unreliable and probably intentionally being understated so riders don't cancel. makes it impossible to accurately estimate how long something will really take, and made me late for appointments as a result. i'd love to see some transparency on the accuracy of time estimates made by lyft and uber. both are horribly understated in my experience, but if one company was more honest about this than the other i'd shift my business (and my company's business) there.
title: Ride times unreliable

review:
i have great experiences over all with lyft.  however, when i schedule rides to the airport drivers cancel repeatedly.  there is no way to give a driver a bad review for canceling.  i have almost missed multiple flights due to this.  

as i travel for business frequently this is a problem. might switch to uber if it keeps up.
title: Great except for rides to the airport.

review: i have used lyft twice today for the 1st time. my 1st driver dropped my pickup and then switched to another driver and the gps went off and never came back on, also went i sent communication to driver they did not respond. this afternoon i used lyft again. and again the gps kicked off and i could not follow my ride home. do not that this has happened makes me think this will be an ongoing problem.
title: GPS/maps

review:
i opened this app and wanna create an account to use it, but it needs my driver's licenseif i have a driver license if i know how to drive why i need to use the app for a ride??? i couldn't even get into the app. it shut me down as soon as i registered. i also searched online how to register, and deleted and re-downloaded the app but i was still required to provide my driver's license.
i don't know if it happened on other peoples phone but mine is wired
title: I can not register without a driver license

review: john was great getting us to our rental car off airport property! he waited patently while we got our rental car and moved the bags while my husband walked the car with the rental agent.  super nice and friendly.  so worth the lyft cost to save $1100 on our rental.
title: Great driver, very clean car

review: cab driver said that he can't take me to new hampshire from woburn (ma) when he arrived at the location as it is a different state and asked me to give the cash and he would cancel and take me to the location but he didn't cancel and now i am charged twice. i am trying to contact the customer care or complain from the app from two months but still couldn't find a way to reach, this is very bad considering the amount charged.
title: No customer care

review: yes i messaged danielle that i would not be taking the ride only my husband with me catching i left without me everything run smooth we had a great conversation everything is colleen easy drop off was as close as can be great ride all together
title: Amazing driver

review: this app is clearly stealing from drivers.  i rarely use this app & will not even use it for the destination option.  i gave a ride on july 6 which paid about $16 & lyft decided to only deposit $6 into my account.  after way too much energy was invested was customer service where they do nothing but waist your time. i figured i'd share this since nobody deserves to lose money & extra time working instead of actually getting paid!!!
title: Worst ever by far

review: my drive home from the airport was fabulous:))i do feel sorry for the drivers that they aren't getting an increase because of gas prices this may deter me from ordering future lyft's unless that changes!
title: Excellent service

review: last night when i planned my trip there was no notification it was confirmed and no way to contact anyone if the trip was confirmed.  i had an excellent driver and early this morning i was notified i had a planned drive.  last night was not able to change the actual address.  the pin moves when doing the app.  you really need to add a contact or confirmation for planned drives. thank you
title: Stress

review:
it's a pleasure being driven by a driver that isn't being exploited by uber

most of these guys do uber call too, but are happier when a lyft one comes along

who would call their company uber anyway? isn't the 3rd reich association enough to dissuade people.
title: So Much Better Than Uber

review: i've been a loyal customer to lyft for a year and some change now. i used to love riding with lyft until i got rated low for a lyft for i don't know what reason and they suspended my account for two days. lyft won't tell me why i was rated low or why i was suspended. i have never had any problems with my drivers, so much so i have a 4.9 rating. so for one low rating to cause my account to be suspended i am very disappointed with lyft. i will no longer be riding with lyft.
title: Don't waste your time

review: we were going to zuma restaurant in miami and the app gave me two options and i chose the one that said zuma restaurant and the address took us to a complete opposite area 15 min away from the correct address. and it charged me double the price for when we had to google the correct address and reroute the driver. it's a bit disappointing having to pay double for the app's mistake.
title: Wrong directions.

review: it's really discouraging using lyft when i have somewhere to be and suddenly i'm given a new driver and the wait time is almost doubled when i've already been waiting for my original driver.. this has made me late for work more times than i'm comfortable with especially when i'm in a situation where i don't have a vehicle of my own for an amount of time.
title: Often makes me late for work.

review:
my son was involved in a situation with a lyft driver that turned dangerous and we couldn't reach the driver. thankfully the authorities and apple came to our help, but because of lyft's zero phone customer care policy, the situation took much longer than it needed to. 

i will be using uber for all rides in the future. my family's safety is too important to risk for their insistence on not providing a customer support line. if you need help, do not expect lyft to be there for you.
title: Needed help in an emergency. Lyft failed.

review: it seems to me that my prices start to go up when i chip my drivers well so to avoid the situation i feel like i should start selling like tipping in cash but mine my ride rate should go up just because i chip well you got to take care of those to take care of you so i'm taking care of the people take care of me you gotta chip and well
title: Pricing

review: don't mess with this app they will rob you and some drivers will not take your account off their list just to over charge your account. download uber instead they're much cheaper and more efficient. trust that!
title: Will Rob You

review:
getting a ride isn't always hard, but when it is, the app is unforgiving. there's no way to talk to support. sometimes the drivers are the reason for ride cancellation and i can't even find somewhere to complain about what they did. 

seems like this company would rather ignore their customer needs because lyft/uber is in high demand in the 21st century. probably going down the tubes soon to be replaced by uber
title: Very inconsistent and hard to troubleshoot

review:
app says max wait time. once it passes the max wait time, it says wait time is busier than normal and then you wait indefinitely. you can't trust lyft for rides when it counts.

three trips in a row i tried to use it at lax-it. the app never connects you with a driver. i thought it was my phone and asked around s and found all people were sitting there waiting for a driver to connect. paid the higher price and got an uber ride almost immediately.
title: Deceitful and doesn't work at LAX

review: sometimes it takes up to an hour and a half for me to find a ride, even with several drivers out and about on the app. lyft shouldn't put a whole on the ride fee until a ride is found and confirmed. there's nothing quite like having a 3 day hold on a charge, but having never found a ride in the first place.
title: Should not charge until a ride is found

review: literally am searching 25+ min for a ride to work since this is my only transportation for the time being, and i'm always try to time everything to make sure i make it on time, but almost everyday, there's apparently no drivers in the area for me, and wants me to spend 20+ dollars just for 5-8 min drive, i've been late a good handful of times now because of this, either find hire more people, or shut down, cause this is very repetitive as of now
title: HORRIBLE AND UNPROFESSIONAL

review:
always waitting long for ride. always more expensive than uber. always drivers cancel ride a minute before they pick me up, after 10-20min wait for him to come. right now again, used wait&save option, waited for 25min to find driver, than waited another 9min. than a 1mim before driver was here, he canceled ride. then next one they gave me needed 19mim to come. still waitting for him. he maybe cancel too. and iam in downtown miami, nice weather at 3pm. 
etc etc etc. avoid.
title: Worst app ever

review:
my boyfriend and i rented a cabin up in blue ridge and misplaced our car keys! called lyft and asked him to go to our house and pick up the spare key (my neighbor set it outside for us) and then he drove over an hour to deliver it to us!!! he went above and beyond! all i can say is thank you! 
thank you so very much!!!!!!
title: Thank you Kevin!!

review: i've been both a driver and a passenger and it's always been the best rideshare app both ways. had an emergency with my child last night and lyft came through faster than emergency services when i called 911 first!
title: Best service

review: literally in a big city on the weekend something popped off and wasn't trying to be stuck out in the snow but they kept saying they're on their way lol smh for the 90 bucks for a 15 min ride be a little more accurate smh
title: Reliability

review: it's a little tricky scheduling a ride. you have to go through the set a pickup point window before you see the schedule ride option. might be better to offer scheduling up front.
title: Overall great except one suggestion for improvement

review:
my family first time in vegas and had horrible experiences with two vegas taxis. after that for three days all our lyft drives were 150% better in attitude, cleanliness, dependability, and responsibility.
thank you for quality standards being practiced!
title: Feeling safe

review: the app started over fine for about 2yrs now suddenly they charge me immediately after i purchase a ride and then again a few days later for the total amount of rides i've taken. i wouldn't mind getting charged either way but getting charged both ways i'm plus i'm getting double charged and i'm not settling for this app taking extra money from me.if y'all have it to spend then go ahead.
title: Over charging

review: easy to reserve a ride but no email confirmation showing the cost of the trip and not showing in the app either.  i was nervous that the correct amount would be charged.  uber always sends email confirm and shows in the app.
title: App Needs improvement

review: great app, however it seems to slow down and not be as functional when you need to do time sensitive things like stop you scooter ride from continuing. i have been off my scooter and trying to get the app to respond for over a minute. considering you are charged by the minute, this can be pretty expensive.
title: The App is Cool.

review: when you check the price before ride, it's very cheap, but after they charge you a lot. uber never do that. i will check uber prices before asking ride. lyft shows it's cheaper, but in the end they charge me more than uber. i use this app everyday recently, sometimes the same place is only 30usd, but this time they charge me 48,97usd. i also waiting there about 10 minutes for save some money. i just understood it. i quit it.
title: Don't use it! It's cheating.

review: if we have more drivers like him in this world more people would be safe and comfortable in there lyft in uber rides depending on others to get where they should be
title: Shut out to my driver he was very kind and friendly and caring

review: while i was on the airport a bus to my place was about 30 minutes from the current time. so i chose left. it showed that a driver would reach in eight minutes max. overall it took 16 minutes along with some search pricing. had i known the fact that lyft would show wrong driver time estimation i would have waited for the bus and just paid $2.25.
title: Incorrect driver estimation. Trying to fool customers

review: i chose the wait 15 minutes  for your driver option. the price was $24. i clicked on it, verified my card paid which took all of 15-30 seconds. the price had jumped to $33.  a $9 increase in seconds to check in.  it was not the savings that was listed. i couldn't have done it quicker. i believe that was really false advertising.
title: Todays Lyft

review: dave bmw x5, last 3 452 cancelled on me after waiting for 15 minutes.   as he got to the airport and was 3 min away.  he just dropped my pickup and then i had to start the process over again.  this is why i stopped using uber and will do the same if it keeps happening with lyft.  also there is no way for me to rate that driver since he didn't do the trip.  next driver was great 5 stars
title: Cancelled on me after 15 min wait

review: when using lyft you. we'd to consider that if they don't have a driver you have no one to call.  i set up a pickup a day before for getting to the airport!  i had set it up to leave at 4:30.  i didn't hear from the driver until 4:40 and he was 30 minutes away.  it wasn't his fault it was lyft and how they assign drivers.
title: Airport transportation

review: looks like everyone is cutting down on staff and replacing everyone with bots. despite having spent upwards of $10,000 usd on this platform, i am unable to reach customer support. i've sent 4 emails thus far through the span of two weeks  and i'm still waiting for a response. switching over to uber. i'd rather pay the extra $2-$5 for cab fairs, instead of risking loosing greater amounts, as is the case now, and not being able to get help.
title: Irresponsible costumer service

review: i have had multiple issues with the search function in the last week. it could not locate my office without rebooting my phone. today it was unable find the airport terminal and routed me to either the terminal i last used or the car rental drop off. it seems to require huge amounts of data for a search and cannot find places even if the exact address is used.
title: Search function is now broken

review: lyft is a very efficient app and it's gotten better throughout the years. they are always looking to improve the app by making it user-friendly and intuitive. highly recommend! bravo!
title: Great service app

review: if i could give them no stars i would. app is so poorly maintained. there will be more than a handful of drivers in any area. what makes it so hard that they can't get someone who is 5-10 minutes away.? normally the drivers just sit in the same spot and wait for the big money / more important rides. it's just annoying especially if you are trying to get to work and it takes them over an hour to send you an uber/lyft .
title: Uber/Lyft

review: i had an issue with a ride that did not arrive despite charging me and the delay caused my trip to require a ride to airport instead of public transit. i feel that lyft should have to refund me the cost of this ride since it was only due to the delay that i needed to spend so much money on a ride all the way to the airport in the first place.
title: Non responsive

review: if you accidentally leave your cellular phone associated with your account in the lyft it is impossible to get in touch with lyft to find out where your phone is, it's impossible to get in touch with the driver as well without the phone associated with your account you are screwed. they have no customer service whatsoever and i am never using lyft again because i cannot reach anyone to find out how to get my cellular phone back!
title: Lost cell phone in lyft ride

review: driver was very polite and knowledgeable of the area. he did a great job making us feel comfortable and answering any questions we had. we would recommend using him to anyone using this service especially any tourist here visiting!
title: Great driver!!

review: 10 star rating with a 5 star cutoff! wow  thank you for beginning this venture!! i've been a loyal customer and because you're loyal. your drivers (yes to i rent cars a lot) are outstanding! the vehicles are well maintained, and smell amazing.
title: 10 stars but half the credit.

review: the drivers are good (and often the same people as uber), but pray you don't need any help or interaction with the company. they only send form emails and ignore most complaints/questions. it's been many months and they still didn't address a pricing issue i've tried to deal with repeatedly. shameful. otherwise i'd use the app more, but i'm afraid i might get screwed over.
title: Good drivers, but the WORST customer service.

review: i haven't had a car for a few months and have been using uber regularly. i used to use lyft a lot and decided to see if there was a price difference, because a few years ago lyft was sometimes cheaper than uber. so i downloaded the app (despite every back to back bad review i read) and oh yeah there was a huge price difference. to get to where i needed to go, uber was going to charge me $22, where lyft was going to charge me $47!! what a joke! i'll stick with uber, thanks!!
title: Lyft is a scam!

review: what is the point of waiting and saving just to be charged just as much as a regular ride or save $.50 .? lyft is getting just as bad as uber.. i chose the wait and save option just to wait over an hr to save .80 when they wait was originally supposed to only be 15-20 mins.. i might as well spend the $2-5 extra for uber..
title: Wait & Save

review: in the years and especially our most recent trip the drivers/ entrepreneurs have been punctual, friendly and knew where they were going. we also appreciate lyft corporate is apolitical.
title: All great drivers

review: came in to airport in the winter evening, two pick up rides canceled! where they dropped off my lyft app picked me up. easy set up and a quick pick up with a good driver made the trip home much better.
title: When Friends let you down; Lyft picks you up!

review:
1. only a few of the shortcuts appear as destination options. must re-enter location options over again. 
2. some valid addresses in midtown manhattan are unrecognized by the app. another car service such as uber must be selected.
title: Shortcuts Don't Appear as Destination Options

review: i do not like lyft because it is very slow and very unreliable. it tells me a period of time and my rides always come after that. i have been late to my destination 2 times. i only use because it is cheaper than uber but this is horrible. also, my drivers always get lost and get sent the back way to my apartments, (back gate that doesn't work/never opens).
title: Can Never Get A Ride On Time!

review: my driver is insane! he apologized for the wait because and i quote was at the house chilling told me i couldn't sit behind him because he freaks out when people sit behind him i'm a female at 125lbs soaking wet. okay bro.. not to mention throwing his hands up at other drivers on the road multiple times. rage much? this is absolutely unacceptable. i'll pay the extra $5 next time and take uber. way better service. dont waste your time or safety on lyft. beware of mark in the white hyundai accent.
title: Not that Lyft cares but I'd rather make it there late than dead.

review: cars in the shop and i needed to get to work early in the city. competitor app told me it was $50 ride with no available drivers. my lyft was more than half the price and i was able to get to work in time.
title: Saved my morning.

review: beware.  lyft is a helpful app until you need customer service.  i was charged $5 when a driver could not find me at the airport.  i called him.  he didn't know where he was.  it was hopeless.   i cancelled the ride and ordered another and the next driver found me in the same location without issue.  i explained this in multiple emails to customer service and they basically insinuated that i was lying and still took the fee.
title: Disappointing Customer Service

review:
it has become impossible to plan on arriving anywhere on time with lyft. it isn't a driver problem. no matter if i wait or request a ride immediately, i'm left waiting longer than 20min for a ride, ballooning my travel time an extra 45mins most of the time. 
drivers constantly cancel after i've waited the 25 mins and then i'm left waiting more time for the next driver. waiting saves you a few cents.
title: Truly awful service quality

review: appreciate driving with lyft as a passenger because i am able to spend time doing other things while someone else takes care of the driving. i can always trust on lyft!
title: Lyft really helps me save time and relax.

review:
used to love lyft. but like uber, now that everyone uses them, they've tried to capitalize by jacking their prices, and the service has gotten worse too. scheduled rides can never be counted on.

last i used them, they showed a price and jacked it the moment i clicked on it it wasn't like i left the app idle. if there is low supply of cars, i guess they just see what they can get away with.

not gonna work in the long-term, lyft: you're gonna lose customers.
title: No good anymore

review: i had been using uber for years and then one time they didn't have any car's near me so i called lyft and they have been great. last night i ordered a car for 7:00 am. the car was here at 7:06. perfect, really nice drivers. lyft is 100 %
title: Review

review: i'm not from atl and me and my son got lost and didn't know our correct hotel name and he could have just left us out here and chose to help and get us home safe , thank you he is 11 and was scared being out there lost
title: Guy was awesome!

review: this was the first time my wife and i used the lyft app. it was easy to use. and it was especially nice to be able to track where the driver was coming from.  and we were very impressed with the cleanliness of the vehicle.
title: First time ever

review:
after placing my bags and  myself in the lift car, i was greeted with great conversation.  we related on awesome interested which made me forget about my long working day. upon arriving at my destination he waited to make sure i enter into the apartment building. i felt blessed. 

katrina
title: Walmart Ride

review: i don't have a car. lyft is my #1 way around and i can tell you it is trash! as someone who has seen this app shift and change i can say it has only gotten worse. leaving you stranded, waiting for as long as an hour for a ride, drivers cancelling last minute, the app switching drivers on you constantly. at this point the prices aren't the issue it's the inconsistency. i'd rather be in debt with a car payment then deal with this
title: TRASHHHH! I've been using Lyft for YEARSS

review: i had an hour delay and no solution to getting from the airport to my destination. it wasn't until i changed drivers did i get one that arrived at the airport an hour later. i missed my appointment for my business meeting which is the reason why i arrived here in miami. it sabotaged my opportunity and now it's gone. the rest of my stay in miami is pointless. this messed up a career opportunity of a lifetime for mesmh.
title: Delays

review: i think you should try to pair the driver up better with the rideri get drivers that speak no english at all and than my ride gets canceled..due to lack of communication that's when things become a problemi have to wait to find another driverhe comes in 10-15 mins and now i'm late for workit's very sickening
title: Drivers

review:
wanted to figure out door to door travel time by train down to baltimore 
booked lyft an hour before planned 10 15 am time to depart
driver arrived almost to the minute although there was a fifteen minute window
good driver and smooth drive
great experience
title: Trip to penn station newark

review:
lyft has fully signed on to the you only use us cause we are cheap business model. 

just so bad. no customer service-literally lol- like they don't have a way to speak to anyone in customer service and if the customer people actually talk at you-i say at you cause they just choose whether or not to respond to the complaint ahaha, it's not a traditional convo. they then have the option to close all communication lol. 

the list of bad things done to me and my friends on behalf of lyft is endless lol. i deleted it for ages but had to redownload it to avoid a 40 dollar uber that was 16 dollars on lyft *shrug* 

i mean, they are cheap
title: Lyft has fully signed on to the you only use us cause we are cheap business model

review: love the convenience of the app on my phone and anywhere i travel i have the convenient of booking a superb ride and don't have to worry about have the right cash.  all handled on phone and i can follow on the map to see where we are!
title: Love Lyft

review: i have been taking car services for many years, and lyft is by far one of the best services i have ever used. the drivers are courteous, friendly and the cars are clean. i highly recommend.
title: Lyft service and drivers

review:
keep the good work. your drivers deserve a bonus and appreciate. it's not all peaches and cream any more out there on the streets. i think the company should also come up with a way to protect the drivers and how to handle  infuriated  costumers as well. thank you for everything and getting me
there safe. 
candice
title: Lyft

review: what a breath of fresh air today with this upbeat, energetic driver. she was dedicated to making my experience perfect while in her car. i would love to see laura arrive every time i schedule a lyft ride. thank you for engaging such a delightful professional to represent lyft in albuquerque.
title: Laura was excellent !

review: easier app with options to save money if you can wait a bit longer for a ride. plenty of options for extra stops
title: App easier to use than Uber

review: app is useful, and i use it a lot, but they have some of the worst customer service i have ever experienced. there's no way to talk to anyone on the phone because all of their multiple phone numbers tell you to request help online, then cut the line. then, when you do, it's like the agents are trained to copy-and-paste templates blindfolded because they just repeat themselves without responding to anything in your request. absolute clownery.
title: Customer Service

review: i have had the best ride , a very good conversationalist person and very polite .  i'm saying this because she made me very comfortable for this morning long ride .  thank you  once again . beautiful individuals are always needed she lifted my spirit.
title: Morning commute

review: great overall drivers . have been having a little problem lately with drivers canceling the pick up and then have to wait for another driver . also , the rates have increased  ..
title: Performance

review: stars lined up today and driver arrived in one minute from requesting on app. though it was only a couple miles back to home , he knew area and driving was smooth. dialog was friendly and driver spoke fluent english.
title: Quick Lyft pick up

review: for a client over 85 driver should blow horn in addition to texting because we old people expect more than a text my bags were at the front door let up and our phone did not vibrate you have a bad policy to rely on text for old people.  cancel my five dollars fine. i think driver changed her mind and never came at all because of distance.
title: Wait time fine driver option bad

review:
the prices that are currently in chicago are outrageous. what are you doing as a company to change the working conditions and help people find incentive and pride for ride sharing with you? 

how do you treat your employees the drivers on the ground? 

$50 for a normally 12$ ride is offensive. i have no reason to continue using this app and will try to support local unibodies cab drivers that you and uber have put out of business. this is total trash capitalism.
title: Prices are outrageous

review: after ordering i received a text that my car and driver were changed, but the app still showed the original car and driver. so i immediately canceled. how can i know that lyft made the change if the info in the app didn't change?  and trying to contact them to find out, was impossible.  i will never let my family use lyft again. for all i knew i would have gotten into the wrong car.
title: Serious safety issue

review: can you please make the drop off destinations available to drivers before they elect to take the fare? tonight is the 3rd time i've been late bc of drivers dropping the fare after having originally accepting it. this means longer than anticipated pick up times & me being late.
title: Please make drop off locations available to drivers!

review: i've used lyft for.a few years now and can't say a bad thing about the service i've received. i go to this service first! prices are fair, drivers have always been prompt, and cars clean!
title: Reliable, nice drivers, clean cars

review: tonight my family and i were stranded at the airport at 10:30pm as lyft changed drivers on us three times. we had paid extra for an early pickup and after all the changes, we should have been offered our express money back. it's such a frustrating feeling to not feel in control of your trip home. taxi anyone?
title: Great drivers, frustrated with company

review: i generally like your app and i am able to edit my trip etc. however, many drivers keep calling me asking where am i going or just cancel on me half way meeting me. this is super annoying, please do something about it. driver education? reward system? a better ux for both end is much needed
title: Driver keep canceling on my trip

review: i have been charged twice for the same ride and it has happened to me more than once. they never reversed the overcharge. what on earth gives them the right to charge someone twice for the same ride? this should be illegal. there is no option to send them a message and discuss the issue. the help section in their app is misleading and does not correspond with the question/problem. i do not recommend lyft.
title: Charged twice for a ride

review: i have been using lyft for over 5 years , loyal customer i recently had an incident happened with a driver that discriminated toward me and my co worker.. he was very rude and called the police on us.. we ended up getting out on a corner and was still charged for the ride.. lyft did absolutely nothing to resolve the problem.. i have sent so many emails and have gotten nowhere.. i will never use lyft again!
title: Not happy

review: lyft really has the best customer service. i've had issues with rides before and with accidental purchases and they are always super understanding if you contact them within a reasonable timeframe.
title: Stellar Customer Service

review: lyft shld give driver's a sense how far they are going instead of not telling them anything. i was put in tough spot scrambling to find a second driver after first guy cancelled bc he didn't want to drive to airport.  there is no where on lyft help section to make this comment. only can make specific comments on particular driver but not those who cancelled on you. the system is flawed. this shortfall needs to be addressed.
title: First driver cancelled after he learned I wanted to go to airport

review: it's not fair that we get charged when we cancel a ride but why don't we get a discount or compensation when the driver cancels the ride before we get to their car? i've had this happen so many times it's a waste of time. you guys need to fix this
title: Ride cancellation

review: i use lyft almost everyday and today i was left stranded because they decided to all of a sudden out the blue demand a picture of my drivers license i was left walking in a very scary neighborhood in the  scourching heat i'm really upset about this when you depend on a service it should be there when you need it most and i know i need to get uber now
title: Stranded

review:
i've been using lyft for years. two years ago there was an incident with a driver who was touching himself inappropriately while driving me home. i called lyft and y'all did nothinggggggg!! they just hung up every time i called. 

lyft should offer the option of picking a male or female drivers!!! i don't know if y'all even offer background checks but if not, y'all need to start!! anybody with a valid license can work for lyft. 

seriously, y'all need to do better as a company and app!
title: Lyft Options

review: i ordered a ride and it was canceled. i went to customer service to see if they could help. first there was no number i could call because my issue is not one of the normal or suggested issue. so i waited in the text customer support. i waited for 30 min for some to ask me how are you i answer immediately and had to wait again for someone to reply. waited another 30 min and still no one had replied.
title: Horrible customer service

review:
thanks for sending me your friendliest hard working driver. he showed up in time. very professional and helpful. he didn't leave drive way until we were completely in the house.
thank you again . mr t2022
title: Great driver

review:
after today's update the app will not even launch even after a reboot of the iphone.

update. after 24hr of posting my review lift update the app and it's now working. thank you
title: Last update-FIXED next day- QUICK!

review: i always appreciate having some quiet time to catch up on texts and phone calls as a passenger. i really do appreciate when the radio is not blasting or there's much conversation. hahaha he was kind and polite and just all around, a great driver.
title: So nice!

review: 90% of my experiences with lyft have been excellent !!! i like it better than uber because it's less expensive for the same service. everyone has been courteous for the most part. i'm thankful i don't have to take a yellow taxi cab these days !!!
title: LYFT

review: ordered a taxi. writes to wait 5 minutes. twice the drivers canceled the trip after 10 minutes. in total i waited 30 minutes for a taxi. worst taxi ever. i could walk home myself for this war ...
title: Worst taxi ever

review: hi everyone, i've been waiting for more than an hour for a ride. the lyft app does not allow a way to call for help, and i guess they have no reason to. if i'd known that i would wait for more than an hour while all of your drivers cancelled on me i would have taken a cab and saved a lot of time. lyft, i know you're business model is based on algorithms and all of that, but you really messed up this time with a real human.
title: From the Side of the Road

review: i had a driver that asked me for extra money. for the bags that i had. i said that i am not going to paid.  just the ride. then he started driving crazy and extremely rude.  then he finished and then i see an $80 fee on top of my ride fare.  i tried to complained to lyft but they would not listen and did not refund me my money.  never even told me about what damages no proof.  do not use lyft.  this is really disappointing.  this is a clear retaliation.
title: Driver charges damages for no Reason

review: lyft is a great thing to have. my children coaxed me into using it because i had to stop driving due to health issues i am a senior. this took away my sense of freedom. many srs. will not use public trans. lyft should offer certain times with lower fees for srs. to go to places to get out the house.
title: To make Lyft better

review: lyft app far more user friendly than uber.  drivers reliable, friendly, safe and cars are clean with all safety features present and operational.  go with lyft over uber any chance you get.
title: Reliable service; easy to use app

review: i landed in palm beach airport florida selected my lyft ride, the app selected the wrong pick up location a few miles from where i was at arrivals. i tried using the app to change the pick up location it would not let me. i text the driver and tried to call the driver. he did not respond. i was charged five dollars because your app selected my incorrect current location. please refund my five dollars. thank you and have a great day!
title: Wrong Pick up location

review: loli was running late but i didn't care. it turns out she was driving someone's dog to an er but not many are open. no other drivers would help this woman get her animal to er but loli did and she's amazing for that. i'm happy to have been driven home by an exceptional human.
title: Stellar people exist

review: i would recommend robert any time. his customer service skills are excellent, i felt safe, he was a safe driver, we had good conversation, positive attitude.  i would ride with him again.
title: Robert is the nicest man, safe driver, friendly, great customer service skills.

review: i'm sorry to say that my ride to sixt to pick up my rental care was not pleasant. driver honking his horn at every stop, then left me at the wrong address, huge parking garage,  had to walk all around the building after asking several people where sixt was, when he could have easily dropped me at 20 morris as was specified.
title: Honking the horn a LOT/ Left at Wrong Address

review:
my lyft driver was on time! very polite and knowledgeable, walking me through the proceedings of my very first ride, paul has opened my awareness to the opportunity of being of service to others by becoming a dependable lyft driver.
thank you for a very pleasant early morning ride.
title: Maiden Voyage

review: constantly having to wait 45+ minutes for a ride. it use to be you saved if you scheduled ahead now it's nearly double the price of a wait and save. they said they had a car for me so i got ready and was waiting by the door and all of a sudden my ride is gone and i'm stuck waiting over an hour for a ride. please don't show us a car & driver if they aren't going to be the ones to get us.
title: Save & wait & wait & wait

review: just used the app once thus far but praying and hoping my information isn't compromised. i was originally using uber but my account was compromised...hoping this one is better!
title: So far awesome! I have had all nice drivers and I'm thankful!

review: a lot of times the driver will show up and leave in a minute or two minutes or go to the wrong address.   then i'm charged five dollars or something- which has nothing to do with the lyft company i understand but it difficult to contact the company easily to remedy the situation or to get a reimbursement. it feels like theyare unreachable on purpose
title: Lyft is ok...but

review:
used to be that you could be anywhere and get a ride for a fair price within minutes. now it is common to request a driver be told you'll be picked up in ten or less minutes only to be told five minutes later the driver has cancelled and your new wait is a half an hour. plus, can't cancel or you'll be charged a cancellation fee. 
this app (and others like it) have made me like taxis again.
title: Used to be good

review:
i entered a local promo for a free ride in the app yesterday for a ride tonight. was getting ready to head out and saw the promo disappeared with no history of use. tried to find customer service to chat with and there's no number or chat box. this is unacceptable.

*edit* found a round about way to get a hold of customer service only to get the run around and no resolution for the bug that prevented use of the promo i wanted to use.
title: No Customer Service and Bugged Promo

review: it's not the app, per se.  it's the garbage people they hire.  utterly useless drivers who can't read a map, can't find landmark buildings, take 25 minutes to make a u-turn and come back 100 yards, park on opposite sides of streets or behind buildingsthese people are too stupid for words.  i've never wasted so much time waiting for idiots and losers to show up the way uber does.  i guess i'm stuck with them (which is at least functional)  talk about pathetic.
title: Absolutely worthless

review: we pre ordered 2 vehicles. my wife ordered one from her phone and i ordered one from my phone. they both showed up on time and they both did there best to get us to the airport on time. we had a 4:00am pick up.
title: On time

review: pedro is a fabulous driver! he was so kind to help me with the luggages and even put them in the trolley for me! an awesome service truly! kindness should always be rewarded! take care and happy holidays!!!! thanks again for a fantastic service!!!! you're one of the jedis :)!
title: Beyond amazing service!!!

review: love this app! but it would be great if while waiting you could switch your ride request from a wait and pay less to i want it now and i'll pay full price.
title: Great but one suggestion

review: wonderfully polite and welcoming for my first time doing lyft , i've never done this before and was nervous , but it was so amazing and easy to use app and locate driver. super clean car and great driving ! glad i downloaded this app .
title: My first experience using Lyft

review: if you're looking for an affordable and reliable car service i recommend you download this app and try it for yourself! great service! (fast) affordable prices (cheap) i give it a 100%
title: Great car service!

review: gracias for a super clean car, nice clean music and a safe ride to my destination. it was well appreciated. i recognized jorge from a previous ride and would like to specify him on future rides. i feel safe with him behind the wheel. thank you.
title: Huge thanks to Jorge

review: as a frequent user i'd say lyft these days have a lot more reliable drivers than uber. price is most of the time cheaper, and drivers don't cancel on u at will. keep up lyft!
title: Way more reliable drivers than Uber these days

review: i used to love lyft. but over the past year i've noticed that wait times are consistently longer than what the app initially reports. sometimes i watch the driver in their car on the map not move for literally ten minutes before starting in my direction. it's made me really frustrated and i don't really feel like using them anymore.
title: Wait times are inaccurate

review: lyft markets booking in advance and locking in the rate. i booked a lyft at the airport for my spouse after midnight. the driver was not there, picked up another passenger, and billed me for the lyft. after some hassle, lyft refunded the fare. however, my spouse had to book another lyft at a much higher fare. lyft has refused to honor the rate booked in advance. clearly bait and switch.  i have never had this problem with uber and wingz. i suggest you bring your business elsewhere. i certainly will be.
title: Bait & Switch and Stranded at Airport

review: it was supposed to come at 5:20 and the dude canceled it and i got fed up and canceled the ride for the other person can i get my refund
title: Can I get my refund I didn't even go on the ride because y'all made me made late to work

review: my lyft driver was so helpful in a crisis situation. my friend has cancer and isn't all there. it takes a minute for him to gather his thoughts and things and get to the car. he was gracious and thoughtful and helped us out. thank you beyond words . god bless you.
title: Beyond grateful

review: her driver was pleasant to be around, he had a clean car and wonderful driving skills. he was very friendly. he was on time to get us. i love the ability to schedule ahead of time!
title: Wonderful experience

review:
i came home from the airport from a long business trip at night. tried to grab a lyft. my first driver, ciro picked me up and found out i was going to springfield from dca and kicked me out. took my luggage out of the trunk stating he would only get paid $15 to drive me. 

 my other driver was amazing. and brought my view of the company higher.
title: Long Business trip

review: my driver was excellent and quite easy to talk to as was the other rider. it was enjoyable to learn about his culture. it cost me about 2 extra minutes and i learned a lot from somebody i'd never have met otherwise.
title: Ride sharing was great

review: i had a horrible day. missed a flight, rerouted all over, and got home 14 hours after i was supposed to. i just wanted to go home, and there was gaspar. he ended my suffering with friendly chat and good humor. thank you, gaspar
title: Late night airport run

review: i have not used lyft in a long time as i use it only while traveling, so my credit card needed to be updated. i put in my destination, called my son to verify i was doing it correctly and a minute later the price was higher. then my credit card needed updating and after doing that the price again had increased. so i'm less than 3 minutes the price went up 3 dollars.. feels quite usury! like ha, gotcha! felt bad!
title: Price increase by the minute!

review:
truth be told it's a good feeling when you know there is people whom go through more than you can imagine but are still good people thank you lyft for the great experience & more too come.
m
title: Happy original grateful acknowledge people

review:
you made me wait longer then the 15min window when there were cars all around me waiting to be assigned passengers during the entire window and instead of assigning me one of them which i know weren't waiting for anyone, you assigned me a driver who was ten minutes away completing another trip who ended up canceling my fare and making me wait even longer.  
i should get refunded my fare.  you charge us if we cancel you.
title: I'd like a refund please.

review: it's been nearly 2 years since my last lyft service, christian was so professional, punctual and a great conversationalist. i only hope i will meet with him again on my next trip. kudos to lyft for hiring such a talented individual
title: Best first experience

review: drivers need better directions to pick people up at dfw. often new drivers go in circles and it is agonizing to watch them.
title: Drivers need better directions to pick up customers at DFW

review:
30% of time: works great 70%: bugs come up in the driver-rider matching process. does it make sense to make a rider wait another 10 mins when they waited 10 minutes already for driver to cancel?? it's very frustrating when this happens, especially when i have to get to work... drivers get rides in the opposite direction? 

what an awful app and terrible inconvenience it causes. i used to take lyft every day for work - not anymore.
title: Very Buggy

review: they charge your card and comes back and charge it again ! i recently just start paying my lyft through cash app so i could see how many times and how much they are actually robbing me for ! they charge a final amount at the end of the day and also take the money off the card. i'm sorry but i'm letting lyft go ! on top of that after booking the rides priced fluctuates and i'm charged even more! sticking to uber !
title: Consistently Charging My CARD!

review: my ride costs 6 dollars on average, only a 5 mile ride. they want $16 dollars now for the same ride. i get that there might not be as many drivers, but when they are only paying them less than 25% of each ride, why would it suddenly charge me more? pay your drivers more lyft! and quit trying to charge me so much for a short ride. late to work because i dont have the money to pay for this.
title: Lyft is artificially inflating ride prices

review: uber deactivated my account after 25+ rides and receiving 5 star ratings from each of my drivers.  never received any explanation.  also lyft takes about 5 minutes less to find me a driver.
title: You Lyft me up

review: i scheduled the more expensive ride to guarantee i would make it to my bus on time. the estimated arrival time kept increasing until it was 10 minutes later than what i paid for. i had no choice but to cancel because i would no longer make it there on time. i was charged a fee for wasting the driver's time yet they never even ended their last job and they weren't driving in my direction. i want my money back.
title: Not impressed.

review: i had a bad experience on january 12th. the driver, joseph, either did not hear or speak english.  he didn't understand where i was going and was planning to drive me right down the street.  i got out of his car immediately but i have been charged for this non ride!!  i am very displeased with this experience and wish to be credited.
title: Bad experience

review: in crowded places must keep a look out for your car. sometimes other side of the street. otherwise great and almost always cheaper, cleaner, better service than cabs.
title: App is easy to follow

review: i don't have many to call on for a ride at the last minute but i can always depend on lyft to send someone and the vehicle is clean and comfortable. the drivers are always nice and respectful. thanks for your service to the community
title: I love this app
