review: lyft makes it impossible to contact them regarding issues especially when it comes to drivers cancelling rides, starting rides without being picked up, or drivers marking that they have arrived and are not actually at your location. this is my second issue in a week and i am absolutely done with using this ride app. i used to only use lyft and now i am switching to uber.
title: System and Customer service issues

review: our driver was an old gentleman, he was down to earth very pleasant, once we got in to the car he was so calm that the atmosphere felt serene. when we got to the airport i didn't feel stress anymore. he was really cool!
title: Our last driver-can't remember his name

review: lyft has now reached the point where they're just openly scamming people. prices fluctuate within seconds (always going up, of course). they're often at least 50% more than uber's prices, especially if you have lyft pink. unless you want to wait 10-20 minutes you now have to pay more.  what a shady company. i'm a longtime user (over 600 rides) but i've decided to delete the app and just use uber. great job destroying all your consumer goodwill lyft.
title: Straight-up scammy now

review: my driver was so friendly and nice and his car was supposedly clean and i really enjoyed the short trip but lots of talk about fascinating things. if you get a chance to have him as your driver you'll be very lucky.
title: Super Smooth ride.

review: kirk was absolutely wonderful !  so friendly and ride was smooth.  got here on time !  this is my first ride with a driving service and i am not disappointed.  hope i'll be able to request him next time i'm in co. thanks kirk
title: Best Driver

review: a driver did not arrive to pick me up yet he stopped a block away said he had and drove to the drop off location with with out me while i was reporting what he was doing. the reporting system has a selection of problems all of which would make it the rider fault and no narrative selection to address the issue. a driver lied on another trip and there was no way to address the false accusation. lyft hires morally corrupt people and protects them.
title: Liters and thieves

review:
he hung up on me before we could clarify anything. very very frustrating. 

second driver was perfect. you can see my review and ask him any questions as well
title: Had huge language problem w first driver - named Massoud

review: i will sue if i am scammed out of any money. the fact that you can't delete a card off of payment methods is not okay at all. any other driving app you can due so. please update this issue. i don't have a problem using lyft but that's a major concern.
title: Update payment methods

review: love the the covienance on time pinpoint pick up compared to the old conventional ways of calling waiting or flagging down cabs or worst showing the driver the route cause they dont know where your going lol that was the worst back in the days
title: Love the easiness

review: i'm a disabled person and i use a cane to walk, i asked the driver to leave me on the side of the street where my destination was and right away he said no , i wasn't asking him to go out of his way.
title: Very surprised with the Drivers  Attitude

review:
no only is this ride sharing service complete crap, they are trying to swindle california citizens by spending millions to put proposition 30 on the ballot. this shady initiative raises taxes, promising to improve wildfire control in order to sucker people in supporting it, while the vast majority of the money will be used to subsidize lyft by paying for electric vehicles for their drivers!

yes, that's right.lyft is spending millions to force ca taxpayers to pay to support lyft!

i will never take a lyft ride again.
title: Don't support this crooked company!

review: i don't understand why we're only given a little sliver of the map showing updates of the drivers' location. it's completely frustrating trying to keep their car in view. please fix this obvious flaw.
title: Map for tracking the driver is too small

review: i have always been an uber person, but because of a recent re-boot of a rideshare program harris county has teamed up with lyft through united way once more. this morning- my ride was punctual, knowledgeable, and funny to boot! thank you ashley- and thank you lyft!!!
title: Ashley is a Winner!!

review: i love lyft! every ride and driver has been an awesome experience. i prefer lyft over any other means if transportation. the company itself has shown more compassion and empathy for passengers and drivers. every chance i get, i recommend lyft over the other service hands down.
title: Ms. Kaye

review: this app has helped me out in so many different ways very very good app thank you for all your hard work and making this possible so i can get from one place to another
title: Go go

review:
i was a little nervous calling for a lift after midnight. my driver put me right at ease! he was wonderful! we had great conversation,  he was informative, professional and was a great driver!
i felt like i had a new friend! thank you so much! highly recommend!
title: Kristen

review:
great app! but it always takes longer than what the app tells you for the driver to come pick you up! 
example your driver will be there in 7 minutes. i have been waiting for 15
title: Great app but the time to pick up is always wrong

review:
your app is atrocious. i've been waiting for 10 minutes for prices to go somewhere not even far from where i'm located and have received nothing. it's definitely not my service nor my wifi and seems like there is no way to contact y'all through the app for customer service.
still can't log in into my account and haven't got an answer as to why my account won't go through so i can get a ride.
title: Trashy

review:
it thought that lyft pink would be a good idea given how often i use ride sharing to get to and from work. perhaps i was wrong.

drivers can give negative feedback to lyft causing lyft to revoke your access to ridesharing for one day so that you can review community guidelines.

how am i supposed to know what community guidelines weren't followed if lyft doesn't tell me? moreover, why aren't i alerted to this sooner so that i can course correct? i am paying for lyft pink - an annual service that provides discounted lyft rides. i have an incentive to change behavior. so now, i'm a whole day off lyft and have to use another shared ride platform to get to work - forfeiting the benefit of lyft pink membership.

ridiculous.
title: How am I supposed to know what community guidelines weren't followed?

review: i was an exclusive lyft user and rarely considered their competitors. lately, lyft has abandoned me in times of need. i waited for one hour at the denver airport as i watched the app assign me a driver, than drop that driver only to wait longer to see another drop. two weeks later and i'm experiencing the same thing. i will continue to stay away.
title: Going downhill

review: i used to use lyft all the time because it was cheaper but it's not anymore. it's more expensive and the wait times/arrival times are so incorrect that it causes a really big inconvenience when you're trying to be somewhere on time. it doesn't help that drivers tend to cancel rides often. i've had a driver literally pull up to my house and drive away while i was on the curb waiting for them. lyft needs a serious overhaul.
title: Jumping to Uber

review:
last friday morning from midnight until 630am i saw that the app was running on my phone the entire time based off of the screen time. 

i'm not sure what is going on, if they received a security breech or what because i don't even have the app downloaded on my phone to begin with. it's been deleted for a good couple years. 

something shady is going on there. be careful
title: App is running on my phone and I don't even have it

review: after a surgery today, i experienced a very patient driver for the special situation,i get in and get off the car so slow,cynthia drove slowly i didn't feel the hurt on wound,thank you so much!!!
title: Special taking care

review: easy to use app, map showing where driver was, photo and license plate info, safe and friendly driver, clean comfortable car. the excellent experience could not have been any better. five stars!!! when i need a lift i will use lyft.
title: My First Lyft

review: just got switched from a driver that was 1 minute away from my pickup spot to a driver that was 11 minutes away. initial driver passed by me, i saw a car and a plate. then second driver disappeared, and now i'm waiting on a third driver. i don't have issue with system adjusting rides but how does this makes sense. i'm going to switch to professional drivers, they seem cheaper and more available then lyft playing games
title: Lyft is becoming worse every day

review: lyft has always been great to me.  great prices. sometimes a little erratic, but i love them ! they make me happy and i've been using them for years. don't play with me again and you have a custom for for life.
title: Just go with them.

review:
i'm not sure if he knew how to speak english or not.
we were speaking to him & he just didn't answer at all!  sukarno was the worst driver i have ever experienced. we said hello & thanked him for picking us up, no response from him.  then he tried dropping us off at the wrong location.  we had to tell him our hotel was just a little further.  drivers i would think should know how to speak & understand english.
title: Sunkanmi was the worst ride I have ever had with Lyft

review:
wonderful that you can contact the driver . problem: it says 5 minutes - then 9 minutes then 7 minutes then another 8 minutes then another 9 minutes - etc - so your 5 minutes ends up being 45 minutes! lousy system!! 
    
same problem. the phone says 7 minutes and it turns into 50 minutes. horrible!!
title: Lyft

review: excuse me!  me always wear mask. i have mine on all times.  it's your 58 ur old driver who picked me up and took off his mask.  don't go after me for wearing mask.  lyft you loosing customers this way.  will blast you all the way on social media.  don't threatened me cause your driver took mask and says that i am not wearing it.  i have mine on all the way home. i take off when door is shut. blasting you all over social media tell people not to use lyft!
title: Lyft has hatred to people who uses them

review: lyft is a scam. their drivers don't even know english and provide awful service. there is no i'm sorry so drop it. i took a lyft drive to my interview at goodwill which is 9 minute drive from where i live and once i get to the place; i'm hearing from my lyft driver asking me, how long will i be. i paid for the service to go to my interview and back home. instead, my driver is complaining and rushing me while also having poor navigation. horrible!
title: Horrible services

review: the last 5 times i've used lyft it seems like the app either has failed to update their gps or just not coordinated with sporting events. drivers either cancel because roads are closed (even though the app navigation shows they're open) or there's too much traffic. i've even had drivers call to tell me they've moved without them even realizing the app has already transferred me to another driver.
title: Cancelled on

review: the app keeps saying they are finding a ride and it will only be 6-5 minutes....it's been over and hour and keeps saying the same thing. poor management of app and drivers. fix it, and at least tell us the truth which that you won't be getting a ride and you should find alternate transportation. thanks for a waste of time.
title: For almost 1 hour the app has said I'm next in line and to wait 5 minutes...

review: this app is incredibly bad, i've paid priority multiple times and always still get rides that take 15-20 minutes to show up when i need to be somewhere. sometimes i'll have a ride that's close by and it'll change my driver to someone significantly further and say it's finding the closest ride. this application is bad, and i will be switching to uber asap. i've always been a loyal lyft customer and i'm disgusted as of recently.
title: Poor Algorithms

review: thank you for taking our friends home. we had 5 rides cancel on us and you took the ride and got everyone home safe and sound. thank you very much.
title: Trustworthy and professional

review: i do t get it i took a lyft on december 8 twice coming and going ride and when i went to get a lyft service on december 9 there saying that my payment method has to change i do y get it also i have been trying to get a hold of a support personnel and had no success can some one assist me i really love the service but it's hard to contact support when you need it..
title: Payment issues

review: turned the lyft app on and it said that the driver was 5 minutes away but when i chose the driver, the time jumped to 15 minutes.  even the driver committed that she was selected from from an odd distance.  other than that the ride was wonderful.
title: Time change

review: had to cancel several lyfts due to driver not showing up timely.  two drivers wanted to put me out at the wrong location, despite me telling them it was wrong.  i was late to two meetings because of late arrival by the drivers despite my timely bookings. asking company to go back to uber.
title: Need to teach drivers better

review: this app is horrible. i exited the app for a few minutes and when i came back, prices went from $20-ish to $80... i understand the supply/demand algorithm, but this is just theft. i know lyft doesn't even pay their drivers enough to make that justifiable for a 15 minute ride. people need to stop using this app so they change this because it's so noticeably just ripping people off at this point
title: Prices increase when you apply promotion codes

review: our driver miguel was one of the most patient drivers i've ever had. he went above and beyond and waited as we found our way through the maze of disney springs. highly recommend, very polite, bring your spanish game though, yo hablo espanol muy mal
title: Outstanding Driver

review: i usually use uber but after 15 mins trying to connect with a driver i opened lyft and arturo was loading our luggage within 3 mins!  i immediately fell asleep in the back seat until he pulled into our driveway.  thank you arturo
title: Airport Rescue!

review: amazingly friendly driver and nice clean car and good ride over when i was in a difficult situation. thank you again for being so kind, prompt, and getting me to my destination safely
title: Great ride

review: i am so disappointed in this app. having used it for years, i can't believe how badly it works these days. my particular gripe is the absolutely terrible and inaccurate estimates on how far away the driver is. 12 minutes changes to 14 minutes changes to 18 minutes.even when the driver is one minute away, it suddenly becomes 5 minutes. this is a huge flaw for a driving app!! do better.
title: This app has fallen apart

review: my car was in the shoppe during the holidays. i had to catch  lyft. the driver's i had were on time. they were humerus and yet professional. if my car break down i know lyft and it's drivers are out there as an alternative.ms caroline
title: Responsible

review: we were going to the airport to catch a flight. so he dropped us off at baggage pickup not at departing. so we had to go up a flight of stairs to get to the correct area ticketing  to get our boarding pass and drop luggage. my wife has difficulty walking and this added agony and a longer wait to get to our gate. you would think that he is driving you to the airport he should know where to drop you off!!
title: Driver from Grove to Denver Airport

review: on iphone se the map only expands to about 10% of the screen. almost useless. no way to find help on this or change the setting. not sure how to contact lyft except for driver issues which this is not. probably won't use lyft again until this is fixed.
title: Barely shows map

review:
according to lyft's drivers; drivers can cancel rides at any time leaving you stranded or late for work.

it also doesn't help that, if you pay for a ride to be sooner that if that ride is cancelled you are still locked in at the higher rate, regardless of how long it takes for your ride to actually get there.

which is borderline lying to their customers.
title: Inconsistent Communications

review:
i was fortunate enough to have esam as my driver!  he was amaing in every way!  super fast to pick you up, fantastic conversationalist, and extremely authentic!
esam, moving forward will always be my first call!!!!  highly recommend!!!
shannon
title: This was THE BEDT EXPERIENCE I've ever had with Lyft

review: do you know that you completely block the map with the driver information? and for some reason you've made it so i can't move it away so now i can't see the map at all from the moment i get a driver to the moment i get to my destination. that seems to me like a huge problem for a taxi app. uber doesn't have these problems and as much as i'm not a fan of uber, i'd rather use an efficient app. deleted.
title: Stupid UI problem

review: today i spent over 20 minutes looking for two different scooters i reserved that weren't there. it charges you to reserve them - so it is bogus. three days ago it happened to me as well. i shouldn't be charged when it is not my fault a scooter i reserved is not where it is supposed to be- and i searched extensively, they must have been brought inside buildings. don't charge us for what we don't use!
title: Paying for a scooter when it isn't there

review: so i had scheduled a ride at least two days in advance and when it came to the morning of the ride. our scheduled ride disappeared off the app and the lyft driver drove past us on the map of the app. i am extremely disappointed in this service, if i never had a back up ride i would have missed my bus to the airport and never got on my flight. i'm not planning on using this app again.
title: Scheduled Ride got canceled without permission

review:
this driver i had today was courteous, kind and respectful and very pleasant. i hope my future rides i would be able to ride with him again.
i want him to know that he is truly representing for lyft, outstanding service.
title: My Lyft driver

review: i tried to get a rental and when i got a lyft to go to the location they didn't even let me get one since i was going to show up a few minutes late. like lyft doesn't even have a button to see your rental while a lyft driver is taking you to your location. lyft needs some major upgrades.
title: Rental

review: i've been very happy with my experiences with lyft.  the cars show up within minutes. the drivers are friendly and professional and i feel very safe.
title: Convenient and dependable

review: i found myself without a vehicle and a bunch of things i had to do today. without lyft, today would have been impossible.
title: Easy to use. Easy to track driver status.

review: the time it takes for a driver to pick me up is getting worse and worse. i just had option to be picked up in 4 or 11 minutes, so i chose the 4 minute and the driver won't get here for about 10 minutes anyway. this has been happening a lot lately.
title: Getting Worse

review: i normally order uber due to it being available and reliable. i ordered lyft to give you guys a chance and it was available for a ride. i got the driver and he cancelled 2 minutes away.  then a second driver. again few minutes away and cancelled while in route. finally this third driver came through thankfully.  but due to this experience this is why i am not a regular lyft customer due to the inconsistency and unreliability.
title: Unreliable

review: their pricing mechanism is so off. you'll never be able to go from point a to point b simultaneously without the price going from 8-60$ i believe it's because of covid and gas prices they want to every now and then jack you for the need of a ride.. i haven't seen uber shoot up in prices like this though so it makes you question if the pricing is accurate and legitimate.
title: Supply and Demand

review: a very good driver. rain was heavy as heck and we had a miscommunication on the pickup address but he stayed calm and stuck with us when most drivers would have given up and cancelled. thank you morad all the best to you and family. john d.
title: Morad

review:
my driver got lost because the lyft directions were wrong and the only feedback options available are specifically for blaming the driver. 

how about when it's your application's programming that caused them to get lost??? not to mention that because pre-scheduled rides are set to a certain rate, he also was forced to provide extra work for free under your company's software. he should be compensated by lyft for shorting him if no fault of his own. period.
title: Negative Feedback is for Drivers

review: your locator function still needs work. the drivers are frequently to the wrong site while passengers wait and wait. frustrating!
title: One suggestion

review: time after time lyft navigates incorrectly to my house.  how it can think it gets to my address when it never navigates to my street is beyond me.   i have a very long driveway, so drivers are consistently directed to a street north of me to which i have no access.  i've had sone drivers just drive off, ignoring my  navigation advice.
title: Bad Navigation

review: thank you lyft for such a smooth ride and driver: thomas in the black charger! thomas was truly a fresh of breath air. his presentation was everything. he was extremely polite,professional,and well dressed! #blackyoungmenstilldisplaymannerism&dostillopendoorsforladies! you go thomas in the black charger! continue to be an example!
title: Lyft driver and Ryde

review: they gave me an estimate for a pickup, i selected the premium option, the driver did not arrive in the time window they quoted, they still charged me the premium price. when i contacted them they pretty much skirted the issue and said everything was hunky dory. i will dispute the charge with my credit card company, talk trash on them endlessly and wait for karma to generate weeping and lamentations from their investors. driver was excellent. but f lyft corpo scumpigs. it's only $5, but principles matter.
title: Drivers good, company is deceptive

review: you say if you wait 15-25 min you save such and such amount. then i wait 20 min and then driver cancels and then i have to wait 20 more minutes and pay the same price for a ridiculous inconvenience. and! you don't want to cancel because it likely the price for regular fare has skyrocketed. you should offer something when stolidly this happens but you don't.
title: Bad service

review:
your app has numerous faults.  undependable.  doesn't give me the ability to enter where i want to be picked up.  many times the gps is wrong about where i am.  sometimes wants me to enter my user name and password?  why?  i ride with you weekly.
get the computer programmers to ask the riders and drivers how to design.  it is not intuitive.
title: Rider

review: he was absolutely amazing!! we had great conversations the whole ride, and found out it is a small world because there are many people that we mutually know!! not only was his hospitality top notch, his car was extremely clean as well!!
title: Scott Kelley

review: our driver dropped us off six blocks from our destination, and so we found our way eventually. very disappointing. the address was clear in my request.
title: We walked

review: prices have gotten crazy. they started this new wait and save scam that basically charges you what you should be paying to get to your destination. they raise the price to a location you go to everyday. even though there are no road closures, accidents, or rain/ weather conditions. makes no sense. charging me $12 more to get some where even with the wait and save option with normal traffic conditions? ridiculous!
title: Price

review:
i have literally had a lyft account since its inception!
not only is this my first lyft review it is my first review ever!!
unfortunately it is for all the wrong reasons!!
i am a veteran and primary use this service to get to the va hospital 
which is exactly 7mi from my house
because public transportation takes me over 45min ,7min ride on njt lightrail to nwk penn station but the only direct bus route to the east orange va hospital runs one every hour the first at six am so if my appointment is at 8 am i have to leave home by six am
so i happly order a lyft 
especially compared to uber the cost was over  $15 less always on time fast safe ride!! 
then covid hit and lyft has lost 
there corporate minds!!
instead of being $15 less is now over $20 more and if i want the driver to arrive at 7:30 i have to startt my request no later than 6:00 am
because as soon as i get the message that my driver is 2min away 
exactly one minute after that it say your driver has arrived which is not at all true as soon as i hit the call driver button a whole different car and driver picture comes up saying that thier three minutes away and this literally happens so far three times per ride!'
twice trying to say that i was not outside and driver left and charged me for that no opolgy refund or explanation!!!!!!!
i twice ended up riding my ebike in twenty degrees takes me 25 min

until you get better lyft this is one veteran who cannot in any way
thank you for your service!!!!!!
title: WTW?!!!

review:
scheduled my ride to the airport a day in advance  i was a little hesitant because i have not  done it before.
uber app  was not working only for same day pick up
it was so easy with the lift app to do it
ride was on time.
 thank you!
title: Ride to airport

review: my daughter and i went out out for the evening together and had the best lyft driver ever- robert! everyone else lucky enough to get him as your driver enjoy! we felt save and like we had known him forever! it was a great experience thank you robert and thank you lyft!
title: Robert the cool Lyft driver

review: i was very happy with my ride it was very quick very fast they pick me up at the right location and drop me off at the correct location and the employees or drivers are very nice and the cars are nice.
title: Nice and Fast

review: you can only contact support if your issue falls under one of the limited categories listed in the app, and for leave feedback for completed rides (so you can't report a driver who is supposed to be picking you up but never responds to your calls  and forces you to cancel after you've been waiting for 30 min).
title: No way to contact customer support

review: i requested a ride to pick me up from the train station on a friday afternoon. allegedly there were no cars around my area (at a very popular station), all were over 15 min away. i sat there watching as 7 drivers accepted to pick me up, wait 5 min and cancel my ride. it was infuriating to keep seeing everyone not wanting to pick me up. unbelievable. ended up calling a friend. awful experience.
title: Stranded

review: lyft is super easy to use and it's not difficult to find things in the app. it shows all the information you need, and none of the information you don't.
title: Easy to use, good design

review: y'all should offer more options and if you need a car seat option so parents wouldn't have to bring one every time
title: Riders with family

review: i'm being charged the $250. i returned the bike to a service area. reported that there was no dock station in the area. requested to end ride. got charged $79 instead of the $12 ride it actually was. then charged another $250 for it being lost. i witnessed the van that drops the bikes off, pick the bike up. so it was never lost stolen or damaged. yet i'm being charged for it. there's no number to call and customer service takes a couple days to return an answer fyi
title: Beware of Bike

review: fernando was nice and polite and got us to our destination safely. he also took the time to find us even though the app had given him the wrong location at first. we appreciated the safe ride!
title: Great ride

review: the last full 12 months i have consistently booked rides at a given price only to have the first driver never show up, have to cancel, and then book another ride at a significantly higher price and now i'm running late. lyft has gone way downhill and i'm just not using it anymore unless i have a full spare hour to call a driver again after my first inevitably cancels or no shows.
title: Never works as promised anymore

review: my ride and service from najib were excellent !!! he opened my door for me. i didn't have any luggage for him to handle. he was courteous and friendly. i would request him for my next ride, if i could.
title: Great Service and Ride

review: they will overcharge the customer and give you peanuts.  seen it many times over. there rules provide the customers a way out of paying you for cancellation fees. trust me this will be a frustrating issue for you.  after you sign up they flood you with incentives after a few weeks then there gone. uber is a better choice imo at least they consistently have weekly incentives. new rideshare jobs are on the way.
title: Trash

review: the passed 4-5 lyfts i have ordered have cancelled, and all after the 3 min text. the latest left me and my family at an airport, with more than one cancellation. this problem has taken my time, and screwed me over for work a couple times. very undependable drivers, who are allowed to just drop, and i have not received any sort of cash compensation from the lyft app, for the trouble i had using this app.
title: Consistent Driver Cancellations

review: i was leaving bur airport and it said my driver was 6mins away.  my original lyft suddenly canceled. it took a while to reconnect me with another driver. it took my new driver 20mins + to arrive. my flight from oakland to los angeles was shorter than the wait time upon the arrival of my lyft. waiting 40mins when my original wait time of 6mins is unacceptable. is there any solution or customer response to this ?
title: Bad wait time experience.

review:
scheduled a ride, the app said everything was on schedule,

after the fact, i am told no drivers are avail.

i missed my flight and in turn it cancelled my return flight (i find out as i attempted to fly back yesterday only to be told i have to buy another ticket.all because i missed my initial flight :-/)

please do not advertise 24/7 if drivers are not going to be available 24/7. (this is not the only city/town i've had these issues in so one can not use that as an excuse and for goodness sakes please don't use covid as the excuse ither. that's been used up don't ya think it's time to get back to holding one accountable for what they say they are going to do and in the manner of which promised to perform.
title: Not reliable

review:
first time we tried the pre arranged pick up time and honestly, was a little nervous. 
low and behold, our driver arrived right on time!  like this option so much, that we'll be using it again tomorrow to jfk.
title: Pre arranged ride

review: the customer service when something goes wrong is non existent. they cancel rides because of payment issues on their end and it's impossible to rebook your ride, without having to pay surge pricing i had booked a scheduled ride for the airport for $55, they cancelled 10 mins before and only option was to rebook for $177. no way to retry the payment which again was on their end.
title: Zero customer service.

review: it was not clear why you showed a number next to the car.  i thought maybe there were multiple stops or riders.  the app also listed an arrival time that was unrealistically soon.  you should list expected pickup and arrival times together.  that would be much clearer.
title: Some confusion in app.

review: drivers always accept ride while they are on another ride already and then often cancel on you after they finish the trip after you've been waiting 10-15 minutes already to finish closest ride.
title: Drivers cancel too much

review: luis picked us up quickly, figured out how to get all our luggage in, then was really friendly the whole way there. got us to our destination quickly and safely.
title: Great driver and very friendly

review: i use lyft or uber everyday to come home from work but when i use the lyft app it always place my location incorrectly and it is impossible to fix once you notice the address has transposed two of the numbers.
title: Need to fix gps

review: i really do appreciate that point b to point a is cheaper than a to point b. i wish there was a way to tell drivers i will tip good. some drivers won't bother to pick me up in hudson. i was grateful to get picked up at my location.
title: Trips

review:
i just arrived in from las vegas and i haven't use lyft since last year and i had a great driver name sid he was very nice and went above and beyond my husband wanted him to drop us off on the side of our apartment and he was so kind to do so.

thanks
title: Drive home

review: thank you for your fast pick up and friendly service.  i gave a cash tip to driver when he dropped me off, didn't know it could be added to my charge.
title: Smooth ride with lift.

review: last ride the app would not allow an exact return from the pick up point. this have the driver inaccurate information and prolonged our arrival time and his departure for the next client.
title: Difficulty putting location in.

review: i have spent a lot of money on lyft recently and while as of the past week i was given $2 off of 3 rides, i feel as though i should have received something a long time ago for greater value. ex: 50% off of 5-10 rides, a $20 credit, 3 free rides.
title: More rewards

review: i canceled my account. i'd been using lyft for years but was increasingly dissatisfied with it. and yesterday i ordered a car with the app and was informed that a car would arrive in 20 mins and would cost around $100 (from brooklyn to queens). i got a ride in 5 mins for half the price from curb and so canceled lyft ride. but they still charged me a fee. they actually charged me for rejecting bad service! that was the last straw so i'm done with lyft.
title: Not what it's cracked up to be

review: i used to be an uber fan, even had uber 1! rides are becoming hard to come by and then very expensive!! switching to lyft and the drivers are friendly and cheaper!! that means more money for tips!!
title: Prefer over Uber

review: this is my second time using this service and i have been extremely satisfied. i will continue to use this service.
title: Friendly, confident drivers

review: the driver was kind, professional and went out her way to please the customer. i truly appreciate her service because i was having a terrible day again thank you lyft
title: Great service

review: used to enjoy using lyft but there new model is inconsistent and just tries to upsell you at every point. drivers are great but that is not at all a reflection on the company. switch drivers on you all the time and keep increasing times so you end up late for everything. even if you pay their premium prices you still get jerked around. absolutely awful and a shame as they used to be great.
title: Used to good. Now worse than Uber

review:
i tried calling uber first, but couldn't get through the app. 
so i called lyft. so easy to use. i pick the rate and the time to pickup.
i was leaving the hospital after being discharged in the middle of the night.
it was a pleasant ending to a horrific day.
title: Lyft ride

review: stop matching me with drivers who are twelve minutes away from me. you should be pairing riders with drivers who are close by and not far away from my location. if you have a promo for money off a ride they'll jump the prices for rides up that way you're not actually saving any money. it's essentially like a scam. the rideshare apps are so money hungry
title: Too long to be picked up

review: take the same ride which has always costed between 29-36$ and over the course of the month the price has skyrocketed. trying to charge me almost 90$ for the same ride i was taking for 30$ every other day a month ago. 90$ and a tip yall out y'all's mind. just got a cab and it was only 25$ i'll be deleting this app and waiting until y'all do something about these thru the roof prices.
title: Prices are suddenly high

review: app works fine but i don't like when the driver cancels ride and someone else takes it. i was late for work last time and ended up waiting 20 mins to be picked up.
title: App works fine but I don't like

review: we arrived in syracuse about 11 o'clock at night and called for lyft about 1115. russell picked us up about 1130, delivered us at home. very nice experience. russell was a very friendly driver, drove very carefully, very cautiously l.  got us home in fine shape.  we have enjoyed using lyft.
title: Late night

review: i've taken 3 lyfts this month. allpoite courteous safe drivers. my lyft driver today brought my purse back within an hour of dropping me off at my house, everything in it. i was so thankful for her! lyft is lucky to have drivers like her.
title: New user

review:
there has been a series of cancellations in the past few months.

i live in a central area of brooklyn, and even so i am kept waiting 15-20 minutes, let alone the stress of having cars cancelled. it's impossible to plan when you are told 7 min, and then a car cancels and it's another 8 min, and then that car's time keeps changing because he is finishing another ride.

it's really unacceptable. your service has gone downhill.
title: Edith

review: there needs to be a space where you can put wheelchair space needed or luggage space needed. also drivers should need to measure car trunks. so far i've had to wait longer because drivers never have any room. it should be a requirement to be a driver so not to discriminate against the handicapped like me.
title: Good but

review: barely any drivers, eta's are severely under estimated, and they always have surge pricing in my city. a ride with uber that would be 30 is 100 with lyft and it is getting insane. this is how i get to and from work and around since i cannot drive and the city has limited transportation and its completely unreliable.
title: Id like it but

review:
drivers are mostly great.  

ap is horrible gives wrong (or no direction

management a disgrace.  prices are high which makes it difficult to give good tips.  uber/lyft take way to high a percentage.  gas prices are high

reliability non-existing :  drivers cancel often (over 1 hour to get a ride with driver 5 minutes awaycancelled10 minutescancelledetc,  finally took a bus with a lot of lackages.  the worst ever !!!  never on time (or cancelled completely.)
title: Great Drivers.  Horrible Ap.  Awful Management

review: just checked to see a ride i had taken two nights ago charged me $40 when it said it would be around $10. 1.7 miles for $40. i should have and will for now on walk over getting robbed like that again. when i tried to make a complaint the app simply wouldn't allow me. terrible app with terrible management. i'll never ask for a lyft again
title: Overpriced ripoff with terrible customer service

review: the app itself is very easy to use, but be warned of the drivers. drivers have found a way to raise prices and you can't do anything about it. all they have to do is say there is traffic and even if there isn't your price goes up. my quoted price was $39 and my actual charge was $50 plus fees. there's no way to dispute in the app because lyft will say it's in the range. word of advice. make sure to check your receipt before tipping.
title: Beware

review: lyft is extremely unsafe and untrustworthy. they have knowledge of one of their drivers being sad and they are choosing to keep the names of the suspects from law enforcement. do your research for yourself but all of the data shows that sa cases involving lyft are on the rise and they are doing absolutely nothing to protect their drivers. you can hear personal testimonies of people's experiences with a quick search on any social media app if you are interested. do not use lyft and make sure you spread the word to everybody you know.
title: BEWARE: LYFT SUPPORTS S/A

review: luckily i was able to acquire michael's services for an emergency when nooner else, friends or family available. michael was there within minutes with a smile on his face. thank you, lyft for hiring good people!
title: Early Morning Friendly Face

review: they charged me $80 for a "spill" in somebody's car... mind you i had nothing but my phone with me. when i tried to argue it to customer service they wouldn't even listen to what i had to say and automatically took the driver's side because he had "picture proof". god knows where the picture came from, what it was, or even how many other people he has done that to. never using lyft again.
title: Extra Charge

review: new to lyft and the last two driver have been great and fast love this app soo much the last two guys where great on time fast friendly and patients so far my first two rides have been perfect
title: Great driver

review: i recently used lyft for a trip to/from the airport.  both times, the driver took local roads to avoid the highway and doubled my trip time. ended up getting into arguments with both who pointed to the app and said they were just following the route on the map. not sure if it was the fault of the drivers or lyft but lyft doesn't provide a way to appropriately address this issue so have no choice but to use uber from now on.
title: Deleting the app

review: the app didn't track driver and didn't update time driver would arrive. said driver would pick me up in 6 min and app  got stuck on that screen. tried closing and opening app after waiting 15 min with no updates of eta.  driver was friendly, but app didn't update me in real time.  waited over 25 min, not 6min.  going to go with uber next time. again, no complaints on driver.
title: App issue

review: when local taxi drivers were giving me a two-hour wait time, lyft was there within 6 minutes, and at half the price! very pleased; i will utilize lyft every time i travel
title: Great experience

review: thank you for always been there in time of transportation needs. it really does matter.
title: Thank you for always been there in time of transportation needs. It really does matter.

review:
my normal 10m/16km route increased 7x!!! i would never pay these prices. was pleased to see uber's rate is completely reasonable almost normal. one thing i can say is that someone is very, very greedy. in these times of hardship, we should be doing things to help each other. hiking your rates like this, is just a nasty thing to do. hope all the ceo's and owners and the person who's idea this was. get 
sued and loose this lousy company. stick with uber
title: Awful Prices!!! 7x as normal

review: thanks for using lyft! we update our app regularly and always right after uber updates their app, clogging your bandwidth and using your time to make our app more visible since we have an undifferentiated product and are at a loss for different marketing ideas.
title: Stop using bandwidth to update app unnecessarily

review: i don't know what happened but lyft has gotten so bad. it's to the point that i cannot plan on using this app for any work or timely function. the reality is you never know how long it will take to get a ride or if you will at all! they will also gouge you when they know there are no other options. i never thought i would remember taxi cabs fondly but i do now! thank you for showing me that it can be worse, lyft.
title: How did Lyft get so bad?

review:
my driver was on time for my pickup, very friendly and her car was so clean, not a drop of candy on her seat.
we had a very friendly conversation along the way, she dropped me right in front of building.
title: TRAIN STATION RIDE

review: i had a hard time finding out where i was so poised to meet the driver. he was so helpful and patient. i appreciated that he waited for me instead of taking another customer. thank you!
title: Thanks for waiting

review: modern day lyft experience: driver accepts ride, after making you wait a substantial chunk of time they just cancel on you minutes before the alleged pickup. there is zero recourse for the customer in this event. lyft is either not doing enough to disincentive this behavior from the driver or being flat out fraudulent and making it look like a driver is coming when they are not. apparently lyft hates customers, not sure why.
title: Too Many Bad Drivers

review: very friendly driver and nice clean car but navigation needs to be improved. the driver did not have correct pick up location and had a bit of trouble finding us.
title: Navigation problem

review: i tried several times to place our address but it kept on defaulting to the corner intersection. i ended up having to go to the corner to meet the driver. the app should also make it easier to contact the driver. no way to do that as far as i could tell.
title: Unable to put exact address

review: awesome experience will always use lyft when no access to a car , driver was polite , car was clean and a smooth drive made my 1st experience a one to remember. thanks lyft will recommend over any others
title: 1 st time with Lyft

review: never had a problem with a single driver i've always been courteous punctual and had clean vehicles. unfortunately, there are never enough of them so the wait times are too long
title: Never had a problem

review: i ordered a lyft to make a concert in la 2.5 hours in advance (allowing for an hour of leeway) and they made me wait 45 minutes to an hour for a driver to show up. i understand this can be due to a lack of available drivers, which is fine. however, making me sit and wait for 35 of those 45 minutes just to cancel on me is unacceptable. i am now losing $75 on a ticket and a graduation present. absolutely inexcusable.
title: Incredibly unreliable

review: on two separate occasions recent ones, i have had drivers cancel on me at the last minute and then my next driver tends to be further away which results in a longer waituber is starting to do better even if it's more expensive
title: Drivers cancel more often now

review: you pay to be picked up promptly they never meet the pick up window. drivers constantly cancel or even worse confirm your ride and never show up. ordered a lyft that no showed for my ride to work, the car was parked behind my building smoking blunts in the car. idk what happened but this app is trash. 4.9 stars for years. lyft has no interest in improving either. loyal customer gone. just call uber or any other app.
title: Worst rideshare app

review: so tired of people accepting my ride while driving someone on uber then i'm left sitting an extra 10-15 minutes making me late all the time , i don't ask for a 30 minutes before i need to be somewhere to arrive there late cause i'm waiting on my driver to drop someone else off !
title: Drivers

review: i lost my iphone from the drivers here a month and a half ago. i called the customer center and found him. he planned to pay $200in compensation and decided to get his my iphone back. but he didn't keep his promise.  realized that this company doesn't have staff management. i will no longer use this place.
title: Bad experience

review: honestly, this would have gotten 5 stars unless i needed long distance driving. i needed a drive from long island to brooklyn on christmas eve and wasn't able to schedule that and it shocked me. on another occasion i was moving from along island to syracuse and wanted to schedule a lyft xl and wasn't able to which was crazy
title: For short distances

review: my first lyft driver arrived within minutes of my order, was extremely friendly and courteous, and got me to my destination ten minutes early. i'm now a committed lyft customer.
title: Wow! What an improvement over the competition.

review: first of all on time.  very important.  she is awesome.  wish i could use her every time.  clean, courteous, knowledgeable, visited my home town, austin,tx.   bonus. she is just one reason i continue to use your service.   great job.   happy holidays to you all.  thanks,  mark blissit
title: Amazing

review:
1- i picked a lyft that said 7:41 pick up. app confirmed and told me 7:44. perfect because i allotted for the window in case the needed the 15min flex. however they showed up at 7:26, told me they would leave by 7:35 if we weren't in the car and charged us for it. 

2- safety
after a long day in universal i booked a lyft with my family. the address that was served up to me via lyft was not the real address
at this point my family was trapped in a moving car and had to accept the surcharges it took the driver to reroute once i realized something was wrong.  thank goodness i did and our escapade was short lived. 

at the end of the day this was not a substantial amount of money but it's not right.
title: Incorrect Lyft pick up time and incorrect address

review: i like how i was given options on different rates in regards to how much time you are willing to wait and get a better rate. this helped me decide that lyft was a better choice than the other company.
title: Good rate

review:
it's terrible service. i was chose the right time and the driver is to late and then i'm trying to cancel but they said we'll charge you 4.99 fee for cancellation and then i just continue waiting until come the driver finally he driver canceled and again 20-30 minutes burning. this is ridiculous time is raterate is money.
i never recommend this ride for everyone it's very bad!

my time is my money. 
my rate is my life.
title: bad action!

review: with everything that's going on with these drivers i thank you for being on time & making sure my sister made it home safely . you are appreciated
title: Thank you

review: thanks for being available in my time of need i never know when i need a lyft but it's good to know u have more than one option to get around when u don't have a car.
title: Lyft

review: took a 30 dollar trip and the driver lied and didn't turn off the trip charged over 600 dollars and then a 350 dollar plus hold. even if returned would take over a week leaving my account negative and over 900 dollars taken with no safe way to live for over a week. will never use lyft again and will tell everyone who will listen. company also stopped using lyft due to these outrageous charges !
title: Absolutely Dangerous

review: the driver refused to give the ride after getting on the car and the fee was charged. he threw my bag off the car, used violent language, and tried to drag me off the car. i called the police and reported the incident. his name is mustafa. the license plate number is blt539. he is driving a honda odyssey. this driver is dangerous to any customers who want to get a ride from lyft in rochester area.  lyft is not able to ensure a safe ride.  avoid this driver and stop using lyft.  be safe.
title: Dangerous driver

review:
used the ride during, driver refused to return lost good (he acknowledged he had them and that he wouldn't help).

so stopped using rides and only did scooters. twice have the scooters refused to let me end a ride thinking the scooter is somewhere else entirely. 10 minutes worth of cost that i cannot get back from them.

it's a parasite slowly leeching stress and money from me. go to their competition and save yourself the hassle.
title: Everything is bad

review:
it's usually a pleasure when i have to use lyft, over all the other car services and this morning was no different . lemarcus was courteous , pleasant, timely , and an added bonus to my saturday morning regiment . thanks lyft for hiring the good guys ! 

best
title: It's a pleasure

review: i used lyft today and it was the first time i saw their tiered pricing of: quickest, wait a couple min , etc. i chose the quickest option which was supposed to be around 15 min arrival, it took 30 min for the driver to arrive, yet i was still charged for the quickest possible. will most likely start using other ride share services if this is how they will run their business.
title: Tiered pricing

review: i hate to be this person but this app truly has a big big problem with cenceling rides. this is my first time using it in almost a year because every time i request a ride i got through at least 5-6 drivers before they solidify one. it's frustrating especially for someone who uses uber to get someone in a timely manner. i don't have 30-45 minutes to set adduce for you guys to mess up my drivers
title: Canceling rides

review: honestly my main app has been ubber but its like there's always something going on with the app. every time lyft comes through like a night and shining armor to save the day. thank you lyft drivers for always saving me.
title: My Hero

review: last night i booked lyft when the app showed 9 minutes wait time. by the time the car came i had already waited for over 20 minutes by the road side at 10:30 pm. lyft got to find a better way to handle such delay.
title: Wait time

review: literally my phone is buzzing like crazy . i keep getting several text messages from lyft during the beginning of the ride , during the ride, after the ride had ended a hour ago still getting these text . it's super annoying.
title: Too many automated text msgs

review: i'm disabled and my house is down a long drive way and some drivers stop at the road and expect me to walk to car even though i put in note to please use driveway.  one said she didn't look at notes
title: Most are very good drivers

review: lyft shouldn't be able to hold money from my account if a driver isn't scheduled. this is ridiculous. then when i go to request a ride again it holds my money again. and i don't get the money back for a whole 24 hours. and i have no way of getting to my desired destination. if there is no driver scheduled i should get my money back immediately or at least within the hour.
title: Account Hold

review:
the menu shown under the map does not collapse on my ios. 
has the horizontal bar menus show to drag down to collapse, but does not work. will allow the menu to drag up to full screen but will not collapse allowing larger map area. map only shows on upper 1/3 of screen.
title: Map hard to navigate

review: i just moved to texas, and lyft services as become my go-to for service transportation. every ride i've experienced has been welcoming, safe, with a splash of southern hospitality. kudos to lyft with selecting their drivers! thank you for your services, lyft team!
title: Lyft never disappoints!

review:
by mistake i wanted a have ride from my hotel to airport , but you sent the lyft to pick me up from the airport and charged me for no show
i requested another lyft and i am now at the airport
can you please reverse the no show charges

thanks
title: Hilton Hawaii village to airport

review: grateful heart right here appreciate this application on my platform and i truly i'd love to drive for you guys from what i understand working with youi can drive your vehichle and i'll be doing something with my extra time
title: Thank you

review: the lyft driver i had was kind but decided to take all the side streets on the way to my house and i was charged accordingly even though the said it would've been a 10 minute drive if she followed it so instead of paying 24 bucks i ended up paying 48 because of the route she took and there is no customer service agent to talk to just some robot to text that doesn't even understand you
title: Bad service

review: i checked uber and lyft to get the the airport in san antonio tx on january 24. lyft was a little cheaper at $17 and change. when the charge came through on paypal, it was $41. this was for a 7 mile ride. i tried to dispute the charge and the app declined it within 10 seconds without asking for any additional information. my brother took the same trip a little later and paid $18. i don't take rideshares often but i will not be using lyft again.
title: Overcharged

review: nothing like having a driver that is minutes away from picking you up only to cancel. there needs to be a way to leave them a critical review. hate being left stranded over people that accept only to drop.
title: Need a way to review drivers that drop you minutes away

review: i've put my trust in this company solely to be lied to and left stranded.  i tried to get a lyft for my family at 7:45. after entering my destination, the app related i could get a ride in 2-5 minutes.  after waiting for 10 minutes it informed me to try again as is was notifying drivers.  well after over an hour and draining 30% of my phone battery and continued lies i realized i was on my own.
title: Stranded in the evening and misinformation

review: the reason you should pay for a priority pickup when it says you'll get picked up in 4-7 mins is because you want to get picked up in 4-7 mins. don't tell me that then have the guy who's 16 mins away pick me up. and for darn sure don't let that guy be one of the rudest people i've ever encountered. saving grace is that at least y'all are cheaper than uber sometimes but it's still disgraceful. do better
title: Straight up lies

review: when a payment method is declined for insufficient funds the card can't be used again  for roughly 15-30 minutes even if funds have become available on that card.
title: It seems the App caches declined payment info

review:
i kept trying to add my home address as my destination.  app gave me & a helper all sorts of problems!    i was going home from the goodman theater in downtown chicago. at one point the app said my destination is very close to my pick up. obviously that was not true.

i also miss seeing the map with the car approaching. i used to find that reassuring. i didn't see that tonight.
title: Trouble with app

review: don't even bother using lyft!  uber is way better . lyft customer service are horrible they don't help you with nothing . when i use to use uber customer service was on point but , never from lyft ! i have a big incident that happen when the driver attacked me and i report it and nobody's contacting me they don't take you serious. they don't care about nobody's safety ! plz just download uber not lyft ! i hope lyft run out of business ! sad company

review: thank you  cheaper and reasonable  more cheaper than uber and the same quality of cars cheaper than uber and with even better service i love lyft for the discount of 40%

review: i scheduled a day ahead for one our interviewee but they ended up canceling the ride on the day he needs to be pick up. i ended up booking another trip which it doubled the rate compared to what i previously scheduled. i shouldn't have done the booking again but i didnt get much options since everything was scheduled. but it's totally ridiculous! you dont even deserve a one star either! never again!

review: the app should show you more obviously when a trip is planned for the next day. hard to confirm it actually went through.

review: we scheduled a pick up 24 hours in advance.  lyft does not assign a driver until 6 minutes before pickup.  earliest driver available was 30 minutes away.  he flaked.  another driver was assigned.  we were picked up 45 minutes late.  this was our first experience using lyft.   if you need to schedule a ride in advance, use uber.  they assign drivers within 30 minutes of scheduling a pick up.

review: scheduled a pickup 18 hrs in advance for pickup from oca to cocoa beach. really annoying that i could t edit the reservation as our flight arrival time changed.  had to cancel and reschedule for 15 minutes later

review: no issues with drivers. on occasion end up having to wait a lot longer than it said when i request the ride. wish the app didn't use the term confirm rather than continue since i'm always worried i'm about to pay for something that i haven't even fully specified yet.

review: i tried other rude share apps like uber, which require a long a annoying verification process. lyft never gives me trouble and is the most convenient. recommended over weak uber.

review: i got in the lyft driver car and got out and was accused of being on my period the driver said he car seats was damaged  keep in mind seats are red and report i bleed on them and lyft charge me 80$ for something i didn't do i feel like this we approved because i was a woman there was no investigation nothing just charged if lyft going to listen to there drivers because i refused to give my phone number then fine lady's head careful out there

review: thanks for making the process simple and affordable with many options to choose from.

review: i absolutely love this service.  the drivers have always been outstanding, the service dependable and and app easy to navigate.  love everything about it!

review: this company makes its money by stealing from drivers. do you know, it keeps roughly 65% of the fare it collects from passengers. drive 14 miles for pickup and receive 2 mile ride worth $3, but the passenger pays $10-$12. this company is an epitome of the modern day slavery. the support is horrible and incompetent. do not ride with them. they frivolously change drivers per mile and per minute rate. they bully drivers. they simply don't pay. absolutely horrible company! buyer beware!

review:
way better service and they pick good drivers

class number one way better than uber
title: Way better than other company

review: this stupid driver was constantly talking on the phone, texting and driving & swerving and making abrupt stops which caused me to spill 3 drops of water in her car. i wiped the spot and the next day later saw an $80 charge. in the picture provided the water stsin was fresh and still shiny meaning she made a new stain!!!!! and i can't get my money back  and other times i've been left stranded and charged a cancellation fee when the driver is the one who cancelled. proceed with caution cause these people do not care.!!!!

review: i've had lots of issues with the app. paying extra for a ride 3 minutes away only to have 3 drivers cancel on me and end up waiting 20 minutes in the rain is only the most recent of a series of troubles i've had with the app. i would recommend uber over lyft but honestly back in the day taxi's were more reliable and more affordable than either of these gig economy scams

review: a lot of people need a lyft everyday of the week between 6 and 7 so if you guys can have more drivers  i wouldn't of almost lost my job so please try to have people ready around 6 even on the weekends because that's when we need you the most is with out the bus going

review: lyft is a joke.   they don't even pay you enough to cover gas and expenses. i drove 17 minutes to pickup a 4 block ride that paid me $3.31.   they charged the rider $7.  they don't care abt the driver. that is why there is a no lyft drivers available.   i switched to uber and i'm glad i did.   they send you on a long drive for a pickup and then pay you extra for the extra miles!   pay is better and communication is better.  dump the dead lyft.
title: Lyft bad

review: estimated wait times are ridiculously long. they constantly switch drives so your wait time is never accurate! i'm always late to work because of it! prices have increased over 50% definitely wouldn't not recommend! drivers are rude and are horrible at driving, they think they're their own boss yet are always complaining that lyft takes all their money.

review:
this app is to often requesting information already store in your data base. when trrying to re/enter data, it stops the process.  what's going on?
anyway i will change carrier to yellow if needed.

lyftdoesn't distinguish on their web app enough between a lyft driver and a lyft rider.

review: why does lyfts estimated drop off time always a minute or two or three later than waze or google? if i'm in the car and i can see discrepancies in the time between my phone and the driver's. i can't imagine what they do when you're not in the car. i've waited 15+ minutes for a car i was told was 5 minutes away. too consistent to be a mistake and it pushes me to use uber just on principle.

review:
vehicles listed as 3 passengers may include compact cars with drivers who don't allow someone to sit the front passenger seat. i really don't think any rational person would say the backseat of a toyota prius fits three adults. 

if a driver doesn't allow front seat passengers, their vehicle should show a capacity of 2 or even 2.5 (to account for children or smaller adults).

review: my car was in the shop for three days and i had to take a lyft to work. the drivers were professional and the app was easy to use. reasonable prices.

title: Meh

                                                        thank you lift !

review:
getting badges for ads is not cool. lyft is becoming no better than uber! i've got offer notifications disabled. if i get one more notification, i'm going to delete the app and just use uber. end the spam!!!

uber it is!!! so ridiculous, why spam people!? if they need a ride they'd use the app! it's not like someone will get the notification and be like well, might as well take a ride around the block!

review: lyft, i see you. you're trying to be an app for all transportation. but guess what? users like me are in a rush to book a car and all this extra transit info is slowing me down and causing extreme frustration. if i was going to take the subway, i would have already done that. you're pushing up the non obvious new thing when i urgently want the old thing.

review:
the app always chooses vehicles that are located further away than other cars that are over by. and when the user tries to cancel the ride, even under 3 minutes, they try to intimidate you by charging a cancellation fee. 
its possible that the shown vehicles close by on the map may not really exist. it may be a trick to make the user think there are more cars available close by.
title: Not Efficient

review: i checked on google maps a ride to the caracas arepa bar in brooklyn, it says 17 dollars in lyft i clicked on it, i confirmed 17 dollars a ride and suddenly i ended up in a bar with the same same in the east village and i was charged 35 dollars. i contacted support with screenshots and they didn't do anything, just treated me like a lier so i am done with lyft. obviously it was a loop or error on the app but they didn't want to fix anything. ciao! extremely bad support
title: They just stole my money

review: it's my first time to use lyft and it's so professionally managed and the cars and drivers are superb so far . i will certainly use it over and over again firstly because it's safe and reliable too,
title: Myrna

review: i got charged for a canceled ride multiple times , scheduled rides have been super late it or even canceled on me , the drivers are almost always erratic and uncaring. i've tried with this app multiple times for many years but after charging me again fully for a ride that was canceled within 2 min and the rider wasn't even chosen yet !?!? i'm absolutely done and will try my best to deter others when it come to this money hungry company.
title: Thieves and liars

review:
i just wanted to say that my lyft driver was awesome. i put the wrong address by accident and she found a way to fine me at my location. she's a good driver and a very nice person. please let her know my comments. 

kind regards,
nelson
title: My Lyft driver

review: i do enjoy using the lyft rides to get to and from where i need to go. it's really great for these drivers to be able to work. i appreciate them getting us aroundthank you!
title: Victoria

review: it would have been nice for the driver to offer to help load and unload our luggage.  at the destination the driver popped the trunk lid open but did not exit his car to offer any help unloading the luggage.
title: Offer to Help Load & Unload Luggage

review: i was gonna go out with my friends to celebrate the end of summer but i forgot my wallet (and id), so i tried to get a lyft back to the hotel to grab it. i put in an request for a wait and save ride and now i've been waiting on a random street corner in downtown indianapolis for the past hour. the best part is that the second a full hour passed, lyft automatically cancelled my request.
title: Made me wait an hour then cancelled my ride

review: our driver was great.  a little early.  vehicle was clean and smelled great.  good conversationalist.  shared many facts about island and made many suggestions in response to our questions.  could not have been better.  loved the ride!!!!
title: Great ride!!!

review: this app is terrible now, they consistently double and triple charge you for rides sometimes leaving you with a $70 charge for just one ride, and you have to wait 7 days to get it back. and even getting your money back isn't guaranteed. all this app does is steal money from its customers now under the guise of being cheaper than uber but hitting you with so many ghost charges. do not use.
title: Terrible service

review: no way to get out of a ride if your driver is still finishing up a ride. my driver has been 3 minutes away for 10 minutes at the time of writing this, and i'm stuck in 100 degree weather waiting for him. lyft won't let me cancel without paying a fee because my driver is already driving towards me. how in the world is he driving towards me if he's currently finishing a ride?
title: Ridiculous cancellation fee

review:
hi lyft, i've always used only uber, and on my first ride with you i had a tribble experience. the driver didn't put on a face mask, he derived really fast and talked over the phone the whole drive. 
i told the driver to put on a mask and be more careful and even tried to reach you through the chat during the ride but i couldn't get access to the chat.
i gave the driver a really bad review and a few hours later i get this email that i'm charged for extra 20$ because of some awful shameful lie that driver made.
obviously, i was shocked and deeply disappointed.
sent over 10 emails to your team and couldn't get your response.
this is outrageous and i had the worst customer experience ever.
title: Jay don't user Lyft

review: driver went to wrong pickup location about 100 yards away from where we were.  he called me i told him we'd walk to where he was and he left before we got there even though clock said you driver leaving in 40 seconds.  we were there he was gone. going back to uber where customers come first.  not drivers getting paid for no ride and leaving customers hanging
title: Charged for no ride

review: the lyft driver the second one put me out of the lyft with my two kids because my son wasted some juice by accident. i offered to clean the mess and he said no please get out of my car and said he would file a report on me because of a some juice ?!!! it was a simple mistake from a two year old
title: Juice Spill

review: may 6 i tried to get a lyft but there were none in the area. i wake up in the morning and i see that they took over 200 dollars out of my account and charged me. how can you charge someone for riding a ride they didn't even get?!?!? this is insane. i will never be using this app again and i will most likely be looking to sue. they have no contact information and this is real money i'm talking about.
title: They Stole My Money

review: the driver was great and knew how to get to the airport but the software was telling him. to go in the wrong direction. when we arrived at the international airport the app said we were 4 miles from our destination. also, our pickup location address didn't appear correctly for the driver.
title: Lyft App not right in Charleston

review: i have experienced other car service and find lyft the best. they have great drivers and response times are good. friendly drivers and great service!
title: Overall great Cab service

review: i like that you can leave comments. i think it helps the drivers get the positive feedback they need. you can't hear to many positive things. it boosts morale.
title: Comments

review:
this driver by far is one of the most interesting guys i have met using the service.  he reminds me of me!  he kept me engaged in conversation or listening every  second of the 4 min ride. 
thank you
title: Personality Wins!

review: accidentally left my phone in the lyft and the driver wouldn't respond to multiple requests. he couldn't even take one minute to send a message back. lyft said there's nothing they can do and the driver gets to keep on driving with no negative feedback. couldn't even leave the driver a review because by the time i got a new phone it was past the review period. very frustrating.
title: Drivers face no consequences

review: very roomy clean car felt very safe and comfortable, highly recommend .   went out of his way to help with app and brought us right to our door help with bags and everything
title: Wonderful driver

review: was going through my credit card statement and my personal card was charged 3 times for business trips. i checked all 3 trips and they are listed as using my business profile, check my business profile and it has my business credit card assigned, so not sure this error happened. getting closer and closer to going back to uber.
title: Using wrong credit card

review: not sure how to remove ride share option. couldn't change to my hotel. only nearby hotels listed. elara hilton grand vacation club should be added. i didn't have a problem on wednesday when i arrived but going home today was challenging. needed assistance
title: Good rates

review: the vetting process is really bad. they're either a robot, weird science but true. or they're just scamming for whatever consolation money the drivers get. the purposefully don't move an inch most of the time. they cancel last minute. the worst, was when i had to drive my pet to the vet as an emergency and it was just up the block. my pet was in its carrier. yet my driver cancelled on me, as if i didn't need a ride to an emergency place.
title: If this sees the light of day.

review: uber does not allow me to use my business cards and credit cards on the account. horrible customer service.
title: Better than Uber

review: app is telling drivers wrong location for pick when i select my home. this is extremely frustrating especially when people have jobs and are running behind on time! this needs to be fixed so people don't have to explain to the driver how to get to your location!
title: Broken app

review: my list of prices haven't loaded for over a week. i'm unable to see how much a lyft to work is let alone order one! so annoying & such an inconvenience.
title: Won't load

review: very friendly and safe driver.  a huge amount of snow was thrown on our windshield and joe took evasive actions and maneuvered the car and stayed in our lane of travel.  a bit scary but it did not seem to jar him.
title: Friendly

review: we always have the option of the other company or your and so far service has great, price right, pleasant and safe drivers.
title: Nice driver and better price!

review: lyft when you're in a big city or going out for the evening lyft is the easy answer. the drivers are always quick and efficient.
title: Hey easy solution for getting somewhere

review: works well, and i really like the schedule ahead feature.  the prices are usually good, but sometimes uber is cheaper.
title: Works well, but Uber can sometimes be cheaper

review: i like using lyft over other apps! their services are great! i feel lyft typically has driver's available within minutes. i chose to use it over uber just because it's less busier than uber (in my experience)  and i have gotten great drivers!
title: Def a great app!

review: first of i always schedule a lyft a hour before the time i plan to be some where an the location i always go is only 10minuites away. i hate that there will be a lyft driver 16 minuites away stuck in the same spot not moving i try an cancel ride then it says 3.25$fee driver moved when it clearly hasn't.  an then 20 minuites later says finding new driver
title: Horrible

review: i was worried about calling a ride only 5 miles from the house but i played it safe and josh came to our rescue!! dude thank you for being on time, professional and most of all reliable!! you rock sir!
title: Josh is the man!!

review: been using both apps lately and lyft had way better rates and way nicer drivers. uber has become greedy and nobody at my place of business uses uber any longer. keep up the good work lyft !!!!
title: Lyft beats Uber

review: i order my lyft at 4:10 every day cause i have to be at work at 5:00 and it says it'll get me details within the next 5 minutes just for me to wait 10-20 minutes for details and then they find a driver and when the driver gets close to me the driver cancels the ride and it still charges my account and i have to select a new lyft making me 30-40 minutes late to work.
title: Never on time

review:
i had payed for a ride to work got a text message 
stating pick up 415am and 430am 
driver never showed up or called i will never use lyft again
very unprofessional company 
not a happy customer
title: Driver no show no call

review: it seems like the ugly little brother of uber. there are none available ever, and if you do get one, it's a crappy car that smells like smoke. i'm a smoker so i don't care but i guarantee most people do. this is not based on one occasion. this has been proved true over at least six months. other places might have good lyft drivers but college station does not.
title: There are none and when there are some they're bad

review:
twice today used lyft.  first ride was delayed and switched 3 different drivers. waited long time.  driver who came was very nice.
second trip, both originating at hotel, same thing happened. 3 different drivers were coming. arriving.switching and finally joseph came. again a long wait.
title: Is this normal?

review: terrance was fantastic. i was a bit nervous as my trip was to the airport where i was going to be flying for the first time since covid hit. he was a calming force and got me to the airport in record time - even with the traffics. it was a great experience.
title: Great trip

review: i was anxious to get to my destination on time because i had a flight to catch. my driver was on time and got me to my destination early. the driver was courteous and his car was clean and comfortable.
title: Teacher

review: it's been awhile since i've used the service but i wanted to take the time,to express my satisfaction with each drive i encountered while in florida thank you
title: Satisfied customer

review: charles was prompt and welcoming. car was very clean and smelled amazing. i wish i could request him on departure. water and car chargers were offered during our ride.
title: Superb! Is there a 10 Star Rating?

review:
she was the most beautiful woman i've seen and her spirt gave me the chill she was the easy woman to talk to i've ever met! i was having a bad day! and our 15 min talk will stick with me for the rest of my life.....she someone i'll
never forget
title: Bobbie

review: i scheduled a lyft with a lower rate. 10 minutes before arrival they cancelled and said to schedule the ride again. the rate went up $50 and i had no choice but to book.   customer service says they never refund rides no matter what and it's not possible with their system. that's just untrue. will not use lyft ever again and i suggest you don't either.
title: Don't expect a refund no matter what - Wrong fare not refunded
