review: i've been apart of the lyft community for 5 years now. i'm so impressed with the level of professionalism and customer service and satisfaction from this incredible company. thank you  for allowing me into your community
title: I LOVE LYFT

review: a driver accepted my request made me wait 5-10 mins cancelled on me right as he got to my doorstep because and told me he couldnt go to my destination because he wanted to go to downtown instead (which i assume would pay him better). this just seems messed up, there should be some sort of repercussion for making customer wait until last minute and the driver cancelling on you
title: Driver cancelled on me

review: my driver derrec arrived at my pick up location quickly as well as was friendly and a good driver.  we were having terrible weather, but he got me to my destination safely.
title: Great ride

review: yesterday i did one of those two rides, but i don't see the 10% discount offer applied to my ride when it will be done?
title: 10% Discount offer for next 2 rides

review:
lyft is incredibly unreliable these days. it tells me my ride is confirmed, then switches me to a new driver after a few minutes. and half the time that new driver doesn't move for 3+ minutes after confirming.

when my ride does show up, it's always later than the original estimate. uber seems to be doing worse so i still use lyft, but i'm not a happy customer.
title: Keeps getting worse

review: when there was 3 minutes to go when they change the driver & car which put another 16 minutes on the trip to the airport.
title: Car Change

review: i had a terrible ride experience and had no one to help me or compensate me no matter what i did! i had a driver that was careless and wreck less and drove a car that was not premium as i paid for and requested. i still paid the premium price and lyft has no option what so ever to get a partial refund nor file an actual complaint. just a rating for the driver. no chat. no phone number.
title: No customer service

review: i decided to try lyft as my delta rewards will earn miles if i use lyft.  the lack of communication from the app was quite troublesome.  i booked 13 hours in advance and as i live in a slightly out of the way area. 15m before my schedule time and no communication from lyft, i booked a ride on uber.   communication is key, perhaps i will try again in the future but for now lyft gets one star and uber gets my business.
title: A lot to learn

review: i just want to know why when i book a ride 30 miles away from me it is trying to charge me the price of a plane ticket. when i first downloaded the app it was saying it would be about $26 and within minutes it changed to $67 for the smallest amount. later in the night i checked again for going back home and the cheapest amount was over $100
title: Prices

review: i am not an experienced lyft customer, but will call them from now on, if i need a ride that i can count on to get me somewhere on time! this driver was excellent - on time and friendly. i truly appreciated the lyft to the airport!
title: Expedient & polite!

review: i had a really good experience with lyft the driver was extremely friendly and also help me with my bag when he dropped me off home which i thought was very kind of him thanks so much
title: j

review:
it seems as though the arrival times is not as accurate as the app would suggest. for example i waited at the airport for  nearly 18 minutes for my car but the app kept telling me the car is 7 minutes away. it kept lowering the time and then would get stuck at different count down times 
my friends and i shared a 8 rides in the past 2 days and it seemed to happen only 2  times so maybe it was just a glitch in the system. 

the drivers were all nice. 

thanks
title: Great app

review:
this driver was really professional and friendly. picked me up from my house.
i asked richard if i could stay a little while in the car because my supervisor had not arrived yet.
title: Richard

review: my first lyft since the pandemic lyft and driver antoine, you are the same great lyft! arrived quickly, friendly and swift, safe ride. this is why i am loyal to lyft instead of others! thank you, antoine and lyft!
title: Always Great service, reliable, easy to use

review: too often this app is unreliable. drivers will spend a whole 7 mins of your time just to cancel as the app scrambles to find another driver..and it never does so efficiently. i do not recommend choosing the standard option because 9/10 the approx arrival time of your driver is not accurate.  this app will surely fade away as a new app emerges, i just hope it's soon.
title: Canceling rides and approx times

review: oftentimes i have found myself in need of transportation and this company has done a splendid job. the transportation requests, options, alerts, prices, and business model is very helpful. thanks to the company and employees.
title: Great Help

review:
i flew in from chicago to ft lauderdale.  although very precise location directions and time the driver left.  they communicated with me via text and then stopped communicating.

this happened to me twice before with lyft in new york laguardia when two drivers ditched me as well.  

i then chose the premium last night so i would get a ride.  that luckily worked. 

the app doesn't allow you to rank the drivers that ditch the client.  that is a large fallacy.  while at times the customer could be at fault however with lyft it happens too frequently.  you should design the app so people don't get away with driving away.
title: Driver left seen

review: you guys take forever to find a driver and i can't believe that to wait so long after i have had a long day of work i also i had a guy cancel on me today i because of him i forgot my wallet today if u guys have no right to cancel hard working people that are paying you and if a rider cancels on you i would expect a full refund because you guys are basically stealing money
title: Lyft waiting

review: had a late night ride on the app, and the driver was not headed in the direction of my home at all. he was taking random turns and ending up farther from the drop off location. this was alarming to me and the other woman i was riding with. we had to raise our voices at him to either turn around or let us out. when i reached out to lyft, they were not concerned and assured me that i was not charged extra uhhhh??? not my concern, lyft.
title: No concern for safety

review: if you need to go to work or anywhere lyft driver will take you their. not all lyft driver are perfect but they try their best to reach your destination so you can be their on time.  majority lyft drivers are very nice people.
title: They are accountable

review: would like to have a true time on how long it will take the driver to get to me.. sometimes i look and it says 15 minutes so i confirm the ride and they are 5 minutes away.. the nickname to send in you review is inconvenient i have tried 10 names and it won't let me send.
title: True time

review: everything was great until it had me type in my address and having to call my extremely patient drive who apparently had the address but it pointed him to a place near me but not my exact location. thankfully i got home thanks to said driver.
title: It was great until

review: got picked up by a driver, but lyft app would not allow him to confirm pickup. so i directed the driver to my home, but lyft still hasn't charged me, meaning the driver isn't getting paid due to lyft's negligence.  i can't reach out to them to let them know because their app does not allow anyone to seek help from the company unless it's a cookie cutter problem listed in their predetermined answers. so bad to the american workers.
title: Terrible to their drivers

review: i've only used the services a few times but each experience has been a good one. i will continue to use this service!
title: Take a Lyft

review: app is easy to use and navigate. scheduled pick-up times very accurate. driver's very pleasant and friendly. will definitely recommend lyft and use for future services.
title: Ride Service

review: it was very early approx 3:45/4am. i couldn't find lyft or uber for awhile. when i did he was right on time! he was extremely nice, prompt and his car was immaculate. i'd request him again if i could best lyft or uber driver i've had!
title: My ride

review: my driver was carlos and he picked me up in a white mercedes that smelled amazing!!! he was super nice and i got to play a game that he had on the headrest! this guy literally went above and beyond and takes his job very seriously! i never write reviews but i had to!!!
title: I love Lyft!

review: i've been a lyft customer for a long time and it's always a clean car. the drivers are always good drivers and friendly. i always feel safe too.
title: Love

review: i have used lyft at least a half dozen times, and each ride has been exemplary: safe driving, interesting conversations, clean vehicles, etc. needless to say, it is my go to ride provider.
title: Why Lyft is the Best

review: lyft is the most economical and arrives on time or ahead of time! the drivers are friendly and professional. lyft has become our go to!!!
title: Always right on time!

review: i checked the wait option to save money. i was informed that my ride would arrive between 3:31 and 3:54, which was about a 20 minute wait at the least.  someone accepted within the time frame but then canceled.  my ride did not show till at least 4:30.  unacceptable.
title: Long wait

review: first ride using lyft and was more than impressed with my driver. he was great. i will definitely be using these services again and would recommend my driver specifically.
title: First Ride

review: just order a lyft for a family member for the 1st time . was surprised how quick and easy it was. thank you lift for having an easy app to use.
title: Quick and Easy

review:
the guy bought a new car and lyft never change over what car i should expect to show up on the app 

get with it!!!
title: Wrong car

review: my family and i have been using lyft on our disney vacation as our sole means of transportation. it's extremely convenient and very reasonably priced. we are thrilled so far with our lyft drivers. so far - so good!
title: New to Lyft

review:
my last couple of rides i have not been able to rate my drivers. after my ride is done and i go into the app it just goes straight to the main page.

update: first update in a while but now i have issues with my valid card always getting declined, i've had to go and download uber in order to get around. my card works just fine with uber.
title: Unable to rate rides

review: generally, i'm a fan of lyft. my only issue is drivers who don't wear masks. i live in nyc, the spread of covid variants is real & we're being asked to mask up. it seems numerous lyft drivers aren't getting the memo or prefer to believe the virus isn't something to worry about.
title: My only issue

review: this app was easy to set up and the drivers have been amazing. it would be awesome if this company covered a one time ride if you user does not have available funds.
title: Great company/app

review: had 30 rides on my account then had 1 ride recently where i got bait and switched by their algorithm (see title) and their message customer service has no tools to reverse the charge. no line for any kind of calling to customer service either. what a scam this app is. don't use it, use uber atleast their accurate with costs and have some customer service.
title: Got charged almost a 100 for quoted 30 ride

review: we almost missed our ferry because lyft didn't know where pier 41 was. we only made it because our driver was great. there's no way to dispute this though without giving the driver 1 star, which he doesn't deserve. we ended up overpaying, solely on account of lyft's poor routing, with no recourse to account for this. i'll be resorting to other ride sharing apps until this is resolved.
title: Drop off locations are wrong

review: it is great to be able to arrange a ride in advance. that is really important when you need to get to the airport at 3:00am!  our driver arrived on time and got us to the airport in a very efficient manner. much appreciated!
title: Ride reservations

review: if i could rate lyft less than one star i would! i called a lyft ride for someone and it got canceled 3 times in a row and i was still charged! as soon as i told the drivers they were picking my friend that's a male they canceled. what kind of people does uber and lyft employ??!! nothing but trash drivers that argue back, threaten people and make us wait long periods of time for no reason and with no explanation. worse app ever!!!
title: Less than 1 star

review: constantly hanging out drivers they get within 3-5 minutes or less in some cases then we get assigned another driver this is ongoing issue with them not sure what the reason is but very frustrating when i'm trying get to medical or other time sensitive appointments ready to stewart using regular cab companies agin at this rate
title: Switching drivers

review: i couldn't be more pleased and happy with my driver. he was positive, friendly and made great conversation. this was a perfect example and experience every person should have.
title: Best experience!

review: got this ride from galpin ford when i dropped car off for service.  few days ago i could not figure out how to get the lyft app to work when i was trying to get a ride from another ford dealership to fix the same problem on my car.  gave up on lyft that day.
title: Confusing app.

review: at busy times they switched drivers four times, and forced us to be picked up in an inconvenient location that was not obvious on the map.
title: Useful, but

review: app lists car arrivals nearby then when it picks a car it's not nearby and half the time after waiting the full time, the driver then cancels and i get passed on to someone further away. same price. keeps happening but if i cancel the app says the driver has been driving too long and i'll be fined. never mind how long i've been waiting. used to be better, going to delete the app.
title: Deceptive app

review: i love the app informationally, and gets you where you need to go. i haven't had a bad experience yet. i love it. i've had nothing but clean cars, and friendly drivers; which is a blessing.
title: Lyft

review: lyft is just the best! it is always there for you and the drivers are always safe and friendly. it is my go to when i need wheels in a hurry. thanks lyft and their drivers.
title: Always There For You

review: i was told my pick up was between 11:11 - 11:28 as i had chosen to wait for pick up. the first driver would have been on time even though the app brought him from kansas to missouri but then changed drivers added another six minutes but the driver sat with no movement for six minutes, hence my pick up was 10 minutes late. i will be disputing charges on the company not the driver.
title: 10 min late pick up

review: had a rude driver who overcharged me & i had 2 pay the penalty after my horrible experience with customer service over the charge i was informed i had to wait 5 -7 business days for a refund when the immediately took the charge from my account & they wouldn't even give me a credit never using this rideshare app again & also informing the better business bureau about my experience uber is definitely way better
title: Horrible Customer Service

review: i haven't owned a car in 15 years and definitely won't own one now... lyft allows me to employ someone else and lets me be in 2 places at once when i need to arrange rides for my parents
title: Love it

review: i have had to use share ride lately more than usual. every ride has been above and beyond. the drivers are all world class. way to pick them.
title: So pleasant

review: my niece experienced a mishap with a he driver jose in a toyota rav4, i made a complaint, and my account got deactivated. i did send in the proof that it was me who order the lyft, because she was a minor. however, i still can't login into my account. then i was charged more than what the actual ride was because his mishap. i did the charge or whatever but still what the hell why i feel like i'm being punished and not him
title: Mishap with driver

review: it's the worst customer service ever , it treat drivers so bad , lyft deactivated my account because a customer complain that the police stop me to check everything that was it , everything was fine , it's not fare at all ,one complain stop my form my job .i went to the office to reactive my account they treat me so bad and have told me you will no longer driver for us , because of one complain even not right
title: Lyft

review: the driver showed up said he doesn't do stops or round trip. i created the ride with 1 stop post office then return home  i'd like the $5 charge for this ride
title: Driver would not take me round trip

review: i always find a quick ride. the app is super easy to navigate. drivers are very friendly and safe drivers. vehicles are always really clean and even smells good.
title: Fast & Easy

review: lyft has come a very long way & i can honestly say i would recommend them over other ride share companies hands down
title: A Lot Better

review: what is the point of me scheduling a ride in advance if the drivers aren't reserved/committed ahead of time- i might as well just request a ride when i need to leave as opposed to scheduling it. drivers just cancelling after the ride is assigned to them means that wait times can be up to an hour. somethings wrong with this system.
title: Drivers cancelling scheduled ride

review: very helpful, friendly and even let me charge my phone in the car, so please keep this guy in the road
title: Thank you for your service

review: i don't know if it's because they are shown the distance and the money they are making before hand and then offered better rides while they are on route to pick you up, but the drivers constantly cancel. i have missed so many appointments and have been late for work so many times because these vultures are looking for a better payout. deleting lyft.
title: Drivers constantly cancel

review: they don't fight for their passengers i was charged a damage fee that i didn't commit that's what drivers do they accuse passengers for damaging there cars and they charge you for that without even checking the cameras in the car i'm so disappointed i'm not using this app again. take a picture of the cars before you leave because lyft will charge you either way. very bad experience
title: Was charged a wrongful fee

review: alfredo immediately helped us with our luggage and opened and closed the doors for us. he came early and told us not to rush. he had pleasant classical music playing and was very friendly.
title: Great Drive

review: my driver was so friendly, clean car, she immediately put on her mask before i entered her vehicle. she is quick and knows the conyers area. i rate pam 20, double the normal 10 rating. thank you for a safe ride home
title: Pam is the BEST!!

review: i had a very dangerous experience tonight. no seatbelt and a driver who spoke zero english who almost got into multiple accidents. i left a negative review and support contacted me seeking more info. after info received i asked for a refund due to the dangerous nature of the ride and at that point they ended the chat and told me they would not do anything, no need to respond we are done with you. business lost
title: Horrible support and bad drivers

review: download more than one ride hailing app to get the best rate in real time. i travel a little bit so it's always a different app from my home city.
title: Download more than one ride hailing app

review: lyft uses a set cost quote and estimated pickup time to get you to select a ride. on multiple occasions the wait time is excessively extended once a ride is selected. this baits the user into selecting the ride over other options like taxi and uber and then switches the time once you're committed. you cannot contest this with lyft as their automated complaint and feedback process does not include this as a complaint category.
title: Bait and switch

review: got charge twice today for a lyft i didn't even order then there is no way for me to actually talk too lyft to get my money back
title: Charging me for a ride I haven't even took

review: on ios the drivers info covers most of the canvas leaving little space to the map tracking the driver. i found no workaround. maybe something you should check. thanks
title: Small map

review: the drivers that i have used thru lyft have been very friendly & helpful.  i use a walker and they are kind enough to help me get in and off the vehicle.  i would highly recommend lyft drivers.
title: Lyft

review: i had a driver name taylor whom i waited for for ten minutes the app said she was one minute away yet she text saying that she was 4 minutes away and about five minutes later i text again and she said she was two minutes away after five more minutes i text and said that i would cancel and request another ride and she say ok no problem like what
title: Driver never showed

review: quality service and highly recommended-other service providers could learn from your methods!
title: 7am quick trip

review: never have a problem getting to the airport for early flights! quick pick up and always a driver!
title: So convenient

review: delete this piece of trash app. was once great but now will spend over an hour rescheduling rides as you sit and wait. extremely unreliable and the app will tell you you're about to be picked up flat out lying to you. there must be another lawsuit incoming soon.  to top it off they erased customer support, so to can't even talk to any human about this horrible issues you're guaranteed to experience.
title: Uber is Now Superiro

review: hard to contact them or to find a way to but when you finally reach out to them with whatever issue it is such as lost items in a car or getting charged for a ride you never took they don't got your back they're on the drivers side first. at least with uber any problems i had get solved with them.
title: Horrible customer service

review: noticed an increase of drivers in the area. although it may have just been one; he honestly made the difference
title: Increase

review: i reserved a car to be coming within 10 minutes it came in 2 minutes and when i was not ready the driver went and i was charged a penalty..
title: Time is not exact

review: a few day ago i got a second charge for a ride that i completed. today  i see the reason why. the app did not hold my destination and i had to reorder the ride this needs to be fixed
title: Jump back

review: this was my second time using lyft and i was pleased with the service the driver was very nice and helpful hope i can get him the next time i do plan on using lyft again
title: My Experience

review: i liked taking lyft, at first, until now. just 8 miles is $30/$40 so not worth it. also, i schedule to be picked up at a certain time, but they don't show up until later. like 7 minutes later. what the heck. i take this for for work. it's just ridiculous. but california prices, themselves, are ridiculous.
title: Not so great costs

review: professional and friendly
title: Professional

review: great driving! absolutely one of the best rides ive had all year. i also got some awesome advice for my future books. she's very friendly, safe and over all a great experience riding with her a++!
title: Awesome

review:
enjoyed my driver and his driving and his route. 

could you please send me that route that we took so that i can make other drivers familiar with it. thank you. god bless and stay safe!
title: Great personality!

review: jeesing was excellent.  he had the correct gps location, however; it took us to the wrong location but he corrected it and took us to our designated area.  thank you jeesing!!!
title: Great driver

review: i have been charged $5 for canceling a ride that i could not confirm on the app if it was set up for a specific time.  i made other arrangements only to get notified a driver was on their way.  others have had rides canceled with no compensation.  a fee for canceling rides should go both ways and easy verification of appointment rides is needed.
title: Charge for canceling rides

review: i lost my phone in a car and when i went to go look for their number they didn't have one! i didn't have access to my phone number or email because i lost my phone and basically i had to depend on this dumb app to help me and they never contacted me back so i don't recommend giving them y'all money!!! if i could put -0 stars i would
title: Lost my phone and they didn't help

review: on our trip to chicago all our drivers were friendly autos were clean and the were on time
title: Drivers

review: first time lyft user. my first 2 notification that a driver was on his way i watched both drivers via the map head away from my pickup point.  finally and thankfully the third driver showed to my location
title: Wrong way

review:
lyft has this great little tool that says you can save some money by waiting longer. i opted for this feature and ended up waiting the max amount of time allowable - 30 minutes. no update other than i'll have to wait another 10 minutes at 25 minutes. 

when i went to get support the support team took well over their quoted time to take care of the issue as well. 3 minutes to look at my account turned into 12 minutes for the customer service agent to respond poorly.

thoroughly disappointed with the service. 

for the app itself, well built, extremely functional, and operating under poor management.
title: What a joke

review: he was really a great and cautious driver and very polite and attentive. the best driver i've ever had! he showed empathy because my car broke down and wished me well on my repairs! it's the little things in life that matters the most!!!
title: Excellent driver

review: with the latest update, prices shown to customers are not accurate. i booked a ride for around $30 and got charged $80 at the end. it happened twice during the same week. tried to contact support and they suggested that i reinstall the app. what a joke. been using the app for 5 years and it becomes more and more like a scam operation
title: BEWARE! Use Uber instead for accurate pricing

review: i love lyft and use it quite frequently, but i wish they offered scheduled rides and were more transparent about ride availability during times when little to no drivers are available.
title: Great app with a few hiccups

review: i have no complaints other than the fact that i think it's silly they do not accept cash app as a form of payment, since it's technically still considered, prepaid
title: Easy peezy

review: abdul was a punctual person and communicated well. he got my son home safe and sound. i appreciate your service abdul may jehovah bless your heart and spirit along with your families existence and health as well.. thank you
title: Accuracy

review: when are y'all gonna do specials with cheaper prices or something off per ride i have not seen that sinse y'all started would great for the holidays thank you i was changed over what i agreed to and your prices are way too high and y'all don't give specials anymore for regular riders i may go back to regular cab companies and i want my difference back i was charged over price it's very disrespectful
title: Customer

review: ahmad - thank you for everything! wishing you the best in everything you do and wishing you the best for your family
title: Super friendly and amazing person

review: for some reason my account has been suspended multiple times with no reason why. the drivers are awful sometimes, mark themselves as arrived when they're nowhere near the pickup. then we get accused of doing something wrong. not fair. i prefer uber and will always choose uber over lyft even if it's more expensive. do better. there are more options than you.
title: I hate lyft

review: lyft has been good all week and i just which the app was just a little bit more blind accessible but other than that, it's great!
title: Lift is good but it needs to be more blind accessible.

review: my sweet driver arrived to pick me u but by the time i walked from my 3rd floor apartment to the vehicle i was totally worn out from back issues. i entrusted my delivery to her and mission accomplished. thanks again to her and to you for hiring such a caring individual.
title: ABOVE & BEYOND

review: having only used ride-share a couple of times i was pleasantly surprised by the driver's pleasant and calming demeanor! i will definitely use lyft again when the need arises!
title: I was pleasantly surprised by the driver's pleasant and calming demeanor!

review: would request him again if possible.
title: Wonderful driver. Extremely kind and professional.

review: never gotten pick up even though it saying i gotten pick up and drop off at  my correct spot no i did not i had to get another lyft driver to drop me off at my destination check the driver history also tried to get a refund but no you guys said i couldn't get one cause i was pick up drop off at the destination which was not true
title: I never gotten pick up tried to get a refund

review: lyft locator service is easier to pinpoint than uber. and the estimated time of arrival is more reliable than uber. the drivers are friendly and courteous. the cars are always clean and fresh smelling!
title: Lyft is competitive with Uber

review:
saleh is a fine representative for lyft.
he drove carefully and got us to our appointment right on time. even though the traffic was very  heavy, he knew his way in the city and always focused.
great to chat with him, as well.
title: Good trip!

review:
first experience with lyft was exceptional, michael was a wonderful driver knew the area very well gave us great information definitely use lyft again as we will probably in the next couple hours

thanks 
troy & kim
title: Bosie Id

review: this was one of my best lyfts thus far. i have a scooter as i injured my foot. my driver was very accommodating and helpful and aided me in getting my scooter in and out of the car and was respectfully communicative. very much appreciate that lyft hires people like that.
title: Amazing

review: great driver. very safe, very courteous, friendly, and helpful. after picking me up at the airport, he waited for me while i did some quick, but necessary grocery shopping. 5 stars.at least!
title: 5 star review for driver Gary Sparer

review: i'm so sick and tired of lyft drivers canceling on me ! i always wait 10 min + for them to finish dropping off their driver than the cancel right after and now i have to order a new one that's another 10+ min wait . they should not be allowed to cancel on me and not get charged !! if i cancel i get charged ! if they do nothing happens i'm sick of it .
title: Lyfts driver cancels !!

review: you did a fine job at helping to keep me calm air travel has begun to cause me anxiety, especially now as i've gotten olderi appreciate your calm and gentle demeanor and your comforting words
title: Thank you Norma

review: i'm in downtown nashville tennessee and i wanted to uber back to my hotel and they were $27 to get me there. then i remembered lyft. si am so glad i did! i saved so much money and they were there within three minutes.
title: So happy!!

review: why doesn't the app allow you to edit your scheduled ride? recently i had my flight times changed by the airline and i just needed to be picked up 20 minutes early. even if a driver accepts the original ride details, they could choose to accept the new time or release the request to another driver. seems like an obvious option to provide.
title: Edit ride details?

review: received an automated message from lyft to meet across the street, destination was the airport. driver should make determination where picking up. they should pull into your drive and assist with the luggage. i always tip and expect assistance when needed.
title: Pickup location

review:
really enjoying more and more low cost trips.
loved the schedule button  made my trip to airport very easy !!!  driver arrived on the button. super friendly. great trip, great service.
title: Enjoy the Backseat

review: uber notified me two minutes before my scheduled ride, that i had no driver. i loaded lyft onto my phone and had a driver within 5 minutes. thank you.
title: Forget Uber, use Lyft

review: can't explain how many times riders cancel on you after having you wait 20-30 minutes. not reliable of you are looking for a ride to work in the morning. when you do eventually get a ride, the drivers are often sketchy and the ride usually feels uncomfortable and awkward. will not be using lyft any more and will let all of my peers know to use uber.
title: Uber Is Better

review: everything's fine until a notice of destination changed  appeared on text. please eliminate inessential text messages especially when one is busy working on the trip.
title: Ride to the airport

review: also the best way for me to travel in my local area and lyft is the best way to travel when i need last minute transportation. job well done!!!
title: Friendly Service

review:
it's frustrating to wait 12 for a driver that is en route only to have them cancel. then i had to wait another 15+ minutes to for another driver to arrive. 

there seems to be no recourse for the rider. maybe you should offer $5 credit if a driver cancels 5 min after accepting?
title: Driver cancelled

review: this app lies! it consistently understates the time for the ride to arrive. it's not a small difference. 5 to 10 minutes extra wait over the stated time. i always prefer uber. also, the app is cluttered, messy and constantly changing. clean this mess up and get honest about the wait time!
title: Terrible App!

review: it was the first time i used lift  and i got an excellent service. the car was on time for pick up,  with a clean car and brought me home the fastest way.
title: First time service

review: constant annoying notifications about my ride, horrible navigation system that has drivers drop passengers off in alleys (you're asking for me to get shot or robbed doing that in chicago), arrival and pickup times are never accurate very spaced out compared to what the app tells you
title: Bad app compared to Uber gif the same service

review: everytime that i'm in desperate need of a ride this app is the absolute worst, i work a near minimum wage job that's about 15 minutes away and the lyfts that i get to go to work end up being about $45 it's completely insane, how am i supposed to make a living if i'm spending $45 twice a day to get to work, they need to fix they're system because it's absolutely ridiculous.
title: Worst thing I ever used

review: absolutely amazing!!! very knowledgeable, awesome driver, car smelled wonderful. even showed us some history and got us to where we needed to go early!! would definitely ride with him again.
title: Awesome

review: such an amazing ride, friendly service and excellent driving skills smooth ride with my daughter and comfortable.  best customer service and experience.
title: Excellent experience

review:
often lyft will randomly taken money from my account or double the amount of the ride. 
drivers don't pay attention to pick up spot.
takes lyft too long to find a driver and so they keep changing the pick up and drop off time. don't rely on it for work, meeting up with friends or anything bc you will be late. unless you have time to burn don't rely on these guys. great price tho.
title: The Truth about Lyft

review: great driver.  felt safe secure and comfortable the entire ride.  really personable and smart.  great conversation and exceeded expectations. professional and friendly.  highly recommend.  20/10 overall experience.
title: Give this guy a raise

review: requested a ride.  system would not let me change pickup dispute multiple attempts. pickup set was literally across the intercostal, so unless the driver had a submarine he wasn't going to pick me up. canceled in a couple minutes.  thieves at lyft prevent any method to explain why the cancelled charge is invalid. constant loop saying they will not refund. i'd be embarrassed to work for such a thieving organization.  contacting ftc and disputing on credit card.
title: Thieves thieves thieves

review: i hate that app keeps lying to you about how long it actually takes for you to reach your destination. it doesn't recommend routes with less traffic/stoplights and doesn't include time in traffic to it's eta. so it'll say you'll get there in 20 but really it's 40. it's not hard to include real time traffic info to navigation. uber does it!!
title: TERRIBLE NAVIGATION

review: i feel like lyft would be a lot more helpful if you were able to request a ride for a specific pick up time rather than waiting an uncertain amount of time for a ride.
title: Helpful criticism

review: we have excellent drivers on the trips for this week except the ride from home to the airport on tuesday, november 9. the lady refused to help us on the luggage. my husband has arms and hands' problems.
title: The lady refused to help, please improve

review: joseph greeted us so warmly, and then put our bags in his car. i have rarely seen this from other drivers. he was a good, accurate driver and got us home safely and quickly.
title: Happy Joseph

review: when asking the airport employees which ride service i should use they responded lift is more reasonably priced. i am so glad i used lyft. i was able to tip the driver more because of the reasonable price.
title: Lyft reasonable prices

review: he called when he showed up / was 1 min away i said i would be out in 2-3 min tops. i came out in 3 exactly and he had left and rejected my calls. i am a female that was waiting outside of work in a bad area in the dark. once i leave my work i can't get back in. not safe for women.
title: Uber driver left / cancelled

review: if you're blind and have a guide dog enjoy being disappointed in their lack of taking action. they were drivers the night ride because of service animals and all they do is say oh. we're sorry about that. they don't do a thing about it, because they categorized themselves as a technology company instead of a transportation company. it's a monthly occurrence for me.
title: Discriminative practices very very upset.

review: i've been in pittsburg for a week now. each driver i had was amazing. great customer service clean cars, friendly. i wouldn't travel no other way. very efficient
title: Great Drivers

review: you assigned the driver reporting 4 minutes. actual time 15-20.  no traffic.  he had a drop off.  does not matter how close he is if he has someone he has to drop of first.  we watched others come and go.  i resent the misrepresentation and will try uber next time.
title: Arrival Times Inaccurate

review: when you request a ride and it says your driver is 10 minutes away.  then you get assigned 4 different drivers before someone comes and picks you up 25 minutes later.  beyond frustrating and there should be compensation to the rider.  you charge us for wait time, but don't compensate when you are significantly later than promised.
title: Always late.

review: what are ur investment options for drivers ? do all drivers get notifications about these options ?
title: Investment options for Drivers

review: i was at the designated spot to be picked up and the driver said she was there but i never saw her or her car.  i texted her to tell her again where i was and what i was wearing but she never responded.  i should not have to pay for a no show fee, because i was there waiting.  i was charged 5.55$ for that and had to apply for another driver who picked me up without any problems at the designated spot.
title: Driver never showed

review: my experience with david today was amazing. not only did he have a clean car but he was a true peoples person. he diffidently made my trip here to palm spring a great one. thank you david job well done.
title: David

review: so far i took two rides in eversenville indiana my opinion on my ride is drivers are friendly but somehow their car is not really clean that's my opinion! mahalo from sj
title: Cleanliness of the car

review:
the prices are way to high. 
i don't like the fact that your service is taking advantage of people. and raising prices depending on how quick people want to be picked up. it's actually a rip off. plus how can you tip a driver if your ride is over priced. it's actually not fair to the drivers.  i rarely use this service for this reason.
title: Prices

review: your driver was so helpful when he saw me. he not only helped me what helped my wife and put the scooter in the back of his vehicle. i would use lyft anytime, anyplace and anywhere.  joe from rhode island
title: Handicapped person.

review: i haven't used lyft in a few years. was pleasantly surprised yesterday to find features that allowed me to state i wanted a quiet ride with cooler temperatures. i'm also a fan of the safety features.
title: Love new features

review: thanks for the local recommendations! we will run into each other soon. take care!
title: Friendly and hospitality is a 10!

review: the ride was good but when he picked me he was sitting across the street down aways and if i didn't run out to where he was he would have driven away. frettersoo
title: The pick up

review: my issue is that people have places to be at certain times so for drivers to cancel when they're already en route is ridiculous. i've been using lyft for over 3 years. this is not right but if a customer cancels when the driver is already on the way we get charged.  this has happened more than once and it's not fair to the riders.
title: Drivers canceling while en route

review: great driver who helped our family after being without a car, late at night, after a car wreck.  thank you!!!
title: Awesome!

review: i like them better than uber, but they are scheduled rides as never worked for me. a driver came close to my pick up location but started driving away and wouldn't answer my calls. i ended up missing my flight and it cost me about $800. the problem is that it's really hard to hold such a drivers accountable because you can't get hold of lyft.
title: I missed my flight.

review: all i wanted to do was drink safely and not worry about how i'm going to get home but this experience has been so stressful. first my ride was cancelled 3 times and i was charged each time. then 4 days later, another authorization hold is put on my account after they already took the money for the ride out. money hungry business that will support the increase of dui's.
title: Will never use again.

review:
i scheduled a ride for 6am. however, when i was asked to confirm the pickup, the app changed the time to 5:31 and there wasn't a place where i could change the time. 
 the driver said it didn't show up as a schedule pick up. i had scheduled, i think 2 days earlier.
title: Wrong time

review: the last couple of nights i can said this that i've been pleased with my last two chauffeurs
title: Excellent Customer Service

review:
the problems with driver assignment continues. they assign a driver that is still on another ride, and greatly underestimate when they will complete and get back to you!!
do not assign unless a driver is available or within 2 minutes of being available!!!
otherwise, give me the option to cancel. 

then, please give your drivers some training in basic customer service!!!!
you have hired all these ex-taxi drivers who bring their bad behavior with them. or give me option to opt-out of taxi drivers
title: Poor driver training and assignment mgmt

review: i was charged for damages i didn't do and instead of customer service investigating properly they just basically blew me off. damage fees are extremely high so to just be taking someone's money without proper evidence is baffling to me highly disappointed i will be canceling the app. i highly suggest riders to take pics before and after you get in or out of the car.
title: Customer Service

review: i was physically able to drive my 14 y/o son to his grandma's house and kevin was the next best thing and he did a wonderful job getting into the gated community per my instructions with no hiccups. thank you kevin.
title: Exceptional

review: the over charging has to stop ! i use this ride to get to work and lately almost every week i have an issue , drivers act as if they picked you up never did , they cancel but you'll be charged they gave me a $5 credit then when i went to use charged for the whole amount
title: Overcharging

review: our driver donn was on time, friendly and got us exactly where we needed to be.  good music too!  highly recommend donn and lift.  oh and the exact same ride on their competitor was $30 more!!!
title: Great job!!

review: if you're in a major city, and you order a wait and save app just before ya price surgeyou will be waiting for up to 2 hours just to get a ride probably because lyft doesn't like you taking advantage of their services, so they'll do whatever they can to get you to cancel a ride and reorder at a higher price.
title: Great app with 1 big weakness.

review: my driver was awesome...but they need to fix the location finder...because we couldn't find each other for 10 minutes.
title: Navigation system errors

review: was super friendly and car was very clean!! arrived fast and waited, had the trunk popped open for our groceries.. ty for making our day a little easier!! stay warm and be safe :)
title: Rodney

review: i prefer lyft over uber but lately i've been using uber because i haven't been able to schedule a lyft ride. the screen just loads and loads but never appears. i've updated my app on both of my phones and can't use the app on either one.
title: Can't schedule rides

review:
i love lyft never had a bad experience. the drivers are always nice and know their way around.

i have never had a bad experience and they listen.
title: Amazing and Better then the U

review: lyfts ap is annoying and triggers many to switch overs to uber because of it. after okaying a ride; the ap auto-picks another closer who states that they are available even though they might not be 100% available. because the driver can deny the ride after lyft accepts it and switches over the rider; the rider is the victim of then another flip of the next closest driver. this usually results in times that go from 15 mins out to 8 which ticks down to 5 only to switch back to 10. aggravating
title: mid-cancellation of rides are aggravating

review: jonathan drove us to the airport as fast as he legally could! he helped us make our flight on time. there was a ton of traffic and we were cancelled by our uber driver, jonathan came to the rescue!
title: Drives Like me

review: i heard about a recent (almost) kidnapping story and lyft didn't even apologize to the affected and didn't work with the police to solve this serious crime, as they didn't release the driver's license plate. i don't care how many good rides i've had with lyft, this is scary and them not caring shows a lot. i already deleted the app and won't be riding with lyft unless i hear their policy changed.
title: Release license plate to police for kidnapping case

review: love having an option to uber. dislike the extra fee for a scheduled ride and you really need to improve the tracker map for where your driver is, especially at airports.
title: Love having an option to Uber

review: jonathan is down to earth and just a solid person.  thank you for your military service and god bless!  i wish you much success in the future.
title: Personable and extremely nice.

review: you can kiss your job goodbye, you cannot trust lyft with a scheduled drop off, i just got my second write up because my ride canceled for the second time thanks to this company.
title: Good luck

review: it was late other driver canceled after waiting for 10 mins . so appreciate your time and hope u have a very happy holiday.
title: Safe and friendly

review:
i was a loyal lyft rider for five years, but after an atrocious experience with both a driver and the support team, i closed my account.

if you can't be bothered as an organization to advocate for the people loyally using and promoting your app for years when they're bringing serious concerns to your attention, then don't be surprised when they leave. thought you'd do better.
title: Left for Uber after 5 years

review: lyft the app is ok but their customer service is absolute garbage. you cannot get in contact via phone (they don't have a number), and their email services are also just bots. i constantly have drivers cancel on me without cause, and the safety feature is just a text. hey, are you ok? and if i am not? i have never had lyft ask to call authorities or anything. all for show.
title: Horrible Customer Service and Safety

review: it's impossible to get ahold of a real person to help you and when you finally do (if you do at all) they take forever to solve problems. plus they put holds on my card every single time i ride so i have to budget twice the fare every time. uber does not do this and is a vastly superior service. i only gave one star because i can't do zero. i would never ever recommend lyft!
title: Never using this garbage ever again

review: used to love the app, never had any problems, but recently prices have been rising and drives keep cancelling on me. i find it incredibly hard to find a ride anywhere anymore. i am now writing this review to complain after a driver has literally driven 5 minutes to pick me up, continued driving right past me, then cancelled. this is ridiculous, what changed???
title: Drivers don't stop cancelling

review: when trying to  schedule a ride our location was wrong on both my app and the drivers. this lead us to a completely wrong location 20 min away from where we were trying to go. even when we were finally at our proper location it still said we were in the wrong place.
title: Location inaccurate

review:
had trouble and issue with app storing to enter the specific address location to number
the driver has the same issue and mentioned it is the lyft app
title: Lyft App direction

review: disgusted to learn that lyft has been fighting a lawsuit since *2017* that simply asks them to use options on their app to help folks with motorized wheelchairs identify accessible rides. the technology already exists and lyft uses it in some places but refuses to expand it because since in their words they have no obligation to be ada accessible they decided they *willingly choose* not to be ada accessible.
title: LYFT doesn't care about people w/disabilities

review: toni was friendly, interested in her passenger and smooth and careful in her driving. hope to ride with her again sometime.
title: Friendly, competent

review: she was an excellent driver. very nice. i got stood up by the first driver, he didn't wait for us at the airport. it is a long walk from southwest terminal to outside and the driver left. so i rescheduled and this excellent driver picked us up. she was very considerate.
title: Excellent driver.

review: thank you for the ride and taking us home from the airport. i love your sharing and delightful conversation along the way. god bless and see you in a  bentley one day.
title: Great ride and super friendly Jeff.

review: i live in a very busy part of la and the app still can never find rides and will have you late for everything. drivers for good reason complain on how lyft flipped the splits so the drivers barely break even especially with gas prices. there's barely any drivers even in busy la because they're being screwed. fix the app lyft.
title: Never finds rides

review: i've used lyft for years and usually a big fan but over the last 2 months, i have tried to use lyft 4 times and every single time, i have been left stranded without any ride. i am in oakland and san francisco so not sure what is going on but the app is pretty much worthless to me at this point
title: Long time usercan't get a ride

review: $20 dollars one way is fair. $25 with gas prices rising understandable but when you get to $30 and even $40 for a one way it makes it almost impossible to use this if this if its your daily transportation to get to and from work. thats completely unreasonable! for another $10 i might as well fill their tank up. do better lyft. period!
title: Getting Pricey

review: sometimes uber has a lower price but most of the time it's lyft, plus i get hilton points every time i book, can't believe they're not turning a profit yet - great company!
title: Better than Uber

review: i feel like they are way too expensive at times for a little bit of miles sometimes 5 miles is 50 dollars .. so i'm paying 10 a mile ? ridiculous but other than that i feel safe in lyfts and the app is easy to use.
title: The app is alright.

review: i don't like how drivers can cancel on you, after you've been waiting over 10 minutes for them to arrive. worst part of it, on the map, they were literally around the corner when they cancelled.
title: Why are drivers able to cancel if you've been waiting a while?

review: when the rental car companies ran out of cars, guy came to the rescue and got us to the destination that was over an hour away. thank you so much!!!
title: Guy was the best!

review: i use to take only uber and been stood up by uber twice and still charged me. lyft drivers are always on time and very friendly.
title: Better

review:
the driver edwardo actually picked me up!
i have made many reservations and ordered cat service for local rides and it is normally a crapshooti was very police to see the award of actually shut up and showed up on tongue picked me up and brought me to the airport i was pleasantly surprised and very pleased thank you
title: Lucky today

review: after 2 years of not traveling, lyft is still my preferred mode of transportation when traveling for business.
title: Still the one!

review: i have been taking lyft for several years. whether traveling in another state or locally i have had really good experiences with lyft. thank you for helping me enjoy my travel adventures!
title: On the go

review: lyft needs to make it easier on people who want to bring their dogs along. they should be able to state this up front so drivers know and can respond or pass on the ride, accordingly.
title: Dogs

review: doesn't matter if you pay $10 or $100 for the ride. the drivers arrival time is always jacked. if you call a taxi it comes to you. these rides however drop who knows how many people off before they get to you. no wonder ride share companies have never actually turned a profit. good idea, terrible execution.
title: Watch your ride go anywhere but pick you up

review: lyft is way better than uber love it always takes me right where i need to go . no interruptions drivers are very professional and lovely.
title: Thanks best customer service

review: yesterday my friend and i were downtown and needed a ride and two lyft drives cancelled our ride because my friend was on a wheel chair, they seem to be so bothered by the fact that my friend was on a wheelchair and said we needed to write the drivers a note before they got there which completely doesnt make sense, my friend got really frustrated and felt completely discriminated against.
title: Discrimination agaisnt people with disabilities

review: lyft has left me stranded several times this week. they usually take over an hour to find a driver, then they cancel or switch to another driver. it's super unreliable. i've used the same payment method for the last 3 years, and tonight they refused my card and said there was a problem with my payment method. i had to walk 4.5 miles home in the dark alone
title: Lyft is money hungry trash

review: need to be able to adjust the drop off location on the app i live in rather big apartment complex and the gps only wants to recognize the office as point of interest as a drop off point which is not my front door
title: Precise location

review: when lyft knows it is late at night and not much traffic in a city it automatically overcharges. a normal $10 ride during the day or early night suddenly can cost double or triple the rate. and the last thing a lyft customer wants to do late at night is wait outside for 45 minutes or an hour just to get a more reasonable rate than the overcharged rate.
title: Lyft overcharges all the time

review: my rides are constantly being canceled. it's always when the driver is 3 mins or less away after i waited almost 10 minutes for them to get to me. just when i think to give lyft a chance the same thing happens again. why even bother i'm better off catching a yellow cab
title: So Unreliable

review: lyft has charged my card a combined ~$500 over the past several days despite no rides being taken or being shown in my history, and the charges are shown as pending on my card so i'm unable to dispute them yet. worse, there is no customer support to discuss this with and have the charges removed at lyft.
title: Charges with no associated ride, no chat support

review: i love using the lyft app it's so easy and fun. very affordable on certain times and be mindful of the amount you spend because they have offers and deals available.
title: Review for Lyft

review: request that you change the custom tip field to allow cents; i like to tip so the total is at an even dollar amount which make it easier for me spot scams.
title: Custom Tip

review: i was trying to book a car but i hadn't used it in awhile. when uploading a new card, it kept declining my purchase. i checked my accounts and there's no reason it should have rejected. i tried to book 4-5 times before i got it to work. it became more and more expensive every time. i will think twice before using your app again.
title: App gave me so much trouble

review: enjoyed my ride today and appreciate the prompt service and friendliness of the driver!  would recommend this service to others.  very appreciative!
title: Nice ride..friendly driver!

review: better than uber
title: Better than Uber and much easier to navigate through setting up an account

review: your maps are not accurate and are always giving the longer route. this is not convenient at all
title: Map accuracy

review: everything was great! only thing that was complicated for being first time user was the recommended pick location kept pinning away from us.
title: Everything was great!

review:
i been b so many situations 
where just because i gotten free rides
they wouldn't want to kome pick me up, and they would b i the are and still wait for u to cancel
title: I feel the pregnant lady

review: at least in my area - (20 miles east of detroit) lyft is  better than uber. maybe a few more bucks but well worth it! lyft doesn't cancel, and has friendly drivers that are on time.
title: Lyft not Uber!

review: with lots of light, cute snack baggies, and tigger in a santa hat as her co-pilot, i was delighted to get into this lyft. the holidays can be a little hum drum if you're not in the spirit and this driver certainly reminded me that christmas can be a very magical time! thank you!
title: This driver put my in the Christmas spirit!

review: i tried uber and had terrible experiences , i love lyfts app it's easy to navigate friendly and caring drivers who go above and beyond for any situation, thankful for them on every occasion! thank you!!
title: Honestly a relief !

review: history shows pickup and drop off to wrong addresses. zero time from pickup to destination to two different and wrong addresses. got charged and haven't been able to get charge reversed. tried to reschedule ride but couldn't get a time that would get rider to work on time, at best would be well over an hour late for a 3 hr shift. extremely unhappy.
title: Driver went to wrong address

review: our driver was on time, extremely kind, car was clean and he saved us money by helping me change address!
title: Safe and secure!

review: they cancelled my ride 15 minutes before pickup and suggested i schedule a new one. well that new one was going to cost over double the price to book. (from $50 to $104). seems like a convenient scam to get us to pay more when we are desperate. needless to say i'm just going to drive myself and pay the parking fees over giving anything else to this scummy company.
title: Cancelled my ride

review:
guy went out his way to get me.   my water pump had blown again in ten days.   he was a. certified mechanics.  explained to me on detail how water pump worked and that it might not be even that. 

nice dude.  hoped me with groceries.  bad day but great driver.
title: Great.

review:
lyft is more friendly 
the driver was friendly  and help me 
other i had from other company they don't even  come out of the car
title: Review

review:
haven't used lyft in awhile. but since i moved to dallas and need to use it, to & from the airport all drivers been amazing, car smells good, great energy, & most of all feeling safe. 

thank you
title: Great service

review: this app offers no way to view a breakdown of charges, especially when it comes to tolls. the app also does not allow for requesting to avoid toll roads. in my case, the app had the driver take a longer route via a toll road, instead of a shorter route on a toll-free road. this is a scam meant to drag out rides longer to make them cost more.
title: Scam to make rides longer and cost more

review: i've been taking lyfts to work for the past 3 weeks and the app is very bad with directions. lyft does not show the best route to take to get to the destination. on more than one occasion my driver had to stop so the app would load and tell them where to go.
title: Lyft rides

review: i will never use lyft again. they charge you for a ride and then put an additional hold on your card for the cost of the ride which takes up to seven days to release. also, good luck trying to get a hold of them because they do not have a customer service number were you can call and speak with someone.
title: Use Uber instead

review: what's the deal with the lyft app? for quite sometime when i've get a lyft and track the person picking me up, the car in the app goes a few feet and then spins like it can't make up its mind where it's going. the app is totally updated so i guess this is the new normal??
title: What gives?

review: need to bring the prices down a little bit more
title: Need to bring the prices down a little bit more

review: my lyft driver was very friendly and cordial, he was very knowledgeable and he shared that information that i didn't know about lyft, continue with the good service that they provided
title: Really enjoy my ride

review:
you guys have to be the most inconsiderate people ever. 
i do not like when you  find me another ride without asking or telling me why. 
i didn't ask for a different driver so why is my ride being switched sometimes to a less appreciated car and longer wait time. like that makes no sense to me. 
there should be an option for this so tired of it. 
happens way too often and you keep no record of it. 
also if i have to wait for a car that's fine but why cancel my ride because there are no available drivers but then when i rebook it's a higher price and my driver will arrive in 10 minutes.
title: Dissatisfied

review: lyft is convenient at times but you all do not have enough drivers and i think it's ridiculous that y'all are willing to charge $50 for a 6 min ride.please be mindful of the reason why you guys are providing this  affordable   service
title: Not enough drivers

review:
super nice very friendly great sense of humor good conversationalist and very efficient and we were 20 minutes early arriving 
thank you
title: Friendly smart and efficient with a great sense of humor

review: i loved this app it's way better than uber and they don't steal your money ! the prices are more cheap and it's not sketchy compared to the other app . best to have this one handy around la ;)
title: Best rides and prices

review: easy to use app, set it up and got a ride in less than 10 minutes.
title: Cheaper than Uber, Same service

review: best option for getting a ride. friendly and hard working drivers
title: Best Option

review: let drivers know how long the trip is going to be this app will be better so they won't cancel
title: Lyft drivers need to know how far the trip will be

review: i booked a trip on the app that said the driver was supposed to be at pickup location in 4-14 minutes why is it that 45 minutes later i'm outside looking for driver and it says that he still hasn't finished his previous ride i was late for work because of this and will be uninstalling the app until i begin hearing better things about it.
title: Lied to about pickup time

review:
i schedule a lyft and i have a driver five or ten minutes away, suddenly the ride is canceled and i have to wait 30 more minutes for a ride that i scheduled the day before. stop stealing drivers from customers who had scheduled with you the day before. it's inconsiderate.

also, why does it cost 30$ for me to go less than 5 miles?
title: If I schedule a Lyft I expect it to show up on time

review: great driver. safe. was there to pick me up exactly when he said he would. felt more like he was a friend than someone i just met. i'm very happy with him and lyft for hiring such professional people.
title: Clifford Averre

review: whenever i use lyft, my drivers are always on time. the prices are convenient. and i like how the app works!
title: 10/10 would recommend

review: i just started traveling again after the pandemic and when i turn on the lyft app, i was shocked to see prices that were not at all competitive with uber and the app could not connect me to a driver despite numerous attempts and deleting and reinstalling the app. i'm not sure what the problem is but until this improves drastically i will be switching back to uber.
title: Doesn't work anymore

review: i couldn't think of a better way to be transported around the city the driver that was sent to me was respectful responsible and very considerate i will be traveling with a lyft here on out.
title: My first experience with Lyft

review: always quick, clean cars & appropriate, friendly drivers
title: Highly recommend

review: absolutely loved the customer service did very great and kept everything nice and clean, very polite! would definitely recommend a friend with y'all!!
title: Service was great!!

review: my sister did a bonus and literally took forever to get it since there was no request until she did it and she ended up not getting the bonus and she contacted lyft and the only thing they said was that there will be more bonuses soon. like dude what..
title: Fraud?

review: when a driver is 1 or 2 minute away, the app will often replace your driver with someone 10min away. you'll often end up going to meet the cab only to realize you still have a while to wait.
title: App cancels drivers last minute

review: thank you robinson for getting us home from our dinner and drinks! you were very courteous and kind, while driving is safely home!! thanks again!!
title: Safe and courteous!

review: once you visit the bigger cities, this app is a must. this makes getting around very easy.
title: Not much use in small town America, but

review: the drivers never showed up and then i have cancel the ride.
title: Last two request

review: after first ride got messed up somehow we finally got another lyft who went to wrong pick up but found us where it said ride share; which is we're we were for both rides but first one never showed up and we got charged an extra $5 for no show when we were there !
title: Lift ride

review: this person was the best lyft driver i never had. she was filibuster and she had a clean car. i gotta tell you though. the clown in the backseat was kind of a turn off. and it was alive. hmmm. k. but if you like to take risks. she's your fare.
title: Wow

review: i feel guilty for using this app because i know the drivers are not taken care of.
title: Pay your drivers more

review: i absolutely love this app! it's super simple to use and shows turn by turn tracking. when your driver is going to show up and where! love it so much !
title: Love this app!

review: i can't give lyft a 5- star rating for the past, but today, with my driver jose, it was a 5-star ride.  he was cordial, friendly, accommodating, polite, and professional. he is restoring my faith in lyft.
title: Expensive but Reliable

review: i swear by lyft. compassionate drivers, good and easy to use app and i get there on time. the drivers are flexible and nice to talk to. i had a problem told the company and they immediately reached out and asked for details.
title: Best rider app

review: i literally hate this app it always sends the driver the longest route to my house and makes them take unnecessary turns and routes they can never directly find me and the rides are always expensive no matter if it's a two minute drive or 30.. it's made me late for multiple appointments and events. you're better off using a different way of transportation
title: worst ever

review: lov the fact that you can easily schedule ahead and you are always shown that it went thru and are reminded of it.
title: Best of the private apps

review: i cannot believe that a ride with lyft to the same place is 74$ and the same ride with uber is 18$ i tried to get help to see if my app was wrong and lyft would not help me at all
title: What's wrong with Lyft

review: on our travels we came across a roadblock and we had to detour and my driver was familiar with the area and got us through the roadblock quickly.
title: Road block

review: my app isn't working properly - i can't view the map during the drive because the ride detail page is covering it up and i can't minimize it
title: Problem with viewing map

review:
had to wait 30 min after i paid for a  driver within the next 15 minutes. 2 minutes before that driver arrived, they canceled. then i had to wait another 20 min for a second driver. at this time, lyft decided to remove a discount from my ride resulting in the trip costing me an additional 10 dollars. 

the reliability of this app is worsening. don't recommend.
title: Over an hour wait

review: i really liked the atmosphere of riding in the car with him he had a gospel music playing and it really lived at my soul this morning helped me to start my workday off on the right foot
title: Miss Marvin

review: i'm a b/i gay person in inner city chicago. when i tell you - two rides canceled on me, when i had already stepped outside to a dangerous area? when i thought it was safe??  because i had a ride??? people were taunting me as i waited. im sure theyre charging me extra just for asking for a ride and not going to a bus. i feel so stupid for using this service. cuz i literally put myself at risk twice.
title: for your own safety, DON'T

review: i love taking lyft when i don't have my personal car to drive. if you want a clean, fresh, and less expensive way to get around use lyft.
title: Cheap ride

review: the first driver given to cancled my ride on realising that im a wheelchair user but im happy for muhamad he was a very good driver please educate more on drivers about non descrimination and i want my 5 dollars of cancelation back to my account
title: First driver canceled bse im a wheel chair user

review: been using this app for the longest and it won't let me pay for anything it just wants to act up whenever it wants and i hate it it makes me late and i don't think i wanna use this app anymore horrible service with rude driver too
title: Won't let you pay or anything and lie about EVERYTHING

review: i ordered a ride, it said a few minutes away. but after i placed and confirmed it lyft didn't have a confirmation on a driver and i waited a few minutes to find one. then after they finally found one, it stayed it was another 10 minutes away i was already paying high fir the location. it just seems crazy to me but the driver i did have was great so nice
title: Lyft lied

review: almost made me miss my international flight. if lyft allows this, then i will not be using this service in the future. don't need the added stress when traveling. you should comp my ride today, i didn't need this. oh and i was charged before that driver ever showed. all i can say is tg the 2nd driver marcus could pick me up about 10 mins later. he was great!
title: Ride to SFO cancelled at exact time driver was scheduled to arrive

review: so convenient, here to serve you when you most need the service! also, the  app is friendly user and easy to navigate!
title: Lyft Ride

review:
the app is very cumbersome

you can get to the schedule portion but it's unnecessarily complicated and tedious.  there should be easy access to various functions
title: Service is good. The app needs help

review: on 1st experience using lyft, i was not pleased when lyft charged me 2 $5 fees to cancel my trip when i specifically requested the driver pick me up after 6:15 pm. however drivers never bothered to check messages from customer. i find that neglectful on whom ever is responsible and by no means should i bear that responsibility. not sure what decision to make. carpenter
title: Not so happy

review: consistently better than uber, every single time, regardless of where i am in the country. always satisfied with lyft!
title: Always the best option

review: never used lift before until today because i could not find a uber driver. the lift driver was awesome and help me out a great deal. i'm a lift fan now and will get my employees to use lift as well. thank you.
title: CEO

review: i had just put the lyft app on my phone before i ordered the ride. i had waited on a taxi for over an hour. my lyft was at my location in 4 minutes.
title: Amazed

review:
done with your company i was charged yesterday for service that never took place and you driver waseem never showed, 2 weeks ago you charged me $3.25 for canceling my ride since it was going to take a long time for the driver to show up and my flights would be missed, so you punish me with a fee because you don't have drivers close, shame on you and your company.

barbari love
title: Unhappy

review:
my first and only ride was late at night, i wanted to rate him later. you don't allow it!
so annoying.  
brian was 5 star. add that to his record.  
cec
title: You don't let me rate the driver later

review: scheduling a ride doesn't mean anything - whether or not you'll be able to get picked up depends on whether any drivers are available and will accept the ride. drivers consistently cancel a ride after i've been waiting for them - using lyft is just a frustrating experience.
title: Unreliable

review: sper friendly and safe without being slow!  so much better than the taxi ride we took earlier!
title: Great driver

review: why the lyft rider doesn't have an option when ordering a lyft to not have a share ride b4 the pandemic riders had a choice?? somebody tell me why bcause imma have to go back to taxi cabs
title: Riding/share rides!!

review: lyft is mostly cheaper and often shorter waits.  drivers are mostly more friendly.  not 100% but when i have a choice i pick lyft.
