review: great to have as service but my problem is when the rides are cancelled often.
title: Service

review: driver called right away to confirm my location. was helpful in explaining how to navigate and offered best places to eat. car was clean. ride was safe. thank you!
title: Great Service

review: after being dropped off, i tried scheduling a return ride, but kept getting an error message stating there was a poor connection. it wouldn't allow me to tip it until 5:12.
title: Lyft app

review: the app prompts you to pay more to be picked up earlier but it doesn't seem to matter which price tier you choose or what the predicted time of arrival is. you get whichever driver is closest to you and the predictions are wrong no matter which price tier you select.
title: Incorrect wait times

review: we waited 15 min for driver he showed up and told me that he could not take us because we were too many (we were 4-my husband and my kids). then i was charged $7 dollars for canceling when he was the one that told me to cancel and get another driver.
title: Rude driver

review: would really make my life easier if the app had a apple watch version like uber and i could call lyft without my phone and just my watch. could you please consider making a watch version of the app? thank you!
title: Would appreciate Apple Watch support

review: we were able to relax a little bit without noisy music. the car smells clean and there is clean air inside.
title: Clean car - no loud music- smooth drive.

review: good experience with lyft always. only when i get emails offering discounts i have no way of implementing those discounts in the system.
title: Discounts offered in emails

review: my first lyft ride was very easy to schedule.  app let's you know where the driver is and when he will arrive.  driver was very friendly and a safe driver.  look forward to future lyft rides!
title: First Lyft Ride

review: i would like to say that i find this service to be of world class caliber and quality . love what y'all did with the upgraded vehicles . looking clean randys
title: The service is top notch

review: the driver drove past us. then changed the pick up location to three blocks away. he accused me of entering the location incorrectly. i doubt this was the case as the bellman from the hotel told me our exact address.
title: Wrong pick up location

review: the past 3x i've tried to use, the driver blows past me and says he picked me up, charged me for the ride and left me on the curb. last time, the driver got stuck at a traffic light while trying to drive past, i knocked on the window and he said he wasn't my ride, despite the fact that the make, model and tag matched by rideagain.
title: Driver does not pick up and charges for ride

review:
i'll call for a ride, get matched with a driver, wait 15 minutes for them only to have them cancel so i have to start the whole process all over. i assume they cancel because they see a better fare opportunity. but if i cancel that far into a wait, i get charged? 
this app is pointless if the drivers will never actually show up.
title: Basically pointless

review: the app works well most of the time, except when it cancels a driver that's 2 minutes away and replaces it with a driver that's 9 minutes away, leaving me to wait in the freezing cold at midnight at the end is a long restaurant shift. that's why you get the 1 star.  the amount of rage that i feel at that moment is hard to describe. are you listening, corporate ? hello ? anyone there ???
title: Bait and switch

review:
my bank account has had multiple fraudulent charges from lyft, which do not show up on my lyft account nor do i get notified of these. i have tried to contact their customer service and got 1 response. it's been a month now and no other replies of any sort.
i will be going with uber in future. 

i am considering legal action.
title: Weak information protection and customer service

review:
i truly appreciate the service when i need to pick up medication or a quick run to walmart.
thank you for having this community service for seniors.
title: Senior Helper

review: seems like there is a bit of increase in ride cancellation. that is annoying to have a ride scheduled, wait and then have it cancelled. waste of time.
title: Ride Cancellation

review:
never a problem getting a ride
& nice & friendly drivers
title: Always reliable

review: 4 of us trying to use uber to get from del frisco steakhouse to boston convention center n taking over 25 min n i suggested i use lyft!!! well guess what ? lyft was there less than 4 min!!! better off using lyft !!
title: Lyft came thru

review: thank you for having good drivers i took my mom to the hospital and used lyft on the way home. he waited patiently as my mom got in the car slowly he did a good job !!!! thanks again !!!!!!
title: My first Lyft

review: lyft drivers are extremely timely, cars are typically very clean, and the drivers obey the traffic laws making me feel safe whenever i use them.
title: Easy

review: while our driver was excellent, we had wanted to change the pickup time , but could not do that. can y'all change that?
title: Can we edit pickup times?

review:
i got a ride a while ago, and noticed my driver was going over 90mph. when i contacted the company to report the incident later, the safety team member laughed and compared my experience to a carnival ride, before telling me that there was nothing they could do since the incident hadn't happened recently.

needless to say i do not feel comfortable using lyft, as they do not handle any safety issues seriously.
title: Unsafe

review: wayyy cheaper then uber  way better all around the freaking board! can't wait till they come out with quick and easy lyft cards! in the stores
title: Better then uber

review:
the ride to the airport was okay except that the driver was rude and unprofessionalhe opened the rear door from inside the car and one our suitcases ejected from the car since it was lodged on the door! the suitcase hit the pavement hard and left very deep scratches but luckily nothing was damagedi use lyft for it's convenience i hope the service providers too act professionally! in future no business with this driver!
***no tips deserved***
title: Driver ReviewAndrew Abe

review: the last several times i've used lyft drivers have driven poorly and been honked at by other drivers who had to swerve to avoid being hit by them. today i pre booked my ride three hours ahead and when i wasn't outside in the first three minutes i got a notification saying i would be left behind soon. the driver has a ten minute window but i don't!
title: Hating it!

review: better prices then uber, but still a bit expensive. that being said i've always had great service!
title: Great service

review:
andrew was simply outstanding,he stopped to let me use the restroom,he offered to give me a hand with my tote, as i am disabled,and most importantly he drove me safely.
he has my sincere thanks.

scottie williams
title: Review on my ride with Andrew

review: this was my first time using lyft. the app worked wonderfully. my driver arrived promptly and he (robert) was very courteous. i will certainly use your services again when the opportunity requires.
title: My 1st Lyft ride

review: it's annoying i wait for 9 min and then the driver canceled it. today 3 times happened to me and now, i'm late!
title: Canceling people until they're getting late!

review:
have tried lyft three times. drivers and cars were fine. two objections-
1) lyft app took longest possible route
2) expected wait time for ride always changes from the initial time noted in app and after the ride has been scheduled. has been up to double the expected wait time. very disappointed.
title: Unsatisfactory

review: we have used lyft for the two days we've been in nashville and the drivers have been personable, friendly, and professional.
title: Perfect!

review: i really want to see the map of my ride full screen. instead, on my iphone, it's just a small patch at the top of the screen, with a lot of useless info taking up the rest of the screen. very frustrating!!!
title: Why is the map so small??

review: i have only used uber in the past, i travel nationally and internationally,  this was  my first time with lyft. uber app not as friendly user  as lyft. there  seems to be no uber in santa fe new, mexico. if traveling in new mexico and colorado area use lyft.
title: Lyft

review: the pending arrival time on the app does't always seem correct. starting g time was 7 minuets and 5 minutes later it still showed 7 minutes. not sure how that can be?!
title: Pending arrival time

review: i have been a long time 5 star customer of lyft. recently i selected a wait and save fare from las vegas airport to a relatives house. when i selected the fare it was approximately $38. after i confirmed my pickup lyft increases the price to $70 without warning. their solution is to stand by their deceitful practice and to tell me the issue is being taken seriously. no credit was offered. i will no longer utilize their service.
title: Dishonest

review: very happy with the efficiency, professionalism and friendly service!  looking forward to using again!
title: Service

review: time and again cheaper than uber with similar if not faster wait times
title: Glad I checked.

review: lyft drivers are uniformly pleasant and welcoming when you enter their vehicle. some are excellent conversationalists while others are quiet. but all are welcoming, which makes for a comfortable, relaxed drive.
title: Pleasant company

review: over the past few months i've noticed that the app won't allow riders to see the map (on iphone at least).  makes it impossible to see where the pickup actually is most of the time and it's  dangerous as you can't tell where the driver is going.   for such a supposed safety conscious company this is a real let down.
title: The app has become unsafe.

review: wonderful driver and friendly also courteous. offered wrapped mints and water. car was very clean and he was very easy to find. great communication felt safe with him.
title: Driving

review: lyft is absolutely horrible. they expect $52 for a 15 minute drive down the road? most of us use this because we can't afford a car but you make us pay this price. i am also sick of drivers accepting a ride then canceling it and then never having another driver taking it so you get left stranded. i really cannot wait for uber and lyft to go under and be forgotten.
title: Done

review: i highly recommend it's fast quick and you also get perks when you use them a lot
title: Top Knotch Services

review:
the first driver who was to pick us at the airport (his name was gevod) never showed up! lyft told us he was there waiting for us and that he would only wait for us for five minutes! and then they said they were going to charge us for his inconvenience
the next driver, moe, was excellent: personable, punctual and polite!
title: Good and bad!

review: this is such a horrible app. they take the majority of the sur charge from the drivers (70%) and they take you on the most un-efficient route so they can gouge more money from you. uber is so much more cohesive and straight forward. the mapping for lyfts routes is not sensible and their time estimates are never accurate, a 7 morning minute wait easily turns into 25. this app is a waste of time
title: Horrible compared to Lyft

review: i've been sitting on the lyft all for 25 minutes and one driver who isn't but maybe 5 minutes away from my house hasn't moved. the ride i wanna take usually cost between 15-20$ right now to do wait and save it would be $80 having low amount of drivers shouldn't mean prices go through the roof. nobody wants to take a 10 minute ride that cost $80
title: Ride cost

review: i was in need of a ride at a desperate hour and the app came through and had the best price.  i would recommend as they are consistently competitive!
title: Best price at the best time

review: i used to use this app. but it's really not a useful app anymore. it's more like an expensive inconvenience. please rename lyft to maps because all i get from this app is an estimation of travel time never an actual ride. improve communication between drivers and customers. or let the area know there are no available drivers at all asap!
title: Dang Drivers are not available at all

review: family section is messed up, once i added someone to family, anytime i click on the family tab it no longer goes to the family section. so i if i wanted to remove them i can't now. or i can't view it just in general.
title: Fix family section, so I can remove people as well.

review: lyft is the worst app i've ever used. wait times  are consistently wrong and inaccurate. i got a lyft with a driver that was 3 minutes away and they didn't move for five minutes. same with the next driver. lyft doesn't update you on your drivers location and so the cars just stay in the same spot for a while. horrible app and my last time using them
title: Worst app ever

review: driver was half a block away then cancelled. never happens with any other service. if you're going to charge customers for making drivers wait then you should give credits for bad experiences like this. until then i'll be skipping lyft

review: always on time with friendly drivers
title: Always on time

review: keldrick was great! my first lyft ride. great representative of your company. we talked & laughed the entire time. got dropped off at the rental car counterwasn't an option for me to selectonly airlines thanks again keldrick!

review: i have found lyft drivers and the lyft app to be more user friendly and i have had great experiences with all the friendly drivers. 5 stars
title: All Lyft Drivers are so nice and accommodating

review: would be nice to have an option for cars that have a car seat for children

review: i have been using lyft for a few years. the past few days have been horrible!! i have used the same bank card information and now it won't take it and it has meade me late for work. i ultimately had to use uber and i'm not a fan of them!! help me!!!

review: the ride said they would be there in 13 mins , i watched as he missed 3 turn offs on i4 and did not respond to my calls or text, giving him the benefit of the doubt i waited before canceling but he should have canceled him self or never accepted. i'm now late to work and will be getting a write up  i would post the screenshots if that was applicable.

review: clint and his truck were outstanding in every way. he was very helpful loading my heavy suitcase into his truck and unloading it at the airport.

review:
i shouldn't have to remember to go back into the app after getting dropped off.

please let me select my tip up front before even getting in the car, and leave it editable until the end of the day.

review: on a recent trip to las vegas we utilized lyft services numerous times. the drivers were exceptional! they were courteous.   they arrived very quickly.  the vehicles were very clean.  great experience with some great people!

review: couldn't adjust my pick up time when my flight got delayed: had to cancel ride and start over. otherwise app is really easy to use
title: Adjusting pick up

review: i ordered a lyft and the driver immediately started driving the opposite direction. clearly a scam. i ordered an uber and continued to watch the lyft driver drive away. it was canceled after an hour. when i tried to complain some other poor driver got the feedback since he was the last driver to give me a ride. i've not had that experience with uber and will stay with it in the future.
title: Scammer drivers

review: i love lyft it never let me down pick up is very quick,they are very clean professional and safe, affordable love it love it. try it you won't regret it put that on everything i love

review:
whenever i type in an address, the app thinks that i am in new york city, because it shows nyc addresses. i am no where near new york city. why does the app think i am in new york city? if i turn on location services, i don't have the problem because the app uses my location. 

is there anyway to fix this problem? 

thanks
title: Wrong City

review: brandon was simply awesome in the way he took care of my daughter. her flight got canceled, he picked her up, got her to her hotel safely and i am forever grateful to him. this brother is trustworthy and he cares!!!

review: there's no notification when car has arrived.

review: i requested a lyft less than 5 minutes from my house to get my children some snacks for school from the neighborhood gas station. i asked if i can run in i came out less than 3 mins later he had left and i walked home which was also less than 5 mins away. i use lyft at least 1 day a week he was the most disappointing. never again.
title: Worst driver I ever had

review: i ordered a normal ride and 4-5 people canceled on me and 1 guy was 3 mins out everyone else gave me false hope with 15+ mins away and im here waiting patiently out in the cold but they cancel after 7 - 10 min so im here like maybe lyft is just a bad app if drivers i get cancel on me and i get reassigned to just get cancelled on again

review: if you are offering a coupon for cheaper ride and i select to wait 5-10 mins which turns into 30 mins to get to the booking you a ride screen how about you don't have it then indefinitely sit like that until it gets so late and cold that we go with a far more expensive standard pick up that arrives within 5 minutes

review: if i schedule a ride it costs 150% of the normal price. also, if a driver shows up late and i've already left i still get a charge. usually $10 for them being incompetent. we're i to cancel that ride after they're late it's still the same charge. yet i have 5 minutes to get to the ride. if i miss it then i also get charged the fee. ridiculous.

review:
keeping the prices reasonable will keep me
being a steady customer.  waiting time under
control is a big plus!

review: outstanding he cares about his customers jessa a awesome lyft driver one is just awesome i can't stop saying clean car patients see you the music yeah he rocks god bless him thank you for sending him

i used it once from the airport, driver was late do to traffic. not a big deal but it won't let me schedule a ride for tomorrow because i'm not at the location i want to be picked up at tomorrow. a one time, last time user.

lyft bike was a huge disappointment charge $12 for 25 minutes for a bike low on battery don't waste your money on the ebikes!!!

review: this is the worst app for traveling . when i'm in a different state and do not know where i am going. this app is only allowing you to be picked up in certain areas which is not convenient. i suggest everyone go back to using a cab or allowing us to be picked up where we are currently at . especially if i'm paying with my money !

review: we had a pleasant ride. very informative and friendly rider. thank you for giving us all the local tips.

review: this is the worst app i ever installed on my phone. every time i check the price of a trip, not a single time have i seen a comparable price. not sure if any one at lyft is giving a thought about pricing or may be i am at the lowest rung of customer service in lyfts list. it always charges 1.5 times or so higher than its competitor. why would i pick lyft ever? service is almost the same.

review: riders need an end ride button for when we plan multiple stops and plans suddenly change so that the driver isn't waiting nor riding the clock pretending not to have received the riders text or phone call.

review: i give em rides are good but not better than uber. they got they problems but lyft let's the customers rip you off and won't dispute it or even let you contact them. as soon you tell them someone didn't end trip after dropping hypo and kept going for over 30 min they say we'll look into it and days go by and never respond.

review: i've never had a bad ride with lyft, no matter where i am in the country. clean cars, friendly drivers and some have offered water or juice.

review:
release new update. thanks

thanks for issuing the update fix quickly!!  5 star again

review: eduardo went beyond my expectations. i thought i was gonna miss the ride but he waited and looked for us! felt safe with his driving and he was very polite! 5 stars for sure!

title: Poor Service and Fares

review: they literally play hot potato with your demand for a ride. passing you around while increasing the wait time with each new driver. i have been waiting for almost an hour and i have been passed around 4 times already. each time getting longer and longer of a wait time. uber may be more pricey but they are trustworthy. truly atrocious.
title: Worse service

review: lyft continues to have the worst sense of time. just go ahead and double or triple every estimation they give of a) when your driver will be booked b) when your driver will arrive. they shouldn't even bother. just say, probably after a while? we don't know.

review: i paid for two stops but the driver was gone when i came back out because lyft stopped the ride at the first stop but still took the faur for two stops and then they have no customer service for the drivers or the customers this is so that they are not held accountable for taking what they want from you
title: Stealing money from customers

review: in many occasions lyft has disappointed their drivers are sometimes careless and reckless. they sometimes refuse to take you to your final destination or some unknown reason cancel the ride after they're literally a minute away. this happens too often and my reports to customer service just go unanswered most lying so thats even more of a joke.

review: my driver was prompt, found my address with little to no issue. i rarely use  lift or competition, however due to my experience i will not hesitate to use lift more often!

title: Gift Card Scam

review: this app is terrible like overcharge you to got down the street extremely long wait times the will find a driver then cancel it and have you waiting 10 minutes to find another driver. no customer service yet charges all this money for what? then i pay for 3 min priority ride and they give me a 17 min ride like wth y'all doing a lot wasting my time.

review: i was requesting a ride to work, i got cancelled 3 times and change the drivers, the app was doing the same for at least 20 minutes just choosing different drivers every 2 minutes, it was so frustrating since for that, now i'm running late for work. i finally taking uber it was the most easy and faster way..

review:
was very professional and helpful considering it was a long ride. would recommend him for anyone
 thank you

review: this has happened twice in a row now. i booked a ride to work and the driver stopped at pick n save for 10 minutes on his way. what was supposed to be a 7 minute pickup took 22 minutes. the driver then stopped again near my pickup location and that's when i lost it. decided to take metro transit and waited 6 more minutes than spending $15 on lyft.
title: Awful drivers

review: dumb kid left his shoes in a car. got ahold of driver who said they had them and would bring by later. lyft decided it wasn't their issue since they are not responsible for left items. since lyft didn't care driver decided they were going to keep the shoes. didn't show up and refuse to return or answer calls. sad and pathetic that a company would condone or even encourage such behavior.

review: we want to give robert 5 stars.  he was courteous and a safe driver.  we would request him again.   my husband tipped him very well.   lyft is so much easier to request a ride than uber.

review: one of the best drivers i ever had. friendly understanding and patient with me didn't over talk car super clean safe driver wish i could get him every time.
title: Driver

review:
i was shocked by the price i had to pay. next time i will probably take a taxi. 

my first driver went to the wrong place and didn't speak english and couldn't tell me where she was. i was at terminal b she could barely communicate she was at terminal a and column 28.

i ran to terminal a to column 28 couldn't find her. i ran up and down the walkway looking for her, asking her for her help and she could tell me because she didn't speak english.

then that ended when i was assigned to a new driver and ran back to terminal b i had to wait another 15 minutes for the driver to get me in the same place the other person was supposed to be. 

my worst lyft experience ever!!
title: Not Happy

review:
lyft always shows up and has great drivers that are friendly. such a great service. safe on bad weather and i arrive in better shape having ridden with lyft 
rebecca stephenson

review: the uber driver jack  provided great customer service, and went above and beyond to make sure my nephew and his friend made it home safely. i pray if i have to use lyft again i get jack. thank you jack you are awesome!!!!

review: when we talk about economical and receiving better service than other companies i've used; lyft stands head and shoulders above the rest.  my lifts are with lyft from now on. thanks lyft

i use other alternative ways if i can. it used to be a good company that didn't drain your bank account.

after that i select another and i had to stop him, so almost loose it again.

don't get too excited if a driver is confirmed, it's likely to switch several drivers a s arrival times before you get a car. 
like all new economy apps, we eventually arrive at an even worse equilibrium.

thanks min!

review: had always taking lyft to head my way to work, lately the app has been overcharging me up to $60 dollars more of my ride. for someone that rides everyday to work and uses lyft pretty constant felt a bit played, frustrated they dont give any answer as to why they overcharging. drivers say they dont get pay enough but the app charges $90 dollars for a 13 mile ride.

review: very friendly and clean. easy going conversation if you want to. he is a family man wanting to provide excellent service.

review: the only problem i'm having is being over charged $48 for a 6min ride that usually cost $10. now i only have $23 because i have to wait for all these pending transactions to give me back my money. now i can't get any rides to work
title: So/so

review: i usually pay about 16-18 dollars for a ride to work  but as soon as it rains the price sky rockets up from $70-85 for a 10 min drive?!? it's ridiculous! as well as waiting for the driver or the driver constantly canceling on us. the wait time is a lie i would have to wait longer than the wait time even if it's scheduled or not! this is really making me rethink about using lyft.

review: barbara was an amazing driver. very safe and courteous. i would love to have her again as my driver and would refer her to family in friends if that were an option!

review: there should be a way to report drivers who cancel on you. it took me almost an hour to get a driver after getting constantly cancelled on including after waiting over 15 minutes. you have no recourse. i'll definitely be driving myself from now on. tired of being stranded.

review: i just want a ride home and i have to wait 20 minutes and pay an absurd amount. uber is faster and 2x more  expensive but 100% worth it. i cancelled my ride bc it took too long and they still charged me 5$. this app is a joke. just call an uber bc they will leave you stranded all night long. would leave 0 stars if u could and i never review.
title: This app is the worst

review: i recently got an email from lyft telling me that a driver had said that i had a mask issue (not wearing one or wearing improperly)! i don't know which driver said this but it is a lie or i was mistaken for another rider!!!!! i double mask and never take them off!!!! when i try to notify lyft, i get re-routed to other places!!!

review: needs to remember our home address correctly.
title: Needs to remember our home address correctly.

review: i spent a lot of money usk g lyft today and my longest ride was very hot.  i had a mask on but my face is small and it falls down under my nose.  i kept pulling it up, and then my driver gives me a heath rating instead of offering to lower the heat or open a window.  why as a. adult she couldn't say something is beyond me?  seriously, i am very disappointed!  it's petty and childish when we are all adults.
title: Disappointed

review: your drivers will leave way to fast after eating for 2 minutes for someone to come out if their house . need to do something about that
title: Review

review: keep on truck n.  my drive was professional. the four door truck was huge and smm it and quite, even with an open window.

title: Terrible customer service

review: driver didn't pick me up and drove to the location and i reported this and they said the driver picked me up when he didn'ti even have proof but can't seem to get a hold of anyone in customer service they want you to report everything through the app so they can quickly deny things with no explanation

review: i have always preferred lyft over uber. there are better cars, better service, and usually better drivers.

review: within the last two weeks lyft had been having drivers drive all the way to you just to cancel the ride on them and you to find a closer driver then they give you a driver that's 15 minutes away when the other driver was only 4 minutes away or 3. lyft you need to get your apps algorithm together.

review: headed to airport, scheduled in advance, car was about 5 minutes out when i got the notice that i missed my ride. the driver was on the way to me an canceled. i had to scramble to fine another ride who could pick me up within minutes.

review: lyft driver at airport did not pick me up but activated the ride like i was in the car. watched the tracker as he drove to my neighborhood. still got charged. tried to contact lyft but the app and the website kept sending me in circles with no way to actually speak/text/email a person. i've had decent experiences u til now, will never use lyft again. use at your own risk.

review: my driver , brandon, was the best.  we talked throughout the rush hourdrive and when i discovered that i left my phone in his car, he turned around and drove it back to me. what a sweetheart !!!!!!
title: Superior

review: driver was awesome. i really appreciate him making my daughter ride home safe. he also made sure she made it to the door before driving off
title: Driver

review: i literally looked up an uber to my mothers home from downtown west chicago to calumet city and the lyft was nearly $100! then when i looked on uber it was $46.this is totally getting out of control like seriouslyi remember when rides were $30.you went from replacing taxis to becoming worse than them! thumbs down !!!

review: lately the wait times are much longer. last night i order a lyft at 6:01 and it said a car would be there in 9 minutes and then that car did not come, waited for another one and finally got a car around 6:30. poor experience and will consider taking a regular cab if this continues.

review: i like lyft better than uber overall.  they are nicer more professional and don't drive off with my belongings or flirt in a questionable way.  they are terrific.

i cant count how many times my ride will be around the corner or arriving soon and as i go downstairs i'll get a notification that my new ride is ten minutes away. these last minute swaps are extremely frustrating and incredibly unprofessional. this happens the majority of the time when i use lyft. terrible car service.

tldr: this app is garbage just get uber or take the bus.

review: i am sick of the drivers counseling on me, when they read my notes stating that i am blind and in traveling with a service animal. i really think that is unfair of them to do that, and i don't understand why lyft let them get away with it.

review: not show me when it's 45 minutes or longer why i was at the airport and popped up a ride and sent me to cape may new jersey hi destination put in north east philadelphia it was gps atrocious not sending me anywhere close to where are you south west south west

review: george was super cool one of the best lyft drivers i've had if not the best!! made me laugh  he was patient friendly and overall just a nice guy!! thank you thank you for being so kind

pay your workers better. they deserve fair pay and fair benefits. a fair day's pay for a fair day's work. 

by not doing so, you're pushing away good and experienced drivers for those who may in more desperate situations. that puts everyone, drivers, passengers, and all people on the roadways, in greater danger because of your cheapness and greed. 

not the makings of a true american company.
title: Do better for your drivers

review:
average experience ordering a lyft: it'll tell you you'll get a ride in something like 9 minutes, it'll take them 5 minutes alone to locate a driver, the driver will be 15 minutes away, wait 10 minutes then the driver will cancel. repeat until you decide you might as well just use uber.

terrible service.
title: Horrible

review: and i'm saying this from nyc on friday at 1am - which is considered early. use uber instead if you need to get home safe late at night. even if lyft is saving you 5 dollars at least uber is reliable. it's clear that uber is paying these drivers more
title: Not enough drivers

review: since we were going to drink this was a great and safe way to go.  very fast and nice rides.  i will start using this much more back on maui.
title: Great way to get around

review: this is the third or fourth time they disabled my account i got a ride this morning and the driver asked me to stop at the store which was odd since no one was there i don't know what i did i didn't have anything in the car
title: They disabled my account

review: i've ridden them all and lyft is far and away the best.  plus they give back to the community.  great people, great business, great company.
title: Greatest ride share service there is

review:
hey lyft! your app crashed three times and reset me so i missed my connection and now i'll be late for physical therapy even though i left work early. also now i'm being rained on. 

but what gave you one star is the fact that you won't let me put this feedback in your app. 

100 ways to report my driver (who was great!); zero ways to report an issue with your app.
title: No in app feedback

review: i have yet to have a driver arrive at the time specified when i book the trip.  it's silly.  you lose credibility.  please adjust the algorithm to project a reasonable driver arrival time.  when it says 3 minutes, the is really 7.
title: Driver arrivals

review: i am still upset that i had to rent a car when i went to florida because lyft could never deliver a car even though i had reserved it the day before. the last minute charges on the rental car at that point were over $1000 which hurt me severely in the pocketbook. i'm still hoping that lyft is going to remedy that at some point.
title: Still Upset

review: i was so busy that by the time i had a chance to review my day & tip my drivers, i couldn't find a way to do so. please update your app to accommodate my late tips.
title: Tips

review: drivers were great. on my return, my driver was changed multiple times. i was not informed that the price nearly doubled. that was very disappointing because i was not informed prior to seeing the charge after i was home. that is a poor business model.
title: Confused

review: i gave jennifer five stars because she was friendly she knew that i was uptight going to the drivers license office she was very calming and she drove safely and offered her assistance if i needed a ride home through lyft
title: Jennifer

review: i find lyft to be fairly dependable and usually readily available. however i do find their inconsistency in fairs and in the time they say it's gonna take a car to arrive flaws that need to be corrected.
title: Lyft Experience

review:
honestly what's the point of having a help center if no one's going to take a minute and try to review your complaint. 
this is my first time ever using lyft and it was all a mess. very confusing in using this app. why was i charged 3 times? this driver never made a second stop he went from point a to point b. so why am i charged 3 times? i need this explained.
title: Unprofessional help center

review: i downloaded the lyft app and within minutes i selected a driver and it only too five minutes.  benjamin our driver was great and his car smelled amazing.
title: The ease of using Lyft

review: i used uber for a long while then lyft came along we heard only good things  which were true until 2022 dropped schedules prices change by the seconds! use to cost us 32$ ride from nashville international airport to nashville i just paid 78$ why because lyft is getting greedy. may as well use a taxi if this is lyfts game they want to play. going to try uber again
title: What's happening with Lyft

review: satti was on time, very friendly, and helpful with luggage.  he was good with the kids and kept such a good conversation the ride went by in a blink. he was a safe driver and his car was very clean.
title: Great driver!

review: hope to add more languages, now diversification hope to see it in future versions
title: Diversified car users

review: lyft is much more than just a ride-hailing app. it's what i turn to to see when the next bus or train is coming, or where to find a metro bike. love it!
title: All-purpose transportation app

review: uber over lyft any day just off their lost and found policy. i left my airpods in my lyft and immediately flagged it. the driver verified they found it 2 days later and after 2 weeks all lyft did was give a $5 coupon i clearly won't be using and said they can't guarantee i'll get my $150 earphones back despite receiving verification they were found.
title: terrible policies

review: i like lyft just wish you would not stop drivers from picking up rides once they commit to a ride people don't like to wait for rides after working 12 hours a day
title: Rides

review: i had at least three lyft drivers cancel the trip from my hotel to union station. as a result, we missed our train. we now have to buy two train tickets for tomorrow, get a hotel for tonight, and pay all the expenses that result from spending another night in dc. i am not sure why drivers are allowed to cancel a passenger, at least, three times.
title: Three Cancelled Drivers

review: i've used the app for years but these past few months have been horrible. the drivers are constantly changing and making me wait up to an hour before getting picked up. when they do arrive they pick me up in a spot that i did not designate. it's been extremely aggravating.
title: Constantly changing drivers

review: i was picked up at my surgeons office this driver is very helpful very polite very respectful and he went beyond to try to help me get in his truck seeing that i was with a cane very clean vehicle i recommend him to anyone!!
title: Awesome driver

review: i'm boogie and everything about how perfect my experience with this driver was excellent so if ur boogie like me pick this driver i hope i get him again!!
title: Highly recommend

review: i don't like the constant price changes within just a few minutes. your prices have also gone up which i'm not too fond of. your services used to be very very affordable. on the contrary, thanks anyhow for your services.
title: Prices

review: i have started liking lyft more than the other national brand , very nice driver today.
title: I had a really nice driver today very professional kind and helpful! I enjoyed riding with him.

review: i am 85 and don't feel comfortable driving anymore. my granddaughter helps order rides on my behalf so that i can be more independent and get my hair done.
title: Helpful for the elderly

review:
so easy and affordable. our driver buck was my favorite.. changed my life perspective forever. you can't put enough stars in a review for that.
thank you lyft
title: Better than Uber!!!!

review: i've had this app for years and for some reason, once i have put my location and destination address, it zooms out, and looks like it is going to load drivers available, but it never does. it's been this way for weeks now !!! i deleted and downloaded the app again, i have reset my phone, i'm completely unable to use it !!
title: Does not work AT ALL

review: app has a mind of its own - destination not working. after entering address it freezes. after multiple attempts it appears to accept the address but then it switches to a previous destination in your history! repeatedly it's changed the address i enter to two doors up the street and quotes a $7 price! insane. lyft is no longer usable.
title: App not working

review:
drivers are very polite and the fares are
quite a bit cheaper sometimes up to $40
cheaper than uber.
title: Drivers always pleasant.

review: this guy went above and beyond with the service and that's what it's all about excellent communication skills and a very nice person keep up lyft you guys rock all over that uber
title: Gerry

review: had to drive around the block because he missed address. prices have gone up a lot since pre pandemic, it feels like.
title: Expensive. Driver went past and

review: my family has been using for a long time now  every time on point
title: Lyft service

review: thanks sooo much, way better than uber( no shade, just being honest). on time, friendly, patient and understanding!!!! the prices were amazing and definitely worth it.
title: Super awesome driver

review:
used to be great. now the price they show and the price they charge are different.  too often priority rides gets pushed back to longer wait times with no decrease in price. 

paid 3x the standard price for a 3 minute pick up. got pushed back to an 11 minute wait for no discount in fare. uber had the same 11 minute wait for the 1x price.
title: Bait and switch too many times.

review: i called my lyft at a certain time and paid alex yea and ended up waiting even longer just because the drivers kept switching , and when my driver was 4 min away it switched me to another driver who was 10 min away and just ended up being late after paying lyft extra to get picked up faster. such a disappointment!
title: Not on time

review: first experience with lyft and he was great! it was a 5am pick up and i was worried he'd be late but he was a bit early. very kind person as well
title: Quick and kind

review: my driver was fast and responsive she was to me quickly and very clean car and smelled really good as well i would recommend her again for sure
title: Hi

review: every driver i have had has gone above and beyond to help me with my walker without complaint. which an urber driver just told me to call someone else
title: Great Drivers

review: after a very stressful trip we received the kindest and safest driver named louis. he drove us from fort lauderdale  to our miami airport and was a wonderful, kind and safe driver! thank you luis and lyft for protecting my family.
title: Thank you Lyft and Luis

review: the app has a lot of issues including constant cancellations but the worst thing i noticed today was that it's terrible at giving directions to drivers. checking what it says against google maps, lyft is giving its drivers terrible route suggestions that are consistently much much longer than the best and or fastest way to go.
title: Horrible

review: excellent customer service, clean car, drove well, good conversation and professional in her ways. keep up the good work and thank you for your kindness, it's well appreciated.!!
title: Excellent customer service!!

review:
my key to my car wouldn't work i downloaded the lyft app & with in minutes(like under ten) i was on my way to pick up my baby from grandmas. 
thank you lyft.
title: Emergency Situation

review: driver was great. however, app photo of driver needed to be updated, as well as the car expected to pick me up. that seems basic housekeeping to me. otherwise, satisfied customer.
title: Need to update App Info

review: primary example.. when i get in a lyft and look at the app, why does the map shrink to an unusable size? the driver details take up more than half the screen! and you can't minimize them. why would i want to know every detail about my driver versus how far / where i am along my trip.
title: Horrible UX compared to Uber

review: app does not display correctly on iphone 12 mini. less than 1/2 inch of map is visible with the rest being taken up by ride and driver info. this happens every time after being picked up and ride starts.
title: Display Issues

review: lyft clearly needs to reinvest revenue back into the app and service because using uber vs lyft is literally night and day. so many complaints but the worst being these multiple uneccessarily large holds they put on  your card pretty much locking you in without guarenteeing a ride. lyft is just horrible and wont last unless they make some major changes.
title: Just Use Uber

review: you would think that you would be able to get a ride after a concert, since the area is busy and lots of people are around. with uber, there were tons of drivers around ready to pick up people, but with lyft, i was waiting over 20 minutes when they finally said they couldn't find me a driver. ridiculous
title: No drivers ever

review: how do they have a 4.9 rating still after allowing drivers to cancel at last minute no repercussions, over charging for rides, making u take a $7 ride for $14. this is ridiculous. making it unaffordable for people to ride and then only showing good reviews .
title: So drivers can just cancel 3 minutes away and not pay for our inconvenience?

review: driver was extremely helpful and pleasant not to mentioned the car was clean and beautiful quick ride easy drop.i'm sure i made an everlasting impression.
title: Bradly

review: not sure what's going on but lyft has been in useable for me lately. drivers usually cancel last minute and i have to wait 20+ mins for a ride. if it's past 11pm, there's usually no drivers for me. i've experienced this in both santa barbara and la. i'm using uber until they figure this out
title: Left stranded, long wait times

review: she was amazing wonderful driving the fastest driver to come pick us up than any other very good conversation car very well clean and bear will present it
title: The best

review: y'all sent my drive to the wrong location to drop me off
title: Directions to destination

review: easy to use interface!  this is really an amazing application that makes business travel a pleasure
title: Business traveler

review: lyft has been wonderful. we use lyft for us in los angeles and thankfully we use it for my daughter who lives in aurora colorado. it's just a great feeling knowing lyft is there whenever we need it !!!
title: Quick and Safe

review: when you need everything to go smoothly , this was a dream.
title: Early morning pick up

review: lyft wanted $74 for a ride and i had it in the bank but it would not authorize my card. i tried several times. almost late for work, i tried uber and got the same ride and my drop off time was 15 minutes sooner than lyft said. the best part? i got the same ride for $35. switch to uber. don't do it fam. don't pay double for rides! and get dropped off sooner
title: Don't do it fam

review: new to this place.  both drivers to and from my destination were awesome. professional, friendly and informative.
title: Yes!

review:
i was a longtime customer for lyft and it'll stay as was as i will no longer use lyft as i've had a terrible experience with their customer service asking for their assistance and they were not willing to help whatsoever. 
i kept asking and they were not willing.
that was a truly disappointing experience so i will no longer use lyft.
title: Terrible customer service

review: a lot of drivers cancel the ride after i waited over 15mins. your driver will be there in 2mins then i wait outside before they arrive..then we're looking for another driver near by like what's going on?! please make better system. when we cancel the rides we got charged but when we waste our time we don't get nothing:( it's unfair.
title: Need better system!

review: i've been using lyft for about a week and it would accept my card and now it won't and my card has money on it i just updated the app so i'm hoping it works it keeps charging my grandmas card instead of mine which is not ok my information is fine i called my bank and they don't know what's going on
title: Declined my card when it wants

review: i have waited for hours and no has come to pick me up. times keep changing and still no driver! i am really angry as i need to get to the hospital!
title: Useless

review: since l joined l have always liked the service all drivers are on time , nice and friendly l have come to rely solely upon lyft to get me to and from and appointments or errands knowing  l will get there safely
title: Availablility

review: if you don't have reliable transportation like a car, we'll guess what? you still don't. an app where the driver can cancel on you at any time with no penalty but oh no, if you cancel, be ready to pay that fee. in conclusion, if you want reliable transportation, get some nice shoes and walk to your destination. if you don't want to do that, just get an uber.
title: Unreliable

review: went above and beyond , it was a bad situation.. but he rocked and it's much appreciated he communicated with me throughout the whole ride to make sure my friend got to me and he was awesome thank you antonio
title: Driver

review: it's nice to know that good and honest people are still around.i believe that you are one of them. god bless you and your family always.
title: Samaritan

review: i seldom use it for pick up at my house due to the gps not providing the right directions, making my experience too stressful and uncomfortable because drivers get upset when they have to go round and round
title: GPS

review: uber generally works better and is cheaper. wait and save rarely meets its (already lax) commitments. drivers regularly claim they picked you up when they are no where near you/the pickup pointto game lyft's driver app, i assume. i don't see these problems with uber.
title: Basic functions mostly workdon't count on more complex stuff

review: it's december 29, 3:22 am, my flight leaves pbi at 5:45. i scheduled the ride a full day in advance. and it's not until 3 am, the actual pick up time that no drivers are available, or with other passengers. the pick time getting pushed back, which is ridiculous for a supposed scheduled drive. had to be inconvenienced to pay almost triple at the airport for parking. horrible experience.
title: Genuinely disgusted.

review: lyft and uber's algorithms are designed to squeeze the most amount of money out of you. the prices are astronomical now and on top of that i can't count how many times my rides were cancelled when i needed them most. oh yeah they intentionally make it near impossible to contact customer service. if there's a handful of companies that i want to see fail. this is one of them.
title: Racketeering App

review: during our visit to la we found lyft far more dependable than uber!!!!!   always on time and never cancelling last minute like uber
title: Dependable

review:
please chill with the spamming on notifications and email with all these savings. a lot of us have cars. i only use the service as a last resort. if i need to unsubscribe and/or turn off my notifications so be it. 
but overall, good service.
title: Spamming

review: took a long time to get the ride from elgin to bastrop accepted. it did get accepted once and then several minutes later the first driver canceled. i then had to rebook with a looooong wait and cost me $10 more for the same ride. bad experience this time with lyft.
title: Long wait

review: why is it that i can only use this app if i'm on wi-fi?? that's soo stupid and frustrating. it should be able to work without having wi-fi.
title: Can't use Lyft without Wi-Fi?!!!

review: this driver we was awesome, he was very nice and he made the hour long driving experience really fun, i definitely would recommend him.
title: Great experience

review: either i'm lucky or lyft is just amazing. i'm not their best customer, but every time i use this service it is easy and pleasant.
title: Always an excellent experience

review: driver didn't speak english but we communicated through a translator app. he was nice enough to wait for me while i picked my daughter up from summer camp and then drove us home
title: Ed

review: big difference between uber. a lot better with everything
title: Better than Uber

review: i was waiting on a lyft this morning in portland and three different times i was sent another driver when the original was about to arrive.  i ended up waiting 30 minutes to finally get a ride.  no acceptable.
title: Frustrated

review: 2 different drivers 2 different environments but both clean and smooth ride!
title: Highly recommend

review: drivers are well prepared and capable, timely and courteous. we tend to lean more toward lyft than other ride share providers for their great quality and competitive pricing.
title: Excellent Service

review: my driver was wonderful and we talked the entire way. he was warm and friendly and i would recommend him to everyone!! definitely 5 stars!
title: James/driver

review: very friendly good service he should be training people i enjoyed my ride would suggest lift to anyone recommend craig great person felt very safe
title: This is for my Lyft driver Craig

review: 5 star customer for 10 months and now since i canceled a ride because i didn't want to wait 30-45 minutes it blocked me from being able to get any rides and caused so many issues for my life i hate how i can't even go to work anymore because of this app being weird i lost everything
title: Needs to be fixed!

review: i really enjoyed this ride, he was at my pick up spot in less than a minute. i was back at my place within seven minutes. great guy!
title: Philly Boi

review: the drivers were friendly and got me to my destination in a safe manner. thank you drivers.
title: Great drivers

review: driver was on time and car was clean. edith was above and beyond, despite her gps directions - she knew better to avoid traffic and get me there safely. she was awesome! thanks edith
title: My first time using Lyft

review: if i could give it zeros stars i would literally the worse the prices are outrageous i have had plenty of drivers that are a minute a way cancel after having me wait 10 -20 minutes rides take forever to find and even if they cancel your ride it's on hold so u won't get money back til 5-7 days later just horrible
title: Don't get Lyft

review: sometimes i forget to rate the stars for the drivers and i want to be able to go back and add that.
title: Rating drivers

review:
every time except once when ordering a
lyft ride it will give a time then switch a driver multiple times and will keep indicating the same driver is 8 mins away for
30 mins.  good news is it forced me to get a cab.  1/3 the cost with nice tip and four people verses 3.  check out the cab option
title: Lyft is struggling!

review: the ride was much cheaper this time than the last, on the same route.
title: Price

review: i've had numerous opportunities to use lyft. i've been very impressed with the drivers courtesy & the comfortable ride. lyft will be my first choice when transportation is needed.
title: Good experience with Lyft

review: driver was friendly and kind car was clean and trip was smooth and fast i'd recommend him to anyone .
title: Great service

review: matthew is so personable and kind. i really enjoyed getting to know him and his passion, and also we had some great conversations. thank you!
title: Amazing person

review:
why more at 5:30 am forme to get too work?
i start at 6am and will have to pay more now then  being late !
title: Prices

review: i found lyft has much higher cancellation rate than uber. i got two drivers canceled last minute in a ride. wasted 20 min waiting time at least.  they all rated 5 star what a joke. the angry customer never got to review their bad behavior
title: Too many canceled drivers.

review:
hi 
how can i pickup 4 people from 4 different spots and how can i drop off 4 people off at 4 different locations?????
title: How can I drop off and pick up from 4 different locations

review:
drivers shouldn't be able to cancel the ride once they have arrived for pickup. waiting all that time and then getting the driver to just go away is not a great service. 
it doesn't give me confidence in using the app.
title: Terrible service

review:
every time i schedule a pick up, it gets canceled at the very last moment. 
why isn't it possible to select a pick up point based on your current location by a dropping a pin?
title: Scheduled pick up

review: always excellent service by lyft drivers never had a problem highly recommended
title: Great service

review: i was talking with a coworker about which he used and he recommended lyft 100%. he was spot on and everything got done smoothly.
title: Info was true!

review: a true patriot from the marine corp gave me my first lyft ride.   he was an amazing driver and conversationalist!   a wonderful man & his service to his country far outweighs his driving service!   i wish he was my driver every time!  good hire!!!
title: Buck

review: i am rather fond of this app, if i would have used this app when i went drinking i probably would still have my car, drink responsibly.
title: LYFT

review: overall the app is okay, except that often you'll have to bear with the problem of the drivers canceling the scheduled ride or canceling it after having you wait for tens of minutes.
title: Fair, except for the uncertainties

review: we had 4 cancellations in a row after we were notified that the driver was within 2 minutes of pick up. not sure how this can be prevented but it is very unpleasant for the customer when they are sitting in the hot sun.
title: Canceled pick ups.

review: loved being able to prebook my ride. it was difficult to change the number of passengers and there was no chat feature on the app to get help. the driver was amazing the app average.
title: Love the Plan Ahead

review: you'll pay for a ride and the driver will be 5 min away then they'll switch you to another driver that's 10 mins away. it's not always this bad but it's more bad than good. please do something about this because uber is definitely beating lyft as far as customer satisfaction! do better lyft!
title: It's a no for me!!!

review: this was my first experience using lyft. it was above and beyond my expectations and i will definitely use them again.
title: Will be a continued customer!

review: web site hard to use uber is much better. also supposed to get the promotion at 50% off for the second ride. how do i get it.? i paid the full amount. thanks
title: Ride from JFK

review: i have always had really good drivers and i appreciate it. your interview process is very good. thank you for helping me feel safe.
title: Thank you.

review: every time i order a ride they cancel my ride at least once. one time i ordered a lyft and got it 40 mins later cause they canceled it 4 times. they need to penalize the people canceling rides because i'm on a time crunch here and i constantly have to wait.
title: Good but not consistent

review: driver lied and said we damaged his car. lyft didn't even contact me they just automatically charged $80 and wouldn't even care what i had to say about it. customer service is vague and shady just like their drivers. this is considering that my stats as a customer were 5 star reviews over 4 years and a high tipper status - totally insulting! account deleted!
title: Lyft damage scam

review: this has happened multiple times where a drivers sees the location i am going to doesn't want to go and then says they will cancel my ride and then reports me for not having a mask on when i do have a mask on to avoid fees and then i get banned for several days. i am done with this app and it's scamming drivers.
title: Awful app with awful drivers

review: always makes me late for work takes forever to get a ride and switches drivers for no reason. unsafe, drivers are rude .
title: Terrible app

review: i'm a cheapskate so it could always be a lil cheaper but i'm grateful to have the service for emergencies as were a one car family & i hv no other way to get her to school should she miss the bus
title: Transportation Backup

review: with the outrageous prices you've got going on here, if the option says my lyft would get to me in 5 minutes, once i purchase that option it shouldn't suddenly say 8 minutes....especially if i'm paying the same price
title: Say what you mean

review: great way to get around and meet new people great way to work on social skills and it helps people who cannot drive yet as in myself a wounded veteran who got hurt overseas
title: Great

review: first, the fee for lyft was 30% of the uber fee.  second, my driver was fabulous, clean car, friendly but not overly so, and punctual!  2 thumbs up!
title: Fast, efficient and cheaper than Uber

review: this guy was super nice and friendly. i was freezing outside. he allowed me to sit up front with the seat warmer. i am forever grateful to my driver. a true gentleman . he deserves more than 5 stars!
title: Lyft

review: in the last two years, prices have increased and efficiency and reliability have decreased.  routinely the ride wait time is double the estimate given by the app.  drivers often cancel rides and there are fewer drivers available, all the while prices have continued to increase.
title: Wait times have doubled

review: i was honored to have a veteran as my driver.  thank you you for your service, edward.  it was a pleasure meeting you.  wishing you many blessings with your future endeavors.
title: Wonderful experience!

review: lyft always has kind and courteous drivers.  we never have to wait long for a ride.  most drivers are familiar with local area.
title: Pleased

review:
i see that you guys are better than uber  definitely more affordable than them.
thank you
title: Ride

review: both drivers wore very nice on time i had my mother with me using a wheelchair they help me to get it in and out of the car with out asking for assistance! great service's!
title: Lift

review: the more you go to the app and look the more the fee goes up it's like it's analyze your movement. it's crazy because the first time i was looking at it it was $19 after 10 minutes even up to 25 another five minutes it went up to $30.
title: See that's how it is

review:
ebikes are constantly reporting inaccurate locations leading to infinite charges and $25 incorrect parking fees.

you need to work with customer service to get reimbursed. however, they don't reimburse you entirely for the inconvenience. consequently, lyft will likely not feel the impact of their poor service causing it to propagate. 

pretty obnoxious overall.
title: eBike GPS is wildly incorrect

review: driving with lift is pleasant and makes my life easier! thank you lift team and drivers for the professionalism
title: Thank you note

review: i don't understand the point of charging someone 4 times for one ride. lyft literally charged me $63 over 4 repeated charges for one ride and i don't get the option to dispute it or even figure out why it is i got charged more than once for one ride. is there something i can do? can i get the money i didn't spend on the trip back?
title: Charged 4 times

review: i appreciate the ride, and i would use lyft more often except for one problem with the app. when looking for a ride out of lax, the app would not show me the cost for the ride before pressing the button to confirm the ride. since i needed to know the cost beforehand, i went with uber.
title: App needs work

review: service is awesome! the only downside is it's always a surge time anymore no matter when you fly it's getting real old
title: Great service!

review: each time i use this app it switches my driver to a closer driver over and over again. what starts out as a 10 minute wait for a driver to arrive often turns into a 15-20 minute wait. it's frustrating when i'm trying to get to work.
title: The app switches drivers at least 2x each time!

review: i feel great to bring people safely home
title: I'm very happy to drive go Lyft I make better money than before when I was driving for Uber

review: needs updates for accuracy on maps for pick up location
title: GPS updates

review: lyft supports and gives money to officials/politicians who support abortion bans. anyone can look at an follow the money report and see for themselves. roe v wade is overturned and lyft wants to provide abortion benefits for employees to travel out of state for abortions, but maybe they shouldn't have funded politicians who want to take away women's healthcare rights in the first place. i've requested to delete my account. i'd rather walk.
title: Supports abortion bans

review:
phillip was the absolute best. 
was on time, car was clean.
he was friendly. kind and a good conversationalist.
gave us good information about the area
title: The best experience

review: appreciated the quick response to my request. carlos car was very clean and he was a safe driver.
title: Quick response

review: even when the source address is accurately given, the driver is being sent to a different location. this is the second time i am facing this. hopefully this can be remedied
title: Maps not accurate

review: i was out waiting in the 90 weather for 20+ minutes when the driver canceled right before they got to me. i was stuck requesting another ride which was going to be another 20 minutes until arrival. why would the driver accept a ride and then cancel 20 minutes later? unbelievable.

review:
i had a doctors appointment friday morning put in for a lyft.  waited for someone to be assigned.  it then said 7 minutes til arrival to pick me up. i waited. and waited. that driver cancelled. assigned another person.   9 minutes to get here. i waited and again he cancelled. i missed my doctors appointment. ok am quite upset. whose fault is it lyft or the driver. 
now i feel better. i got it off my chest.

review: canceled a 50 dollar ride for my sister because she was able to find a ride. saw the hold was there so i exited the app. i returned to check on it and the hold was no longer there and the money was never returned to my account. i may change my review if i can get back my lost money, but other than the entire situation irritates me.

just ordered an lyft that was $16 when i got in they claimed my address was where i was being picked up  right i would pay $16 do go nowhere. so i update to the original address and they charge me $32! the only reason i chose this ride was because it was the cheapest option-turned out to be the most expensive. 
so disappointed in this app

cons:

no customer service number

all of the phone agents are foreigners who have strong accents and only read from scripts (they are idiots who know only how to read scripted answers)

need a refund from buying lyft cash? too bad; no refunds!

they will block your account, dont tell you and still take your money when you attempt to buy lyft cash.

need help right away? too bad; you can only request an accident reporting agent to call you you (but no, you can't call them)

did i mention that the agents are complete idiots?

overpriced

review:
i booked a lyft ride for $53.
i got in the car. 
the driver stated that the app froze and that he would not be able to proceed with the ride. 
he canceled the ride and lyft did not send another driver. 
i had to re-request a ride and was offered a rate of $63. 
i tried to submit a complaint and was offered a list of pre-set feedback questions. 
thank you for leaving me stranded and taking the opportunity to up-charge. 
your rates continue to increase, yet the customer service experience continues to decline. 
i deleted your stupid app and took a taxi.

review: usually cheaper than uber not cheaper than a cab but more reliable usually a dollar more than my local cab company or 2 with a tip worth a dollar or 2 more if you don't want the aggravation of waiting i use the wait and save  15 minutes before i have to leave some times most of the time it's never more than 5 to 10 minutes when i call a cab they say 5 to 10 minutes i've waited up to an hour sometimes 30hr never less than 15 and then they say do you mind if i stop i've got another pick up really i think lyft could and should work on their pricing late at night prices double inclement weather or busy triple sometimes i think if your a regular customer which i am they should base their prices on the local taxi fares when i say they are 1 or two more than the local taxi that is the best one in our area there are ones cheaper by 3 or 4 dollars but they re a nightmare and are only available certain hours when lyft doubles or triples it's price i do use a cab i've called for a lyft and a 8,9,10.$ride is now 23 $or more than i just can't and won't pay that a little extra is fine but overcharging excessively because someone is stuck is horrendous as far as i'm concerned there's a name for that it's called price gouging most people know and appreciate the service and will tip the driver extra however when that happens you don't appreciate the service and i don't want not to tip the driver so i do and am resentful and mad i even paid for the service all and all it's a great company a great convenience as with all companies could it be better absolutely in general there going in the right direction for me if they charged me 8$everyday every time instead of 9 or 10$ for the same service i would use them a minimum of 2 times a day 5days a week but because of their price changes i probably only use them 6times a week i shop around and only use them when i  truly can't be late or can't be bothered do use them enough to say all in all they re great i wish i i had no disparaging remarks to say about them i think they are on their way to greatness with those couple fixes i would recommend them to everyone and anyone i know i have and do but tell them to be wary and check out their options first sometimes ubers cheaper if they don't mind waiting call a cab if its late or bad weather or heavy traffic ask a friend unfortunately that's my stance i want and wish i could stand 100%behind them and hopefully one day i will be able too that said i still give them 5 stars
title: Best option out there

review: well it's been a roller coaster riding with lyft because i just started using lyft a week ago and the first day i used it was the worst experience you could have i guess i shouldn't have let ivonne the driver invite someone else to drive me to atlantic city because he was a very unsafe driver and he speeded and drove recklessly at times and then as we arrived in atlantic city the mood changed very quickly because ivonne wanted a off the books ride so we came to an agreement on $100 cash and then the driver who she said was her boss so i guess because he was the one that actually drove he wanted the $170 that was the price that was close to what the ride would've been which didn't make sense to me because it's not like lyft doesn't take there share of the ride so we got into an argument and i didn't know where we were so as we drove down harrahs blvd he decided to stop the car and jump into the back where he decided to start hitting me in my leg and thigh and then started punching me and i was trying to calm him down and i said whatever i will just give you the money and then he said then give it to me then he grabbed my cell phone and threw it into the bushes area and i was going to get the phone but then i saw him jump into the car so i didn't want him to take off with all my belongings so i was able to pop the trunk and grab my duffel bag but i wasn't able to grab my suitcase which had most of my clothes thousands of dollars worth of clothes i had cash and jewelry and other personal belongings that i really need but he just took off and wouldn't even answer the phone and ivonne acted like none of this ever happened so i was assaulted and then grand theft of my suitcase so it started off as a nightmare but since then the drivers have been great and they are just what i expected them to be!!! but i'm stilll upset that even lyft hasn't really got back to me on this issue so it looks like they aren't even investigating so i'm just very disappointed in how they are handling this or shall i say not really doing anything and are not even handling this!!
title: Lyft experience

review: usually no issue with the app or taxi dispatcher except the last time i used lyft to go back home my hospital follow up specialist visit. i ordered a low sedan car like a toyota camry so that wearing large back brace and cannot climb into a suburban car. the first driver shows up in a high suburban wagon. i explain to him that the car is too high for me and i have a fractured spine and cannot climb into it. he acted as if he didn't understand english and kept using hand signal thinking that i talking about my walker . i canceled the ride because climbing into would be unsafe for me. cancel that ride and again specify for the next driver my limitations and request a low sedan car. i get a notification that i am getting a mercedes benz. the pic of it was also going to be an unsafe care for me and i was not looking for the most expensive car. i canceled that and attempted a 3 rd try. the pic of the 3 rd car was another highlander type of high van. i ask the driver to please cancel the ride and told him i was hanicapped. this driver on the call rudely told  that is not my problem . all the while i could find any way to report this to lyft support for help. there is no place for free text to say this was a safety issue for me. i finally grabbed a low yellow taxi sedan. i found out the yellow taxi have apps such as arrow and curb. i hate to break up with lyft. i have been a steady customers for many years. please have a way for the rider to free text the unsafe conditions for us.
title: Handicapped using walker and back brace

review: i have generally had excellent riding experiences with the app. in nyc the app generally offers a variety of rates based on wait times for a ride and type of vehicle. tonight i could have selected a general rate of around $18 to my destination, but with wait time for pickup estimated at 17 minutes. then for around $4 more i was offered a pick-up in just 1 minute, if i selected that option immediately, which i did. after i selected i was told my estimated time for pick up was 15 minutes. so i figured the car available in only a minute had been taken. several seconds later the app found a car that was estimated to pick me up in 7 minutes.  that car did arrive within the estimated time, but to my surprise after i got home i discovered that i had been charged the higher rate. the $4 difference will not break me, but these types of rate and wait time discrepancies seem to occur all too frequently. although traffic can always be a factor in longer wait times in new york city, traffic does not seem to be an issue whenever i encounter these discrepancies. i have also been charged with cancellation fees at least twice when a driver failed to show up at the designated place, and did not offer me the courtesy of a phone call. i hope that lyft will endeavor to improve its app and other systems to benefit the customer. frankly, i have been using good old nyc taxi cabs more often over the past year or longer, because of taxis' superior availability, reliability, and predictability. maybe nyc taxis will now drive their chief competitors, uber and lyft, to improve delivery of customer service in this competitive market place. we will see.
title: App car fare charges

title: Save time

review:
so this morning at 7:25am scheduled a lyft drive to take my wife and i and one other couple to the airport in destin, florida. he shows up on time and says he can't carry 4 passengers and i should have requested an xl car. i believe he was right and it was my mistake. the driver decided to rush off and i tried to stop him and let him know that he could take 2 of us and i would call a second car to pick us up. as it turns out that's what we had to do. i don't understand this whole 3 or 5 passenger thing with lift, to me it sounds like a scam that i have never experienced with uber. my friends i was with we're the ones that suggested lyft to me this past week. so i decided to try them out. i know from using your completion uber that the price can change at different times because of supply & demand. but i saw my rate change from $50-$60 dollar rates to $163-$195 and back down to $50-$60 in a time frame of ten to fifteen minutes. that's crazy and when does gauging come into play. either way. i don't really need the games and if you look and see, i have know problem paying good money for a ride somewhere i need to go and tip at 25% for the great drivers that do there job and enjoy the work. i recognize hard workers and don't mind giving them a little extra for there integrity and there ability to humble themselves and do the right thing to get out there and make a living and work for what the want in life. 
one more mention, even after the things i experienced with one of your drivers i didn't give up on you and i sent my nephew home tonight using lyft and my nephew chase called me after he got home and told me what a great experience he had riding home and talking to rashad his lyft driver and what a great individual he is. thank you for taking the time to read my story tonight!!

review: this app seems to have way more bugs (yes, specifically app bugs) than uber. i have good comparison since i'm a heavy user of both. it also doesn't have any obvious place in the ui for users to report bugs. i wonder if those two facts are related. one example from today is when i were waiting for a shared saver ride, got an app notification that the driver is arriving soon, and one minute later the entire ride has disappeared - no notification about the driver canceling, not a trace in ride history, nothing. i was back on the "where are you going?" screen. another bug from an app version months ago that lasted for many days was with multi-stop rides. the driver would only see the final stop of the ride - we actually compared how the app was showing the ride differently on our devices and were amazed! the bug lasted for several days and maybe longer, but i switched entirely to uber for multi-stop rides.  sometimes the app has inaccurate map data as well (i have witnessed a railway station to have pickup spot located on a nearby freeway, where it's even illegal for a pedestrian to be). there is no way either to report this kind of problems as well. all the app's issue reporting features are dedicated to problems with the drivers. when i contacted user support, the representatives seemed unable to grasp the concept of a bug report or to acknowledge there might be a problem within the app itself and its underlying network services. i think that until the developer rethinks this design or improves their testing, lyft app will continue to suffer from those common and preventable issues.
title: App buggy, doesn't provide an avenue for reporting app bugs
